1b1(dkon brtsegs): /rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya ug g+ha pa ri prod ts+tshan+d+ra ma ma hA yAn sU tra/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/'phags pa drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg
1b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa
1b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
2a1(dkon brtsegs): /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
2a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra ba na/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gau dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems
2a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' che ni po byams pa dang //'jam dpal dang /ngan song spong dang /smra ni ras gzigs
2a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug dang /mthu cheni thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
2a5(dkon brtsegs): te/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brga stong du mas yongs su be skor cing mdun gyis bltas nas
2b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te/tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig
2b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag pa/yongs su byang ba/yang dag par rab tu ston to//
2b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni sa khyim bdag drag shul can g.yog lde brgya dang /mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed
2b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba gre lo ba dang /bcom ldan 'das gol ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
2b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyeg 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go
2b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan rnams kyang 'di lta ste/khyim bdag dgo' 'dod dang /khyim bdag grags 'dod dang
3a1(dkon brtsegs): /khyim bdag legs byin dang /khyim bdag dga' byed dang /khyim bdag grags byin dang /khyim bdag
3a2(dkon brtsegs): nor bzangs dang /khyim bdag tshul dga' dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas byin dang /khyim bdag klu dpal dang /
3a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag bden dga' dang /de dag dang gzhan yang khyim bdag rab tu mang po rnams g.yog lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /mnyan yod
3a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga le ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga
3a5(dkon brtsegs): la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyog 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
3a6(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//khyim bdag de dag thams cad phal cher ni g.yog dang bcas te
3b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byas
3b2(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag go//de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis khyimo bdag gi 'khor chen po de 'dus par shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
3b3(dkon brtsegs): mthus stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom
3b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba betud nas//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu
3b5(dkon brtsegs): pa lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye ni/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
3b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag
3b7(dkon brtsegs): drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyim bdag khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyis/khyim bdag khyod
4a1(dkon brtsegs): /ci dang ci 'dod pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /de ltar dris pa de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka'
4a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
4a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /theg pa chen po la mos pa dang /theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang /theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang /theg po chen po
4a4(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug par 'tshal ba dang //theg pa chen po la dam bca' ba dang /sems can thams cad gnyer ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa dang /sems can thams cad
4a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyab pa'i slang go cha 'tshal ba dang /ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba
4a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzlag//zhes sems can thams cad kyi don du khur chen
4a7(dkon brtsegs): bo len pa dang 'jug pa rlabs po che chen po la rab tu gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dpag tum
4b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa thos nas/ye shes de yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba dang /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skyon mang po du ma 'tshal kyang yid yongs
4b2(dkon brtsegs): su mi skyo zhing bskal pa grangs ma mchis par 'khor yang sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba de dag dang /bcom ldan 'das de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang
4b3(dkon brtsegs): dag khyim gyi gnas nas byung ste/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub cing khyim na mi gnas pa dag dang /yang khyim na gnas shing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag
4b4(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub ste/khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par mi 'byung ba dag mchis na/bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /theg pa chen po 'di rjes
4b5(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
4b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i yon tan rnam par bzhag pa de legs par bshad du gsol/byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi sa la gnas nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid
4b7(dkon brtsegs): cing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams/yongs su mi nyams te tshe 'di la yang las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis shing gzhan du yang bye brag tu mchis par 'gyur ba dang /bcom
5a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das glang yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ste/sdug pa dang mi sdug pa spangs nas sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/
5a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim ma logs par rab tu byung ba de dag ji tsam du gdams pa dang /rjes su bstan pa gnyis kyis chos spyod pa dang /dge ba spyod pa yang dag par rab
5a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bshad du gsol/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung bas ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim 'das
5a4(dkon brtsegs): dreg shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyim bdag logs so legs so//khyod nga la don 'dri'i dri bar sems pa khyod kyi tshul dang 'thun pa'o//de'i phyir legs par
5a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung bas ji ltar bslab pa'i yon tan yang dag par gzung zhing spyod pa mchog la gnos par bya ba dang /
5a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bsgrub par bya bangs khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/khyim bdag drag shul can bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
5a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o//chos la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o//
5b1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o//de gsum la skyabs su song ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o//khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems
5b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa
5b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsgrub par bya'o snyam du sems mngon par 'du byed de/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rna ba de dag
5b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de lta bu'i khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no//khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos
5b5(dkon brtsegs): la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la gus pa dang bcas shing ri mor byed pa dang bcas pa chos don du gnyer ba chos 'dod pa chos kyi kun dga' la
5b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' zhing mes pa chos la gzhol bya/chos la 'bab pa/chos bsrung ba/chos sbed cing gnas pa/chos kyi grags pa dang /chos kyi spyod pa la gnas pa/chos kyi dbang du gyur pa/chos yongs su
5b7(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba/chos yongs su dag pa/chos kyi stobs dang ldan pa/chos kyi sbyin pa'i mtshon dang ldan pa/chos kyi bya ba byed pa de de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
6a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la chos kyis bgo ba sha bya'o snyam du dran pa rab tu thob ste/khyim bdag de ltar
6a2(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos la skyabs su song ba yin no//khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin zhe na/khyim bdag 'di la byang
6a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba ni/gal te dge slong rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/dgra bcom pa'am/so so'i skye 'o
6a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/theg pa chen po pa dag mthong na de de la gus pa dang bcas/zhe sa dang bcas shing ldang bar brtson la bka' blo bde
6a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing mthun par 'dzin pa yin te/de yang dag par song ba dang /de yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas pas 'di ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
6a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /nyan thos kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du dran pa rab tu thob ste/de de
6a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pa yin gyi/de dag la mi dka' bar ni mi byed de/de ltar na khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no//
6b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /dam bcas pa mi 'jigs pa
6b2(dkon brtsegs): drang /snying rje chen po yongs su mi gtong ba dang /theg pa gzhan la mi dmigs pa ste/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba
6b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na chos la skyabs su song ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la brten cing bsnyen
6b4(dkon brtsegs): tebasnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byas nas chos nyan pa dang /chos thos nas tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang /ji ltar khong du chud pa rnams
6b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang ston cing yang dag par rab tu 'chad pa dang /khyim bdag chos kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsu ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba
6b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/chos la skyabs su song ba yin no//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan
6b7(dkon brtsegs): na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dag pa skyon med pa la zhugs pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dzud pa dang /gang zang zing
7a1(dkon brtsegs): gis spyad par byed pa da dag rgyas bsgrub la sbyor ba dang /byang chub sems dang 'byor mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rton pa ma yin pa dang /nyan thos ni sngon tan yang ra du
7a2(dkon brtsegs): chol la/de'i rnam par grol ba la mos pa yang ma yin pa s+t+wa~M/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi pa do dag dang ldan na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no//khyim bdag gzhan yang
7a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gzugs mthong nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni/sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no//chos thos nas rgyas
7a4(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa rab tu thob pa ni chos la skyabs su song ba yin do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthong nas byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin
7a5(dkon brtsegs): no//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par smon cing smyon pa sbyin pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no//dam pa'i
7a6(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa ni chos la skyabs su song ba yin no//sbyin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni dge 'dun la skyabs
7a7(dkon brtsegs): su song ba yin no//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa ni skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams byed kyi skyes bu ngan pa'i las rnams mi byed do//khyim bdag
7b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa'i las sbyin gyi skyes bu ngan pa'i lus mA b+hin+d+ha brnams gang n+d+han//khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpal khyim nga chos kyis longs spyod tshul gyi chos ma yin dus mtsho lnga'o//
7b2(dkon brtsegs): mthun pas ma yin no//yod dag pas 'tsho ba yin gyi chog pas 'tshe ba ma yin te//de chos kyis longs spyod thob pa de dag gis gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed de/mi rtag pa'i
7b3(dkon brtsegs): shes bsgom pa mang zhing snying po len to//'di lta ste pha ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /bu dang chung ma dang /bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la
7b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i longs spyod dang /mdza' bshes dang /blon po dang /nyi du dang /sdug gi gnyen mtshams rnams la bkur bsti dang /gong du yang chos la 'dzud pas gtong ba 'brel bar byed do//
7b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer bas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo//'di lta ste nyan thos
7b6(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thig pa mi 'dod pas khur blangs pa bkur ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo//sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba/bdag bde ba la mi chags pa
7b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang /grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /bstod pa dang spang ba dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa de 'jig
8a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /rnyed pa dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pas mi snyems pa dang /rnyed pa dang grags pa dang brjod pa'i sgra'i snyan pa med pa la
8a2(dkon brtsegs): yi mi 'chad pa dang /shin du brtags te las byed pa dang /yang dag par bsgrub pa kun tu bsrung ba dang /log par bsgrub pa la yid mi mos pa dang /mi gnas pa'i
8a3(dkon brtsegs): blos 'byung ba mthong ba dang /shing bal gyi 'dab ma lta bu'i sems med de/ji ltar dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /gzhan gyi bya ba byed pa dang /rang gi
8a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yongs su 'dor ba dang /gzhan la lan du phan 'dogs par mi re ba dang /gnod par bya ba la sha mi ljon pa dang /byas pa bzo ba dang /byas pa tshar ba dang /legs par bya
8a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las byed pa dang /dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par 'gyed pa dang /stobs dang ldan pa rnams nga rgyal bcag pa dang /'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs par dbugs
8a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa dang /mya ngan gyis nyam thag pa rnams la mya ngan gyi zug rngu sel ba dang /mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len pa dang /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba
8a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /bla ma rnams la gus pa dang /mang du thos pa rnams la brten pa dang /mkhas pa rnams la kun 'dri ba dang /lta ba drang ba dang g.yo med par spyod pa dang /bcos pa med
8b1(dkon brtsegs): par sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /dge ba gang yin zhes tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang /mang du thos pa la chog mi shes par byas pa dang /brtsam pa rnams la yi dam
8b2(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa dang /'phags pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang /'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams la cher snying rje ba dang /mdza' ba brtan po dang /mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems
8b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston pa dang /thos pa'i don rjes su bsgom pa dang /
8b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtse ba thams cad la mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /lus la mi blta bar 'du shes pa dang /sgrog la zil pa'i thogs pa ltar 'du shes pa dang /longs spyod la skye sa dang /
8b5(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu lta bur 'du shes pa dang /bu dang chung ma la sems can dmyal ba mnur med par 'du shes pa dang /zhing dang khyim gyi las kyi mtha' dang /gos rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa
8b6(dkon brtsegs): la drangs pa'i sdug par 'du shes pa dang /yongs su tshol ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'jig par 'du shes pa dang /khyim gyi gnas la gshed ma lta bur 'du shes pa dang /mdzad
8b7(dkon brtsegs): bshes dang /blon po dang /nye du dang /snag gi mnyan mtshams rnams la sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs mar 'du shes pa dang /nyin dang mtshan du bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ces
9a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'jam par 'du shes pa dang /snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa dang /snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa
9a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa yin no//de la snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/gang gzhan gyi bya ba cog
9a3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar spro ba dang /bla ma rnams la gus par smra ba dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang ldang ba dang /thal mo sbyor ba dang /'dud pa'i las byed pa ste/'di ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po
9a4(dkon brtsegs): blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o//de la snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang zhe na/gang sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su mi nyams la gong du
9a5(dkon brtsegs): yang rnam par 'phel ba ste/'di ni snying po med pa'i srog las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o//de la snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying po blang bar 'du shes pa gang
9a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/gang ser sna'i sems tshar gcod cing gtong ba chen po'i sems 'phel bar byed cing sbyin pa yang dag par 'gyed pa ste/'dri ni snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams las snying
9a7(dkon brtsegs): po blang bar 'du shes pa zhes bya'o//khyim bdag da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang 'od lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa'i lus las 'di dag byed kyi skyes bu ngan pa'i las ni ma yin no//
9b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes par brjod pa ma yin te/rigs par smra ba yin chos smra ba yin no//'di lta ste sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du//
9b2(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa yang mi nyams pa yin no//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin no//'di lta ste bslab pa'i
9b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhi lnga yongs su bzung nas des srog gcod pa spang bar bya ste/dbyig pa dor ba dang /mtshon cha dor ba dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang /snying rje dang ldan pa dang /srog chags 'byung po
9b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin dang /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /rtag tu byams pa la gnas par bya'o//des mo byin par len pa spang bar bya ste/
9b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi longs spyod kyis chog shes pa dang /gzhan gyi longs spyod la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /chags pa dang brnab sems med pa dang /gzhan gyi nor la 'dod pa
9b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /tha nau rtswa dang lo ma tsam yang ma byin par mi blang bar bya'o//des 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa snang bar bya ste/rang gi chung mas chog par 'dzin pa dang /gzhan gyi
9b7(dkon brtsegs): chung ma la 'dod pa med pa dang /ma chags po'i mig gis blta ba dang /yid byung ba'i yid dang /'dod pa dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du chags pa yid la byed pa la
10a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bya'o//de gang gis tshe rang gi chung ma la 'dod pa rnam par rtog pa byung ba de'i tshe yang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/des rang gi chung ma la mi
10a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug par rjes su lta ba dang /skrag pa'i yid kyis 'dod pa bsnyen par bya yi zhen pas zin bzhin du ni ma yin pa dang /mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa dang /
10a3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang bar 'du shes pas des ci nas bdag gis yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa la spyod par mi bya na/mtshan gnyis spyod pa'am/yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta
10a4(dkon brtsegs): smos te bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o snyam mo//des rdzun du smra ba spang bar bya ste/bden pa smra ba dang yang dag par smra ba dang /ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa dang /mi
10a5(dkon brtsegs): slu ba dang /bsam pa phun sum tshigs pa dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa smra ba dang /chos rjes su bsrung bar gyur pa
10a6(dkon brtsegs): des lus dang srog gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun smra bar mi bya'o//des 'bru'i rgyung dang sbyar ba'i tshad myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spang bar bya ste/de ri ro ba med pa
10a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /myos pa med pa dang /'khrul pa med pa dang /tshig mi 'chal ba dang /mi 'byer po dang /mi rgod pa dang /mi g.yeng ba dang /dran po nye bar gnas pa dang /
10b1(dkon brtsegs): shes bzhin dang ldan par bya ste/des nam bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i blo 'jug cing zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam
10b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /des gzhan dag la chang byin te/'di snyam du 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin te/gang ci 'dod pa de la sbyin pa'i dus la bab kyis bdag gigos 'di ltar bya ste/gang
10b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gang la 'di ltar chang yang byin nas gang 'di 'khrul pa med pa'i longs spyod pa la de dang de dag dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//
10b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba yin no//khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub
10b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa gzhan dag la chang byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nyes pa brjod pa ma yin no//khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga
10b6(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag kyang shin tu bsrung bar bya'o//gong
10b7(dkon brtsegs): du yang des phra ma mi bya zhing bye ba rnams kyi bsdums bya'o//des ngag rtsub mo yang mi smra bar bya zhing des ngag 'jam por sla ba dang /tshig mnyen pa dang gsong por smra bar bya'o///
11a1(dkon brtsegs): chog kyal pa yang smra bar mi bya zhing dus su smra ba dang /yang dag par smra ba dang /don smra ba dang /chos smra ba dang /rigs pa smra ba dang /'dul ba smra ba dang /
11a2(dkon brtsegs): lan legs par 'debs pa de bzhin byed par bya'o//des brnab sems su mi bya zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bsam par bya'o//gnod sems su mi bya zhing rtag tu
11a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgo bar bya'o//des yang dag par blta bar bya zhing log pa phyin ci log tu blta ba thams cad dang bral bar bya'o//lhar sangs rgyas bsam pa rjes su song
11a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing lha gzhan mi 'dzin par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/ljongs sam/ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa
11a5(dkon brtsegs): der/des sems can rnams la chos kyi gtam brjod par bya ste/gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dad pa la gzud par bya/sems can gang dag mi gus shing phar mi 'dzin pa/mar mi 'dzin pa//
11a6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/bram zer mi 'dzin pa/rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro mi byed pa/tshul dang mi ldan zhing mtshams las 'das pa de dag bla ma la gus pa dang /chos spyod pa la gzud par
11a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//sems can gang dag thos pa nyung ba de dag mang du thos pa la sbyar bar bya'o//srer sna can rnams ni gtong ba la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams ni tshul khrims la/gnod sems can
11b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams na bzod pa dang nges pa la/le lo can rnams ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la/brjed ngas pa rnams ni dran pa dang /'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams ni shes rab la gzud bar bya'o//sems
11b2(dkon brtsegs): can dbul po rnams la longs spyod yang dag par bgo bar bya'o//sems can nad pa rnams la smyan sbyin par bya'o//sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon bya'o//skyobs med pa rnams
11b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi skyabs dang /dpung gnyen mod pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du bya'o//des ljongs dang ljongs kyi phyogs de dag thams cad dang /ji ltar mthun par sems can 'ga' yang log par ltung bar
11b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gro ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung bar bya'o//khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum nas lan bdun gyi bar du rjes su bstan pas sems
11b5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yon tan dag la bkod pa las yon tan gang yang rung ba la gnas par ma gyur na khyim bdag de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa des sems can de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed de/
11b6(dkon brtsegs): des thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha sra ba yang bgro zhing rlig 'di skad ces ji srid du sems can gdul dka' ba rmu rgod de dag yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
11b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes brjod par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag gis ni de dag gi phyir go cha bgos te/sems can drang po rnams kyi phyir ma yin//
12a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin/sgyu med pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin/tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin te/yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi phyir bdag
12a2(dkon brtsegs): gis go cha ma bgos kyis ci nas bdag gi rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams kyis bdag mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang /dad pa thob par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o//
12a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bsgrub po/de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o snyam mo//khyim bdag gal te grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdul lam/ljongs sam/ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas
12a4(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa' des phyogs der ma bskul tam/dran par ma byas te sems can rnams ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' de ni de
12a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no//khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/ljongs sam ljongs kyi phyogs gang na sman pa
12a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhig gnas pa des tha na sems can 'ga' zhig gi dug ni bar ma nus te/'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur na smin pa de skye bo mang pos smad par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag
12a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/ljongs sam/ljongs kyi phyogs gang na byed chub sems dpa' gnas pa des de'i phyogs su thi na sems can 'ga' tsamo la ya
12b1(dkon brtsegs): ma bskul tam/dran par ma byas te ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis smad pa yin no//khyim bdag de bas
12b2(dkon brtsegs): na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas ci nas grong ngam grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/ljongs sam/ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas pa des bdag gis sems can 'ga'
12b3(dkon brtsegs): yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o//de ltar bsgrub po/de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam me snyam pa'i go cha de lta bu bgo bar bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan
12b4(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa ste/khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la mkhas par bya'o//des 'di ltar so sor bslab par bya'o//khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge
12b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba rnams 'joms par byed pa/'byung ba sun 'byin pa dge ba'i sdong po 'gyel bar byed pa ste/de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o//khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams
12b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi gnas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi gnas/byis pa so so'i skye bo ma dul ba ma sbas pa rnams kyi gnas mi dge ba'i spyod pa rnams kyi gnas/skye bo ngan pa 'dus
12b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o//khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi chos thams cad kyi gnas shes brjod pa'o//'di ni sngon goms par byas pa'i dge
13a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba rnams nyams par byed pa ste/de'i phyir khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o//khyim zhes bya ba 'dri ni der gnas nas bya ba mi rigs pa byed pa'o//der gnas nas/
13a2(dkon brtsegs): pha ma dang bram ze la gus par mi 'gyur ba yin te/de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o//khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni sred pa'i mkhri shing la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don
13a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug po rnams 'byung ste/de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o//khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni bsad pa dang /bcing ba dang /brdeg pa dang /
13a4(dkon brtsegs): bsdigs pa dang /gtse ba dang /mi snyan pa dang /gshe ba dang /ngan du brjod pa dang /ngan du bya ba'i tshig gi lam rnams 'du ba ste/de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o//khyim zhes bya ba 'di ni dge ba'i
13a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma byas pa mi 'dzugs pa'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa rnams rnam par 'jig pa'o//mkhas pa rnams dang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos thams cad kyis smad pa'o//
13a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di la gnas pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro//'di la gnas pa ni 'dod chags kyis 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba'o//zhe sdang dang 'jigs pa dang /gti mug gis 'gro ba
13a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par 'gro ba ste/de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o//'di ni tshul khrims kyi phung po kun mi bsrun pa'o//ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'dor ba'o//shes rab kyi phung po la mi
13b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'o//rnam par grol ba'i phung po mi 'thob pa'o//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po mi skye ba ste/de'i phyir khyim zhes bya'o//'di la gnas pa ni pha dang /ma dang /bu
13b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /chung ma dang /bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba dang /mdza' shes bshos dang /blon po dang /nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /g.yog
13b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa la sred pa yin no//khyim na gnas pa 'di ni rgya mtsho la chu bran ltar dgang dka' ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni me la shing lcer chog mi shes pa'o//khyim na gnas
13b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni thug pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlung dmar ltar thug pa med par rnam par rtog pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'jig pas bye ma'i grong khyer lhur 'jig pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni kha zas
13b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dug dang 'dres pa ltar 'dres pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni mi mdza' ba bzhin du mthun pa ma yin pas rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'phags pa'i chos bsgrub pa la
13b6(dkon brtsegs): bAr chad byed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'thab pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas rtag tu mi mthun pa'o//khyim ni gnas pa
13b7(dkon brtsegs): ni legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la sbyor bas gnod pa mang ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni las kyi mtha' thug pa med pas rtag tu brtson pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni
14a1(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po nas bsags pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir mi rtag pa'o//khyim nu gnas pa ni dngos po kun du rgol zhing yongs su bsrung bas sdug
14a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni dgra ltar mi mdza' bas rtag tu bag tsha ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni phyin ci log gi zin pas bag med de'o//khyim na gnas pa ni rang
14a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs te/ngo bo nyid ston pas glar ma khan gyi tshon dang 'dra'o//khyim na gnas pa ni myur du phan tshun bgyis pas mthar chud cing 'gyur ba'o//khyim na gnas
14a4(dkon brtsegs): po ni skye bo blo bur du 'dus pas rtag tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir sgyu ma la lta ba dang mtshungs so//khyim na gnas pa ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang mthar chud par 'gyur bas rmi lam
14a5(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs sa//khyim na gnas pa ni myur du 'bral bas zil pa'i thigs pa dang mtshungs so//khyim na gnas pa ni ra bro ba chung ngu yongs su 'jal bas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa dang
14a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs so//khyim na gnas pa ni gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos kyis yongs su gzir bsre tsher ma'i dra ba dang mtshungaso//khyim na gnas pa ni
14a7(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba la rnam par rtog pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir kha khab tsam gyi srog chags dang mtshungs so//khyim na gnas pa ni gcig la gcig 'drid pas srog rnam par 'jig pa'o//
14b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa ni sems rnyog ma can du byed pas rtag tu 'khrugs pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni rgyal po dang /chom rkun dang /me dang /chu dang /bgo skal la spyod pas rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir thun
14b2(dkon brtsegs): mong ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni nyis dmigs mang bas ro bro ba chung ba'o//khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas/khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa la
14b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pas sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par sdom po dang nges pa mang du bya'o//des yang 'di ltar brtag
14b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/gang byin pa de ni bdag gi yin no//gang khyim na bzhug pa de ni bdag gi ma yin no//gang byin pa de ni snying po can no//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni snying po med pa'o//
14b5(dkon brtsegs): gang byin pa de ni gzhan la bde ba'o//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni de ltar byung ba na bde ba'o//gang byin pa de ni yang bsrung bar bya ba ma yin pa'o//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni
14b6(dkon brtsegs): bsrung bar bya'o//gang byin pa de ni sred pa zad par 'gyur ba'o//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni sred pa rnam par 'phel ba'o//gang byin pa de ni bdag gi ba med pa'o//gang
14b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim na bzhag pa de ni bdag gi dang bcas pa'o//gang byin pa de ni yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o//gang byin pa de ni 'jigs
15a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o//gang khyim nu ba'ag pa de ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o//gang byin pa de ni byang chub kyi lam nye bar rton pa'o//glang khyim na bzhag pa
15a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni bdud kyi phyogs nye bar rton pa'o//gong byin pa de ni zad ma shes pa'o//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni zad par 'gyur ba'o//gang byin pa de ni bde ba'o//dang khyim na
15a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa de ni kun bsrung dgos pas sdug bsngal ba'o//gang byin pa de ni nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro//gang khyim na yod pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed
15a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//gang byin pa de ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba'o//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni longs spyod chen por mi 'gyur ba'o//gang byin pa de ni skyes bu dam pa'i laso//
15a5(dkon brtsegs): gang khyim na bzhog pa de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i las so//gang byin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'o//gang khyim na bzhag pa de ni byis pa'i skye bos bsngags
15a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o snyam du brtag par bya'o//khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pos slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/dge ba'i bshes
15a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyen du 'du shes pa dang /tshe brjes nas longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar 'du shes pa dang /byang chub kyi lasgra nye bar ston par 'du shes pa ste/khyim bdag byang chub sems
15b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/
15b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/ser sna tshar gcod pa'i 'du shes dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i 'du shes dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la lta ba'i 'du shes te/
15b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na/'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na//
15b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya ba'i 'du shes dang /bdud tshar gcod pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par smin pa la re ba
15b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i 'du shes te/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum pa de dag bskyed par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
15b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/slong ba la g.yog tu 'du shes pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos pos mi btang bar 'du shes pa dang /
15b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa las 'byung bar 'du shes pa ste/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong pa mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o//
16a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang na/'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /byams
16a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgom pa'i 'du shes dang /gti mug la mi 'jug pa'i 'du shes te/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o//de ci'i
16a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/khyim bdag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug slab mor 'gyuraro//khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
16a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug srab mor 'gyur zhe na/gang du'i dngos po la btang snyoms shing yongs su gtong ba 'di ni de'i 'dod chags srab pa'o//
16a5(dkon brtsegs): gang slong ba de dag la byams pa nye bar bsgrub pa 'di ni de'i zhe sdang srab pa'o//gang dngos po 'di byin nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni de'i gti
16a6(dkon brtsegs): mug srab pa'o//khyim bdug de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug srab mor 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gzhan yang byung
16a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas dngos po
16b1(dkon brtsegs): gang rung ba zhig bslangs ma thag tu dngos po de la sems kyis 'dzin par mi byed de/de ltar na de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang byang chub kyi sems
16b2(dkon brtsegs): la brten nas yongs su gtong ste de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang spong ba de dag la byams pa nye bar bsgrub ste/me khro zhing gnod
16b3(dkon brtsegs): sems mi byed de de ltar na de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gal te byin na ci spyad snyam du 'di ltar sems g.yo bas zhum pa med de de ltar na
16b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang slong ba la byin te byin nas kyang gdung ba med cing 'gyod pa med pa gong du yang dga' zhing rab
16b5(dkon brtsegs): tu mgu ba ste/bde ba dang /yid bde ba skye zhing gang byang chub kyi sems las gnas gtong ste de ltar ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//
16b6(dkon brtsegs): byin nas kyang gang chos thams cad mi dmigs shing rnam par smin pa la mi re ste mi ltar mkhas pa de dag chos gang la yang mngon par mo zhen na de ltar mngon par zhen pa med pas blan
16b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/de ltar na de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag de ltar na byang
17a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba mthong na/pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro////bam po gnyis pa/
17a2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pas 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad la mnyam pa nyid thob par bya'o//
17a3(dkon brtsegs): des longs spyod rnyed dam/chung ma rnyed dam/bu rnyed dam/nor rnyed dam/'bru rnyed kyang khengs par yang mi bya dga' bar yang mi bya/thams cad ma 'byor kyang des zhum par yang mi
17a4(dkon brtsegs): bya/yi myog par yang bya yi/des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/'dus byas thams cad ni sgyu ma byas pa rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do//'di
17a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/pha ma dang /bu dang /chung ma dang /bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba dang /mdza' bshes dang /blon po dang /nye du dang /snag gi gnyen
17a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshams de dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pa las grub pa yin te/de dag kyang bdag gi ma yin bdag kyang de dag gi ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/pha ma la sogs pa de dag ni
17a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi mgon nam/skyabs sam/dpung gnyen nam/gnas sam/gling ngam/bdag gam bdag gi ba ma yin no//gang bdag gi zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag
17b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdag ma yin bdag gi ma yin na/gang bdag gi phra ma la stsogs pa de dag bdag dang bdag gir 'gyur ba dang /bdag kyang de dag gi yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag
17b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang las bdag gir bya ba las kyi bsgro skal la spyod pa yin te/las dge ba 'am sdig pa 'am gang dang gang byas pa de dang de nyid kyi bgo sgal la spyod par 'gyur dri dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu
17b3(dkon brtsegs): so sor myong ngo //de dang de nyid kyi rnam par smin pa la spyod do//'di dag kyang las bdag gir bya ba las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa yin te las dge ba 'am sdig pa 'am gang dang gang
17b4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de dang de nyid kyi bgo skal la spyod par 'gyur/de dang de dag gi rnam par smin pa so sor myong bar 'gyur/de dang de nyid kyi 'bras bu so sor myong bar 'gyur ro//de dag gi/
17b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir bdag mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/'di dag ni tshe 'di la bde ba'i phyir bdag gir bya ba yin gyi/tshe gzhan la dade ba'i bdag gir bya ba ma
17b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no//bdag gi gang yin pa de la bdag 'jug par bya ste/'di lta ste/sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /yang dag par sdom pa dang /bzod pa dang /nges pa dang /brtson 'grus
17b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /bag yod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag sdud cing mngon par bsgrub pa'i dge ba de ni bdag gi yin te/gang du bdag 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam der 'di dag kyang 'gro bar
18a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam ste/de srog gi phyir ram bu dang chung ma'i phyir yang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'du mi byed do//khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa
18a2(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa des rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /mi brtan pa'i 'du shes dang /'gyur ba'i 'du
18a3(dkon brtsegs): shes te/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim
18a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di ni dga' zhing rtse ba'i grogs yin gyi 'dri ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi grogs ni ma yino//'di ni bza'
18a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang btung ba'i grogs yin gyi 'di ni las kyi rnam par smin pa myong ba'i grogs ni ma yin no//'di ni bde ba'i grogs yin gyi 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi grogs ni ma yin no snyam
18a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhi ni yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas
18a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed por bya ste/gsum gang zhe ni/mi gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang /dring por 'du shes pa dang /mi mthun par 'du shes pa'o//
18b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' khyim pas dang gi chungs la 'du nas gsum+bu baspyod par d+ham+b+ha/gsum ga nan/dgar 'du shes pa dang /bshad mar 'du shes du
18b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /phyir rgol bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhani yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pos rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/sha za
18b3(dkon brtsegs): mor 'du shes pa dang /srin mor 'du shes pa dang /gzugs mi sdug par 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du
18b4(dkon brtsegs): shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum glang zhe na/dgang dka' bar 'du shes pa dang /gting du 'du shes pa dang /byas pa mi gzo bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan
18b5(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung mA la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang nan/sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'du shes pa dang /dud 'gro'i skye
18b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas lnga 'gro bar 'du shes pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi drung ma la 'du shes
18b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/khur du 'du shes pa dang /srid par 'du shes pa dang /srid par yongs su 'dzin par 'du shes pa'o//khyim 'dag gzhan yang byang
19a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi rlung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/bdag gi ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /yongs su
19a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med par 'du shes pa dang /brnyan mar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/
19a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gang zhe na/lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang /ngagra gis nyes par spyod pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang /yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i gnas
19a4(dkon brtsegs): su 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/'dod pa'i rnam par
19a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa dang /rnam par 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnas su 'du shes pa'o//khyim
19a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/khri mon du 'du shes pa dang /gsod par 'du
19a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /'ching bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe
19b1(dkon brtsegs): na/tshul khrims kyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa dang /shes rab kyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag
19b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/khog tsher 'du shes pa dang /snyir 'du shes pa dang /rgyar
19b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/yams kyi nang du 'du shes pa
19b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /gnod par 'du shes pa dang /nad 'go bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed por bya
19b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/gsum gang zhe na/'thab par 'du shes pa dang /byur du 'du shes pa dang /sar bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung
19b6(dkon brtsegs): ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/nang du 'du shes pa dang /rga bar 'du shes pa dang /'chi bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub
19b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/bdud du 'du shes pa dang /bdud la brten par 'du shes pa dang /'jig par 'du
20a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/mya ngan du
20a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang /smre sngags 'don par 'du shes pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba drang 'khrug par 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
20a3(dkon brtsegs): khyim pas rang gi chung me le 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/spyang mo chen mor 'du shes pa dang /chu srin chen mor 'du shes pa dang /byi la chen
20a4(dkon brtsegs): maumor 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/sbrul nag mor
20a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang /chu srin byis pa gsod par 'du shes pa dang //mdangs 'phrog par 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yong byang chub sems dpa' khyim pos rang gi/
20a6(dkon brtsegs): chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum grang zhe na/mgron med par 'du shes pa dang /skyabs med par 'du shes pa dang /gnas med par 'du shes
20a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/gang bar 'du shes pa dang /
20b1(dkon brtsegs): bri bar 'du shes pa dang /na bar 'du shes bya'o//khyim bdagra gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma lta 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang
20b2(dkon brtsegs): zhan/chom rkun du 'du shes pa dang /brtson bsrungs su 'du shes pa dang /sems can dmyal po'i bsrungs mar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdog gzhon yang byang chub sems
20b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/chu blor 'du shes pA dang /sbyar bar 'du shes pa dang /mdud par 'du shes bya'o//
20b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/'dam du 'du shes pa dang /chags phyir 'du
20b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /klong du 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung mA la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/thag
20b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'du shes pa dang /khong sgril du 'du shes pa dang /rnyong du 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed
20b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya s+t+wa~M/gsum gang zhe na/mi ma mur du 'du shes pa dang /rtsa me'i sgron mo ltar 'du shes pa dang /chu gri lta bur 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chuchu
21a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma lnga 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum ga she na/don med par 'du shes pa dang /tshur mar 'du shes pa dang /
21a2(dkon brtsegs): dudrug tu 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/lhag par sgro
21a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs par 'du shes pa dang /lhag par kun tu gos par byed par 'du shes pa dang /lhag par chags par 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
21a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/shwar gnyer bar 'du shes pa dang /chad pa gcod par 'du shes pa dang /mtshon cha 'dzin
21a5(dkon brtsegs): por 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/'gyed par 'du shes
21a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rtsod par 'du shes pa dang /'tshang 'bru bar 'du shes pa'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed
21a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/mi sdug pa dang phrad par 'du shes pa dang /sdug pa dang bral bar 'du shes pa dang /nyam nga bar 'du shes pa'o//mdor na thab mo'i dri
21b1(dkon brtsegs): mar 'du shes pa dang /'thab mo'i rnyog pa thams cad du 'du shes pa dang /glanod pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur par 'du shes pa dang /mi dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa bar 'du shes
21b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas 'di lta bu'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rang gi chung ma la brtag par bya'o//
21b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim bras bu la lhag par sdug pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o//khyim bdag gal te des bu la lhag par sdug pa'i
21b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed la de bzhin du sems can gzhan dag lo ma yin na/des spro ba gsum gyis rang gi sems la smyo bar bya ste/gsum gung zhen/byang chub ni sems snyoms pa'i byang chub sems
21b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i yin mo/sems mi snyoms pa ni ma yin gyi/byang chub ni yang dag pa sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yin gyi log par sbyor ba ni ma yin no//byang chub ni tha dad pa med por spyod pa'i
21b6(dkon brtsegs): byabyu chub sems dpa'i yin gyi tha dad du spyod pa ni ma yin pa ste/skyo ba gsum po de dag gis rang gi sems la spyos nas bu de la mi ldog pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/'di ni mi sdug pa ste/bdug
21b7(dkon brtsegs): go sbyong thugs ma yin na gang bdag gi de'i don du byung la ni sdig par sdug pa baspyad la sems can gzhan la ni de ltar ma yin na sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsol pa'i bsgrib pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro//
22a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gsu de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba gang la yung gnod par byas/srog la yang bag med de gnod par gyur pas 'di ni bdag la gnod par byed pa'o//bdag
22a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir byang chub kyi lam dang mi mthun pa'i lam la spyod pas 'di ni bdag la phyir rgol ba'i snyam du 'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o//des bu de d+hAr byas te ji lta ji lta bur
22a3(dkon brtsegs): de la sdug par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed pa dang /bdag phangs par sems pa dang ldan po bzhin du byams pa bskyod pa de lta de lta bur
22a4(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par bya'o//des yang 'di ltar 'di yang gud nas 'ongs la bdag kyang gud nas 'ongs mod kyi/sems can thams cad kyang sngon bdag gri bur gyur la bdag kyang sems can
22a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi bur gyur te/'di la ni bdag gi'am gzhan gyi 'am smra'i sems can gang yang med do snyam du tshul bzhin brtag par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi mthun pa'i phyir te/
22a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba lnga rnams su 'dza' ba lngas kyang mi mdza' bar 'gyur bar bdag ni ji ltar su dang yang mdza' 'am mi mdza' bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhen/mi mdza' ba bzung ni na
22a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad thams cad du byed mi 'dod par 'gyur/mdza' ba bzung na ni ha tsang byed 'dod par 'gyur te/rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba'i sems gnyis kyis ni chos mnyam pa nyid long du
22b1(dkon brtsegs): /chud par byed mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi mnyam pa spyod pa ni mi mnyam pa'i 'gro bar 'gyur mnyam par spyod pa ni mnyam par 'gyur ba'o//rje su chags pa dang khong khro ba'i sems de la
22b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni mi mnyam par spyod par mi bya'i sems can thams cad la mnyam par spyod na thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ro//khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas
22b3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gang la yang bdag gi snyam du yongs su bzung bar mi bya chags par mi bya'o//g.yo dang sred pa'i bag la nyal mi bya'o//khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'i drung du
22b4(dkon brtsegs): slong ba 'ongs la dngos po zhig bslangs pa las/gal te des dngos po ma btang na des 'di ltar dngos po 'di btang yang rung ma btang yang rung ste/bdag ni dngos po 'di dang gdon mi za bar 'brel
22b5(dkon brtsegs): bar yang 'gyur/mi 'dod bzhin du 'chi bar yang 'gyur zhing dngos po 'dis kyang bdag 'dor bdag gis kyang dngos po 'di 'dor gyi/dngos po 'di btang la yid dga' ba dang snying po blangs te 'chi ba'i
22b6(dkon brtsegs): dus byas so//'di yongs su btang ni bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems kun nas zin te gnas par 'gyur/'dis ni bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang rangs pa dang 'gyod pa
22b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa skye bar 'gyur snyam du sems nges par bsam par bya'o//gal te de ltar bsams kyang dngos po de gtong ma nus na des slong ba la kun go bar bya ba gsum gyis go bar bya ste/bdag ni da dung
23a1(dkon brtsegs): mthu chung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin te theg pa chen po la las dang po dang /bdag ni mi gtong ba sems kyi dbang du gyur pa dang /bdag ni nye bar ldan pa'i lta ba
23a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang /bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la gnas pa lags kyis skyes bu dam pa bzod par mdzad cing yongs su gdung bar mi mdzad du gsol/ji ltar khyod dang
23a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bgyi'o//de ltar bsgrub po//de ltar brtson 'grus rtsom mo zhes khyim bdag de ltar byang chub
23a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba la kun go bar bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim po khyim na gnas pas rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par
23a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/gal te de ston pa 'das pa'i gsung rab yod la/sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang med/chos ston pa yang med/'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang phrad pa yang med par gyur na//
23a6(dkon brtsegs): des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas te/gang de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa dang /mtshungs par spyod pa dang /dge ba spyod pa dang /bsam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam
23a7(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub thob po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su grub pa de des rjes su dran par bya rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//des yang 'di ltar
23b1(dkon brtsegs): nyin lan gsum mtsho na lan gsum du lus kyi lngas yongs su dag pa dang /ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang /yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang /gtsang ma dang bsam pa dag pa
23b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /byams pa bsgom pa la mkhas pa dang /gos gtsang ma dang /ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pas legs par brgyan pa dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
23b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /mdzes pa dang /byang chub kyi sems la rab tu dga' ba dang denges pa dang 'grogs na bde ba dang /legs par byed pa'i las byed pa dang /gus pa dang bcas pa dang /bka'
23b4(dkon brtsegs): blo bde ba dang /nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pas yang dag par chad pas mi dge ba'i las kyi nyes pa thams cad shes pa dang /phyin chad kyang bsdam pa dang /bsod
23b5(dkon brtsegs): nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang /mtshan bsags pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa
23b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /chos thams cad bzung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa rnams su che yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha dron du bya'o//khyim bdag
23b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa blang bar bya'o//des dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang
24a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa rnams la bsnyen par bya bsten par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o//de dag la bsnyen cing bsten te bsnyen bkur byed cing spyod pa la 'khrul pa
24a2(dkon brtsegs): med par rang gi nyes pa mthong bar bya'o//des dge sbyong gi spyod pa las nyams pa'i dge slong mthong na yang mi gus pa'i reg rlung zad rlung mi byaM ste/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyog pa med pa nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang bral ba de'i ngur smrig ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsgos pa/ting nge
24a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su bsgos pa 'di dag yin te/'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi drang srong gi rgyal mtshan
24a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//des de dag la rab tu gus pa bskyed nas dge slong de la snying rje chen po bskyed par byaro//sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di ni ma legs so//kun nas
24a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa 'odan ma logs so//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das dpazhin gshegs pa dgra brtsam pa rang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas du ba bzhi basmras pa cang shAs de'i drang srong gi
24a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan bgos kyang 'di ni ma byang ma'i me skyes mdul ba ste/cang shes pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa spyod do//bcom ldan 'das des ma bsgribs pa lam brnyas shig ces gsungs
24b1(dkon brtsegs): pas na/'dis nyes pa ma yin gyi nyon mongs pas gang gis mi dge ba 'di dag ston pa nyon mongs pas nyes so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa na 'byung ba dang bcas pa/
24b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas gang nyon mongs pa 'di dag khong du chud nas tshul bzhin so sor rtog na dang po'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i
24b3(dkon brtsegs): granas yod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams ni ye shes kyis bsngal ba yin pas na/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zag gi sgo gang zag la tshod gzung bar
24b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ste/gang zag gis gang zag la tshod bzung na nyams par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni rab tu mkhyen pa/bdag ni rab tu shes pa ma yin no snyam nas des dge slong de
24b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnod sems med pa dang /zhe sdang med pa dang /khong khro med pa dang /khong khro ba med pa'ang bskyed par bya'o//khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa de gtsug lag khang du
24b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'dod na cang shes pa'i sems dang /las su rung ba'i sems dang /gus pa dang bcas pa dang /zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /dad pa dang bcas pa dang /ri mo dang bcas pa dang /gtsug
24b7(dkon brtsegs): lag khang la yan lag lngas phyag byas la de nas gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro bar bya'o//des yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i gnas so//mtshan
25a1(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa la gnas pa dang /smyon pa med pa la gnas pa dang /byams pa dang /snying rngu dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms la gnas pa gnas so//'di
25a2(dkon brtsegs): ni bsam gtan pa rnams kyi gnas te/gnas thams cad yang dag par chad pa rnams kyi gnas so//'di ni yang dag par song ba rnams dang /yang dag par zhugs pa
25a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gnas so//bdag kyang rdul gyi grwanas khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste/nam zhig na 'di lta bu spyod par 'gyur/bdag kyang nam zhig na gang dge 'dun gyi las
25a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /gso sbyong gri las dang /dgag dbye'i las dang /'dud pa'i las de la gnas par 'gyur snyam nas des 'di ltar rab tu 'byung ba'i sems la dga' bar bya'o//byang
25a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i' khyim na gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni gang yang med de/de dag thams cad kyang khyim gyi gnas nas mngon por
25a6(dkon brtsegs): byung nas dgon pa la sems/dgon pA la gzhol/dgon par song nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//tshogs de yang dag
25a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrubs so//khyim na gnas pa ni kun du gnod pa ste rdul bab pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas dang de'i nyan thos rnams kyis bsngags pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni nyes
25b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skyon chags pa mang pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa mang ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni nyam nga ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni bag yangs pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni
25b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa'i dri ma can no//rab tu byung ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni nyes par spyod pa'i gzhi'o//rab tu byung ba ni legs par spyod
25b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzhi'o//khyim na gnas pa ni rdul gyi nang na gnas pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni rdul gyi nang na mi gnas pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'o//rab tu byung po
25b4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod pa'i 'dam nas 'byin pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni byis pa'i skye bo'i zhugs pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni skye bo mkhas pa'i zhugs pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'tsho ba sbyang bar
25b5(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'o//rab tu myong ba ni 'tsho ba sbyong bar smra ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'gran zla mang ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni 'gran zla med pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni phongs po mang ba'o//
25b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba ni phongs pa med pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni mya ngan gyi gnas so//rab tu byung ba ni dga' ba'o//khyim na glenus pa ni ngan song gi thim skas so//rab tu byung ba ni
25b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mtho ba'i them skas so//khyim na gnas pa ni bcings pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni thar pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni 'jigs pa
26a1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni chud pa dang bcas par spyod pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni chad pa med par spyod pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni mtshon tshwa'i spyod pa dang brdzus
26a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni mtshon na ma spyod pa'o//khyim na gnas pa na yongs su gdung ba dang bac+doMs pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'o//khyim ni gnas pa ni
26a3(dkon brtsegs): kAnA d+hu rgol bas sdug bsngal ba'o//rlig d+hA rlung ba nA~M kun tu rna ba sang pas 'dre ba'i//kyis na gnas pa ni ni pa'o//rlu tu ni ra ni d+mo//khyiman gnas
26a4(dkon brtsegs): poni'i rdzusmra pa'o//shwat+yAr+dz+dza na sa 'arjes //khyim na ga sa pa mi na 'o//ra byung ba ni myi zhin pa// ni nas pan me mas so/'a na
26a5(dkon brtsegs): la rangs so//khyim nA gnas pa ni kun tu 'byor bya'o//rab tu byung ba ni 'bar baN+DI pa'o//khyim no ga nas pa ni gzhan gyi rlon to//rab tu byung ba ni gnyi ga'i don to//ma
26a6(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa ni don myong ba'i//rab tu byung ba ni don che bya'o//khyim na gnas pa ni gzhi rlung ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni gzi rgyu ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni kun nas nyon
26a7(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pas smyig bsngal ba'o//ri ts+tshi byu ba ni mngon par 'byung bas /khyim na gnas pa ni tshe rim bskyed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni cher ma'i sil bar//
26b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa ni chos chung ngu dang ldan pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni chos chen po dang ldan pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'dul ba ma yin pa byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni 'dul ba byed pa'o//khyim
26b2(dkon brtsegs): no gnas pa ni 'gyod pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni mi 'gyod pa'o//khyim na gnas pa na mchi ma dang nu zho dang khrag gi rgya mtsho 'phel ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni mchi ma dang nu zha dang khrag ga rgya mtsho
26b3(dkon brtsegs): skems pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyis snad pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyis bsngags pa'o//khyim na

26b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni rnyog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mthar thug pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni kun tu thul ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni kun tu ma thul ba'o//khyim
26b6(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa ni bran gyi las byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni rje bo byed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni 'khor ba'i mthar 'gyur ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gyur ba'o//
26b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa ni gra yang sa'o//rab tu byung ba ni g.yang so las 'das pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni mun nag ga/rab tu byung ba ni snang ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni dbang po lnga dbang mi
27a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni dbang po la dbang byed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni dregs pa bskyed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni dregs pa 'dul ba'o//khyim na
27a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni dam pa ma yin pa bskyed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni dam pa bskyed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni ngan song bskyod pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni bde 'gro bskyed pa'o//khyim na
27a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni blta bar mi 'os pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni blta bar 'os po'o//khyim na gnas pa ni rtsom pa che ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni rtsom pa chung ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni

27a5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba ni yid bde ba dang ldan pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni zug rngu dang bcas pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni zug rngu phyung ba'o//khyim nu gnas pa ni na ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni nad med
27a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni chos rgas par byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni chos ngar bar byed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni bag med par byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni

27b1(dkon brtsegs): bar chad byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni shes rab kyi srog byed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni slub so sor nye bar gnas pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni mi slu bar so sor nye bar gnas pa'o//khyim na

27b7(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni dpung gnyen med par byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni dpung gnyen byed pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni mgon med par byed pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni

28b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni glags pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni glags pa med pa'o//khyim nu gnas pa ni sher gnyer ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni shAr gnyer bzhi pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni rgyal

28b6(dkon brtsegs): du byung ba ni grogs dkon pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni chung ma dang 'grogs pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni mos pa dang 'grogs pa'o//khyim na gnas ba ni rgyu dang 'dra ba'o//rab tu byung
28b7(dkon brtsegs): bo ni rgya dang bral ba'o//khyim na gnas pa ni gzhan la gnod par byed pa gces su rtsi ba'o//rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa gces su rtsi ba'o//khyimar gnas pa ni zod
29a1(dkon brtsegs): zing gi sbyin pa ched cher 'dzin pa'o//rab tu byung ba ni chos kyi sbyin pa ched cher 'dzin pa'o//khyim na gnas pa ni bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o//rab tu byung
