50b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab/bod skad du/glog thob kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po/sangs
50b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/dge
50b6(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa stong dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya
50b7(dkon brtsegs): dang zangs gcig tu bzhugs te/de dag thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/spongs pa thogs pa med par gyur pa/mi skye bo'i bzod pa mngon sum du byas pa/phyir mi ldog
51a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ldan pa/mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa sha stag 'di
51a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i
51a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' shin tu mtho gsal dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed dang /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems
51a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin po che'i yon tan 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rkyen dang ldan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' smon
51a5(dkon brtsegs): lam dang /spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang /byang chub sems dpa' dga' sred
51a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo mos pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros spyod pa dang /byang chub sems
51a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' glog thob dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i spobs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i nga ro dang /byang chub sems dpa' rab dbyangs dang /byang chub
51b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dnga' sad byed dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sgyur ba la mkhas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
51b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di dag ni gtso bar gyur to//gzhan yang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang /
51b3(dkon brtsegs): mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri zla dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor tshad
51b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ces bya bas 'khor mang po rab tu zhi zhing yongs su dag pa dag 'dus par gyur
51b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong ba dang /stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga le ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/
51b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tsom cung zad cig mchis te/deng zhu bar 'tshal na/de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjes gsan cing
51b7(dkon brtsegs): gnang bar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' klog thob la bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
52a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis khyod la skabs phyes/khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
52a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' glog thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur na//
52a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing /skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang /dbang po dang /rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pas
52a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag drangs te/lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing /gdon mi 'tshal bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /'jig
52a5(dkon brtsegs): rten na gnas kyang pad+ma bzhin skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu zhing /rtag par de bzhin gshegs
52a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong ba dang /'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /rnam par thar pa gsum la rab tu gnas kyang snyoms par mi 'jug par sems can gyis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin
52a7(dkon brtsegs): du/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yongs su sbyangs nas skad cig ma gcig la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/
52b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/bla na ma mchis mi yi gtso//mkhyen dang gzigs pa tshad ma
52b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis//ma 'dres chos la bzhugs nas ni//'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad//sems can kun la snyoms par gzigs//'jig rten kun gyi mgon skyabs mdzad//
52b3(dkon brtsegs): log dang yang ngag lam bstan nas//mthar thug bde la dkod par mdzad//yon tan mchog ni rab bsags pas//rin chen sna tshogs phung po 'dra//'jig rten shes rab nyi ma
52b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod//khams gsum mchod 'os gtso bo lags//theg pa chen po bkras bshad nas//byang chub lam ni rdzogs par mdzod//zhal mtshan zla ba nya ba 'dra//zhi gnas dag ni
52b5(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs//nyer zhi chos ni rab bstan nas//nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar mdzad//byang chub spyod pa bkas bshad nas//sems can rnams la phan mdzad gsol//sangs
52b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing dang sku tshe dang //gzugs sku dang ni 'khor rnams dang //phrin las gsum dang chos rnams kyang //thams cad kun ni rnam par dag/bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi//
52b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag spyod pa bkas bshad gsol//ji ltar bdud ni 'dul bar bgyi//ji ltar chos rnams bstan par bgyi//ji ltar dran pa nyams mi 'gyur//khyod kyi dkas ni bshad du
53a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol//ji ltar dpa' bo dag gis ni//'khor ba kun du zhugs gyur kyang //mtshan nyid gcig la gnas bgyid cing //chos la rtag tu g.yo mi 'gyur//
53a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams la ni//rten cing mchod pa bgyis na ni//rtag par sangs rgyas sku bltas kyang //mthar ni mtshan ma spong 'gyur lags//rnam thar gsum po mngon
53a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyis kyang //mkha' la bya ni 'phur ba bzhin//yon tan phun tshogs ma gyur par//nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' lags//dbang po rang bzhin yongs rtogs nas//'jigs/
53a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis rjes 'brang zhing //mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par//sems can de dag smin bgyid lags//sngar ni 'jig rten bde btang nas//slad kyis dang ba'i
53a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed de//ye shes gya nom phun tshogs pas//bla med byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba//'di 'dra'i zab mo gya nom don//de bzhin gshegs pas bkas bshang
53a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob la bka' stsal ba/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can tshad med pa rnams la//
53a7(dkon brtsegs): phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang /da ltar gyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa la don
53b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu zhus pa legs so//legs so//de'i phyir glog thob shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o//byang chub
53b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' glog thob kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams
53b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gter chen po dang /zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /kun du zad mi shes pa'i bter dang /mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gter phun
53b4(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs par gyur pas/rgung pa rnams gtan du spong zhing /gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/tshegs chung ngus myur du bla
53b5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro//lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/'dod chags spyod pa'i gter dang /zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter dang /gti mug spyod pa'i
53b6(dkon brtsegs): gter dang /chu mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter dang /chos thams cad kyi gter gang yin pa'o//glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags spyod pa'i
53b7(dkon brtsegs): gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can rnams ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su mthun zhing phyin ci log gis bcings pas/mtshan ma rnams kyi rjesu gzugs
54a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro drang /reg bya dang /chos la sogs pa'i yul dag la rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par brtags nas/brtan pa nyid du mngon par
54a2(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa dang /bde ba la chags shing myos par gyur pa yin la/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba
54a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rab tu shes pas/sems can de dag gang la mos shing 'dun pa dang /spyod yul gang la chags shing goms pas mthun pa can du gyur pa dang /dad pa ji lta bu dang
54a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu skyed pa dang /theg pa gang la gzhol bar byed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yod pa dag nam
54a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig na yongs su smin par gyur pa yang rab tu shes te/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir dang /de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
54a6(dkon brtsegs): sems rtag par rgyan mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir shin tu legs par brtags nas yongs su gasngo bar byed do//glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /spyod pa'i bye brag ni
54a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu shes par dka' bar rig par bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rig par mi nus na/so so'i skye bo dang mu stegs can rnams kyis lta
54b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci dgos/glog thob sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa rnams la mngon par zhen par gyur kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yong su smin par byed pa yod do//sems can
54b2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni 'dod pa'i yul la reg pa tsam mam/'dod pa'i sems kyis tshig smras pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod do//sems
54b3(dkon brtsegs): can kha cig ni gzugs sdug gu dag mthong nas/'ongs chags kyi sems skyes pa las gzugs de rnam par 'gyur zhing zhig par mthong ba nyid kyis gzugs mi rtag par khong du chud par gyur
54b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/'dod pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ste/mi rtag pa nyid shin tu yid la byed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod do//sems
54b5(dkon brtsegs): can kha cig ni bud med mthong ba na/mngon par zhen pa skyes pa med kyang /phyis yid la dran pa'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi sems skyes nas/de'i kha dog dang dbyibs yid la
54b6(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/rjes su chags pa skye bar 'gyur ba yang yod do//sems can kha cig ni rmi lam na gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ba'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi mngon par zhen pa
54b7(dkon brtsegs): smyos nas/yid la byed cing yongs su gnyer bar byed pa yang yod do//sems can kha cig ni bud med kyi sgra thos pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sred pa bskyed par byed la/res
55a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod pas/de'i
55a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa dang /'dod chags kyi sman gang yin pa de dag thibs mo khas pas legs par
55a3(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud kyang /chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'din pa'i mtshan ma yang med la/chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag la yang snying rje chen po bskyed
55a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed do//glog thob 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug ces bya ba dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes shes bya ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med pas//
55a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong ba ltar na/sems can rnams ni mtshan ma med pa rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dben pa/btags pa tsam du rnam par gzhag pa/
55a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing 'dus pa'i chos 'di la 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug bskyed par byed pas/bdag gis 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas/
55a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyis rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du snying rje chen po la gnas nas/sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//chos kyi dbyings las ma
55b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du sems so//skyes pa gang zhig bud med dag la yang dag pa ma yin pas sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/
55b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags lci ba skyes par gyur na/byang chub sems dpas bud med shin du sdug cing mdzes pa gzugs kyi mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang ldan pa rgyan rnam
55b3(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar gyur pa sngon ma mthong ba dag tu bsgyur nas sems can de dag gis ji ltar sred cing rjes su chags pa dang /shin tu mngon
55b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ri zhen par gyur pa ston par byed de/de dag gi nus pa dang sbyar nas thabs kyis 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du rang dbang du gyur pa'i mthus bud med kyi gzugs su
55b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur nas/de'i mdun du snang bar byas nas chos bstan po nyid kyis sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byas te mi snang bar gyur to//bud med gang zhig skyes
55b6(dkon brtsegs): ba drug la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes par gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i lus bstan nas 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i tshad du chos bstan pa nyid kyis chos kyi
55b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la zhugs par byas nas mi snang bar byed do//glog thob 'dod chags kyi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang spyod pa gzhan de dag kyang gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa
56a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub sems dpas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi sgo mo bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa bskyed de/sems can gyi khong du chud par byas nas thams
56a2(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par grol bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can la 'di lta bu'i chos bstan to snyam du sems pa yang med la sems can rnam par grol bar gyur pa yang mi dmigs so//
56a3(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'di lta ste dper nu mtsho ma dros pa'i klu'i rgyal po ni las kyi mthu'i dbang gis de'i pho brang gi nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi byung nas sems can chu dang /skam sa la gnas pa
56a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dbyar tsha ba'i dus kyi che bsil ba dang rlan gyis me tog dang 'bras bu dag rgyas shing 'bru rnams 'phel bar gyur nas sems can mang po shin tu bde bar byed kyang /klu'i rgyal po de
56a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis chu klung bzhi po 'di dag phyung ngo //dbyung bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi 'on kyang chu klung bzhi po dag rtag tu 'bar cing sems can rnams nye bar spyod par byed do//byang
56a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i dbang gis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan nas 'khor ba'i yongs su
56a7(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba thams cad bsal te/lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba sbyin par byed kyang /byang chub sems dpa' de bdag gis chos bstan to//bstan par byar
56b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du mi sems mod kyi/'on kyang rang gi drang gis snying rje chen po bsam pa la gnas nas sems can rnams so sor brtag te ci rigs par chos ston par byed do//gzhan yang
56b2(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'di lta ste/dper na brgya byin lha'i dbang po la lha'i bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod pa de dag brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i rang dbang gi mthu'i dbang gis lus mang po bstan
56b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/lha'i bu mo de dag de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs par myong bas de dag so so nas dzad snyam du bdag gcig pu ni deng lha'i dbang po dang lhan cig rtses so snyam du
56b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang yang dag par lha'i dbang po de la mngon par zhen par gyur pa ci yang med do//byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sems can yongs su bzla ba'i 'os su gyur pa de
56b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par byed kyang /byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do//gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i
56b6(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor ri mthon po'i rtsa la shar ba'i tshe 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu snang bar byed pas grang du snang bar byas pa'i gnas de dag tu kha dog sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar
56b7(dkon brtsegs): bo dang /dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni me dog gcig po 'od gcig pa nyid de tha dad pa'i mtshan me med de//byang chub sems
57a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings snang bar byas nas sems can gyi mngon par zhen pa'i ri'i rtse mo de dag tu shar bA na
57a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur cing de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do glog thob 'di ni byang
57a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/bskal pa 'am
57a4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa las lhag pa sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis
57a5(dkon brtsegs): su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do//gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na gser yang dag pa ni mgar ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i mthu'i dbang gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du
57a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs su byas te/mtshan nyid tha dad par gyur kyang gser gyi rang bzhin la ni tha dad du gyur pa ci yang med do//byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin tu
57a7(dkon brtsegs): legs par brtags nas sems can mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa dag bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la ni gnyis su
57b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med de/'di ni rtag par chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di lta bu thob par gyur
57b2(dkon brtsegs): nasems can gyi ched du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos ston par byed pa de dag gis chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i nar phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par gyur pas
57b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgud pa dag gtan du yongs su spong byed do//gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/'di
57b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/sems can rnams ni nga rgyal dang mtshungs par ldan pa/bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/bdag dang bdag gi mtshan ma la gnas pas yun ring po nas
57b5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang bzod pa ma bsgoms pa zhe sdang gi gdung bas rang gi sems bshig par gyur pa/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rjes su dran par ma gyur pa/zhe sdang gi gdug pas
57b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa/chos nyid la rmongs par gyur pa yin yang byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la nam yang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tsho ba bskyed par mi byed kyi/'di
57b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug go rmongs pas chos rnams gzod ma nyid nas rab tu dben zhing zhi ba dri ma dang rnyog pa med pa/'dum pa med pa/rtsod pa med pa/rab tu dben pa'i
58a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya r+b+ba dang rgyun gyi log dang ma tshungs par gyur du'i dbyung gis yang dag pa ma yin pa ni sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa rgyas par gyur to zlum du sems pa ljon byud pa//
58a2(dkon brtsegs): deskasnyam du bsams nas kyang snying rje chen po la gnas te rtag par bdag nyid 'gyod cing bshags par yang byed la/gal te lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa zhig yodan
58a3(dkon brtsegs): ya /zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir bzod pa la rab tu gnas par byed do//gal te ni sdang spyod pa'i sems can tshad med pa de dag phan tshun
58a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig la gcig rgyab kyis phyogs shing zhe sdang dang /khron du 'dzin pa'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis sbrul gdug pa ngan 'gro'i lus su ltung bar gyur pa dag la ni/
58a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la rab tu gnas pa des 'di ltar byams pa dang /dran pa'i stobs kyis sems can de dag btul nus ngan 'gro'i rnam par smin pa len par mi
58a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing /gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mekhas pas sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa yongs su
58a7(dkon brtsegs): bsil bzhes bya'o//gzhan yang klog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni zhal te sems can ni sdang can dag mthong bar gyur na/'di snyam du chos thams cid ni rang zhin
58b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis rnam par dag pa yin na/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brangs nas yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa bskyed nas mnyam zhing rtsod pa med pa chos 'di nyid la zhe
58b2(dkon brtsegs): spang gi bsam pa bskyed pas sems can 'di dag chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs par gyur to//gal te sems can 'di dag chos nyid mthong bar gyur na ni gzhan dag la gnod sems bskyed
58b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba zhig na chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ma rtogs pas/de'i phyir zhe sdang skyes par gyur to zhes byang chub sems dpa' des zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la lhag par stong
58b4(dkon brtsegs): brtse bskyed nas snying rje chen po la gnas te/sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed la rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam par bzhig pa'i phyir chos
58b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo mo rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang bdag gis sems can gyi zhe sdang bsal ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems
58b6(dkon brtsegs): dradruba' chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir 'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid la gnas nas nyon mongs pa'i
58b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rab tu bsal ba zhes bya'o//glog thob 'di lta ste dper na/mun pa bsal nas snang ba 'thob par 'gyur yang mun pa sel bar byed pa med de/'di ltar mun
59a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dbyer med pa yin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i ye
59a2(dkon brtsegs): shes de la brten nas thabs mkhas blas chos bstan te zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul zhing zhi bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la tha dad du gyur pa med do//
59a3(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nus 'di kyis gang dang gang du snang bar byis pa de dag thams cad ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin no//de bzhin
59a4(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa' yang zhe sdang gi spyod pa gdul zhing bsal ba'i phyir ji tsam du brjod pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo yin yang chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa yin no//
59a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar zhe sdang gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang /spyod pa gzhan rtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pas
59a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su chos ston par byed kyang /bdag gis sems can la chos bstan to ston to//ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems
59a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/bskal
59b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rje su tshig 'bru dang /yi ge dang /brjod pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang //
59b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang spyod pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi 'gyur la/byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings
59b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o//gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i
59b4(dkon brtsegs): gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 'dri lta bu 'di ni shin tu dkar ba'i dngos po yin te/'di ltar sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rjes
59b5(dkon brtsegs): su 'brang ba gzhan la gnod par byed pa ma rig pa'i mngal gyi sgo ngas kun tu dkris pa dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid bcings pas chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i thabs med pa bya ba dag la legs
59b6(dkon brtsegs): par so sor mi rtog pa bdag tu lto ba la mngon par zhen pa/lam log par zhugs pa/byis pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa nges par 'byung bar dka' ba yin pas 'di lta bu la sogs pas
59b7(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag gi ched du dang po sems bskyed pa nas sbyor ba chen po bskyed de/ral zhing sdug pa yang med de/le lo yang med par rkyen gang dang mos pa gang dang /chos
60a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis sems can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la btsud de/rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur snyam du sems te/byang chub sems
60a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sngon chos kyi dbyings legs par so sor brtags pas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis snying rje chen po la gnas te/sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur
60a3(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas ci nus ci lcogs kyis chos bstan nas rab tu dul bar byed kyang bdag gis chos bstan to//ston to//ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med de/'on kyang
60a4(dkon brtsegs): de sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba legs par so sor brtags nas rang gi ngang gis chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan te/sems can de dag gi ma rig pa'i
60a5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do//glog thob 'di lta ste dper na/sman pa bzang po nad mang po gso ba la mkhas pa/sngar sman dpyad rnams la
60a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu goms par gyur pa ni nad kyi mtshan mthong ma thag tu sngags dang sman btang ba thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur pas/des gsos pa glang yang mi sos pa med do//de bzhin du
60a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par rtogs pas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis gti mug gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang /
60b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas thams cad rab tu gsal bar rtogs par byed de/glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
60b2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug spyod pa'i gtero zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang gi gter 'di thob par gyur na/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas/gti
60b3(dkon brtsegs): mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa 'am//bskal pa las lhag par de dag gi rang bzhin dang 'dum pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig 'bru dang /yi ge dang brjod pa rnam
60b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang /gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs
60b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o//'di ltar gti mug
60b6(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang /spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag/byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang ba'i phyir/chos kyi sgo mo brgyad stong du ma rab tu bya
60b7(dkon brtsegs): nas yang dag par ston pa gang yin po 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o//gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha
61a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gtor ces bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na mo long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag cing yongs su gsal ba/dri ma med pa
61a2(dkon brtsegs): la lam bzhi mdor bzhag na gzugs brnyan rnams der snang zhing 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag gis gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag ston
61a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed do zhes mi sems mod kyi/'on kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu byi dor legs par byas na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu snang bar
61a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa rtsol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems
61a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgyad stong du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas/de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs shing rnam par grol ba thob par byas kyang /
61a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mtshan ma dang /sems can gyi mtshan ma bskyed par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i
61a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir dang /spyod pa bzhi po 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de dag gi dbang po dang /rang bzhin ji lta ba
61b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang /chos kyi dbyings dang /sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs par byed pas/gnyis su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyang med de/
61b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings dang /sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag gnyis su med cing tha dad pa med par gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro//glog thob 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa
61b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma yang med la/rnam par bzhag pa yang med do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas chos thams
61b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug par rtogs pa dang /sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang /chos kyi dbyings la
61b5(dkon brtsegs): ni tha dad du gyur pa med do//glog thob cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa 'di la nyi khri chig stong yod pa dang /spyod po gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag kyang /byang chub sems dpas
61b6(dkon brtsegs): so sor brtags nas thams cad gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur te/'di lta ste dper na/sman pa mkhas pa nad dang /sman gtong ba rab tu shes pa bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis
61b7(dkon brtsegs): chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang
62a1(dkon brtsegs): gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/sems can rnams kyi ched du/bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par de dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa rnam pa sna
62a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang /spyod pa de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang /spobs pa yang gtugs
62a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o//
62a4(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /
62a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang /bsam pa yang thabs mkhas pas rab tu rtogs pas/gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/de dag rab tu gdul zhing de dag gi nad gso
62a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/so so'i skye bo dang mthun par 'dod pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa dang /bu dang chung ma dang /khyim gyi so chos phun sum tshogs pa ston par byed kyang /pad+ma bzhin du
62a7(dkon brtsegs): des gos shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do//sems can gong gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes pas
62b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du blo dang ldan pa sa klag/dra chu'i skye ba dang b+h+ra mi dang bar 'dod pa na mas nyams su len par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub spangs pa yin na snyam du sems par/
62b2(dkon brtsegs): byed de/sems can de lta bu de dag ni soms yongs su mi gtsang ba'i phyir/zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus par mi 'gyur bas/las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste/shi ba'i
62b3(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur na yang /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gsang bas gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongs su zad nas//
62b4(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa la rab tu bkod par byed do//glog thob 'di lta ste dper na/me rab tu 'bar ba ni/rtswa dang shing dang phrad par gyur pa na/thams cad rab tu
62b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bar zhing me'i phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur pa na/sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /
62b6(dkon brtsegs): zhesdang dang /gti mug dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan thig 'grogs shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas/shes rab nyid du mngon par
62b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos shes bya'o//gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/
63a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin pas/sems can rnams pang du'i rjes su kha dog sngon po dang /sor po dang /dmar po dang /dka po rnam pa
63a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du gyur par byed de/gal te bai DUr+ya'i ngos su phyin na ni/thams cad kyang bai DUr+ya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed do//gser gyi kha dog gi ngos su
63a3(dkon brtsegs): phyin na ni/thams cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do//dngul dang /chu shel gyi kha dog tu gyur pa yang de bzhin no//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma
63a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i chos thob pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin cing
63a5(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na/thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du gyur par byed kyang de'i sems mi gtsang zhing /rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi dad
63a6(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar gyur pas/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dris pa'i yon tan dang /
63a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan lam gyi stobs kyis kha namatha ba'i rnam par smin pa bde ba'i rag tu gdin min rje/blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu zab par gyur pa sa bkod par byed //
63b1(dkon brtsegs): glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med dpag tu med/grangs med pa na/snyigs mA lnga'i dus kyi tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
63b2(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
63b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par gyur te/da ltar dwa ji lta ba bzhin no//de'i tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags dang /
63b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang /gti mug shin tu che ste/nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas/pha ma dang phu nu dang grogs po'i yid dang 'gal bar byed pa/mkhan po dang /slob dpon gyi rjes
63b5(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'brang ba/byas pa drin mi gzo /rtag par gnod sems dang bcas pa/g.yo sgyu dang /rku ba'i sems dang ldan pa/na tshun gcig lnga gcig gnod par byed pa/tshul
63b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mu yin par spyod pa/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ser snas zil gyis non pas yi dwags kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag/sangs
63b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas par gyur pas na/shin tu gdul dka' bar gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yang sngon gyi smon lam phyi mthus dus ngan pa de'i tshe/bla na med pa yang
64a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos chen po'i tshogs ni nyi khri nyis stong mang 'brar
64a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgya cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dzam+bu'i gling la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu drang bar gyur pa zhig
64a3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa des/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par dbyar zla ba gsum spyan drangs te/mchod pa rgya cher bshams nas/mchod cing rim gro byas so//de'i
64a4(dkon brtsegs): tshecho dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/chos ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa 'khor mang po rnams nyan par spro ba/sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la/
64a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag par ngal ba med pa/re ba med par chos ston pa/mdog gsal zhing gsong por smra ba/gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa/byang bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/sems
64a6(dkon brtsegs): can+da rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing /rim gro dang /bkur bsti dang /bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod pa zhig yod de/dge slong gsar bu dag kyang rtag par dri ma med
64a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la/thogs pa med par gyur pas/gos dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /mal stan dang /na nga'i
64b1(dkon brtsegs): gsos sman rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang /rim gro byas par gyur to//de'i tshe 'khor mang po de nas dge slong phal cher lus kyi sdom pa dang /sems kyi shes rab bsgom pa mi shes pa/sangs
64b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/rtag par lta ba dang /chad par lta ba dang /bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur pa 'debs pa/rnam
64b3(dkon brtsegs): bar g.yeng zhing gdul dka' ba/dbang po rnams mi sdom pa/chos bzhin ma yin pa la gnas pa dge slong gi tshul med par bdag nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/lus dang /ngag dang /yang
64b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi las thams cad log par bzhugs pa sha stag gnas par gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de dbyer 'das nas/yongs su mya ngan las 'dras pa dang /rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan
64b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan dmar pos sku bzhu nas mchod pa byas te/ring bsrel gyi mchod rten ngos bzhi kun tu tse na dan dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/pad+ma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/bye ba phrag brgyad cu
64b6(dkon brtsegs): brtsigs so//de'i tshe dge slong dri ma yang ba ni bcom ldan 'das des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu lung bstan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan les 'ge'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos
64b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher spel te/grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal gang dang gang du song ba der sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongs su btul nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubal
65a1(dkon brtsegs): /pa/ byA b+hU //de me dge slong sgrogs rgyu mang la 'byud khong du mchud pa/rtag par zag dog dang brdzus pa/bdud smras pa rnams rgyal pa dag
65a2(dkon brtsegs): de de ste/'di da du rgyam sa dag ming dris med rgyam de blo 'i ga thugs sogs mamachis te/de sbyi ni 'du chags da sgyul ba yang
65a3(dkon brtsegs): lugs la//dus mi lags par yang sa tshal te/spros dang phreng ba dag gis kya gros brgyan par 'gyis pas/yang dag par tshangs par spyod pa ma legs pas mdzod pa mdzadas
65a4(dkon brtsegs): mo gsus//bdag drug na don d-i'i ska du 'di ma tshi sa rgyal po sngagasal ba lag /b+had kyis 'dzud par yang ma mdzad ci//seMs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstan dul
65a5(dkon brtsegs): drugs ni ches pa yang myi bskyed du gsol nas rnaMs so//de'i tshe bdud sdig can zhes bya ba nig cad bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su brdzun+d+hanas/rgyal po dag la bder pa'i ste/
65a6(dkon brtsegs): snum Sh+mi d+hA nas so/ sbyin dus phyung du sa da sa slong sa spyod sbyim du de slong drim med pa ni sa dang na sa byu ga gis rnamar
65a7(dkon brtsegs): phre ba rtson/das pa'i dus kyi byed pa ni gnas med de skye // ni dem mdud zil ba rnams pa rlung las sus byed bstan mo/ ma phyogs su
65b1(dkon brtsegs): desmras pa/rgyal po bzo yi sgra rtul slobs//dus chod dag la mu khas par gyis//rgyal pos de ni ma shes na//mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin//sangs rgyas nyan thos dgra bcom pa//ye
65b2(dkon brtsegs): shes chen po ldan pa yin//tshig dag la ni mi rten par//ci yi phyir na chad par lta//dge slong rnams ni phan gdags phyir//khyod la bden tshig smras pa yin//chad smra dran 'gror 'gro
65b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mi//yang dag tshangs spyod ma yin pas//dro ni rgyal po'i pho brang du//btsun mo dag dang lhan cig rtse//rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis//legs par rtogs la the tshom sol//rgyal
65b4(dkon brtsegs): pos dngos po 'di thos pas//sems la skrag cing mya ngan skyes//'khor rnams dang ni lhan cig tu//myur zhing rings par pho brang dong //de tshe dri med pho brang nang //chos rnams rang bzhin stong
65b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //bdag dang sems can med pa yi//dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed//rgyal po dmag 'khor bcas pa rnams//thams cad bdud kyis bslus pas na//pho brang nang gi btsun mo
65b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams//dge slong yongs bskor mthong ba dang //zhe sdang glang chen myos pa bzhin//gshed ma dag la rab bsgo ba//dge slong nga yi btsun mo bslus//sdug bsngal chos kyi chad pas chos//
65b7(dkon brtsegs): blon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams//thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na//dge slong nyes pa med pa la//sems kyis gnod pa bya bar bsams//gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang //
66a1(dkon brtsegs): dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung //rgyal pos khyod ni chos min na//ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung //dri med rgyal po la smras pa//dngos po 'di ni yid ches dkar//re
66a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig skad cig sdod cig dang //bdag ni bsad pa'i long yod do//rgyal pos dge slong tshig thos nas//gshed ma dag la sdod cig bsgo//bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod//khyod
66a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis myur du smra bar rigs//lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan 'gyur zhing //snying rjes 'jig rten phan 'dogs pas//sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te//bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras//
66a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod//gal te yang dag nyes med na//sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos//mkha' la me tog char phob shig/de skad tshig 'di smras ma thag/sa chen
66a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu g.yos//mkha' la lha yi me tog babs//bdud 'khor mya ngan smras par gyur//de tshe rgyal po dang bskyes//rkang la phyag byas bzod par gsol//bdug ni
66a6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal bar lhung 'gyur na//mgon med bdag la skyabs mdzod cig/kyi hud sdig pa'i grogs phrad pas//gdug pa'i sems ni skyes par gyur//sdig pa'i grogs po'i rjes
66a7(dkon brtsegs): 'brang nas//mgon dang skyabs byed su yang med//ston pa chen po ma gtogs par//phyogs bcu bdag gis mgon byed med//bdag gis rgyal srid spangs nas ni//nam 'tsho'i
66b1(dkon brtsegs): bar du skyabs su mchi//dge slong des ni rgyal po dang //g.yog 'khor bsam pa rig gyur nas//dam pa'i chos na rab tu bshad//rgyal pos thos nas dang pa thob//'khor ni bya ba brgya
66b2(dkon brtsegs): stong dag/rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung //sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na//gzhan gyis mgron gnyer rjod mi len//de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang //btsun mo 'khor bcas brgyad khri
66b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams//dam pa'i don ni thos pas na//phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur//rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin//lo ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar//nyin mtshan rtag par sdig bshags kyang //
66b4(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang sdig pa'i las ma zad//lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong //sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad//sngon ni bsreg par byas pa'i rgyus//rnam smin lhag ma rtag par smin//mthar gyis rnal
66b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor rab bsgoms te//sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas//so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu//thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas//thams cad kun dang mtshan mthun par//yon tan
66b6(dkon brtsegs): grags pa zhes byar gyur//de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin//dge slong byams bzod de la ni//gdug pa'i sems ni bskyod pas na//lo ni bye ba mang por yang //sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas//
66b7(dkon brtsegs): ngu 'bod chen por ltung bar 'gyur//rnam smin do ni zad nas kyang //slar yang mi lus thob gyur te//de bzhin gshegs pa kun spyan phrad//rtag tu bsnyen bkur rim gro byas//gzhan yang
67a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/brgyad cu dag ni rim gro byas//de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa//de ni nga bdag nyid yin no//chos smra nyes pa med pa la//gnod pa byas pa'i//
67a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong ni//ma 'ongs mngon par 'tshang rgya ba//byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin//de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang //btsun mo'i 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams//shin tu dang bas dge
67a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bskyed//sangs rgyas tshad med rim gro byas//de ltar spyod pa rab bskyed nas//sems can phan gdags smon lam gdab//sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas//so sor mngon par
67a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chang yang rgya//ngas deng khyod la bsgo ba ni//thams cad gnod sems ma bskyed cig/gang gis byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags//myur du byang chub chen po thob//de lta
67a5(dkon brtsegs): bas na glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /rang bzhin dang bsam pa dag la mi mkhas pa dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o//gleg thob
67a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na ri rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog dang gtso bo dang /bla na med par gyur pa
67a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no//'di lta ste dper na chu bo thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya che bar
67b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin no//gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khon mos bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchog dang gtso bo dang bla mar gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang
67b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par gyur pa yin no//glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti
67b3(dkon brtsegs): mug spyod pa'i sems dang /sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cing se gol btogs pa gcig la thams cad yongs
67b4(dkon brtsegs): su sdud pa mdzad do//glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par rang gi lag
67b5(dkon brtsegs): mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tsom med pa de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa dag rab tu mkhyen pas 'khor
67b6(dkon brtsegs): mang po'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i
67b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs nas/nyin mtshan du yid la byed cing don med par dus las 'das par byed pa yang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so//'dod chags
68a1(dkon brtsegs): sa bla dungs pas smras dang drug gi las rnam pa sna tshogs rmeng par byed pa dag byung ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so//zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can no sang gau zong
68a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis non pas gcig la gcig zhe sdang gi phrag dog byed pa dang gnod pa byas pa'i phyir man+dor med pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mi khyen cing gzigs so//gti mug
68a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams mi rig pa'i mun nag gis bsgribs shing rmongs pas mngon par zhen pa dang /log par lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la mos par bya
68a4(dkon brtsegs): po dag kyang ngas rab tu mabyin to//'os su gyur pa dang /'os su mi 'gyur ba dang /'phel zhing rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang /log cing nyams par gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg
68a5(dkon brtsegs): bar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to//de bzhin gshegs
68a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du zhugs nas sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu mkhyen pos gal te dus lde ma dad par rig par gyur nan cang mi
68a7(dkon brtsegs): gsung nang gtang snyoms su bzhed nas sems can 'di dag ni chos la rmongs par gyur pas khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po dang stobs
68b1(dkon brtsegs): khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing dus rab tu mkhyen pa'i phyir 'dul ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa dang /bzod par nus pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang /tshig
68b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par nyan par gyur pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen te/de ltar mabyon par gyur nas kyang sems can de dag yongs su spyad cing zin 'dogs par byed do//de lta bas na gleg thob byang chub
68b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' las dang po pa yang dag pa'i gnas skabs su ma zhugs pa/sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par khong du chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa'am rab tu byu
68b4(dkon brtsegs): pab yang rung ste/thams cad kun la smod cing gnod sems bskyed nas yun ring por bdag nyid la gnod par 'gyur bar mi bya'o//de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
68b5(dkon brtsegs): nus theg pa chen blo la granas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//sems can gzhan dag sdig pa mau dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na yang gnod sems bskyed par
68b6(dkon brtsegs): me bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu sems can gang rnam par dkar zhing yongs su dge pa'i chos las cung zad cig nyams par gyur na nam yang yongs su
68b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngon las mi 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas so//byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/sems can 'di dag 'don
69a1(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa yang bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so//zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa de dag mthong
69a2(dkon brtsegs): na yang 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag gis sems can thams cad na ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur pa dag mthong
69a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na sman yongs su btsal te thabs mkhas pas yongs su gso ba'i rigs pa las/bdag sngon sems can gyi nad bsal bar yid dam bcas na dang yal bar bor ba 'di nyid
69a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi nyes pa yin no snyam du sems pas so//byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems
69a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed do//gal te gsod pa'am lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod cing btub pa zhig dang phrad par gyur na yang pha rol gnod pa byed pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med
69a6(dkon brtsegs): do//glog thob byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par bsgom pa na 'das pa'i mi dge ba'i las ji snyed pa dag kyang gtan du zad cing ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur la/ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba
69a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni yam ldang bar mi 'gyur ro//glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa de bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
69b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jug rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
69b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //'jig rten gyi khams ni 'od zer can zhes bya ste rgyal po'i grong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na bzhugs so//de
69b3(dkon brtsegs): tsheshan pa 'jigs su rung po zhes bya ba khro gtumache ba gsod pa la dga' zhing /bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa lag pa khrag gis bskus pa mthong ba thams cad skrag par 'gyur
69b4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhig yod de/de'i tshe shan pa des glang zhig khang pa'i nang du bcings te/nang du zhugs nas gsod par byas pa las glang des de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas thag pa bcad de byos nas/de bzhin
69b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa bzhugs pa'i tshal gA la bai der song ngo //de'i tshe shan pa de yang mtshon thogs nas phyi bzhin bsnyegs pas glang de skrag nas g.yang sa zab mo zhig tu lhung nas srog
69b6(dkon brtsegs): chatshad la thug pa tsam du ni zhing sdug bsngal bas sgra phyung ngo //de'i tshe shan pas glang de mthong nas zhe sdang cher skyes te/g.yang sa zab mo de nyid du zhugs nas mtshon thogs te bsad par byas pa
69b7(dkon brtsegs): las mtshan ma btab pa'i bar skabs dar de'i tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshel der 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor ba dag la rten cing 'brel bar
70a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/
70a2(dkon brtsegs): ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i
70a3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
70a4(dkon brtsegs): to/de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par phye ste ston par mdzad pas/glog thob rten cing
70a5(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba 'di la ma rig pa yang 'du byed la mA sems mi rtag la/'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi rtog go/de bzhin du skye ba yang rga shi lnga mi sems mi rtog
70a6(dkon brtsegs): pas/de ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/dran pa med pa/bdag dang bdag gi med pa/rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
70a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi rig pa yin no//so so'i skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thob pa'i phyir gzugs ni bdag yin no//bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no//
70b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang de bzhin no//bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa lnga mngon par
70b2(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa'i dbang gis mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byed/sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'dzin par byed//rmyi sdug pa la sdug par 'dzin par byed/bdag med pa la bdag gir 'dzin cing phyin ci
70b3(dkon brtsegs): log bzhi bskyed par byed do//phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /sems kyi rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur pas srid pa'i
70b4(dkon brtsegs): srisred pa 'ching ba gcod pa mi nus shing 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor bar gyur pa yin no//mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu legs par rtogs par
70b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i phyir/bdag dang gang zag dang sems can zhes bya ba nas srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yang yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang
70b6(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa dang gnod par byed pa dag kyang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa dang /glog thob de'i tshe shan pa 'jigs su rung bas rkyang nas/de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i sgra thos nas go/
70b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pas de ma thag tu gsod pa'i sems nye bar sri bar gyur nas/mtshon cha spangs te g.yang sa nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
71a1(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ce sa gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dang de bzhin gshegs
71a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de rigs so//dge slong legs par 'ongs so zhes gsungs ma thag tu
71a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dngos por gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pas de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas mthar gyis yongs su
71a4(dkon brtsegs): smin par mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'jigs su rung ba thos nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to//glang de
71a5(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i gsung sgra shin tu gya nom pa thos nas sems lnga rab tu dga' ba skyes pas/shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan
71a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gnas su skyes nas byams pa dang phrad de yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//glog thob de ltar na sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni shin tu zab pa dang /rnam par rig par dka' ni
71a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par dka' ba yin te/de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas/sems can gyi dbang po dang
71b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dag la shin tu mkhas par byas nas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems dang /thogs pa med pa'i sems la rab tu gnas te chos thams cad la rtag tu mngon par zhon pa med
71b2(dkon brtsegs): por bya'o//ci bdog pa rnams yongs su spangs te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya'o//bzod pa la gnas par bya'o//brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o//bsam gtan dang ting nge
71b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par bya'o//yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la so sor brtag par bya'o//glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang chos drug po de dag yongs su
71b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par gyur na myur du blan mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgyu bar 'gyur ro//ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i lce
71b5(dkon brtsegs): shes la brten nas mngon par sgrub byed pa'i phyir ro//glog zob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi gtar gang zhe na/'di lta ste byang chub sems dpas gzugs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
71b6(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu rtogs shing bzod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa dang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa mthong ba gang yin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' ni gzugs la mkhas pa thob pa'i phyir mo so yang dag
71b7(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa
72a1(dkon brtsegs): /dang /stobs pa so so yang dag par rnyog pa'o//donas so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi don rnams la thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir ro//gzugs
72a2(dkon brtsegs): don gang zhe na/'di lta ste don dam pa gang yin pa'o//don dam pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste gzugs dmigs su med pa gang yin pa ste/don dam pa'i ye shes la 'di lta bu dang ldan
72a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni den so so yang dag par rlig pa zlas bya'o//chos sa sa ya g-i bA rab pa ni gzug d+hI mAn mas yang dge 'a blo bzhin dus sor brtags nas
72a4(dkon brtsegs): dgra pa dz+rI lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni nas so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o//nges pa'i tshigs sde yang dge par rig pa ni 'di lta ste gzugs rnams la
72a5(dkon brtsegs): pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi thabasi la mu khas pas de.a 'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshigs so yang dge par rig pazhes bya'o//sa
72a6(dkon brtsegs): seM so yang dag par rig pa ni 'd-i lnga ste gzugs kyi chos rnams sum sa ldan mye ba po del po bzhin du rnam bur ste ston par byed kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cid man
72a7(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa med pa gang yin po ni slebs pas sa yang dge par rig pa zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i ni 'od lta bu'i ye shes deng ldan pas gzugs kyi chos la rma
72b1(dkon brtsegs): shing mngon par zhon par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mthun pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings lnga//
72b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med de/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi bar du yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
72b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gter zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na spyod yul rnams la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu dag yongs su gdul bar 'dod pa'i
72b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag re re la yang bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang de dag gi
72b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la yang 'grib pa med cing chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'gal bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
72b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thob pa'i chos kyi gter zhes bya'o//chos kyi gter 'dis
72b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag la ci rigs par chos bstan nas zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gter phun sum tshogs par gyur te/'khor ba'i rgud pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni glog thob byang
73a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gter chen po dang /zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /kun tu zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /mtha' med pa'i gtor/
73a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshogs chung ngus
73a3(dkon brtsegs): myur du bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//chas kyi gter bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub
73a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' glog thob ni gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//lha'i bu sum khri drug
73a5(dkon brtsegs): stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces
73a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rtsol ba mchis pa'i ye shes gang gsungs pa de'i doni ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems
73a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la lus dang sems kyi rjes su mthun par dmigs shing mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o//byang chub
73b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur nas dran pa gnas med pa rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur pa dang /de sngon gyi smon lam dang ye shes yongs su rdzobs
73b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams su rnam pa sna tshogs su ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las g.yo ba med pa dang /rtag tu chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi mtshan ma
73b3(dkon brtsegs): cung zad tsam yang med pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can gang yang yongs su bzlas pa med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su
73b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /rtag par sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dran par byed kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi
73b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing kun tu rgyu bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes
73b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang gang byas pa de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa yang med do//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsol ba meng pa'i ye
73b7(dkon brtsegs): shes 'di bstan pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang bcas te sta
74a1(dkon brtsegs): grI bar snang las me tog man dar ba dang /ut+pa la dang /ku mu ta dang /pung+tha dang /dru du rA ka dang /can dan gyi phyi ma'i chur mngon par phab ste/bcom ldan 'das/
74a2(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod de//lha'i rjernams kyang rang m+bu byung bar gyur te//ngo mtshar mod du byu ba'i snying bachen pos kyang kun tu steng bar byas te/sems can gang la reg par skyed pa
74a3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyang shin tu bsal bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' krig thob la bka' stsal pa/glog slo ba 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bon na
74a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs so//mi byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu
74a5(dkon brtsegs): yang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ga smang bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams tshad ming grangs med pa dag na da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kya
74a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po bskyed par mdzad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dge' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu zar
74a7(dkon brtsegs): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das go la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
74b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lpags bdag gis ji ltar yongs su bzung bar gyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gtar zhes bya'o//

74b3(dkon brtsegs): thob dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /'khor bzhi po rnams dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/
74b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do////'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i le'u ste 'dus pa nyi
74b5(dkon brtsegs): shu pa rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/b+had dra m+b+ha ya kAr byA kA ra Na nA ma mahA ya nA sU tA/bod skad du/sgyu ma mkhan bzung po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mang/bram
74b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs me gcig/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'odadi skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ril
74b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par grags pa/mngon par shes pa theb pa/gzungs thob pa/rdzu
75a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thob pa/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lnga stong la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge dang /byang chub sems
75a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge blo gos dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po can dan bzang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khe lo bsgyur
75a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo bsgyur ba chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems

75a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang

75b2(dkon brtsegs): yang thabs gcig go//mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang yang thabs gcig go//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang yang thabs gcig go//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang
75b3(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang yongs su bskor to//de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la brten cing bzhugs te/rgyal po dang blon po chen po
75b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang bram ze dang khyim bdag dang grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis ni gus par byas/bla mar byas/bsnyen bkur byas/mchod par byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang zhal
75b5(dkon brtsegs): zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong ni brnyas bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/'di ltar de bzhin
75b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen po/skyes bu 'dral ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha
75b7(dkon brtsegs): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/thams cad ni mkhyen thams cad ni gzigs/de bzhin gshegs
75b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ni ldan//
76a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po drang ni ldan/sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa myi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/spyan lnga dang ni ldan/rgyu 'phrul yang brnyes te/kun brjod
76a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so//bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas
76a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/grong rdal dang bcas pa/sa dang bcas pa/ri rab dang bcas pa/rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/rtswa dang shing dang rir
76a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis 'dzin par mdzad do//yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na sgyu ma mkhan bzang
76a5(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa/gsang sngags la shin tu mkhas pa/bzo dang rig pa la mkhas pa/las kyi mtha' byas zin pa/rab tu byed pa byos pa/sgra
76a6(dkon brtsegs): grags pa/yul ma ga d+ha na sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag gi mchog tu grags pa phul du grags pa zhig gnas te/des yul mu ga d+hA rnyil gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams
76a7(dkon brtsegs): cad 'dun par byas pa rmongs por byas mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/bden pa mthong ba rnams dang dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang dge
76b1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams ni ma gtogs so//des sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshogs su bcad pa yang lhag par rnyed do//
76b2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
76b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa

76b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcodadra rgyad dang ni ldan/byams pa chen po de
76b6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/spyan lnga dang ni ldan/cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/kun brjod pa'i tshe 'phrul ni brnyes/rjes su bstan pa

77a3(dkon brtsegs): dang shing dang rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la 'dzin par mdzad do zhes thos so//thos nas kyang de 'di
77a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bdag gis 'dun par byas rmongs par byas mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/bram

77a6(dkon brtsegs): de gcig pu da dung ma bgams rmongs par ma byas mgo 'khor bar ma byas kyis/ma la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga
77a7(dkon brtsegs): la ba der 'gro bar bya'o//song nas kyang 'gam par bya ste/gal te rmongs pa'am mgo 'khor bar bya nus pa lta na de lta na yul ma ga d+ha thams cad bdag la gcig tu 'dus/
77a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rnyed pa dang kur sti yang ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam mo//de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi mthus
77b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyam la ba kyi grong khyung rdzun d+ha nas r+b+ba sgra b+hU nga kyi rung ba'i rnyogal ba dang /bcom ldan 'das grol ba der song //gasmon sa kyang sgyum mkhan bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyam bya
77b2(dkon brtsegs): bablag 'bum pas ldog pa'i 'od zer 'bar baM/zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'dzum pas ldeg par dri ma med pa/sku shing n+ya gro de'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng ga b+hA be/mdzod spu nor bu dri ma med
77b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od dag pa ltar gsal ba/spyan pad+ma dang ut+pal sngon po kha bye ba lta bu'i bklag yod pa/spyi gtsug tshangs pas kyang ba ltar mi mthong ba/'khor gyi nang na gsung dbyangs yan lag

77b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'dre ni thams cad mkhyen la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam 'on te/ma yin pagam par bya gor ma chag snyam mo//de nas sgyu ma mkhan pabang pos
77b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabasngal mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bgram pa'i bsam+me pas sang gi gdugs tshad la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol to//'di snyam du yang sems te ci 'dis bdag gi sems
77b7(dkon brtsegs): shes sam 'on te mi shes zhig gu /gal te shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro//ci ste mi shes na ni den 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan
78a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i daphung du yang mdzad nas/mkhyen bzhin du sgyu ma mkhan bzang
78a2(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do//de nas yang sgyu mo mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/'di bdag rnam par po 'tshim pa'i bsam pa
78a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa la 'dir khas len pa dang sbyar na 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma yin la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin no snyam mo//de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom
78a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
78a5(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni sgyu me'i za ma tog gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di la tho 'tsham par 'gyur ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod snyid
78a6(dkon brtsegs): las chung bar gyis shig dang /ngas yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
78a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyis kyang tho 'tsham par ma nas so//mo'u dgal gyi bu bzhin yang 'dod chags ni tho 'tsham par byed pa yin/zhe sdang ni tho 'tsham par byed pa yin/gti mug ni tho 'tsham par
78b1(dkon brtsegs): byed na/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bag la nyal ba dang bcas te zad gral yongs su gyur gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/des na de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
78b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyis kyang tho 'tshim par mi nus so//mo'u dgal gyi bu gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas sgyu ma yang dag pa ma yin gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ni
78b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa yin te/des na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mo'u dgal gyi bu sems can gyi khams su gdags par 'dogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams
78b4(dkon brtsegs): cad 'di lta ste sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro//stong gi chang yang nye bar mi 'gro/bye
78b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dum gyi tshor yang grangs su yang cher yang bgrang bar yang dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
78b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par kun tu ston nus sam/gsol pa/ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhedan
78b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan cing de thams cad kying skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la kun tu ston par mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ril gyis bstan par ni mi
79a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//mo'u dgal gyi bu phyogs bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba dang /rlung gi dkyil
79a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor yongs su gcod byed ces bya ba gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yongs su gcod par byed cing yongs su bcad nas kyang 'jig par byed pa dang /
79a3(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'thor byed dang /rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang /rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas yongs su 'jog pa zhes bya ba
79a4(dkon brtsegs): smod pa'i rtse mo na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na ri phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang dag
79a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed ces bya ba sreg pa'i skal pA'i tshe ldang zhing grong gis na me lce de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen par byed pa dang /rlung gi dkyil
79a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnam par bsgrub byed ces bya ba gang gis bsreg pa'i bskal pa'i me de zhi bar byed pa dang /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
79a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa dang /rlung gi dkyil 'khor chus 'debs shes bya ba gang gis na bsreg pa'i skal pa'i tshe tshar 'bebras
79b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang /rlung gi dkyil 'khor lhag par skems shes bya ba gang gris na chus 'jig pa de lhag par skems par byed pa yod do//mo'u dgal gyi bu ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las
79b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor los brtsanas te chos bstan pa las mthar thug pa med do//mo'u
79b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/gsol pa/ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

79b5(dkon brtsegs): cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du 'jog par mdzad 'jug par mdzad la/yungs 'bru de yang rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing /yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag

79b7(dkon brtsegs): dang de ma yin po gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
80a1(dkon brtsegs): mang ya yas mcha bathams samamamasamamam/sa maman tham mamam thas mamamayamams mams khas lams ma a ma yas ma yam ma yas

80a5(dkon brtsegs): par rnyed pa lags so//de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/de nyid kyi nub myo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyogs gang na grong
80a6(dkon brtsegs): khyer thams cad kyi brtsog dgu dang /mi mthun pa thams cad 'bab pa dang 'byung ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyamasna chen po dar gyi lda ldi dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dran bsgreng
80a7(dkon brtsegs): bas brgyan pa/gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa me tog bkram pa spos bzang po mchog gis bdugs pa steng du bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to//'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du
80a8(dkon brtsegs): yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa brgyad stong mngon par sprul to//rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du yang seng ge'i khri ras bcos bu du mas
80b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yogs pa rin po che'i ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par sprul to//seng ge'i khri glayas g.yon du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang nga dras bud bcas pa bzhi bzhi mngon
80b2(dkon brtsegs): par sprul to//bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul to//rig go byed pa gos dkar po

80b6(dkon brtsegs): legs par rnyed do//bzang po gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang /khyod la bstang ba'i

81a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po bzhi la gnang ba dang /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to//de nas

81a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang ba dang /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khyad
