81b7(dkon brtsegs): byedan ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshod du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med par byed ma nus so snyam mo//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sgyu mya mkhan bzang po'i sems kyi rnam par

85a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'dra'i drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs so//bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i

85a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo //sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa dang /rgyal po chen po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de
85a6(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo //rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rtsig pa 'am khyim mam
85a7(dkon brtsegs): khang bzangs sam srang ngam lam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
85b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa 'chags par mthong zhing /de nas sgyu ma mkhan dadang po mig lam na gang cung zad//
85b2(dkon brtsegs): ci gnang ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma mthong nas/de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur to//de dga' ba
85b3(dkon brtsegs): dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo//ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
85b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bzhed na brgya phrag stong las lhag gyur cing //dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi//sangs rgyas mang po sprul par mdzad pa yi//de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul de la mos//bdag gis
85b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon baspobs sgyu ma'i sa ma lags//'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na//de ring rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong nas//'di yi grangs dang char yang ma spyod do//bdag gi shwa yi mig gis
85b6(dkon brtsegs): gang mthong ba//thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku//chos kyi rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus//rgyal ba yang dag gang lags bka' stsol cig/gang zhig mchod na legs par
85b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa lags//gang la 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba lags//gang gi byang chub mthun par gzung ba 'di//kun tu spyan gyis bdag la bka' stsol cig/de ring 'jig rten mgon la bgam/
86a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa'i//nongs pa gang lags dang 'dir kun tu 'chags//gang dag sems can mchog la gus mi gnas//sems can de dag rgyal ba'i bde las/
86a2(dkon brtsegs): nyams//bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang //'khor 'dus gyur pa 'di dag kun gson cig/sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol slad du//byang chub sems ni bdag gis
86a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bgyi//bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron du gaunyer//bdud rtsi bde bas yang dag tshim par bgyi//gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes par bgyi//mthu dang sbru
86a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam par sad par bgyi//rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra mthong gyur cig/bde ba gshegs bka' yid 'ong ye shes dang //chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni//su zhig dag
86a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu sems bskyed mi bgyi//byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi//byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol//gang la nyan thos rnams kyis mi dpogs pa'i//de dag rnams
86a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa ji lta bu//cho ga spyod pa'i yon tan ji lta bu//mnyan par 'dod la gus pa ji lta bu//des pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci 'dra ba//bdag la the tshom ma mchis de bzhin gsungs//ji ltar
86a7(dkon brtsegs): thos pa tshol la goms pa logs//thos pa snying por bgyid pa'i dang po gang //gzhan la gsal bar ston pa ji lta bu//srog chags thams cad ji ltar chos la dad //ji ltar 'di dag shes
86b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi khe mi tshol//zang zing med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas//byas pa shes shing rab tu phan 'dogs dang //sems can mi phyed gnas par TI ltar 'gyur//grogs po gang dag bsten bgyi ci lta bu//
86b2(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i grogs rnams ji ltar rnam par spong //ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur//de dag mthong nas ji ltar mchod par bgyi//ci ltar bslab pa dag la gus pa legs//de yi
86b3(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa'i bca' ba gang zhig lags//tshul khrims ji ltar rnam par drag par 'gyur//ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa ji ltar 'thob sa//ji ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor bA lags//tshul bzhin
86b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags ji ltar spyong ba lags//ji ltar shin tu nges par bsams yid dang //nyon mongs bdud kyi brjing bas mi thub legs//ji ltar dad ldan don ni sems bgyid cing //sems kyis
86b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni mi gtong lags//ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid cing //nor mchog 'dzin pa med la dpa' ba lags//ji ltar sems can spyod la 'jug pa dang //thabs dang
86b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i snying rjes gnas pa lags//mngon par shes pa ji ltar yongs rdzogs 'gyur//dran dang blo gros gang gis rnam dag cing //so so yang dag rig gzungs bzod par 'gyur//smon lam
86b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag spyod las mi log cing //zab mo shes ldan don dam mkhas pa lags//smon lam thams cad ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur//ji ltar de dag pha rol phyin 'phags shing //de bzhin byang chub rjes
87a1(dkon brtsegs): su mthun par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun shes shing //byang chub phyir ni spyod pa mi ldog pa//kun mkhyen legs par don bsams shes rab mtsho//ye shes
87a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas 'di ni bdag la gsungs//bcom ldan phan yon bdog la bstan du gsol//bdag gis nan tan snying por bgyi bar 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan
87a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/chos kun sprul par gang gis shes pa de//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong sprul par byed//sprul pa de dag zhing rnams bye bar 'gro//de dag
87a4(dkon brtsegs): song nas sems can bye ba 'grel//ji ltar bzang po khyod kyis gzugs med las//sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs ni ston byed cing //de dag skye ba med cing 'gag med la//'gro med
87a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od med gnas pa med pa ltar//bzang po skyes bu khyu mchog rgyal ba yis//phung po dge 'dun tshogs btsas sprul de 'dra//de dang ye shes med par mi 'gyur te//sangs rgyas bsam yas/
87a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin//ji ltar sgyu mas rmongs byas skye bo ni//sems pa yod min de bzhin nga rgyal med//'di la grub pa med cing rdzas yod min//phyin ci log gi sems kyis mthong ba
87a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar//de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs med kha dog dang //dbyibs min spyod pa ston yang spyod lam med//'jig tshogs lta ba kun nas bslang ma yin//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas snyam
87b1(dkon brtsegs): mngam mamam thamamachams samamasam mams mtsham thas mnyan thas mas mthal kas lam masam ma
87b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes med//sangs rgyas gzugs su mi lta mtshan dang ni//nA tshod rigs su ma yin sgra dang ni//'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin sems dang ni//rnam shes yid kyis rab tu phye ma yin//chos
87b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang ma skyes pa//rtag tu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol//de la bgrang bas rab tu phye ba med//sangs rgyas 'byung
87b4(dkon brtsegs): gang chos nyid 'byung ba med//de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung //chos de gnas pa mi g.yo rten pa med//de ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin no//gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas blta snyam
87b5(dkon brtsegs): sems//des ni gzhan yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur//'dren pa mthong ba med pa mthong ba ste//dper na na mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin//bzang po gang khyod cung zad sangs rgyas blta//de kun
87b6(dkon brtsegs): don gcig yin par shes par gyis//nga dang gzhan gang yin pa de kun mtshungs//bar snang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin//de dag ting 'dzin mnyam zhing shes rab mnyam//de dag rnam
87b7(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar mAnyam pa yin//rnam grol ye shes mthong dang stobs dang ni//rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin//de dag stong don go 'phang gnas par mnyam//thams cad
87b8(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa'i chos nyid gnas//kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol//de dag 'byung ba med par 'byung ba yin//bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na//phyogs bcu'i sangs
88a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la ni mchod 'gyur te//'di ltar de dag nga yi chos dbyings dang //tha dad bya ba nam yang yod ma yin//de dag thams cad yon pazhes sbyong bar mdzad//kun la phul ba'ang
88a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu che bar 'gyur//de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa brnyes//sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang med//rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad bya yin//rtse gcig sems dang dran pa
88a3(dkon brtsegs): nyer gzhag cing //chos tshul rtogs la rnam par lta bas de//legs par ngas bsams sems kyis nga la nyon//bzang po de kun ma skyes yang dag min//phyin ci log gis de kun mthong
88a4(dkon brtsegs): bar zad//gal te dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag na//dngos po thams cad du ni zad mi 'gyur//de phyir shin tu ma skyes yang dag min//de dag skye med zad la gnas pa med//des na bltar med/
88a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo de dag snang //rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin//ji ltar bzang pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang //ji ltar phyogs su mngon par sprul mthong ba/gang gzhan phung po rgyal chen
88a6(dkon brtsegs): rten stobs dang //phung po lnga po'ang de dang 'dra bar ltos//chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste//sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med//mtshan nyid med la mtshan du
88a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de//sangs rgyas las ni shin tu ring bar 'gyur//ches yod ma yin kun tu rtogs pas bslang //dngos po med par yang ni brtan nas shes//byed pa med cing byed pa po las
88b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das//ming du 'dzin pas stong pa rab tu ston//glang gis rgyu dang byed po rkyen min shes/des ni chags bral gyur pa'i chos kyang shes//'dod chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na//des ni
88b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag mig gis sangs rgyas mthong //yang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po chos la nges par rtog pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa rgyud du skyes so//srog
88b3(dkon brtsegs): chags lnga spyong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sngon ma bskyod pa skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' nyi sna brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de
88b4(dkon brtsegs): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas sprul pa de dag gsol nas/sgyu ma mkhan bzong po'i yon yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su btsod pa 'di bka' stsal to//gang gis sbyin dang
88b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la sbyin//sbyin pa ji ltar mi rtog pa//sbyin pa mnyam pa de nyid ni//bzang po lnga ni yongs rdzogs shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
88b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyam 'di rgyan gyis bo rgyan bzhin du dgung bdun du gnas shing mi gda' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
88b7(dkon brtsegs): khyams de ltar rgyun gyis brgyan bzhin du zhag bdun du gnas shing mi snang bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dade bcas te stan las
89a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs nas gshegs so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos bstan pa'i phyir bzhugs so//dge slong de dag dang /byang chub
89a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag dang /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za de dag kyang chos mnyan po'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo //de nas sgro ma mkhan bzang po yang bcom ldan 'das ga
89a3(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas par thal mo
89a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lam
89a5(dkon brtsegs): gong la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dre pa' rnams kyi lam bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang
89a6(dkon brtsegs): po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzang po de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang nges bshad do//sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por
89b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin te/bzhi gang zhe na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /dge
89b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ngoms mi shes pa nyid dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang
89b3(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yino//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
89b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang /gnas yongs su drag pa dang /shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /skye ba yongs su dag pa ste/
89b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni gang la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/bsam
89b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan bzlog pa dang /sems kyis rnam par 'byor pa dang /sems can rnams la snying rje che ba dang /spobs pa dang /skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po bzhi po
89b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'phags pa'i spyod pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/dgon pa na gnas pa dang /'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang /de na gnas na sems can rnams la
90a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang /'du byed rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri
90a2(dkon brtsegs): zhu che zhing gus pa la gnas pa zhes brjod par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /sems rtag tu dga' bya dang /nga rgyal dang grags pa
90a3(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin du sgrub pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/
90a4(dkon brtsegs): dus shes pa dang /tshod shes pa dang /rab tu dben pa dang /yang dag pa nyid de/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na the tsom med pa yin te/bzhi
90a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang /mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /thos pa'i don sems pa dang /gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing
90a6(dkon brtsegs): gleng ba gang yin pa yang byams pas gleng gi skyon gtsor byed pas ma yin pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na thos pa tshol
90a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed de/bzhi gang zhe na/bdag dang gzhan gyi shes rab sbyong ba dang /phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom gtsang ba dang /dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis
90b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa thang mi shes pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/thos nas chos bye drag tu
90b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di nA 'da'i snying po yin no//thos nas bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no//thos nas gzhan la ston par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no//thos nas don de nyid rnam
90b3(dkon brtsegs): bar grol ba 'di lta ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la gtong bar byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
90b4(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/las byas nas zas lnga yongs su spyod pa dang /chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal tshwa dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong
90b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams rnyed pa dang /gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang /chos 'dod pa'i lha rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/bzang po
90b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin no//byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos ston par byed cing 'di'i tshig 'am
90b7(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'dod pa chung ba dang /chog shes pa dang /ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang /bdag nyid kyis chos grub pa ste/bzhi po de dag
91a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes kyi kho las 'byol zhing zang zing med par yang chos ston pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'khor ba la 'jigs///
91a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed pa dang /'jig rten gyi zang zing dang 'du 'dzi don du mi gnyer ba dang /pha rol rjes su srung po dang /'phags pa'i ris la gnas pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub
91a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byas pa bzol dang byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/gzhan byang chub yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang las byas pa chud mi
91a4(dkon brtsegs): gson pa dang /bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa dang /skyes bu dam pa'i rtsa la don du gnyer ba ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
91a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyeng bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/bzod pa'i stobs kyis go bgos pa dang /lan du phan 'dogs par cung zad kyang re ba med pa dang /
91a6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba dang /log par zhugaso pa rnams mi spong ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur ro//
91a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya ba'i grogs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /bcum pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /spyod pa phun sum
91b1(dkon brtsegs): rmugs pa dang /gang dag 'di'i byang chub nye bar ston par byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin na//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i grogs po yin par
91b2(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/theg pa dman pa ston pa dang /byang chub kyi sems 'dun pa bzlog par byed pa dang /gang dag bstan na mi dge ba'i chos la 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
91b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//dbang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad
91b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/bA'i gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa dang /tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam
91b5(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag bathong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/
91b6(dkon brtsegs): yon gnas mchog lnga mchod par 'gyur ba dang /bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa legs par
91b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod nas byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang /skyes bu chen po'i sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba ste/bzang po
91'a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po de drag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro//bzang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi
91'a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang bzhin mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'do' ba dang /bde 'gro thob par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
91'a3(dkon brtsegs): lel gus pa dang /smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/bzhi gang
91'a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa
91'a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa la mi skrag pa ste/bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa
91'a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi sbyong ba dang /lta ba bag la nyal dang bcas par
91'a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'joms te/bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge
91'b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi rigs yin te/bzhi gdA zhe na/'du 'dzi med pa dang /rab tu dben pa dang /sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa ste/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
91'b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin no//bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba
91'b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang /nang du yang dag 'jog la sgrib pa med pa dang /rnam par dag pa'i sgro dag la 'dris par byed pa dang /dris pa la mi 'jug ste/
91'b4(dkon brtsegs): bzong po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sem
91'b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin to/bzhi gang zhe na/'khor ba'i 'jigs pas sgrog pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa drag lam mos pa dang /dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams/
91'b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste/bzang po bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
91'b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis nges par bsam pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par
92a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa dang pa yin nu//bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes par bya zhing de dag gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang dbang
92a2(dkon brtsegs): po mchog ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa yin no//bdag gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs
92a3(dkon brtsegs): shing dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par byas nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug go//bdud kyi dpung pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
92a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam po 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gsum pa yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig gis go bar byas te chos bstan
92a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin no//bzang po chos bzhi
92a6(dkon brtsegs): po 'od dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang /tshul bzhin du sbyor ba dang /chos thams cad la rnam
92a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pa dang /mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/bzang po bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul ba yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems
92b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/gang zag med pa'i phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skye ba dang /rten nas skyes pa dang rten nas skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang //
92b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa dang /byang chub kyi phyir chud mi za ba ste/bzong po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no//
92b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams mi gtong ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang /yongs su skyo ba bzod pa dang /lus dang srog la mi
92b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang /bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'jig rten
92b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi zang zing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang /dus su bskul bas dran pa byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang /bdag nyid kyi bde ba spangs
92b6(dkon brtsegs): nas gzhan gyi bde ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin no//bzang po byang chub/
92b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ma bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la yang mos pa dang /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzhan
93a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi don byed par spro ba dang /sbyin pa dang dul ba dang des pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/
93a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /ye shes thob pa
93a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /ting nge 'dzin chen por gyur pa tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid bsgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang ma 'dres pa ste/bzhi po de
93a4(dkon brtsegs): dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi
93a5(dkon brtsegs): sems sngon du 'gro ste tha na nyon mongs pa'i sems la yang rung ni dge ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang /sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang /ngo bo
93a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid med par khong du chud pas chos thams cad log pa nyid nges pa yin par lta ba dang /rnam par grol ba 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
93a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bsgom par byed pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
93b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byams pa bsgom pa yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang /bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o//
93b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang /bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
93b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa ste/bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa bsgom pa yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje yin te/
93b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ngan song du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam+ba la 'god pa'i snying rje dang /sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang /theg pa dman pa la mos pa
93b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po
93b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/lus dang sems yang ba dang /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang /sems
93b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la gus pa dang /rim gro'i sems bskyed pa dang /zhi gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur pas rnam par g.yeng ba med pa yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na so

94a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang /yi ge mi zad par shes nas chags pa med cing thogs pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po byang chub sems
94a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/mang du thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang /mang du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /

94a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa dag 'thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/chos smra ba gzhan de dag gis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /chos smra ba la gus pa dang
94a8(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang /thos pas khengs pa med pa dang /thos pa nyung ngu rnams la brnyas par mi byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang
94b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyuchu sems dpa' rnams kyi b.rU ba ste/d+yAn+d+ha ga zhen//'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang grati mug bsgyu bu dang /nyan thos lAs+yA d+ha m+WA ba dang /rang sbyangs rgyas las bsgyur pa dang /dge ba'in
94b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la 'du shes bsgyur po ste//bzhi po de dag yin no//bzang po chos zin po 'di dug byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don ni mo la sbyor ba yin to//bzhi gang zhe na/na la
94b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung bar rtogs par byed pa dang /dgongs pa rtogs par byed pa dang /bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang /'di ltar stod pa'i don du chos de dag thams cad don gcig
94b4(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs par byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin no//bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na smon lam

94b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la sems dbang byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ro//bzang po byang chub sems dpa' rjes bzhi dang ldan na pha rol tu phyin pa
94b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis 'phogs shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan
95a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sdud par byed pa dang /thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pas de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang
95a2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig gi tshul rtogs pas chos gzhan dag gi rnam par dag pa yang shes pa dang /chos nyid yin
95a3(dkon brtsegs): pas sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i
95a4(dkon brtsegs): chos can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab
95a5(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bo de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'phag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
95a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzod 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer des khyab par byas nas slar yang
95a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yos pa'i lha nga sa la

95b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis pa dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang legs rkyen gang lags/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol
95b4(dkon brtsegs): to//ye shes 'byung gnas gzi brjid gzhal yas shes rab grags//'jig rten gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin brnyes grags//rgyal ba rang 'byung gang gi slad du 'dzum
95b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa//mi yi dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol//phyogs rnams na ni 'gro bar sems can ji snyed gnas//de dag kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni//dman

95b7(dkon brtsegs): byin lha min dang //mkha' ldeng lto 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan rnams//sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod//'od bzang nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams
95b8(dkon brtsegs): dang //brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa//ji ltar sangs rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba ster//'od rnams de dog thams cad rnam par gsal ma lags//sangs
96a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zhing der zan ma mam ni rjes su dran//sbyong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med ma thun nas//yid dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par snad smranas smra/
96a2(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum chu zla 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa po//deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de//su zhog sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rigs la gnas//su zhig dkon

96a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa nabs kyi bus mor ga/gal te rkyen gyi theg pa gisung na phrag par nug//gang tshe langs rgyas theg gsungs de tshe spyi bor nug//ji ltar khyod kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed rab btang ga

96a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dgra' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po mthong ngam/gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so//bka' stsal pa/
96a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo rig kyi bu babang po 'di ni bskal pa dgu khri nyis stong ni brgal ba 'gro par sprul pa la 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

97a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid gang gis dri bzhin nyid las slar ma log pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /ma tshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin

97b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid gsung ba bzhin du bdag kyang de skad mchi'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rigs kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so//bzang po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes
97b2(dkon brtsegs): su thob bam ci na/khyod ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba ltar khyod de skad smra/bzang pos smras pa/kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
97b3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa nyid du thugs su chud de/de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa gang yin pa der kho bo yang
97b4(dkon brtsegs): chud cing /ji ltar kho bo chud pa bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chud la/ji ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin du ches thams cad kyang chud pa'i phyir te/btsun pa kun
97b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no//btsun pa kun dga' bo gnyis su med pa ni gang na kun tu shes pa med pa nyid dang yongs su shes
97b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa nyid do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'du shes yongs su shes pa/shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
97b7(dkon brtsegs): bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/sngon yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis mgo
98a1(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par bgyis so//da yang shes rab dang ye shes kyis mag rmongs par bgyid do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi stobs pa ni da
98a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu lags pa'i slad du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzang po khyod lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgro rmongs
98a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa bden num/gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mgo rmongs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kyang mgo rmongs par bgyid lags so//de ci'i spyad du na
98a4(dkon brtsegs): nabacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang /srog med pa dang gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa
98a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen po lags pa'i spyad du'o//de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am 'gro ba 'am skye ba
98a6(dkon brtsegs): mi gzigs mod kyi 'chi 'pho drang 'gro ba dang skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsung bka' stsol ba
98a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs so bya ba byin te/rigs kyi bu legs so legaso//
98b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/'di lta ste bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang /srog med pa dang gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa'ang
98b2(dkon brtsegs): ni mgo rmongs pa chen po yin no//de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am 'gro ba 'am skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/'chi 'pho ba dang 'gro ba
98b3(dkon brtsegs): dang skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'am yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos bstan pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang med do//de nas rigs kyi bu
98b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byamos pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po
98b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phyung shig/de nas byams pas rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so//rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
98b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang rtags dang tshul gyis rab tu 'byung ba ma lpags so//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub
98b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la yang chags pa ma mchis la sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum na yang gnas na/de ni byang chub sems
99a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags so//yang de'i tshe bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sro gu chags lnga stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
99a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed do//dge slong nyes brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
99a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags//'di'i ming ji skad ces gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
99a4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/rim gyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
99a5(dkon brtsegs): gong de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pa dang /sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/bklag par
99a6(dkon brtsegs): bya/gzhan dag la yang bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo gang gros 'di bzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /bklags pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa des
99a7(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin/des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas pa yin no//kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
99b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /'di lta ste lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /phun pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/tshangs shig/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/kun dag
99b2(dkon brtsegs): bo chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par 'byung ba de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par rab tu ston te/des na chos kyi rnam
99b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di byang chub la yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o//kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o//khong du chud par bya'o//gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du byed pa 'am/lus la bsrel ba
99b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pA yin na gang dag gis zos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
99b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskul ba zhes bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dge
99b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/rigs kyi bu bzang po dang //tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
99b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
100a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/'dus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa
100a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so///rgyu glur gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tA dang /pradz+dzaHram dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban dr-i ye shes sde la sogs pas sbyar cing zhus te gtan la phab go//
100a3(dkon brtsegs): sho lo ka bzhi brgya sum cu bam po gcig dang sho lo ka brgya sum cu'o//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya ma hA pra ti hA r+ya u pa de sho nA ma ma hA ya naM sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa cho 'phrul
100a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/bam po dang po/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
100a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
100a6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//de nas lha'i bu ded dpon zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/
100a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gos sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad lagra/
100b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bung ni chu 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do//gsum gang wA na/'di lta ste kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /rjes su bstan pa'i
100b2(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang /
100b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang /dkon mchog gsum po dag la ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
100b4(dkon brtsegs): pas gang zag gang la da ltar byung ba na nyes pa spyad pa gzhis ngan song dang ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba/de dag ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes kun rjod par mdzad
100b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gang zag de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus ngan song rnams las thar nas lha dang mi dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /yang na nyan
100b6(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa'am/yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/yang na theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang /bskal
100b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin
101a1(dkon brtsegs): ma sa a masam sa/amanathas mthas a masa yas ma ma
101a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes de kho na bzhin du kun brjod par mdzad pa dang /gang dag
101a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag tu
101a4(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /spyod
101a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to//mkhyen nas kyang
101a6(dkon brtsegs): de kho na bzhin du kun brjod cing lung ston par mdzad pa dang /dge bla 'am mi dge ba'am/dman pa 'am bar ma 'am mchog gam tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'da' ste de bzhin
101a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i kun+da brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste 'di ni
101a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'o//'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o//'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'o//'di ni bsgrub pa'o//'di ni log par bsgrub pa'o//chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang
101b1(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'o//chos 'di dag ni rnam par byang ba'i cha dang mthun pa'o zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pa rjes su ston pa dang /mi dge ba thams cad sbyangs pa rjes su ston pa dang //
101b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las kyi tshogs thams cad rjes su ston pa dang //lam 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o//lam 'di ni rarar+ya sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur
101b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//lam 'di ni thag pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o zhes rjes su ston pa gang yin pa ste/de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa de rjes su 'thob par mi
101b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin pa ste de ni gnas med do//las 'di yang drag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do//las 'di yang dag par blangs na
101b5(dkon brtsegs): ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid par byed do//las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su khrid par byed do//las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su
101b6(dkon brtsegs): khrid par byed do//las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni mi rnams su khrid par byed do//de la gang dag mi dge ba spangs na dge ba yang dag par blang ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang /'phags pa'i
101b7(dkon brtsegs): lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams su skyes nas rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /tshul de lta bus kha na ma tho ba dang rmongs pa med pa'i rjes su ston par
102a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul yin no//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhem
102a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pas bcom pa rnam pa sa rdzu 'khyim gyi cho 'phrul kun tu ston par mdzad de/'di lta ste gcig tu
102a3(dkon brtsegs): nas du myur 'gyur ro//du mar gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro//snang bar 'gyur zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro//rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro'o//rab la yang mi thogs par zad
102a4(dkon brtsegs): kar 'gro'o//ri la yang mi thogs par zad kar 'gro'o//si la steng du 'byung ba dang bye'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no//chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste dper na sA la
102a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba bzhin no//nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste dpe ran 'dab chags bya bzhin no//lus kyi stong nas mi 'brar bar byed cing lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do//lus kyi
102a6(dkon brtsegs): smad nas ma 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi stod nas nA'i rgyun 'bab par byed de/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu tshwa ba 'di lhultar gzi brjid cheb la yang dag
102a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang kun tu 'bar 'ar/
102b1(dkon brtsegs): bar ston te/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par ci dang ci lta bus sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam
102b2(dkon brtsegs): par dag pa mngon par sgrub par byed de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no//lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do///
102b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ci zhig mnga' lags sam/bcom
102b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu yod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal chod phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang
102b5(dkon brtsegs): zas na zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /bdud kyi phyogs kyang shin tu tshur bcad par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
102b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs par gyis shig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la
102b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung pa
103a1(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa de thams cad phyag gi khyod pa ya cig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems can rnams lnga yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la cho 'phrul 'di
103a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga' lags so//yang na 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang /yi ge ma mchis pa dang /bskyed du ma mchis pa dang /skye ba ma mchis pa dang /
103a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /ming ma mchis pa dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /sgra ma mchis pa dang /dbyangs ma mchis pa dang /tshig gi la ma mchis pa dang /rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang /
103a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ma mchis pa dang /spyod pa ma mchis pa dang /rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang /kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang /'dus ma bgyis pa dang /sems dang yid
103a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang /tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang /zhi ba dang /byang ba dang /phra ba dang /mthong bar dka' ba dang /brtag tu ma mchis pa dang /rtog ge'i spyod yul
103a6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang brda' dang tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de gzhan dag la rnam par rig par mdzad pa de na
103a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing /dmigs pa dang mtshan ma dang yongs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong
103b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bram ze thams cad dang zhing 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po
103b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhal gyi sgor stsal kyang gling chen po bzhi pa'i sems can rnams dang /dgung zla dang /gdugs dag dang /khor yug rnams dang /ri dang /shing gel ba dang /sman dang /nags tshal
103b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang /slar phyung ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang sems can rnams kyang 'di ltar bdag cag yul gang du bkod pa dang /bdag cag yul gang nas bton pa yang
103b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lag so//'di ni cho 'phrul chen po dam pa lags te/gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa
103b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /yi ge ma mchis pa dang /bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang /ming ma mchis pa dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang tha
103b6(dkon brtsegs): skad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang /zhi ba dang byang ba dang phra ba dang /mthong bar dka' ba dang /brtag tu ma mchis pa dang /rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon
103b7(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas nas/yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang brda' dang tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos bstan pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gzhan
104a1(dkon brtsegs): yang gdu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma'i dngos po dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad pa lag
104a2(dkon brtsegs): so//'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/'di lta ste bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu tha spyad 'dogs pa dang /sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du tha snyad
104a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa dang /srog ma mchis pa ba srog tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /gso pa ma mchis pa la gso bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /
104a4(dkon brtsegs): shed las skyes pa ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /shed bu ma mchis pa la shed bur tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /ming ma mchis pa la ming du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /gzugs
104a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis po la gzugs su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /tshor ba ma mchis pa la tshor bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /'du shes ma mchis pa la 'du shes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /'du byed rnams ma
104a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la 'du byed rnams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes par tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /phung po ma mchis pa la phung por tha snyad 'dogs pa dang //khams
104a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /mig stong zhes bgyi ba tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo
104b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du mi sems pa dang /gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang gzugs ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs
104b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce dang ro dang
104b3(dkon brtsegs): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /chos rnams
104b4(dkon brtsegs): stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid kyi rnam par
104b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems te/'di ltar bems po dang /sems pa ma mchis pa dang /dngos po ma mchis pa dang /ming ma mchis pa dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i chos
104b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu 'di dag sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la yang dag par go bar mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/cho 'phrul de ni mig dang
104b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yang ma lags/gzugs dang ldan pa yang ma lags/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/rna ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags/sgra dang ldan pa yang ma lags/rna ba'i
105a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/sna dang ldan pa yang ma lags/dri dang ldan pa yang ma lags/sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/lce dang ldan pa
105a2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags/ro dang ldan pa yang ma lags/lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/lus dang ldan pa yang ma lags/reg bya dang ldan pa yang ma lags/lus kyi rnam par
105a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/yid dang ldan pa yang ma lags/chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma lags/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags te/de lta bu'i cho 'phrul
105a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni yul ma mchis pa'i cho 'phrul lagaso//de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par lta ba ma lags/sems dang yid dang /rnam par shes pa dang
105a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par lta ba ma lags te/de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga dag lags te phung
105a6(dkon brtsegs): po lnga po mi rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing de dag gi phung po lnga po dag rtag par bzung ba'i slad du ste/de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur
105a7(dkon brtsegs): ba leg so//'jig rten gyi phung po lnga po dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/de dag mi rtag go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches pa lag so//'jig rten ni phung po lnga po
105b1(dkon brtsegs): dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo bu ches pas na de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi che sa pa lag so//'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches
105b2(dkon brtsegs): pas na de dag bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so//'jig rten ni phung po dag sdug ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag mi sdug go zhes bshad na
105b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so//'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag bdag po ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams
105b4(dkon brtsegs): cad glo ba mi ches lags so//'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang drag par zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag yang dag pa ma lags so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi
105b5(dkon brtsegs): ches pa lags te/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lagaso//cho 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags te
105b6(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lagaso//cho 'phrul de ni mig tu bgrang ba ma lags gzugs su bzung ba ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das
105b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lagaso//cho 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags sgrar bgrang ba ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa lagaso//de bzhin du sbyar te cho 'phrul de ni yid
106a1(dkon brtsegs): du bgrang ba ma lags chos su bgrang ba ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so//cho 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul
106a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags rangs par bgyid pa ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lagaso//stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na stong pa nyid brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul logaso///
106a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mtshan ma ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so//smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na smon pa ma
106a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so//mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags
106a5(dkon brtsegs): so//skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na skye ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lag so//'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'byung ba ma
106a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis ba brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so//dngos po ma mchis pa ni brjod ma mchis pa lags na dngos po ma mchis pa de ni cho 'phrul legs so//mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du
106a7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa lags na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso//'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'gag pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul
106b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so//mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mya ngan las 'das pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso//'di lta ste bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang /sems can
106b2(dkon brtsegs): du kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /byang chub la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so//'di lta ste lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa
106b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /ngag brjod pa ma mchis pa dang /sems rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so//'di lta ste sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa
106b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /sems skad cig tu 'jig pa dang /lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so//'di lta ste blang ba ma mchis pa dang /dor
106b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis pa dang /gnas pa mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni cho 'phrul lags so//'di lta ste nang nye bar zhi ba dang /phyi rol du rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang /
106b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bsams pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan de ni cho 'phrul lags so//'di lta ste ngar 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa dang /nga yi ba rnam par spangs pa dang /
106b7(dkon brtsegs): nga yir 'dzin pa bor ba dang /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags so//chos thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma mchis pa
107a1(dkon brtsegs): lcags na de dag rnam par bral bAr bshad pa ni tshe 'phrulnga lags so//chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na rang gi ba dang bral bar bshad pa/
107a2(dkon brtsegs): ni cha 'phrul lags so//chos thams cad ni dbyer me mchis pa legs ni yi ges kun tu phye ste ba shad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags sa//chos thams cad ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa
107a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so//chos thams cad ni 'byur ba ma mchis pa lags na 'byung bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso/
107a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa lags na 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bshad pa na tshe 'phrul lags so//chos thams cad ni'i gcig pa lags na theg pa gsum du
107a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so//chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na chas thams cad rnam par bshad pa dgod pa ni tshe 'phrul lags so//sangs rgyas
107a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi sangs rgyas gcig legs na sangs rgyas dpag tu ma mchis por bshad ba ni tshe 'phrul lags//zhing rnams snang zhing gcig pa la gsuM na 'di sku rgyags bshad pa ni tshe 'phrul
107a7(dkon brtsegs): lags so//sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig po lags na sems can gyi rim pa pa shad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so//chos thams cad ni tshes gcig pa lags na tham da
107b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang bar mar bshad pa'i tshe 'phrul lags so//chos thams cad ni rnam par bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so//chos thams
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bad ni nam d+har rig pa ma mchis pa lags na gzhan la rnam par rig pa bshad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags so//de nas lci'i bu de dpan gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di nad ces smras so//
107b3(dkon brtsegs): dang la khyod kyis ji skad smras da'i ngan la rlos shes pa lta ste ji tsam du brjod pa'i rjes de ga thams cad ni tshe 'dul yin no//lamA dpal gyis smras pa/lce'i bu de bzhin no//dzaM skad skyes pa de bzhin
107b4(dkon brtsegs): te/chos thams cad ni brjod du ma mchis pa yin pas de dag brjid pa gang yin pa de ni tshe 'phrul chen pa yin no//bstan pa 'di bshad pa nA m+b+hi'i bu khri nyis stong blan meng pa yang dag par rdzogs
107b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i
107b6(dkon brtsegs): 'i khyod tshe 'phrul bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ram/lha'i bus smras pa/btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu kho bo nyid cing tshe 'phrul yin na de la kho bsgrag par 'gyur du ci yod/sh+tsa
107b7(dkon brtsegs): ti'i dus smras pa rta'i buM khyod ci las bsams te skad sgra/lha'i bus smras de/btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 'bob med pa yin na de la dge pa'i rgyas 'phro ba 'di yin pa de ni tshe phrul
108a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po yin no//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i sa/nga'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te bdag nyid chen po 'di yang thob pa'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du//
108a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems can mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do//de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang sems par mi byed cing /rnam par shes par mi byed
108a3(dkon brtsegs): cing rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin te/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa//klu rnams kyi
108a4(dkon brtsegs): klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul
108a5(dkon brtsegs): yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/de lta bas na chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no//yang
108a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du lha'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de thos na skrag par mi 'gyur rAm zhes zer ba ni/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci de
108a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/smras pa/lha'i bu de ni ma yin no//smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de bzhin gsheg
108b1(dkon brtsegs): pas zo 'phrul bstan pa des nam mkha' khams skrag par ma 'gyur na kho bo yang sprug par mi 'gyur//smras pa/lha'i bu ni khyod nam mkha' yin nam/smras pa/btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu kha bo ni na mkha' yin no//
108b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi na mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang /phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams
108b3(dkon brtsegs): su gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams ma yin nam/smras pa/lha'i bu de ni ma yin no//smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang na mkha'i khams kyi
108b4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin can yin no//smras pa/lha'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod kyis ring po ma thogs par cho 'phrul de nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro//smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu cho 'phrul de
108b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni nye bar bstan par mi nus so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/cho 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di
108b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha'i dang dpon 'di dri lta bur ston pa lags na 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bI ts+tsha ba bgyis shing 'jam dpa le gnon nur byung pa yang bsnyen bkur bgyis
108b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/shA radwa ti'i bu lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su
109a1(dkon brtsegs): smin par byas pa yin no//shA ra dwa tI'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mngon par
109a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/'jig
109a3(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to//shA ra dwa
109a4(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing sdug bsngal ba dang yod mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam
109a5(dkon brtsegs): med la 'jig rten gyi khams de yang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang shel las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na 'jam zhing /mi
109a6(dkon brtsegs): lom pa dang ngan song rnams dang bral la/lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu gang zhing yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor pa bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pas na de'i phyir
109a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ste/brtson 'grus 'bar ba shes rab kyi snang ba thob pa/gzungs
109b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mdo rje'i rgyal po thob pa/spobs pa mi chod pa/tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa mngon par shes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/bdud dang
109b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du chos
109b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/
109b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang brtan pa dang blo rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs
109b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/sbyin pa dang dul ba dang legs par sdom pa dang /tshul khrims dang thos pa dang shes rab la shin tu gnas pa/thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la
109b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa/stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu zhugs pa/bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms
109b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
110a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po gleng bzhi'i dbang phyun dra /bdun dang
110a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mi'i dbang por gyur pa lta bu zhig byung bar gyur to//de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go//
110a3(dkon brtsegs): shI rAdwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de yang btsun mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das
110a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang mi dag gi tshe tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to//de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod
110a5(dkon brtsegs): pabu stong dang lhan cig btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang dad pa thob nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
110a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshang bar thugs la dgongs bzhin du na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang
110a7(dkon brtsegs): gdan dang /spyan gyi gsos sprin dang /yo byad rnams dang /bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas so//rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas tes rtag par rgyun du
110b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to//dngas su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
110b2(dkon brtsegs): du ma pa de nas mnan pa'i ra sa ma ngas shin ga shegs pad pa yang ba ma 'du /
110b3(dkon brtsegs): na bzhin ga shegs ngas ma pa ma dag pa phyigs ma ma ba ltu pa da 'i 'i dums mas mas
111a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la rgyal po
111a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ma mchis lags sam/de skad ces gsol
111a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka'
111a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to//rgyal po chen po cho 'phrul de dag ma yin pa'i tshe 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do//de yang gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma
111a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa rnams bshad pa dang /sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang /de ltar byang ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa
111a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa rnams la yan lag gsum du smos pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa
111a7(dkon brtsegs): la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang rnam pa med pa dang 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
111b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang /phyin ci log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /blang ba med pa dang dor ba med
111b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang //
111b3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba med cing skad cig ma'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /
111b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /pha rol dang tshul rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
111b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa yod pa dang /brtag pa dang bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa yod pa dang /skyob pa med pa dang rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa bsgom pa dang /bya ba
111b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyar ba dang /dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang /gnas pa meng pa'i chos rnams la btang
111b7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms bsgom pa dang /shes pa med pa dang mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa dang /thos pa med pa dang rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la
112a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba mngon par grub pa dang /dmigs pa dang sems pa dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang
112a2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa yod pa dang /sems dang lus dang sgra dang brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob pa
112a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa dang /skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa dang /
112a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang /stobs med pa dang nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su brjod pa dang /nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub
112a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag bshad pa dang /khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang /zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas bskyed pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i
112a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /rang bzhin gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'ongs par smon pa'o zhes/bcom
112a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba 'god pa de dang bu stong po de dag dang btsun mo'i tshogs
112b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te/de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
112b2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems skyes so//rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang de'i bu stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//de dag gis bzod pa thob nas songs
112b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rAb lta bu de la chog su bcad pa 'di dgra
112b4(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod do//ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni//lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar//de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni//chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes//ji ltar nyim
112b5(dkon brtsegs): 'char ba yis//mun pa thams cad sil ba ltar//de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzad su yang //srings rgyas zhing rnams steng bar bgyid//ji ltar zla ba nya ba yis//zla ba yongs rdzogs
112b6(dkon brtsegs): lhung de ltar//sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yi//'jig rten mgon yang lhang legs//ji ltar me tog bad+ma ni//cheb kyi nang du mi gos ltar//de bzhin 'jig rten mgon po yang //'jig
112b7(dkon brtsegs): rten chos kyis mi gos lags//ji ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal//nags ni sgra skad sgrogs bltar//de bzhin skyes bu sing ge yang //stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrogs//mchis
113a1(dkon brtsegs): sam yang na ma ma sa dang //mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang //mthar lta ba la rnam 'das pas//nges par seng ge sgra zhes bgyi//skye ba'am yang na 'jig pa'ang /
113a2(dkon brtsegs): rung /de dag thams cad bstan 'dzin cing //mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa//nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi//pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag/de dag rnam par rtog par bstan//chos
113a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun la mi gnas pa//nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi//kun nas nyon mongs rnams byang ba//de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te//shin du dri ma ma mchis chos//nges
113a4(dkon brtsegs): par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni//yongs su rtog las byung ba ste//rtog bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa//nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi//
113a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dag ni mya ngan 'das//de dag lam du gzhug pa ste//chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa//nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi//skye dang 'chi dang 'khor
113a6(dkon brtsegs): pra ni/phyin ci log las byung ba ste//mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med don//nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes dgyi//lha dang dmigs pa gnas lags te//de dag gis
113a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten 'jug/chos rnams stong par rab bshad pa//nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi//'jig rten mgon pos cho 'phrul ni//gang dag ji snyed bstan mdzad
113b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/de dag thams cad bshad pa ni//nges par seng ge sla zhes dgye//sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du//rjes su mthun dang mithun pa'i//gang la'ang sems ni mi 'jug pa//don
113b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes mthun bzod pa lags//sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'o//zab cing zhi la mthun bgyid cing //de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa//de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags//mi dge/
113b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma gtogs par//dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing //de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa//de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags//stong pa'i sgra dang sems can/
113b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra/de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni//sgra rnams kun la mi chags pa//de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags//sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra//rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams
113b5(dkon brtsegs): dang //gang gi sgra'ang mi rtog pa//de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags//sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang //brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang //dro zhin kun
113b6(dkon brtsegs): la brtson bgyid pa//de ni rjes 'thun brjod pa legs//thams cad bdog la sems mnyam zhing //byang chub sems ni mi spyod la//byang chub lam ni ston dpyod
113b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/di ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la//de 'dra'i chos ni ston mdzad de//de la so mi nyi ma mchis pa//de ni rjes mdun bzod
114a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags//bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing //seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni//ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i//cho 'phrul nges par
114a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bgyi//zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste//bla med bsod nams zhing de la//bdag gis sa bon btab pas na//bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags//
114a3(dkon brtsegs): dog sa thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing //rgya mtsho 'ang bas par 'gyur ba yin//rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa yin//sa bon nams kyang chab mi 'tshal//sems can
114a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing //nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thog gi/byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems//de ni bsod nams tshad ma mchis//bdag ga bsam pa ci
114a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i//dbang dgu lha dang dri za dang //mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te//bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dbang //'dren pa bdag gi longs spyod dang //gtsu
114a6(dkon brtsegs): dang mtho ris mi 'tshul gyi//mi mchog khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni//ci 'dra de ltar bdag gyur cig/byung chub lam ni dmigs bgyi sa nas//bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni//
114a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog sdang ba ma mchis par//bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkur bgyis//bdag gis byis pa stong rnams dang //mchis 'brang yongasu smin bgyis pa'i//gang lag
