114b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi//byang chub slad du spros mdzod//bdag gis bde gshegs lam mthong zhing //chos 'di legs par thos pa dang //byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba//
114b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed//gleng zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa//de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'//chos rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa//sems can kun la
114b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag dga' legs//de nas 'khor de nyid du chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di
114b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dag dang 'thun par ma byas kyi mi mthun par byas pas na/khyod ni gnas ma yin pa
114b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshor ba thams cad med
114b6(dkon brtsegs): pas shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs pa med cing dor ba med pas/blang ba med la dor ba med pa yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam
114b7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' la bris pa dang 'dra bas gzugs med pa kha dog med pa/rtags med pa/dbyibs med pa yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag cing
115a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po med pa yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjesu song ba yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub
115a2(dkon brtsegs): ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas g.yo ba med pa yin no//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni
115a3(dkon brtsegs): brtag pa dang bsal ba dang /bral bar nye bar zhi ba'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mi mthun pa med pa lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongs
115a4(dkon brtsegs): su grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par
115a5(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni sems dang /yid dang /rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par rig
115a6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyu ba med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad
115a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang
115b1(dkon brtsegs): bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du bya
115b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'o//rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang /ngo bo nyid
115b3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu la/sgrub par byed pa dang /gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang /gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang /gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni
115b4(dkon brtsegs): log par rtsol ba yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyal po byang chub ci 'dra ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang de 'dra ba yin pas/brang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni
115b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//bam po gnyis pa//de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan
115b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig de skad ces smras pa dang /chos
115b7(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge babakod pa la 'di skad ces smraso//rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
116a1(dkon brtsegs): bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//tshul khrims kyis rlom sems mi byed pa mnyam pa
116a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis tshul khrims dang /bslab pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len po'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//bzod
116a3(dkon brtsegs): pas rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha bo dang /khro ba dang /gnod sems dang /'chab pa'i yongasu gdung ba dang /zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba tha~Md 'byed par
116a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang //
116a5(dkon brtsegs): zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' nams kyi spyod pa yin no//bsam gtan gyis rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa
116a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa bsgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//shes rab kyis rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
116a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i shes rab tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis tshangs
116b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas pa bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//mngon par shes pas rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa bskyang
116b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//don dang chos la nges par sems mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub
116b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
116b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par skye ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yino///
116b5(dkon brtsegs): don 'thun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par 'dzin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sems kyis rlom sems su
116b6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sngam sa mnyam pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//na mkha' yongs su dag pa dang /sems
116b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa dang /zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yino//mtshan
117a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni/byang chub sems dpa'
117a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//lus dang ngag dang /sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang /sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
117a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no//sems can thams cad la bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis/sems can thams cad la ci zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
117a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no//rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongasu mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//las dang los kyi
117a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa la mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//chos sgyu ma lta bur so so rtog pa
117a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sdug bsngal skye bo med par shes mnyam pa nyid
117a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//mdza' bshos dang /mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyoms pa
117b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba brtan pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//lan re ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba ni/byang chub
117b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//thos pa dang bsgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//zang
117b3(dkon brtsegs): zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dam
117b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//don dam pa'i dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dben pa'i shes pa yongasu tshol ba ni byang chub sems
117b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sems can la shin tu 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//yon
117b6(dkon brtsegs): tan thams cad yod dag par blangs pas/rlom sems su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongasu tshol ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams
117b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no//de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa de dag thos nas/dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /
118a1(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs pa dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/gos dang rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis/chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi
118a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan la mngon par bkab po//bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis/chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas/tshig 'di
118a3(dkon brtsegs): skad du/gang bdag cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//
118a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang /spobs pa de lta bu dgi thob par gyur cig ces smras so//de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong
118a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa lo 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/gos dang rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni/mchod pa
118a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po ma yin gyi de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis de dag khyod kyis bsgrubs shig/de yang gang zhe na/de nas de'i tshe chos sgyu
118a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//bang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun//byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing //ma
118b1(dkon brtsegs): zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni//bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas//gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas//de bzhin du ni rjes su bslabs pa dang //
118b2(dkon brtsegs): rab byung sems kyi gom pa gcig bor ba//de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags//gang dag sngan chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang //gang dag me b+h+yon byung dang bzhugs pa
118b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams//de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par//bla med byang chub ni 'i thob pa med//rab byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis//rab tu bstod cing bsngags la bkur
118b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa//rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung gzung bar gyis//gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i//gang+gA'i bye snyesnying
118b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing byin dang //gang zhig rab byung nyid dang mtshan gcig tu//mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na//gang zhig rab byung bag yod gyur pa yi//byang
118b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang //bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing //dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin//rab byung de ni lam ngan sbyangs
118b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //las kyi rjes 'thun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod//de na dge ba chung za ma yin zhing //de ni yongasu 'dzin pa spangs pa yin//khyim las grol ba nyon
119a1(dkon brtsegs): mangs mi 'phel zhing //nyon mongs rna ma grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med//rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod//spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dga'
119a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas tshig su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang /'dod pa'i dga' ba dang longs spyod dang /rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la mi blta bar gyur cing /
119a3(dkon brtsegs): skyol 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/rab tu 'byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces
119a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam/bcom
119a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po rab tu byung ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/sems can thams cad la yang bar du mi gcod
119a6(dkon brtsegs): cing skabs yod do//khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis/gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su bstan gyis khyod kyis
119a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang gtams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang /rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong
119b1(dkon brtsegs): po de dag la smras pa/khyed cag las rgyal srid grub pa dang /sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par spro ba su yod/de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/
119b2(dkon brtsegs): yab bdag cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyang /bdag cag mi dor bar gsol//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te khyed thams cad rab
119b3(dkon brtsegs): tu byung na glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyis/khyed cag las gang sems can rnams la brtan pa'i
119b4(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des/rgyal srid bsgrubs la sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du chug cig/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas//
119b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems zhes bya ba des/rang gi pha de dang /rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa//rab byung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes//de bzhin
119b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi//de ltar lags kyang snying rjer gyur pa na//'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub//ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs spyod
119b7(dkon brtsegs): cing //gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi//me tog rnams dang dri dang byug pa dang //de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi bgyi'o//lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi
120a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs shig/'chil lham mi 'tshul rin chen gtsug brud min//khri rkang gser las bgyis par mi nyal shing //rgyal po'i rkyen gyi gos kyang mi 'tshal lo//
120a2(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing //rma bya ngang ba'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid //skye bos mdun padang bud med gnas spong zhing //gcig bu ma la na mchis nyal rlung mi
120a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yab/bdag ni gling nas gling du mchi bgyi zhing //dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi//khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing //rab tu 'byung ba'i bsngags
120a4(dkon brtsegs): paba'ang brjod par bgyi//gzugs dang dbang phyug longs spyod dregs pa yis//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrong mi bgyi//byang chub sems ni bskyud par mi bgyi zhing //
120a5(dkon brtsegs): rtog tu yid byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi//sbyin dang ston smra don spyod don 'thun pas//sems can bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing //bla med theg rkyen dam pa 'di la yang //
120a6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bya ba mang po yongs smin bgyi//chos don mnyam zhing bshad par bgyi slad du//nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du//ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing //
120a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod pa'ang bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des//rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems la legs so zhes bya
120b1(dkon brtsegs): ba byin te/skyes bu dbu ba legs sa legs so//bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon khyim par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba
120b2(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan mtshungs pa ma yin no//khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bsgrub pa'ang sgrub par byer ba yin no//de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas/rgyal po
120b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas/bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang lhan cig tu/bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med
120b4(dkon brtsegs): bapar rab tu byung bar gyur to//de dag rab tu byung nas kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar gtams shing rjes su bstan pas/de dag
120b5(dkon brtsegs): gis ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to//gzungs dang dran pa dang /chos mnyan pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to//rgyal bu gzhon nu snying
120b6(dkon brtsegs): rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas zla ba nya'o cog la gling chen po bzhi po dag pa rjes su ston par byed de/ci nas kyang srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /bye ba
120b7(dkon brtsegs): braphrag gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to//de dag thams cad
121a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pA la dang bras khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/theg pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang
121a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi ci tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can
121a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rten du gyur cing /dad pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de lta ltos/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar
121a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/'khor los
121a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to//shA ra dwa tI'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa da gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
121a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod yid gnyis dang som nyi za bar gyur na/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid do'i tshe de'i dun chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi
121a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan nas bya bar gyur to//sha ra dwa tI'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po dge pa bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur ba de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyed so ma nyid
121b1(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis za bar gyur na/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyis sangs rgyas stong po de dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i
121b2(dkon brtsegs): bu stong tham par gyur to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis
121b3(dkon brtsegs): za bar gyur na/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje tshar sems shes bya bar gyur to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon
121b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa rnams ni/lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /shes bzhin gyi spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin//
121b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na/lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las/srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par
121b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu
121b7(dkon brtsegs): da dpon 'di dang lhan cig tu yun ring po nas/tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no//'jam
122a1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/brgyad pa'i chog bla dgas yin la/
122a2(dkon brtsegs): lam ni 'dus byas yin gyis/khro bo ni 'dus ma byas su rmugs pa yin pas/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no//btsun pa sha radwa tI'i
122a3(dkon brtsegs): burgyangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/kho bo ni spyod pa med pa dang /rab tu spyod pa med pa yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par
122a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ma yin no//btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyis/kho bo ni gnyis su sbyor ba yang ma yin la/gnyis
122a5(dkon brtsegs): mong bar sbyor ba yang ma yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas/tshangs par smad pa ma yin no//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba don
122a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/khro bo no gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyang pa ma yin no//btsun pa shA rang
122a7(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/kho bo ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro deng rig
122b1(dkon brtsegs): bya dang chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ngas par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/bdud kyis
122b2(dkon brtsegs): lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/kho ba ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no//
122b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/kho bo ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor ba mi byed de/de'i phyir kho
122b4(dkon brtsegs): bo yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad po ma yin no//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/kho
122b5(dkon brtsegs): bo ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa
122b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/kho bo na 'khor ba las 'byol ba ma yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no//btsun pa
122b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/kho bo ni mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer ba ma yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni yun
123a1(dkon brtsegs): rnying pa nas tshangs par sbyad du ma yin no//btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang ba la bsnyen bkung byas pa/
123a2(dkon brtsegs): ljin no zhes zer ba ni/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med
123a3(dkon brtsegs): cing bstan du med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas/de la
123a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkus bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi
123a5(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing 'dus ma byas brnyes pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/
123a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa med cing yid gnas pa med po ljon pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing stong pa
123a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang /sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i mu yin
123b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ya yamamamamathapa cam camasas macam sam tham/a macan thas na thaH a mamamatsham tham ma.a bas/ma masamayas ma yamaHma bam
123b2(dkon brtsegs): bas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar m-inus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing gnyis dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /
123b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs po nI l+ye dang ro'i yul ma yin zhing rnam par rig pa med de'i mtshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de gnon gshegs pa ni smras
123b4(dkon brtsegs): dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya ba mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing
123b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings su yang dag 'du ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /dri bdon gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya bar
123b6(dkon brtsegs): mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang 'thun par zhugs pa yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ches
123b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas/de la bstan bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur
123b8(dkon brtsegs): bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad
124a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par chad pa yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la bzhugs pa yin pas/de la
124a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
124a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ni khams gsum nu mi gnas pa yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi
124a4(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang /'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
124a5(dkon brtsegs): ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba yin pas/de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang dag dang yid dang bral ba yin pas/da pe bsnyen
124a6(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dog dang gzugs dang /dbyibs dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin
124a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma klad cing kha na ma tho ba med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgyid lam thams cad la
124b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /btsun pa shA rAdwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur pa gdab tu med cing na mkha' la
124b2(dkon brtsegs): bris pa lta bu yin pas/de la bstan bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyed ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no zhes/
124b3(dkon brtsegs): zer ba la btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig chags rtsa ba ma yin pa dang //ma rig pa dang srid pa'i srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
124b4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i
124b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /log pa brgyad rtsa ba yin pa dang /kun nas man+dar sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa
124b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa de gang yin pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin
124b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang /lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /lhag pa'i
125a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /dbang po lngar 'du shes pa
125a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /byang chub kyi lam bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
125a3(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rna ba ma yin pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /mi slob pa'i chos bcul mngon
125a4(dkon brtsegs): pabar zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba yin pa dang /'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa
125a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dang /lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//sgrib pa rtsu ba ma yin pa dang /chod pa dang /kun nas
125a6(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba ma yin pa dang /'gyod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//bdan tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /sems can du lte ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /sgrog tu lta
125a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dang /gso ba dang /gang zag du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /'jig par lta brtse ba ma yin pa dang /
125b1(dkon brtsegs): chad par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /rtag par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /ma rig pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /
125b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /ming dang gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /skye mched drug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang //
125b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe 'i rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /sred pa rnam yin pa dang /len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /srid pa rtswa ba ma yin pa dang /skye ba rtsu ba ma yin pa dang /rga shi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /nang
125b4(dkon brtsegs): dang sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//'dod pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /gzugs kyi khams
125b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /gzugs med pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa
125b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//byams pa dang snying rje dang /dga'
125b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin
126a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//byams pa chen po'i rtsa ba dang /snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
126a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su
126a3(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang /rnam par sman pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang /tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang /brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig
126a4(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong ba yang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang /bzod pa dang /zhi ba dang /dul ba dang /nges pa'i rtsa ba dang /bdag dang gzhan la yang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang /brtan pa'i
126a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po rtsam pa'i rtsa ba dang /dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang /bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang /bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar mi byed pa'i rtsa
126a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang /gtang snyoms kyang ma yin pa'i rtsa ba dang /thabs kyi rtsa ba dang /thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
126a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi
126b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
126b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//spobs pa mi chod pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
126b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//mngon par shes pa dang /rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba yin no//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
126b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /lan gsum du bzlas te/chos
126b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don gyi gzhi rnam par nges
126b6(dkon brtsegs): par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ngas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam
126b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas/tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas
127a1(dkon brtsegs): pader na de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung ba yin par rig par gyu//sems can gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thosun/mi skragam
127a2(dkon brtsegs): dang zhing /dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no//de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no//de dag ni theg pa chen po la
127a3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba thob pa yin no zhes kyang smras so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de smras pa la rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad nas/lha'i bu ded dpon la
127a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa de thos nas mos par 'gyur ba de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin to//de dag ni de las
127a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par bshad pa dang /
127a6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang /bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang /sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug
127a7(dkon brtsegs): par bshad pa dang /dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par bshad pa dang /lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang /mtshan mar 'du shes pa
127b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mtshan ma med par bshad pa dang /khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams la smon pa med par bshad pa dang /ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa 'du shes pa rnams la
127b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te/gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na//
127b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dul ba rnams ni grang la yang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ngar 'dzin pa yongasu 'dzin pa dang
127b4(dkon brtsegs): nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su ma bzung bas/yongs su ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang /rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang /g.yo ba med pa la
127b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gul ba med pa dang /'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang /blang ba med pa la dor ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang /'dzin pa med pa la mchog
127b6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang /phyin ci log med pa la log pa nyid med pa dang /log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par bsgrub
127b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pa dang /yang dag par bsgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang /yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin pa dang /yang dag pa'i
128a1(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang /sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang /sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang //
128a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gnas med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang /rnam par rig pa med pa la brtag cing bsal ba med pa dang /brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas/dmigs
128a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang /sgrib pa med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang /gang gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom sems med pa dang /gang
128a4(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe lhag par rlom sems med pa de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang /mthong ba med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /yongs su gdung ba med pa la
128a5(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug pa med pa dang /sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang /nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems la gsal ba snang ba dang /gsal ba thob pas ye
128a6(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong ba dang /ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang /sems kyi ye shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang //
128a7(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa med pa mngon par gyur pa dang /sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir//
128b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la/chos kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i
128b2(dkon brtsegs): byas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur la 'di skad ces smras so//kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa tsi dang ci 'dri ba de dang de nyid kyi tshig gi mtshams las/sangs rgyas kyi
128b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad snang ngo //'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do//
128b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/de dag
128b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ji lta ba de bzhin du brjod par byed do//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'jog
128b6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par dgod par byed do//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams
128b7(dkon brtsegs): cad btong snyoms pa ste/de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs/gang du yang ma khrid pa ste/
129a1(dkon brtsegs): dag bsags pa yang ma yin srungs pa yang ma yin no//de dag ni bshad kyang rung ma bshad kyang rung ste/chos kyi de bzhin mi 'dor ba yin no//sems can
129a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad ni/lus las kyang ma byung
129a3(dkon brtsegs): sems las kyang ma byung ste/rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no//ji ltar yi go rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du/sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams
129a4(dkon brtsegs): la yang bsags pa med do//ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du/nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la yang
129a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa med do//ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du/shes pa gang gis nyon mongs pa rnams pa spangs pa'i shes
129a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de la yang bsags pa med de/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/chos thams cad ni shes pas mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yino//
129a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa gang yin/'jam dpal
129b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang /phung po yongs su spangs pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa dang //
129b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /skye ba dang 'byung ba shes pa dang /lamo shes pa dang /lam ngan pa rnam par bcad pa shes
129b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /rgyu shes pa dang /chud mi za ba shes pa dang /'bras bu shes pa dang /mngon sum du bya ba shes pa dang /rkyen shes pa dang /tshogs bsags pa shes pa
129b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /bden pa shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la lnga zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang /'byung ba mngon par zhen pa med pa
129b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /phung po lnga shes pa dang /phung po'i bdud spangs pa shes pa dang /khams shes pa dang /chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang /skye mched shes
129b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /grong stong lta bu so sor rtog pa shes pa dang /sbyin pa shes pa dang /dus dang dus ma yin pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang /tshul khrims shes pa dang /tshul
129b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang /bzod pa shes pa dang /sems can rjes su bsrung ba shes pa dang /brtson 'grus shes pa dang /
130a1(dkon brtsegs): legs par bya ba'i las bya ba shes pa dang /bsam gtan shes pa dang /bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang /shes rab shes pa dang /lta
130a2(dkon brtsegs): bu yongs su shes pa shes pa dang /thabs shes pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang /byams pa shes pa dang /sems can bskyab pa
130a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang /snying rje shes pa dang /yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang /dga' ba shes pa dang /chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mchog tu dga' ba shes pa dang /btang
130a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa shes pa dang /sems can gzhugs pa shes pa dang /tha snyad shes pa dang /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang //
130a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa la gnas pa shes pa dang /yang dag par spong ba shes pa dang /mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang /mngon
130a6(dkon brtsegs): pabar 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa shes pa dang /dad pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang /chags pa thams cad khas yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang /
130a7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /stobs shes pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang /chos thams
130b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mi brjed pa shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs shes
130b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang /rang byung gi ye shes rjes su
130b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa dang /lam dran pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang /snying rje chen po la lhag par dmigs pa shes pa
130b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /zad pa shes pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang /skye ba med pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang /sangs
130b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su grub pa shes pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba shes pa
130b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du shes pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa shes
130b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya
131a1(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar shes pa dang /sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang /rim pa rjes su
131a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa shes pa dang /thos pa'i tshigs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang /tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang /spyan thams cad shes pa
131a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang /gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang /stobs bcu shes pa dang /
131a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang /rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang /mi 'jigs pa shes pa dang /bar du gcod pa dang bar du gcod pa ma yin
131a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang /rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la
131a6(dkon brtsegs): mthogs pa'i shes pa dang /chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'angang ba shes pa dang /da ste dbyung ba'i dus la mthogs pa'i shes pa dang /gnas pa mad pang
131a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas pa med pa shes pa dang /dus sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa shes pa dang /ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang /
131b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sku rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang /yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa
131b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /sems can thams cad
131b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyon mongs pa dang /rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang /mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang /sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang /
131b4(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang /sems can le lo can yongs su bzung ba shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang /gdul ba'i sems can 'dul
131b5(dkon brtsegs): brjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /thabs shes pa dang /shes rab shes pa ste/lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub
131b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob bo//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab
131b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dang /'jig rten thams cad gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar te/shes pa de ni go cha ngan ngon dang ldan pas yang dag par
132a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdu bar mi nus so//'jam dngal gang de lta bu'i shes pa bskyed par byed pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no//bam po gsum po ste thum/
132a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par dgos pa yin/'dzum dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis
132a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin no//smras pa/'jam
132a4(dkon brtsegs): dngul ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/smras pa/lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal
132a5(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/smras pa/lha'i bu rtsom pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang /ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pasan
132a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/smras pa/lha'i bu shes rab kyis bzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug
132a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /thabs kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu bas de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes
132b1(dkon brtsegs): byu smras pa/lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/brtson 'grus rtsom par yang
132b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/de'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ltar sems
132b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pas/de'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes
132b4(dkon brtsegs): bya/smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ltar lam de la gnas nas/sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pas/de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o//
132b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams shin tu 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas//
132b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu ji tsam du bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges
132b7(dkon brtsegs): par bcom zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/sred pa len par byed pa de tsam gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji
133a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul bar dka' ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang /sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par//
133a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
133a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab dang /thabs kyis sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang /ngom pa'i chos yongs
133a4(dkon brtsegs): mu bzung ba'i phyir kun du snang ba de tsam gyis nA/byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
133a5(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig gis/sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil gyis gnon par byed
133a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/de lta bu ni chos smra ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la/sems
133a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang /kun nas ldan pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir/chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba smra ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal
133b1(dkon brtsegs): rdo ltar na don smra ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe thos pa thams cad la nan tan skyeng bar byed cing don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don slu ba yin//smras pa/'jam dpal
133b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa
133b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sems can rnams la stobs par byed pa de lta bu ni/sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na
133b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' drang po yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag go nyes pa mi 'chab de lta bu ni drang ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
133b5(dkon brtsegs): dnga'adam pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi gya gyu can rnams la khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin//
133b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo med pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji skad smras pa'i tshi ga las 'da' ba med pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar
133b7(dkon brtsegs): na sgyu med pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji ltar sems kyis mngon par bsgrub pa de bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de lta bu ni sgyu med pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal
134a1(dkon brtsegs): ma' ya yammacas a mamasamam/a macan tha sa mthaH Sha sa maa
134a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar na du rgyal med pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi ts+tsha sems can thams cad la 'dud par pyod cing myo dge ba mi byung ba de lta bu nong rgyal med pa yin na/
134a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin bdag yin/smras pa/gang gi tshe yongs su bsdu ba'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na/dngos po
134a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag lha smos kyang ci dag sna du'o//smras pa/'dzom dpal ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/spyi'i bu gang tshul khrims 'artul pa mcho
134a5(dkon brtsegs): na/srog gi phyir yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na bzod pa smras pa yin/lha'i bu gang gi tshe gnod pa bzod cing /gzhan
134a6(dkon brtsegs): la gnod par mi byed pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang rnam par bsams na/chos 'ga'
134a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mi dmigs pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar ni bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa yin/smras pa/'i bri gang 'dod pa'i khams su phyis mi snang ba yin no//smras pa/
134a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang shes rab kyis bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa yin no//smras po/'jam dpal ji ltar na
134b1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa la gnas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du rnam par lta ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na snying rje la
134b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thams cad na mkha' lta bur shes nas/byang chub la brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal
134b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe thub cing zhi la rab tu zhi ba thob cing chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' ba mi ngoms pa yin no//smras pa/
134b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'jig rten na spyod kyang /'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis
134b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'phrogs pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su dag pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis
134b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi las dang 'thun par ston pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na ngag yongs su dag pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can
134b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas/'bras bu yod pas chos ston pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/smras pa/
135a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
135a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong la/gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no//smras pa/
135a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na/lha'i bu rna ba thob pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sgra thams cad thos la sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji
135a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar na pha rol gyi sems la mkhas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur pa rnams kyi sems kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no//smras pa/
135a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi mtha'i mu rjes su dran zhing /yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba
135a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yin/smras pa/lce'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang ston la/bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa
135a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na
135b1(dkon brtsegs): bsrungs pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na rnam par dul ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pa'i
135b2(dkon brtsegs): chos su gyur pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na zhi ba yin/smras pa/lha'i bu nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad kyis gdung ba med la/sems
135b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na dad pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs
135b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis phye yang mi phyed pa yin no//smras po/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
135b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byang chub la rag las par mthong ba yin no//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
135b6(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la leg so zhes bya
135b7(dkon brtsegs): babyin to/'jam dpal leg so legs so//khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming bshad pa de dang /skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par smras te//
136a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do//lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal
136a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas na/khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes
136a3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed 'gags snyam/smras pa/'jam dpal sprul pa nyid la yang sems dang sems las byung ba dag med na sgyu ma sprul pa la lta ci
136a4(dkon brtsegs): smos/smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin la/de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de lta bu yin no//
136a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/smras pa/lha'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
136a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig la khyod yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces dris na/ci de la lan ldon par byed dam/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni cung zad kyang
136a7(dkon brtsegs): lan ldon par mi byed do//smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo yang sprul pa de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas na/kho bos ji skad du/kho bo yun ring po 'di tsam zhig nas sbyin pa'i
136b1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes lan gdab par bya/smras pa/'jam dpal 'o na ci khyod ser sna can yin nam/smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo ni ser sna can yin no//
136b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpol khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu gang yongs su mi gtong ba de ser sna can ma yin nam/smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci zhig
136b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtong /smos pa/lha'i bu kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni ser sna can
136b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/khyod ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin no//smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin te/
136b5(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa de ngan song
136b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag tu ltung ba ma yin nam/smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin no//smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams
136b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ngan song rnams su 'gro ste/de'i phyir kho bo ni tshul khrims mtshal ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ci khyod gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin nam/
137a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin te//za bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras
137a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/lha'i bu gang gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa de rje su chags pa med pa ma yin na me/smras pa/'dzem dpal de bzhin no//smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo yang nyon
137a3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad dang /byis pa thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la rjes su chags pa med de/de'i phyir kho bo ni gnod sems kyi
137a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ci khyod le lo can yin nam/smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin te/kho bo le lo can yin no//smras pa/'jam
137a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu le lo can zhes bya ba ni gang lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi rtsom pa yin la/kho bo yang rtsom pa med cing brtul
137a6(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa dang /len pa med pa dang /'dor ba med pa yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ci khyod sems rnam par g.yongs
137a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin nam/lha'i bu de bzhin te/kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu
137b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi sems rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de/sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin nam/smras pa/'jam dngapal de bzhin no//smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo yang 'phags pa
137b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi gnas pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni sems rnam par
137b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yengs pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ci khyod shes rab 'chal ba yin nam/smras pa/lha'i bu de bzhin te/kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yino//smras pa/
137b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu gang 'khor bas mi skrag cing sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba de shes rab 'chal ba ma
137b5(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin no//smras pa/lha'i bu kho bo yang 'khor bas mi skrag cing /de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/sems can
137b6(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba yin te/de'i phyir kho bo ni shes rab 'chal ba yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal 'jig rten ni sbyin gronas su yin/smras pa/lha'i
137b7(dkon brtsegs): bu gang dag bsad pa bsod pa'i sems skyes pa rnams so//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu gsod pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod
138a1(dkon brtsegs): chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams te/gang de dag gsod par byed pa de ni/bsad pa gsod par byed pa yin pas/de ni 'jig rten na sbyin
138a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu na 'jig rten gnas po skrag par 'gyur ba yin no//smras pa/lha'i bu gang de yang dag pa'i mtho'
138a3(dkon brtsegs): skrag par 'gyur na ni/'jig rten gnas pa yang skrag par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro//'jam
138a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro//smras pa/'jam
138a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu pha rol gyi sgra nyan pa ma spangs par na/'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba 'thob par mi nus so//de ci'i
138a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/skyon med par zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med pas na/gang dag mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//'jam
138a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/smras pa/lha'i bu rnam par grol ba ni/yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med do//smras pa/'jam dpal dam
138b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos spang ba rnams ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin no//smras pa/lha'i bu gang dag rnam par grol ba de dag thams cad sems can da myal bar 'gro ba yin nam/smras pa/
138b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med pa yin no//smras pa/lha'i bu stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus so//
138b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni ci zhig la gnas pa nas yin/smras pa/lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni sems can thams cad la byams par gnas
138b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can ma gtogs par stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams/
138b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' khong du chud po yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang /chad pa'i mthar lta bar yang mi ltung ba
138b6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin no//smras pa/'dzem dpal sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/
138b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sems can gyi khams ni/chos kyi dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/
139a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu na mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal na mkha'i khams gang dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu yul
139a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/smras pa/lha'i bu mig gi yul
139a3(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mig dang gzugs dang /rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te//
139a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rna ba dang /sgra dang rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang dri dang rnam
139a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lce dang ro dang /rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//lus kyi
139a6(dkon brtsegs): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lus dang reg bya dang /rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/
139a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yid dang chos dang /rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no//gzugs kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gzugs
139b1(dkon brtsegs): su rung ba'i yul ma yin no//tshor ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni myong ba'i yul mu yin no//'du shes kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul/
139b2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun tu g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no//'du byed kyi yul ni spangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon par 'du byed ba'i
139b3(dkon brtsegs): yul ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no//ma rig pa'i yul ni spangs
139b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi yul ma yin no//rga shi'i bar ngag gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni nying
139b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no//'dod pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags so sor rnam par rig pa'i yul
139b6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin//gzugs kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'i yul ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i
139b7(dkon brtsegs): yul gyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba'i lam rnam par grol ba'i yul ma yin no//'dus byas kyi khams kyi yul ni
140a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gnyis su sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no//'dus ma byas kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yulU yin te/sangs
140a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin no//lha'i bu de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir/yul
140a3(dkon brtsegs): deng ni yul thams cad 'dus shing khongs su chud ba yin no//lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yul de lta bur zhugs shing don gyi yul thams cad la/rnam par spyong
140a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang bdud kyi yul thob pa ma yin te/de ni bdud kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa'i yul du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud do//lha'i bu
140a5(dkon brtsegs): gang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang /mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'dra' ba 'di yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no//de la
140a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid ni gang mi mnyam pa nyid ni gang zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no//gang dgra stong pa nyid la mi 'jug pa
140a7(dkon brtsegs): dedag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o//chos thams
140b1(dkon brtsegs): cod mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no//gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la ma 'jug pa de dag ni mnyam par gnas pa yin te/byang chub
140b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin kyang mtshan ma med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o//chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni
140b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid yin no//gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par
140b4(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang /smon pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o//chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par monyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no//
140b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yong su smin par byed kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i
140b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o//chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang /'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid dang /dben
140b7(dkon brtsegs): par mnyam pa nyid dang /dngos po med par mnyam pa nyid dang /'gog par mnyam pa nyid dang /chos thams cad mya ngan las 'ongs par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam
141a1(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid yin no//gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par mnyam pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed
141a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ste/lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/byang chub sems dpo'i
141a3(dkon brtsegs): spyad po la spyod pa yin no//de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
141a4(dkon brtsegs): lo spobs por gyis shig/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni bsams gyis mi khyab pa yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal
141a5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsems gyis mi khyab pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bsams gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/byang chub
141a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsams gyis mi khyab pa ste/'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//zhe sdang gi spyod pa bsams kyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/byang
141a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsams kyis mi khyab ste/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//gti mug gi spyod pa bsams kyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub
141b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsams kyis mi khyab ste/shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//ser sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
141b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin te/sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//'tshal pa'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
141b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te//bzod pos rlom
141b4(dkon brtsegs): sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//le lo med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni
141b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no//rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no//'chal
141b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/shes rab kyi rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yino//nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang
141b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yino//nang dong phyi'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas brtse ba med pa'i
142a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//bu dang bu mo dang /chung ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dga' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang
142a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pas rtag tu gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod po yin no//dge
142a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu bos mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub
142a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su gtong bas tsham chom med pa'i spyod pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//
142a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dpag tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bas khur chen po
142a6(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sngar dam bcas pa nyams su len par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems
142a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid la gcig pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//theg pa thams cad
142b1(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan pas/mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//yid ma ma zhig pas go cha rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems
142b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems pos/rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
142b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//las byas pa chung ma za bas/chung mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sems can thams cad sems mnyam
142b4(dkon brtsegs): pas/tha dad med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//dgra thams cad nges par bcom pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
142b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no//skal pa mnyam pa'i skye bo dang 'thun par 'jug pas/ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//gshe ba dang /
142b6(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas/rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//sangs rgyas lta ba dang /chos mnyan pa
142b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas/dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
143a1(dkon brtsegs): yin na//lus dang ngag dang /sems dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan par byed pas rgyun gyi spyad pa ni byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyang ba yin no//mnyam
143a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur pas/zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//skye bo mkhas shing mdzangs pa rnams kyi rab tu
143a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pas/ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu nges par brtags pas/mi
143a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsi ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//khur blangs po nyams su lon pas/skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
143a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no//brtson 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag
143a6(dkon brtsegs): par sdud pas/chos spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yino//sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas/byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa
143a7(dkon brtsegs): nibyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//dkon mchog gsum 'dri bar mi byed pas/dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
143b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no//sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa
143b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di bshad pa ni/spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob por gyur to//de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur
143b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so//byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang
143b4(dkon brtsegs): me bral ba de dag ni/de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/lha'i bu grong gi tshe
143b5(dkon brtsegs): nga spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/der ngas mi skye ba'i
143b6(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob bo//lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed po de yang
143b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mi skye bo zhes bya ba ni ci lags
144a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa glang gis nA byung chub sem sna dru 'am skye bas la bzong bu zab pa lags/com ldan 'das kyis ga' sprul pa/sna'i bu mo skye ba zhes
144a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni/gnod ma nus ma skyes pa'i rtswa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgos yin te/de ni sngon byung bar gyur la b+hi sa mA byu bar gyur pa ma yin te/de ni gzung mon som nga
144a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid yin no//de ni sngon srid par gyur la/phyis mi sred par gyur pa ma yin te/de ni gzod mi nas mi srid pa nyid yin no//de ni sngon skyes par gyur la phyis ma skyes par
144a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ma yin te/de ni gzong ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin no//de ni sngon mngon par 'dus byas pa yin la/phyis mngon par 'dus mi byas pa ma yin te/de ni go zod ma nas
144a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no//de ni sngon yod par gyur lnga/phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/dri ni gzong ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no//de ni sngon gang
144a6(dkon brtsegs): zag tu bgrang bar gyur la/phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang bar gyur pa yin to//de ni gzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no//de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar gyur la/phyis
144a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshon ma med par 'grang bar gyur pa ma yin te/de ni gzod ma nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no//gang gis de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang /sems kyi skye ba dang /'jig
144b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par zhen pa med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o//de la bzod pa gang zhe na/de dag ci ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang bzod pa do na bzod pa
144b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o//de dag ci ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o//de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /rang sangs
144b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o//de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams
144b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o//de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du/chos thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o//bzod pa de
144b5(dkon brtsegs): yang skad cig pa yin te/gang gis skad cig pa yin zhe na/skad cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no//stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis skad cig pu yin no//mtshan ma med
144b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin no//ji ltar stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de ni de bzhin du/gzugs kyang
144b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no//ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du/tshor ba
145a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no//ji ltar stong pa nyid dang //mtshan
145a2(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de ni de bzhin du/chos thams cad kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no//ji
145a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du/skye mched thams cad kyang skye mched rnams kyi mtshan
