145a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi skad cig pa yin te/skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya ma R+Ya yino//ya ma rla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no//gsog gang yin pa de ni gsob yin no//gsob
145a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no//'dod chags med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no//'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid
145a6(dkon brtsegs): mang pa yin no//ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te/de na chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /skad cig pa dang /ya ma R+Ya dben pa dang /gsog
145a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste chos thams cad la de ltar gzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o//bzod pa de yang bzod pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/de ltar mnyam pa nyid thob
145b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin no//bzod pa de yang dmigs pas rab tu phye ma yin te/de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/gang gi
145b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe bdag dang /bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na/da ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o//sems can dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /gang zag dang /bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs
145b3(dkon brtsegs): da ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o//de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o//sems can
145b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /gang zag dang /bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/dung po dang /kham dang /skye
145b5(dkon brtsegs): mched rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ngo bo nyid de dang /bzod pa de la gnyis su
145b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su rtog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o//lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skal pa grangs med par spyod pa de
145b7(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin no//bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug
146a1(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos so//'jig rten 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to//sil snyan brgya stong yang ma bkrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to//me tog gi char
146a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang rab tu bab po//srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//byang chub sems
146a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis na/chos rnams la rjesu 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me
146a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu yang kun tu snang bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do//gang gi tshe sangs rgyas
146a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs/kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di
146a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod kha dang /shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
146a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang phyir
146b1(dkon brtsegs): log ste/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/chos

161a2(dkon brtsegs): snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

167b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi bsngags pa brjod nas/zas dang gos sgrub par byed do//byams pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bsgrags cing /seng ge'i las rnams bya ba'i rigs pa wa'i sgra bsgrogs shing /wa'i
167b5(dkon brtsegs): las rnams byed pa dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags par byed cing /'jig rten gyi zang zing yun ring bar yongasu gtong bar mi byed la ser snas zil gyis gnon cing
167b6(dkon brtsegs): yo byad kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis stong pa'i phyi rol du byas pa/ngan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing /gnod sems dang /tha ba dang /khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed
167b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed pa dang /gcig tu gnod sems su byed pa dang /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gi bsngags pa brjod par byed cing /sems can 'ga'
168a1(dkon brtsegs): yang sbyin pa 'am/snyan par smra ba'am ngon spyod pa 'am/don 'thun pas sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi bzad par 'gyur ba la ltos de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos//
168a2(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ba yin gyi/de dag yon tan yang dag par bya ba dang /'dres pa'i spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mas pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no//byams pa sngon
168a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa grangs med pa dang /ches grangs med pa dang /ches shin tu grangs med pa dang /rgya che ba dang /tshad med pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang dpag tu ming
168a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba/rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa
168a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/byams pa de bzhin gshegs
168a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang 'di lta ste dper na/da ltar nga bzhin du snyigs ma lha dang ldan pa kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo //byams pa de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mos shes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa/rtogs
168a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa/blo dang ldan pa/'dod pa chung ba tshig shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to//de grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /rgyal
168b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i pho brang dang /yul 'khor de dag tu song ste/phyin pa dang /chos ston par byed cing /rgyal po dang blon po chen po dag dang /skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang ri mo byas/mchod pa byas/bkur sti
168b2(dkon brtsegs): byas bla ma byas/shes par byas/yongasu shes par byas so//de khyim gong du zhugs shing /gang las tshig snyan pa dang /bdag la gus par snyan pa dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba thob par
168b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i khyim der ni/de lan gnyisu 'gro bar sems bskyed par mi byed do//de 'jungs pa dang /ma dad pa dang /log par lta ba'i dad pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu song zhing de dag tu son pa na//
168b4(dkon brtsegs): de la de dag 'ongs pa legaso zhes kyang mi zer/de dag tshig snyan par yang mi brjod pa'i steng du/de la khro bar byed/gshe bar byed na yang /de bzod pa'i ga dgos shing /snying rje chen po
168b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas 'gro la/khyim de dag tu yongasu gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing /yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro//byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des/khyim gang dag dang
168b6(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa de dag ni/'di lta ste chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /sten dang na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'che bar 'gyur ro//byams
168b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ji snyam du sems/de khyim de dag tu yang 'gro bar byed cing /'gro bar sems bskyed yang mi byed mod kyi 'on kyang de dag la phrag dog dang /ser sna'i sems bskyed par byed snyam 'amo//
169a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma logs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa de la byang chub
169a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyan pa dang /bdag la gus par nyan pa dang /bza' ba dang /btung brnyad pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing //
169a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas/de dag tu lan gnyi su 'jug par mi byed pa dang /'jungs pa dang ma dad pa dang /log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag
169a4(dkon brtsegs): da par byed cing /de dag khro zhing gshe na yang yongasu gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing /yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang /'dod pa chung ba nyid
169a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /chog shes pa nyid dang /nges pa nyid dang /snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos/byams pa de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khyim bdag dad par byas shing /gzhan gyi
169a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'tsho bar byed kyi bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang /bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no//byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya
169a7(dkon brtsegs): pabar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na/khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
169b1(dkon brtsegs): mos shes bya bar gyur to//byams pa de lta bus na/byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de'i rjesu bslab par bya/do las
169b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan po'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs po dag gi rjesu bslab par bya zhing /de dag gi chos kun tu skyed par yang bya ///bam po gnyis po//byams
169b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang phyi ma'i cha phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba'i dge slong gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag 'di lto ste rnyed pa dang /chos gos dang /bsod snyoms kyi don
169b4(dkon brtsegs): du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/khyim pa rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang /'byed pa dang /rtsod pa'i rang
169b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin can du 'gyur ro//de dag ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yid rangs par 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la/ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde bar
169b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ltar/bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin//byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byad de dag thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan dag la sbyin par
169b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yin na/de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa 'di ltar des ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed par bya'o zhes/snying rje chen po sngon
170a1(dkon brtsegs): du btung ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro//byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/tshong dpon nam khyim bdag cig la bu gcig pa sdug pa phangs pa yidadu 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur/
170a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de/le lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos btson rar bcug par gyur na/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis
170a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos brtson ra der 'jug par 'gyur snyam de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
170a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'od ltar bu gcig pa de thar byur bgyi ba'i bsam pas/bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di brtson ra 'dri nas myur du thar par bgyi'o snyam nus bu gcig pa yid la
170a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa kho na dag gis btson ra dwer 'jug par bgyid de/thar par yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams/
170a6(dkon brtsegs): pangs dpe de ni don shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin//'dir don kyang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal po'i btson ra de ji lta ba de bzhin du
170a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i btson rang blta bar bya'o//byams pa 'di lta ste dper ni/tshong dpon nam khyim pa shi de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o//byams pa 'di
170b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na/bu gcig de lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bla gcig pa 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya bar blta bar bya'o//byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/
170b2(dkon brtsegs): tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir ma yin zhing /ched ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi bu gcig de'i don du btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems
170b3(dkon brtsegs): dpas chos gos kyi ched dang /bsod snyoms kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongasu thar par bya ba'i phyir khyim rnamasu 'gro bar bya ba la
170b4(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya'o//byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya thu ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/sems ma bsgoms pa/tshul khrims ma bsgom pa/shes rab ma bsgoms po//kha cig
170b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag ni chos gos dang /bsod snyoms kyi ched du me tog gi skyes dgu dang /'bras bu'i skyes dag dang /lo mo'i skyes drug dang /yo byad kyi skyes dag dang /byas pa'i
170b6(dkon brtsegs): lan gyi skyes dag dang /khyim rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur bas/byis pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng brgyud lta bur mi bya zhing /bran dang los mi lta bu yang mi bya'o//byams pa dge slong khyim
170b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya bar ma gtogs par/skyes gzhan bkur bar mi bya ste/des ni mang du thos pa dang /gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang /'jigs
171a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang /byarkam chags med pa dang /tshul 'chos med pa dang /kha bsag med pa dang /bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing /chos la dga' ba bskyed ras khyim rnams
171a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar bya'o//khyim rnamasu song nas kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang /sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus
171a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing /chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par/khang khyim gyi ched dam/zhing las kyi ched ngam/rnyed pa'i cheng
171a4(dkon brtsegs): dam/reg pa lang ba'i gtam 'am/rgyal po'i gtama'am/chom rkun gyi gtam 'am/grong gI gtam 'am/grong khyer gyi gau ta ma 'am/ljongs kyi gtam 'am/bu'i gtam 'am/
171a5(dkon brtsegs): bu me'i glata ma 'am/gtum gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o//byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/
171a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig la byon pa dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi badra ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag
171a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bsdus te rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na/nod kyi phung po de tsam dang /bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni/des rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
171b1(dkon brtsegs): la snying brtse ba'am/phan gdags par mi 'gyur gyi/de'i tshogs bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste/de yang de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam
171b2(dkon brtsegs): de kho nar zad kyi/re shig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang /de ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas pa dang /phan 'dogs pa dang /snying brtse ba chos shin tu mang du byed pa yino//byams
171b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas/sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te/'jig rten pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing /ji tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par brtson
171b4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa la ltos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa 'di ltar gser ram dngul lam/nor bu dag gam/rin po che dag gam/mu tig dag gam/bai tAr+ya dag gam/dung dag gam/man shel
171b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gam/byi ru dag gam/bde ba'i yo byad dag gis na/sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongasu thar par mi 'gyur/sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nang rnams
171b6(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur/sems can rga ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa'i chos can rnams
171b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang rga ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa dag las yongasu thar par mi 'gyur gyi/chos thos pas ni sa ngas
172a1(dkon brtsegs): can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang /skye ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur la/sems can na ba'i chos can rnams nang rnams las yongasu thar par 'gyur/sems can /
172a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yang mi bde ba dag 'khrug po'i chos can rnams kyang /'khrug pa las yongasu thar par
172a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i phyir te/de dag las dgongs te/de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad ces//stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis//bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni//tshig
172a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig brjod pas//de ltar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin//phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gi/'jig rten gsum ni sems can tha~Md
172a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi//bde ba gang dag yang pa de dag kun//sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas//gang gis de la sangs rgyas lugs kyi ni//tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig
172a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs na//de ni shin tu phan 'dogs mchog yin te//des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur zhes ston to//byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
172a7(dkon brtsegs): yos mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyi rab tu bkang ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul 'phul ba bas ni/snying rje chen po bskyed de/sems can gcig la tshig bzhi
172b1(dkon brtsegs): mang pa mam bas/thasamamam/sas macams mtham/a macan thas caH/tham mamathamamam mamanyam yam kas ma/ma tham mal yas ma yas pam yamaH tham mams tatsa

172b3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen khams mchog rin chen gang byas te//dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang //gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs bcang byin//rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen des//

172b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil ni bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu 'thun pas
172b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na/phyag g.yas pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu
172b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par mdzad nas/sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrub par mdzad cing /zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/skom 'dong ba rnams lan skom/gos 'dod
172b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ni gos/rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams/gang ci 'dod pa de la sbyin par yang yod mod kyi/de tsam gyis sems can de ngag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med
173a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nas/chu sbyin 'dzin khri'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar par mi 'gyur bas/byams pa nga ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par spangs nas/'jig rten
173a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i bde ba chos rin po che yang dge bar ston par mdzad de/de thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//byams pa de lta bas na khyed
173a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang nga'i rjesu bslab par bya zhing /khyed zang zing la gdu bar mi bya'i/khyed chos gos la gdu bar bya'o//byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub
173a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab po'i tshe na/byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur to//de dag ni ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /lus ma bsdams pa da /
173a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag ma bsdams pa dang /yid ma bsdams pas sdig pa'i las lhag par spyad nas kyang /nyes pa bshags pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems kyi/phyin chad sdom par yang mi
173a6(dkon brtsegs): byed la/phyi ched yang dag par bsdam pa'i phyir yang mi byed do//ngas ni sngon byas pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir/phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin na/de la
173a7(dkon brtsegs): mi blun po de dag ni lhag par ltung ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas nas/nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing /phyin chad sdom par
173b1(dkon brtsegs): ni mi byed do//byams pa gzhan yang ngas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa nga'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi las yongasu bsal ba byas pa na/mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ni byang chub
173b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba'am/dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/dbul por skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan tu yang ltung bar nus mod kyi/'on kyang
173b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas ni myur du byed par byas shing /'joms mdog dang ldan pa dang /bslab pa 'dod pa dang /'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lte ba dang /rtag tu yid skyo ba dang /
173b4(dkon brtsegs): srod par 'gro ba'i skye ba'i gnas thams cad lo yid skrag par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag brgal nas/khyed cag thams cad bsgral par bya'o//
173b5(dkon brtsegs): grol nas dgrol bar bya'o//dbugs byin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o//yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/sems can thams cad nye bar gzung po'i phyir
173b6(dkon brtsegs): te/byams pa ngas ni lho dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/byang chub
173b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i las ji snyed pa dang /khur ji snyed pa dang /dgongs pa ji snyed pa dang /don bya ba ji snyed pa dang /bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed ni/sems can 'ga' la yang ma mthong ngo //byams pa
174a1(dkon brtsegs): /'di lta ste dpe na/la la zhig gos stong gsum gyi spyod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/brag dang /ri dang /rgya mtsho dang /chu klung dang /nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di mi la la
174a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig gi spyi bo'am/phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste/'di skad ces kyi skyes bu khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/brag dang /ri dang /rgya mtsho dang /chu klung dang /
174a3(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag pa 'am/bskal pa brgya 'am/bskal pa stong ngam/bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du gdog par mi bya zhing bzhag
174a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya/ngal bso bar mi bya'o zhes kyang bsgo na/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/mi de'i khur che ba dang /spro ba mthu dang ldan pa dang /mthu stobs mthu dang ldan pa dang /brtson
174a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa mthu dang ldan pa lag so//bcom ldan
174a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/byams pa khyod mos par bya/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/byams bde ba kyang gang zhig gis kyi sems can rnams ngas khyed cag mya ngan las
174a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes/sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i khur dang spro ba dang /mthu stobs dang /brtson 'grus ches stobs
174b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par blta bar bya'o//byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/mi la la zhig gi las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las ji tsam pa
174b2(dkon brtsegs): de tsam du gyur/deso sems can thams cad kyi las de dag kyang de se gol togs pa gcig tsam gyis yongasu sgrub par byed cing /las kyi mtha' 'ga' tsam yang yongasu nyams par ma
174b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/mi de'i las stobs dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags
174b4(dkon brtsegs): te/bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa stobs dang ldan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa khyod mos par bya/khyod kyis
174b5(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya ste/byams pa de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'di skadadu/bdag gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las dgrol bar bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod
174b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/lasu bya bar byed pa de ches stobs dang ldan pa yin no//byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/khyim bdag la la zhig la bu gcig pa sdug pa phangs pa/yid du 'ong ba mthong na mi mthun pa
174b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhig bdog par gyur la/khyim bdag de nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi le lan gyis bu gcig pa dang bcas/chung ma dang bcas/las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang bcas/nor dang
175a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyig dang /yo byad thams cad bcas te/rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par gyur cing /de nas rgyal po des khyim bdag de la 'di skad du kwa'i khyim bdag khyod 'di nas dpag
175a2(dkon brtsegs): tshad 'bum gyi pha rol na/grong khyer che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig yod par don 'di'i phyir/zhag bdun gyis phyin par song la cha khyer de phyir yang zhag bdun gyis 'i drung du phyin par shog shig dang /
175a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta na ngas khyod kyi bu gcig pa 'di dang /chung ma 'di dang /'khor 'di dag thams cad dang /nor dbyig dang /yo byad 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la phyir sbyin par bya zhing /gzhan yang
175a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgyal srid phyed kyi sbyin pa yang lhag par sbyin par bya'o//gal te khyod song nas grong khyer de nas cha blangs te/nyin mtshan bdun gyis phyir ma 'ongs na/khyod la chung zad kyang
175a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par mi bya ba'i steng du/khyod bu gcig pa dang bcas/chung ma dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te/srog dang dpral zhing bsad par bya'o zhes bsgo bar gyur na/byams pa 'di ji snyam du
175a6(dkon brtsegs): sems/khyim bdag de de skad bsgo ba na/bdag phad pa dang ldan pa dang /bu phangs pa dang ldan pa dang /chung ma phangs pa dang ljon pa dang /'khor phangs pa dang ldan pa dang /nor phangs
175a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pas/stobs dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa dang /stobs dang ldan pa'i mgyogs pas grong khyer der 'gro bar 'gyur snyam 'am/byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta
175b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so//bde bar gshegs pa da lta lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/de ni don de yongasu ma grub kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar
175b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dgyid zas kyi 'du shes bskyed par mi bgyid/rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sems bskyed par mi bgyid lagaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de'i slad pha rol gyi dngos po gzhan
175b3(dkon brtsegs): dag lta zhog lags kyi/bdag nyid phangs pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa gal te sems can thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang ldan
175b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur kyang /sems can de dag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po de ni/byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po de'i brgya'i char yang mi 'gro/stong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /bye/
175b5(dkon brtsegs): bapa'i tshe dang /bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang /bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de ci'i
175b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' na rgyun phyogasu dad pa'i sems can thams cad rgyun las bzlog pa/g.yo ba med pa/mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu rab tu dgod
175b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir ro//byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/mi 'di tsam du stobs dang ldan pa ming 'di tsam du shugs dang ldan pa 'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa 'di tsam du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa
176a1(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig skyes par gyur la/des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po de dag na/chu'i phung po gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgyu
176a2(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas rgyu las bzlog/thams cad kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du phang par
176a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/mi de dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba dang /brtson 'a grus che ba yin snyam 'am/byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de
176a4(dkon brtsegs): lta lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa de lta lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa khyod mos par bya/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/de bas kyang gang
176a5(dkon brtsegs): drag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun bskyed nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/nan tan
176a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar tshwa ba yin no//de bas kyang gang sangs rgyas yod do//chos yod do//dge 'dun yod do//legs
176a7(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa dang /nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes/nges par rtog par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba
176b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no//dbas kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang /zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang /gti mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag chas
176b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba yin no//de bas kyang gang dag mdza' bshes dang /grogs dang nye du dang /rgan rabs rnams la mi lta bar spangaso shing /longs spyod chung ngu dang /
176b3(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongasu spangs nas/legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyi/khyim gyis gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byang
176b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba yin no//de bas kyang gang dag gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas
176b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar tsha ba yin no//de bas kyang gang dag de ltar rab tu byung nas/gdams ngag la nan tan
176b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mdzes par byed pa dang /bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag la slob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba yin no//de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam
176b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'jigs par lta zhing /dben pa 'dod pas dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te/gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar tsha ba yin no//de bas
177a1(dkon brtsegs): mang mam/sas ma nyamasamasaca/sa macan thas nams asmas yasam ma
177a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba yino//de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su
177a3(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba yino//de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon sum du byas nas rgyun tu zhugs
177a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'bras bu rjesu thob par byed pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' bar byed pa dang /ngo mtshar che ba yino//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
177a5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di lta ste/'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang /rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs dge slong gi dngos po dang 'bras bu thob pa de ni shin tu dka' ba yin pa'i
177a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro//byams pa de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi mi'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la legs par
177a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas/byang chub sems dpa'i las spangs te/byis pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/byams pa de la
177a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/de dag yongasu ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
177b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying por 'gro bang mi nuso//nyi shu gang zhe na/ser sna'i sems cher gcad par bya ba dang /gtong ba chen po sbrel bar bya ba dang /'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongasu spang bar bya ba dang /tshul khrims
177b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba dang /gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam par spang bar bya ba dang /bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang /le lo'i sems rnam par mnan par bya ba dang /
177b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya ba dang /brjed ngas pa'i sems yong su spang bar bya ba dang /dran pa dang blo gros dang /bsam gtan rnams la mi brten par bsam gtan du bya ba dang /zab
177b4(dkon brtsegs): mo la bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang /mtshan ma med pas gnas par bya ba dang /
177b5(dkon brtsegs): smon pa dang bral ba dang /smon pa med pa'i yul yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad yongasu mi btang bar bya ba dang /snying rje chen pos gnas par bya ba dang /nyan thos dang /
177b6(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dga' ba'i sems yid la mi bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nur med pa dang /yid ches par bya ba ste/byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang
177b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te/las de dag yongasu ma rdzogs na/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus//byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/byang chub
178a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dam bca' ba yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong ba dang /chos kyis ngoms mi shes pa dang /chos yongasu tshol bas
178a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o//sems can rnams 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa las thar par bya'o//sems can gyi khams tshang
178a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bzhug par bya'o zhes yang dag par dam bca' ba ste/byams pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
178a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par dam bca' bo yin no//byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/mi sman mkhas la gsang sngags mkhas shing dug drang rtsi la mkhas pa gnyis
178a5(dkon brtsegs): shig yod par gyur la/de gnyis las mi gcig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/dug za bar byed cing zos nas kyang yan lag dang
178a6(dkon brtsegs): nyi lag rnams shig shig por gyur pas/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa las/yang gsang sngags sngon du btang ba'i sman zla bar byed cing /de gsang sngags yang dag
178a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sman des dug gi nyes pa de dag dang bral bar gyur la/de nas mi des dus gzhan gyi tshe na sman di ma rnyed cing ginyen po ma rnyed cing gnyen po ma rnyed pas/dug des shi ba
178b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/de nas mi cig shos des 'di skad ces smras te/kha bsna ni sman gyis dug zhi bar byed nus mod kyi/'on kyang kho bo la ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi dgos/yan lag dang nying lag shig shig
178b2(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur ba mi dgongs pas/dug kyang mi za sman yang mi 'thung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du/byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang /
178b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba kha cig 'di skad ces sdig pa'i las ni nyes pa bshags pas ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing /de dag sdig pa mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du shes nas yang bshags
178b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes/ltung ba lhag par 'byin par byed cing /phyis sdom pa 'dzin par ni mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag ni 'chi ba'i chos can yin no zhes nga smra ste/'chi ba yang gang
178b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/dug za ba'i mi de dang 'dra bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/log par ltung ba rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no//byams pa byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa
178b6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/'di skad ces bdag cag la dug kyang mi dgos sman yang mi dgos kyis/bdag cag ni 'das pa'i dus na sdig pa'i las byas
178b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zad par bya ba dang /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba na mngon par 'du mi bya ba ma gtog pa sdig pa'i las kyang mi bya zhing /ltung ba yang 'byung bar mi bya la/bshags par yang mi bya'o//
179a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes zer te/byams pa 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'dri la drug ces bya ba de ni/'di lta ste bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag las 'da' bar byed pa yin pas khyed
179a2(dkon brtsegs): tsug gis ni dug bza' bar mi bya'o//byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams
179a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na/byang chub sems dpes lta smos kyang ci dgos/bzhi gang zhe na/byas pa mi bzo pa nyid dang /g.yo la brton pa nyid dang /
179a4(dkon brtsegs): brdzun gyi tshig smra ba nyid dang /bslab pa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid yin te/bzhi po de dag ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod
179a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te/de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/byams pa byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi
179a6(dkon brtsegs): po'od dag las dpag tshad brgyar 'grol bar bya ste/ba ni gtsun na/rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /tshig su bcad pa dang /sdig pa'i sgrogs po'i log pa dang /'du 'dzi'i gnas dang
179a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas gang na gnas pa na/byang chub sems da pe'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la/gal te de dang lhan cig tu mgu ba dang /dga' ba dang mchog tu
179b1(dkon brtsegs): dgal ba smyos la//'thab pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /rtsod pa med pa dang ldan par gnas nan/des der gnas par bya'o//gal te de de la ba na pa dang na sdang gi sems gar+b+ha gyu
179b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig bskyod par byed na yang /des de nas de dag chang brgyar 'byol bar bye ste/byang chub sems dpas ni byang chub sems dpa' la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o//
179b3(dkon brtsegs): byams po byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad spyos sam
179b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa 'am/dbyig pas brdegs sam/mtshon gyis btab par gyur nA byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' des sems can ji snyed cig la smyos pa'am/
179b5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa 'am/dbyig pas brdegs pa 'am/mtshon gyis btab pa'i gzhi de las sdig pa dang /smras pa dang nyams pa mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam 'am/byams pas
179b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig cig lnga spyos snyam/brgyad pa 'am/dbyig pas brdegs sam/mtshon gyis btab nu yang bsod nams mo lags pa
179b7(dkon brtsegs): mang du bskyed lags ni/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa thams cad la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang
180a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas ni sems can 'ga' tsam la yang tha ba dang /zhe sdang dang /gnod sems bskyed par mi bgyi ba'i slad du'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan
180a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems
180a3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad spyos sam/brgyad pa'am/dbyig pas brdegs sam/mtshon gyis btab pa gang yin pa des ni/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la tha na tha ba dang /zhe
180a4(dkon brtsegs): sdang gis sems gcig tsam zhig bskyed par gyur pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de smras pa dang /nyams par mi 'gyur te/byams pa byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
180a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gcig shos de la tha ba dang /zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par byed na/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub yongasu mi gtong ba zhig yin na/sems ji snyed bskyed pa de kho na'i
180a6(dkon brtsegs): bskul par byang chub kyi phyir yang go cha bgo bar bya dgos so//byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/lcags ni lcags nyid kyis gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par bong ba 'am/shing ngam rnas
180a7(dkon brtsegs): gcod par mi nus pa de bzhin du/byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub sems dpa' gcig shos la/tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas zad par byed pa
180b1(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par gzhan gyis zod par mi 'gyur te/byams pa de lta bas na khyed cag gis gcig la gcig zhes dang bcas pa dang /gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o zhes
180b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bslab par bya zhed sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
180b3(dkon brtsegs): po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la yang zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bgyis lags na/byang chub
180b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal ba de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnod sems la dpa' bar mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni bzod pa'i stobs dang /mthu phun sum
180b5(dkon brtsegs): tshegs par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni g.yo la brten par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
180b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi khyim la lhag par chags par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /yong su 'dzin pa ma mchis par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing
180b7(dkon brtsegs): lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni chos gyur len par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zas dang /gos lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni pa'i nor yongasu tshol ba
181a1(dkon brtsegs): bgying pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni phrag dag dang /ser snas kun nas dkris par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni gzhan gyi 'byor pa dag la yod dga' ba dang /
181a2(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dge sbyong gi ming lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni dge sbyong gi yon tan dag la slob par bgyid pa
181a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smra ba lhur len par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni sgrub pa'i stong por bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnyed pa dang /bkur bste la lhag par chags par
181a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni don nyung ba dang /bgyi ba nyung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongasu tshol bar bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems
181a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyud kyis grong dang grong khyer du 'jug par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yid la bgyid pe la mngon par brtson pas grong dang grong khyer du 'jug par
181a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi slad du tshul 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni tshul 'chos pa ma mchis pa dang /'phags pa'i rigs/
181a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhis chog shes par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byis pa'i spyod pa la slob par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la slob par bgyid pa dang /bcom
181b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma//sa a masam tham/sa rba chaH/tha sa mas yam kaHmaya yas nyam gas/
181b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan dag gi bgyid pa dang /ma bgyis po dag la so sor rtog par mi bgyis kyi/bdag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang /zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjesu brtson pas gnas par bgyid pa dang /
181b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ltung ba 'ga' yang gleng bar mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni ngag gi las kyi mtha' sdom par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bslab pa thag ring du mi bgyid
181b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi /bdag ni so sor thar pa la slob par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi bsngags pas 'tshe bar sems par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni/
181b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod cing de la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bgyid pa dang /bdag ni chos kyi bsngags pa brjod cing chos kyi rje su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub pa la gnas par bgyid
181b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bdag ni dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la brten par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzhan gyis mthong ba bskyed pa'i sla du tshul
181b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chos pas mchi ma 'byin par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byin par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyi ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis spags te gnas
181b8(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni chos yongasu tshol ba la mngon par brtson par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba la dga' bar mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni 'jig rten
182a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i chos yongasu tshol ba la dgar bar bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni cho ga 'jog gi zas dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni tshul 'chos pa
182a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par kun du spyod par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnas dang yul gcig yongasu 'dzin par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni ri dgas ltar kun tu rgyu bar bgyid pa dang /
182a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsod snyoms la sbyor bar rje su brtson par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongasu tshol ba la brtson par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan
182a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni rmugs pa dang /gnyid kyis nyal bar mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni nem gyi cha stod dang /nom gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjesu brtson par bgyid pa dang /bcom
182a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni 'du 'dzi'i spyod yul la brtson par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni dben pa la dga' bar bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan chung zad tsam gyis
182a6(dkon brtsegs): chog shes par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni yon tan yongasu tshol bas ngoms ma 'tshal bar bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khyi'i chos rnams la kun tu spyod par mi
182a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kyi/bdag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni cung zad ba shes pa dang ldan par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni mdza' bshes shin tu brtan par
182b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bgyis pa mi bzo bar mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni bgyis pa bza ba dang /bgyis pa tshor bar bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sbyin pa'i
182b2(dkon brtsegs): lan gyis mdza' ba shesu mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mdza' ba shes su bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bcos mar mi bgyid
182b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi/bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dman pa la mos par mi bgyid kyi/bdag na sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu 'grub pa lhur
182b4(dkon brtsegs): blang ba rgya chen paM la mos par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa me mchis pa dang /bslab pa la gus pa ma mchis par mi bgyid kyi/
182b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni dri bzhin gshegs pA la gus pa dang bcas pa dang /bslab pa la gus pa dang bcas par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems kyang gzhan la/smra ba yang
182b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa'i lce gnyis su mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul 'tshes pa'i byang chub sems dpar mi bab+hid kyi/
182b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /bdag nyid dul ba dang /zhi ba la sbyor ba'i rje su brtson par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nga rgyal gyis rgyal
183a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyod par mi bgyid kye/byadag ni gdol pa'i bu dang 'dra bar nga rgyal nges par 'jom par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chags pa dang bcas pas
183a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms yongasu longs spyod par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang /dad pas stsal ba la lci ba'i 'du shes su bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
183a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i rnam par rtog par yid la bgyid pa sngon du btang bas/gdugs ma thag kho nar mchis nyal ba dang /rmugs pa dang /gnyid kyi bar du zil gyis
183a4(dkon brtsegs): gnon par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgrub par bgyid pa'i slad du/rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor bar bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag tu lta
183a5(dkon brtsegs): ba la brten par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas par bya'i gyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rnam par rtog pa dang /'khrul pa smra bar mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni mtshan ma
183a6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa la gnas par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni tshul 'chos par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yong su dag par bgyid pa dang /
183a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zang zing gis bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis chos ston par mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos ston par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan
183b1(dkon brtsegs): 'o'angs bdag ni zang zong gi sbyin pas/mdza' bshosu mi bgyid kyi bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas mdzar bshes su bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag dang gzhan la yongasu gdung bar
183b2(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid kyi/bdag ni bdog la sman pa dang /gzhan la sman pa'i slad du bsgrub par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dgon par gnas pa la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/bsod
183b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid/phyag dar khrod la tshul 'chos par mi bgyid de/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bdag gi sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par blangs te/gnas par
183b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing /de yang rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /tshigasu bcad pa thams cad la brten pa ma mchis pa'i slanga'o//nga skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
183b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/byams pa legaso legaso//khyod ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongasu tshol ba la brtson pa de ltar seng ge'i sgra 'di sgrogs
183b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa/khyod sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /chos de dag dang /yon tan de dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin te/legaso legs so//
183b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'odi bshad pa na/'khor de nas dge slong lnga brgya bstan las langs te dong ngo //de nas gnas brtan 'od
184a1(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//dge slong chen po dag khyed cag yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam brjod pa'i tshe stan las langs te gar 'dang /de skad
184a2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa dang /gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la dge slong lnga brgya po de dag gis 'od skad ces smras so//btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
184a3(dkon brtsegs): pas yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam de lta bu bstan pa'i gnas pa de dag ni srid par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag 'di snyam du/bdag cag yo byad bsnyungs pa'i yon tan de dag la
184a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi snang bas bdag cag phyir khyim du 'dong gor ma chag go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dad pas byin pa ni reg par dka' zhing sbyangs par dka' ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa'i
184a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/dge slong de dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/rigs kyi bu dag legaso legaso//ga bdag dang pas byin pa la yongasu longs spyod
184a6(dkon brtsegs): pabar mi spro ba dag gis ni/de ltar mdzem pa dang ldan pa dang /mgyod pa dang ldan par bya ste/nyin gcig la lan brgya ran tu byung ba phyir spangs pa ni bla'i/tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pas dang
184a7(dkon brtsegs): pas byin pa la yongs su spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das lo 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis
184b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ya yamasan/thamaH/sa a mams ma thaH/a macaH thas natha/Shas nathathamamam am kham tham mal sa/ as ma mam mas
184b2(dkon brtsegs): dang sprul ba ji ltar rjes gnang bar mdzad pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal ngas ni rigs pa dang /gral ba la dang bas byin pa rje su gnang ngo //de nas 'jam
184b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge sbyong lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smra so//tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sbyor cig rtsol cig 'bod cig/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/khyed
184b4(dkon brtsegs): cag rab tu byung ba las phyir ma ldog shig/de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la dge slong lnga brgya rnam po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras//'jam dpal bdag cag gis ji ltar sbyor
184b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid lags/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/dge slong dag khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar sbyor ba dang /'bad pa dang /rtsol bar byed pa na/chos 'ga' yang sbyor bar mi byed/chos 'ga' yang byed pa
184b6(dkon brtsegs): mimebyed pa dang /chos 'ga' yang skyed par mi byed/chos 'ga' yang 'gog par mi byed po dang /chos 'ga' yang thob par mi byed/chos 'ga' yang sbyong bar mi byed pa dang /chos 'ga' yang
184b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bri bar mi byed/chos 'gru' yang 'phel bar mi byed pa de ltar sbyor bar gyis shig/dge slong gang de ltar sbyor ba de ni chos 'ga' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro//gang chos
184b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ger yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gang yang mo 'gro/gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo //gang la 'gro ba med pa de la ni rang ba yang dga' yang mad do//de ni 'ong ba med pa dang /'gro ba med pa
185a1(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong zhes bya ste/gang du yang rten pa yang ma yin/mi rten pa yang ma yin no//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/dge slong lnga brgya po de dag len pa med par dag pa las
185a2(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe srung ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la
185a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'ches pa ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pas yongasu zin cing /lhag
185a4(dkon brtsegs): bo'i bsam pa nyam chung ste/zas dang gos lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dag ni mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'ong
185a5(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du gnas gang dag dang /spyod pa gang dag gis byang chub sems
185a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba dang /tshul 'chos pa legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag lags pa legs par bshad du gsol/de ci'i slad zhe na/bcom
185a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas pa de dag thos na/byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gang dag lags pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyi bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i slang
185b1(dkon brtsegs): du'o//da//da ces gsolnga pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od srung phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i ngas lnga brgya pa tha ma de la/byang chub
185b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pas yongasu zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /phye
185b3(dkon brtsegs): ma dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan dang /mar mo'i sbyin pa dag gis mchod pa'i las la brten par 'gyur//
185b4(dkon brtsegs): 'odo srung ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin na/mi blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur te/'od srung ngas lha
185b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dge slong dag khyed cag ni bdag nyid du la ba dang /zhi bar sbyor ba'i rje su brtson pas gnus par gyis shig/bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang pang
185b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag yod na/de dag ni nga'i sku gdung rnams la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro//zhes de skad gsung na/'od srung mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor kyang spangs/spong ba yang
185b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs/lung nod pa yang spangs/kha don bye ba yang spangs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchong pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur zhing /de dag la brten nas 'tsho bar
186a1(dkon brtsegs): sems byur byung pa de dag la lhas/'od srung byung chub sems dpa' gang gis spyong gsum gyi sbyong rgan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyu'i phung po nas
186a2(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste/tshungs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du 'i'ablo mar gyis yongasu bkang ste/mar ma'i snying po ri rab rgya ma bcu byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
186a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las kyi phyir mAr me bus pa byas ni/byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa gcig shos kyis ma na
186a4(dkon brtsegs): bo'am slob dpon gyi drung nas/tshig bzhi po'i tshig su bcang pa gcig lung mnos te/ba den byed cing gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de/de bas ches bas
186a5(dkon brtsegs): narnams myed du skyes par 'gyur ro//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong ga sum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od me tog dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma
186a6(dkon brtsegs): dudang /spos kyis rab tu bkang ste/de bzhin gau shegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi b+hair/lo 'dzum gyi bAr du ts+tshin lan ga sum mtshan ldan gsum phul ba bas ni byang chub
186a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpar 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa gzhan zhig khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs shing sems can gyis don mngon par bsgrub po na
186b1(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te/gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro//'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/de
186b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas kyil ka'i tshad dam/brjod pa'i ched du de skad gsungs pa ma yin grang snyam na/'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni nga la mngon sum
186b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir ro//'od srung sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa grangs med pa dang /chos grangs med pa dang /ches shin tu grangs med pa dang /rgya che ba dang /tshad med
186b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /dpag tu med pa dag byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog
186b5(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs shes bya ba/rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
186b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po ni bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu gyur to//
186b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus na/gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa/chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung bar gyur te/'od srung rgyal po mu khyud de la bu
187a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brtul phod pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yod par gyur to//'od srung rgyal po mu khyud de'i bu
187a2(dkon brtsegs): stong po de dag gi rjes la de'i phang bar chos shes bya ba dang /chos bzang zhes bya ba'i khye'u gnyis shig brdzus te skyes par gyur to//'od srung rgyal po mu khyud des/bcom ldan
187a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la/lo brgya khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par khyim gyi yid la byed
187a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad spangs te/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims tsha dang /gdan dang /bsnyun gyi gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/dge slong gi
187a5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun rnams la yang zhag bdun bdun 'das shing /chos gos yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang phu lo//gang dang gang ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag la kha
187a6(dkon brtsegs): zas kyi rnam pa yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang phul lo//gang dang gang dag ji lta ji lta bu 'dod pa de dang de dag gis gtsug lag khang yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang rtsig
187a7(dkon brtsegs): tu bcug go//dge slong re re la yang chags dang /skyed mos tshal dang /bsnyen bkur ba bdun bdun dang /ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas dag kyang phul lo//'od srung 'di ltar
187b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mu khyud des/khang bzang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad cu yod pa/ngos bzhi khang mig can shin tu 'brel ba/bkra ba blta na sdug pa/legs par byas pa/shin tu zin pang
187b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/'khrul 'khor gyi srad bus yongasu sbyang ba byas pa dag kyang byed du bcug ste/gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag khang bzangs de dag na bzhugs
187b3(dkon brtsegs): po de'i tshe/'khrul 'khor gyi srad bu de dag shugs kyis khang bzangs de dag gi steng nas me tog kha dog rnam pa du ma'i char dag kyang 'bab po//me tog de dag gis khang bzang ba de dag
187b4(dkon brtsegs): pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to//'od srung de ltar rgyal po mu khyud des/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la/lo brgyad khri bzhi
187b5(dkon brtsegs): stong rdzogs kyi bar du yon tan bkod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas so//'od
187b6(dkon brtsegs): srung de nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'das pa'i phyir de nyin par/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa lags pa'i 'og tu/khye'u chos dang chos bzang
187b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dang btsas te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna
188a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs de'i spyan sngar btud nas/de bzhin gshegs pa d+ma la yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yong su zhus so//bcom ldan 'das rgyal dro mu khyud 'dis yun ring ba 'di
188a2(dkon brtsegs): srid du/dge ba'i rtsa ba baspyan po rnam pa mang po 'di lta bu thams cad zil gyis non cing /yongasu gtugs ste gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang /bsod nams dang longs spyod dang /
188a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam/'od srung de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis gtugs ma thag tu/de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
188a4(dkon brtsegs): de rab tu g.yos shing /'jig rten dus g.yos pa chen po yang byung bar gyur to//'od srung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i bsnyen bkur ba
188a5(dkon brtsegs): thub dka' zhes bya ba zhig yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de stan las langs te/chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lte nga sa la btsugs te/bcom
188a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
188a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dis 'jig rten dogs cher g.yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang lags ci'i slad du ni//khye'u 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs par
188b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur lags/'od srung de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu gtam de lta bu
188b2(dkon brtsegs): yingasu zhus pas khyod la ci bye/gal te dro bzhin gshegs pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu dang /zab mo la bzod pa bsgom pa ji lta bu dang /snying rje chen po ji
188b3(dkon brtsegs): bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa'i gnas de bshad par gyur na/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di rmongs par 'gyu ro///bam po gsum pa//'od srung
188b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des/nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/sred med kyi bu khyod ljongs la khye'u 'di
188b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis slong ste/rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ston cig/'od srung de nas dge slong srid med kyi bu des de las khye'u gcig lag pa g.yas pas blangs la/khye'u gcig shos log pa
188b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yon pas blangs te gyen du 'phang du snyam na gdag par ma nus//des yang rgya cher mthu dang stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /spro ba dang rdzu 'phrul chen po yang dag par bstan cing gye nang
188b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phang ngo snyam na/tha na de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang bskyod pa'am bskul bar ma nus//'od srung de ltar des khye'u de gnyis shin tu gyen du 'bang bar bskyed pa na/stong
189a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams drug dang ri dang /rtswa dang shing dang /chu dang bcas pa de rab tu g.yos shing bla 'og tu 'gul bar gyur kyang khye'u de//
189a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis bslang bar ni ma nus//'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe/nyan thos chen po de'i sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba dang /rdzu
189a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar bsgrubs pa des dge slong sred med kyi bu des 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed
189a4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'gul ba dang g.yos pa dang /rab tu 'khrugs pa dang bla 'og tu 'gul bar byas kyang /tha na khye'u de gnyis skye'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g.yo ba 'am 'gul
189a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed mi nus//'od srung de nas dge slong sred mod kyi bu des bcom ldan 'das de dezhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshigs de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/de
189a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa me tig sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongasu nyams pa 'am/gcig tu
189a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur lags grang /de ci'i srid zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis khye'u skyes nas ring po ma lags pa/byis pa'i gzugasu mchis pa/lus bong chub
189b1(dkon brtsegs): du'adi gnyis kyis dog sa la gtugs pa yang bslang bar rngo ma thog pa'i slad du'o//de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des/dge
189b2(dkon brtsegs): slong sred med kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sred med kyi bu khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongasu ma nyams mod kyi 'on kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs
189b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas de ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par dkrugs pa'am/bsam par slab ma yin te/sred med kyi bu gal te stong
189b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste dper na ngas da ltar khyod nyid nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi bstan pa
189b5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan par gyur cing /de tsam du rdzu 'phrul tsha ba dang de tsam du mthu che ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis/bskal pa bye ba snyed du rdzu 'phrul
189b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa su tshogs dge gi rnam par 'phrul pa byas kyang /de dag gi khye'u 'di gnyis bslang ba 'am bskul bar mi nuso//'od srung de ltar de bzhi ni gshegs
189b7(dkon brtsegs): pa me tog sna tshogs des tshig de skad smras pa ni/'khor de las srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
190a1(dkon brtsegs): bskrad cing /de dag 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs shing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa/
190a2(dkon brtsegs): kho na yin yang /gong la nyan thos chen po 'di dag brdugs par byos te/bkang ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu dang ljon pa de ni ngo mtshar te/bdag cag gis kyang byin gyi brlas de lta
190a3(dkon brtsegs): bathob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thob par bya'o snyam du sems shing /de ltar yang dge bar shes pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag
190a4(dkon brtsegs): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba
190a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pud mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sA la btsugs nas/bcom
190a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gyi/shegs bra me tig sna tshogs g.yo ba de log smra dul mo sbyar ba btud nas/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
190a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bslangs par mdzad cing khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhum pa rab tu rnam par dbya ba yang bstan du gas la/'di srung de nas de bzhin gshi
190b1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' pam mamacamathamam/sas macamasam sama.a na caH tha sa rbaH/thas mthamam yamakhas tamamatham/mams maya am tham ma
190b2(dkon brtsegs): pa me tog sna tshogs dus de'i tshe skye gol gyi sgra mdzad ta/sa gol gyi sgra dus phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhang gang+gA'i klung gri bye ma stong dag tu mngon par grags par gyur to//
190b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji skad du se gol gyi sgra mngon par grags par gyur pa de skad kho na rnam pa drug tu g.yos par yang gyur to//ji snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur pa de snyed
190b4(dkon brtsegs): na snang ba chen pos yongasu khyab par gyur to//'od srung de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis sgra de thos nas de bzhini gshegs pa de'i zhabs kyi drung nas langs par gyur te/'od srung khye ru de gnyis
190b5(dkon brtsegs): langs par gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/lha dang mi'i sil snyan gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ma gsil ma bkrol bar rol mo'i sgra dag
190b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byin par gyur cing /me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to//'od srung de nas khye'u de gnyis langs nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal
190b7(dkon brtsegs): teto/de bzhin gshegs pa de la bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa de'o zhal du lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me
190b8(dkon brtsegs): tog sna tshogs des byang chub sems dpa'o blo gros bzang po la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga'i zhabs kyi drung du gtugs nas/nga la
191a1(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yongasu zhus te/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po mu khyud 'dis sbyin par byang mchos kyi sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa gang lags pa dang /dag
191a2(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /yongasu gtong ba gang lags pa zil gyis gnon cang yongasu gtugs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa mchis lags sam/yongasu gtong ba mchis lags
191a3(dkon brtsegs): sam/dge ba'i rtsa ba mchis lags sam zhes khye'u 'di gnyis nga la zhu ba 'di skad ces yongasu zhus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so//'od srung de
191a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po des 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la
191a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang /'jig rten la zhugs brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /sman pa dang /bde ba'i slad du khye'u 'di gnyis kyis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis
191a6(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/'od srung gis de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs nges byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
191a7(dkon brtsegs): to//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o//rigs kyi bu rgyal po mu khyud 'dis bsod nams kyi sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba gang yin de de bas byang chub sems dpeng
191b1(dkon brtsegs): dben par gnas pa zhig dgon pa dang /rab tu dgon pa na gnas shing se gol btogs pa tsam zhig chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o zhes bzod pa thob pa gang yin pa de bsod nams kyi phung po
191b2(dkon brtsegs): ches che bar rig par bya'o//rigs kyi du rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa lta zhog gi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji tsam sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa'i
191b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag thams cad las sems can re res kyang so so nas/rgyal po mu khyud 'di'i sbyin pa ji snyed pa de snyed cig byin par gyur na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu
191b4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pa yang dag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/yang dag pa'i lam du
191b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa tshul bzhin la rab tu brtson pa zhig chos thams cad stong pa dang /'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa zhes bya bar se gol togs pa tsam zhig bzod cing gnas par gyur na/ses
191b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des ni se gol togs pa tsam zhig bzod pa la gnas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//steng gi Na dang /
191b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dum gyi cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang /bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang /bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi cha dang /grang ba dang /cha dang /

192a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dpe de lta bu mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de bsam par yang sla ba ma lags pas/bsam gyis mi
192b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa lagaso//'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod mos par bya
192b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/nakhas pa mngon par sbyang bar byas pa/zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni 'di la mos par 'gyur te/sems can de
192b3(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring ba de srid du mngon par 'dus byas pa de tsam du dpag tu med cing /de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa sems can de dag thams cad
192b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma de ni khye'u 'di gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa gang gis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs shing phyag 'tshal ba 'di'i brgya'i

192b7(dkon brtsegs): pa me tog sna tshogs de'i dge slong gi dge 'dun las/dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bstan pa 'di thos nas tshig mthun par rje su yi rang ba'i tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/bcom/
