193a2(dkon brtsegs): dben pa la dga' zhing dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te gom pa bdun 'dor bar bgyid pa dang /gang dag ye shes de lta bu yongasu bsgrub par bgyi ba'i skad bla na med pa yang dag
193a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rje su yid rang ngo zhes rje su yang rang ba'i chog brjod par gyur to//'od srung de nas de bzhi
193a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des/dge slong de dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus rje su yi rang ba'i tshig de lta
193a5(dkon brtsegs): dag brjod pa legs leg so//gal te khyed cag gi sems dag rnam par grol bar ma gyur du zin na ni/khyed cag dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal bri dag
193a6(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed byed du bcug nas/bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro//de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po
193a7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'khor de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag dang gang dag la
193b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad stong pa dang /dben pa dang nye bar zhi ba dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /rang bzhin ma mchis par glo ba ches pa mchis pa dang /bzod pa ma mchis pa dang /mos
193b2(dkon brtsegs): pa mchis pa de dag la yang rje su yid rang lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/'od srung de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
193b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/sbyin pa la
193b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar yang mi bgyid la/ser sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang /kun 'dzin pa'i sems ma mchis pa dang /gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing stsol bar bgyid pa de dag mthong
193b5(dkon brtsegs): na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par mi bgyid pa dang /gong du yang 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyis gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /zab mo la bzod
193b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang lnga na bar 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par yang bgyid lags 'od srung /de skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs
193b7(dkon brtsegs): des khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi byed la/
194a1(dkon brtsegs): sad sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang /kun 'dzin par sems med pa dang /gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed pa de mthong na yang de la dga' ba bskyed/
194a2(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma mi byed pa dang /gang du yang 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'dra 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /zabam la bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /blan mong
194a3(dkon brtsegs): 'i ye shes kyang yongasu rdzogs pa de pyod de/bzhi gang zhe na/stong pa nyid le mos pa dang /dben pa du gnas pa dang /zab mo la bzod pa dang /tshu la bzhini yid la byed pa sku/
194a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa'o chos bani po de dag dang ldan na sbyin pa la yang dga' bar mi byed la/ser sna can du yang nye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /kun 'dzin po'i sems
194a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /gzhan 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed pa de mthong na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par mi byed pa dang /gong du yang 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas
194a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /zab mo lo bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /bla na mod pa'i ye shes kyang yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dge gzhan
194a7(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/sbyin pa la dga' bar mi byed la/ser sna can du yang mi 'gyur ba dang /kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang /gzhan 'jig
194b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed pa de mthong na yang de la dga' ba bskyed par mi byed pa dang /gang yang 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa bla na med pas gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang zab mo la
194b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa
194b3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu tshol bar byed pa dang /dri mang du thos par gyur nas grong dang gleng khyer dang /grong rdal dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dang /yul 'khor dag tu zhugs te/chos kyi sbyin pa byin par
194b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /gang las kyang tha na lagaso zhes bya ba tsam cung zad kyang re ba med cing de gos pa med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la chos ston par byed pa dang /de gos po med pa'i sems/
194b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas 'di lta ste/chos kyi sbyin pa'i byin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsgrags shing bstod pa yin pas na/mchog yino zhes dga' ba nyams su
194b6(dkon brtsegs): myong bar byed pa ste de dag ni sbyin pa dam pa byin pa gtso bo 'di la gnas pa yin zhes yang dag par mthong ba ni dga' ba nyam su myong bar byed cing /sems can 'jig rten gyi zung
194b7(dkon brtsegs): zozing yongasu gtong ba la mngon par brtson pa gzhan dag la ni dga' bar mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
195a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa drug na/de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor ba ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes
195a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad la/tshe'i mtha' ji srid par ma tshang ba med pa'i sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rdul
195a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa gzhan zhig gis snying rje chen po kun du bskyed te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rje su dran par byed na gos pa med pa'i sems
195a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis rmed pa dang bkur bsti dang grags pa mi 'dod par sems can gcig cig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gtsog tsam zhig sgrogs par byed cing /des tshig su bcud
195a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bshad pa nas kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di lta ste/dper na yi ge 'di dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de bzhin du/chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin
195a6(dkon brtsegs): rjezhes rab tu rtogs par byed pa na/rigs kyi bu dag bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des/brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /'bum
195a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang /bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang /bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /bya ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /grangs dang cha dang /khakra
195b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /dpe dang /nye bar 'jal ba dang /rgyu ni bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro//'od srung de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces/
195b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dga' chos bzhi dang ldan na/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa rgya chen pos gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di
195b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste rgyu chen po la 'jug pa dang /chos rgya chen po 'chad pa dang /sbyin pa rgya chen po yongasu gtong ba dang /rgya chen po la mos pa ste/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' chos
195b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa rgya chen pos gonas pa 'thob par 'gyuraro//'od srung de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis
195b5(dkon brtsegs): la de lta da ltar chos bstan pas khye'u de gnyis chos kyi mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/de gnyis steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas de
195b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyi gas tshigs thun par tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//thub pa spyod pa thams cad mkhyen//spyod pa kun la mkhas pa lags//sems can
195b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gtong ba dang //de bzhin stong la mi gnas ston//'di la bdag dang sems can dang //srog dang gang zag ma mchis par//bzod pa bla med gang lags pa//sbyin pa
196a1(dkon brtsegs): /don byin chen lags//byaro nga zab pa ma smos la//del 'ang rtog pam byed ces//'gyi ba 'di 'dra bka' stsal ba//dbu chem da ni ngo mtshur lags//ga sa n+d+ha thA/
196a2(dkon brtsegs): la sogs med pa//byang chub dam pa don du gnyer//ye shes chen po skyed byas nas//de la'ang rlom sems ma byed ces//rnam grol stong pa bsgom par bgyi//de la'ang rnam rtogs
196a3(dkon brtsegs): byed cig/dgon pa'i gnas ni ston byed pa//dben pa'i gnas zhes gsung ba mdzad//rlom sems yongasu spang ba mi//sbyin pa rtag tu phyin par bya//gang la 'du shes mi
196a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa//de ni rdul bral mtha' yin no//zhi ba'i gnas la mi g.yo ba'o//tshul khrims yongasu sbyang bar bya//gang gi zhi tshul mdzes rtogs pa//de ni tshul khrims mchog
196a5(dkon brtsegs): yin gsungs//bzod pa rtag tu bsom gyis la//sems can rnams la rtog ma byed//rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa//de ni bzod pa yin par gsungs//brtson 'grus brtan
196a6(dkon brtsegs): pu'ang brtsam par byos//'dus byas kun kyang spang bar bgyis//dben pa de lta ba gang yin pa//de ni sangs rgyas brtson 'grus gsung //dngos po'i dngos de med pasan//
196a7(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad bsreg par bya//nyon mongs med pa gang yin pa//de ni rtog med bsam gtan yin//tshu rol ma yin pha rol min//dbu su'ang gnas par mi bya skye//dus gsum
196b1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' macamathaman/sas macamasam tham a na can thas rbaN/Shas mamathamayamam thas amags tam mtham/mamam mama.am yaH tham ma
196b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam lta gang yin pa//de ni shes rab dam pa yin//dgon pa'i 'du shes bsgom bya zhing //'du shes de la'ang lta mi bya//'du shes pa las skye 'gyur te//des de 'du shes med ces bya/
196b3(dkon brtsegs): n+d+ra pa'i yon tan dang //de bzhin ldan yon rnams cang bstan//de byin rnam sems med de yin//ji ltar thos po'i chos kyang shid//yi gI rnams ni rlung myed te//rang bzhin gyis
196b4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'grub pa med//de phyir chos la mi rlom zhing //khyed kyi 'bras bu med mi bya//bdag ni chos ston byed pa'o zhes//gang lnga 'du shes de 'byung ba//des ni chos nyid mi shes pas//de ni bdud
196b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhags byas bcings//bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes//ga la 'du shes de 'byung ba//de la de ma thag tu ni//bdud rtsi dug gi btung bar 'gyur//gang zhig rdzogs pa'i
196b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni//rtog par 'dod dam nyan thos sam//rang rgyal byang chub rtogs 'did pa//dri ni tshul 'di bsam par gyis//rnam gro la ye shes dpagra med kyang //gcig pa nyid du bstun
196b7(dkon brtsegs): po mdzad//dman pa'i smon lam 'dod mi bya//byang chub dam pa don du gnyer//gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i sku//mtshan gyis brgyan pa ci 'dra ba//de 'dra 'dod pa de yis ni/
196b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog la gnas par gyis//chos kun rgyu las 'byung ba ste//byed pa po ni dmig su med//chos rnams brten nas byung ba ste//yong dag rang bzhin yong min zhes//bgyi ba /
197a1(dkon brtsegs): /'dra bka' stsal pa//dpal chen khyod ni ngo mtshar lags//'od srung de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis bar snang de las tshog su bcad pa de dag smras pa'i tshe/rgyal po mu
197a2(dkon brtsegs): khyad de'i grong khyer ba dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /zham 'bring gnyug ma rnams dang /stong gi bar snang la lha gang dge 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa de dag las srog chags brgyad
197a3(dkon brtsegs): khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs yongasu bsgrub
197a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgya skyed par gyur to//'od srung de nas khye'u chos dang choso bzang gnyis par snang de las babs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs
197a5(dkon brtsegs): la ge tugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /dam pa'i chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu
197a6(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi nga bzhin rje su rtogs par yang bgyid lags te/bcom
197a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'dir sems bskyed pa de ni 'di lta ste/chos thams cad skyo ba ma mchis pa lag so//'dir sems bskyed pa de ni 'di lta sku/chos thams cad la mngon par zhen
197b1(dkon brtsegs): pam mkhas pa kho na lags//de ci'i slad du zhe na/gang la mngon par zhen pa mchis pa de la ni skye ba 'gra' zhig mchis gang+gA'i/gang la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa de ma ni skye ba
197b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/skye ba nyid skye bo ma mchis pa lags//ci'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi zhe na/de la skye bo'i gzhi
197b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ma mchis pas de'i sla du skye ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/skye ba ma mchos pa de ni/brjod pa de yang brjod par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/ji tsam du brjod pa mo mchis pa
197b4(dkon brtsegs): ded tsam du skye ba dang 'gag pa mchis kyi/de ltar ye shes shin tu rnam por dag pa gang lags pa de la ni skye ba yang ma mchis/'gag pa ying mamatshas la gang la skye bya ma mchis pa dang /dgag pa ma mchis
197b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni bas pa ma 'tshal ba ste/gtan du bas pa lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de lta la gos pas bdag cag gnyis ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' des bla na med pa yang
197b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs shing chos 'ga' yang dmigasde par mi bgyid/chos 'ga' yang thob par mi bgyid/chos 'ga' yang thob par bgyid du/
197b7(dkon brtsegs): stsol bar mi bgyid te/mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de kho na rjesu rtogs par bgyid par rabs kyi/chos 'ga' yang rje su rtogs par ni mi bgyid lags so//de ci'i slad zhe na/
198a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa lags pa'i slad du'o//'od srung de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis de skad smras pas/byang chub sems dpa' khris ni mi skye ba'i chos
198a2(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa thob par gyur to//rgyal po mu khyud kyang bu stong po de dag dang lhan cig/rgyal po lnga stong de dag dang lhan cig tu/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
198a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do//'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des zhal zas kyi bye ba mdzad nas/lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs nas/rgyal po mu khyud dang skye bo de dag la chos
198a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gau tAm yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/gdan las bzhengs te gsheg so//'od srung de
198a5(dkon brtsegs): nas khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis pha ma la gsol ba btab nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par byung ngo //de gnyis rang
198a6(dkon brtsegs): gi grong khyer chen po nas mngon par byung ba'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras//rabo byung sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags//nges 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa sa bsngags//khyim
198a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas nyon mongs gnas pa ste//dkar chos rnam par 'jig par byed//gang zhig dkar po'i chos rnams ni//nyams par mi 'gyur 'phel 'dod pa//rab tu 'byung bar bya//
198b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir//'jig rten mgon thang myur du song //bskul ba bye ba rab spyod kyang //'dod pa rnams la ngoms pa med//khyim na gnas pa 'dod rnams kyi//mi 'anas bzhin du
198b2(dkon brtsegs): hrI/myu tshon+da kAng nams//'brub pas ngoms por mi 'gyur ba//de bzhini ma pa 'dod rnams la//bste pas rnams kyang drims mi 'gyur//dper na mA~M nr-iN+DI dag dang /
198b3(dkon brtsegs): shing gis rnams kyang nga mos pa med//de bzhin byis pa 'dod rnams la//bsten pasdu ngoms pa gyur ba med//'jig rten rnam par 'dren rnams kyis//'dod pa 'di dag chags
198b4(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs//de phyir chags pa yongs spangs te//rab tu 'byung phyir mngon byung shig/'jig rten mgon po bla na med//snga ma 'ga' yang gang gi phyir na khyim gyi gnas na gnas

198b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//de byir sangs rgyas rnams kyi//bsnyen bdananams la// ma gnas spyod pa spyod blos dang //de ni 'di lags nyid du 'gyur//gang zhig ni gan
198b7(dkon brtsegs): nas ni//stong gsum thams cad rin chen gyis//rib tu bkang ste 'jig rten gyis//mgon la yon du 'bul byed la//mkhas pa gang zhig yid byu shig/nyes po shes nas khyim
199a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs te//sangs rgyas rjesu slob byed la//rab tu 'byung ba tshol byed cing //rab tu 'byung ba btsal byas nas//g.yol ba med pa 'dod rnams dang //khyim gyi gnas la
199a2(dkon brtsegs): mi lta bar//gom pa bdun ni 'dor byed na//bsod nams phung po de la ni//snga mas rin gyi char ma tshig/de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yi//rab tu 'byung phyir myur du der//gang la
199a3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa yod min pa'i//shes pas rtag tu ngoms med na//chags pa kun las rnams 'das pa'i//sangs rgyas dam pa nyid 'thob 'gyur//myur du dgon par gnas byed na//
199a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i sred pa spong 'gyur zhing //nyes pa ji bzhin rnams rig nas//de dag las ni sems ldog 'gyur//khyim ni myur du spangs na su//dgon pa la ni gnas gyur pa//mkhas
199a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag mthong ba rnams//sangs rgyas rnams kyi rje su slob//gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa//dri dag dben pa bstan byed cing //de dag dgon par dga' 'gyur gyi//de dag
199a6(dkon brtsegs): khyim la dga' mi 'gyur//de ni sangs rgyas rnam dag go/spyod yul gnas dang spyod pa ste//gang zhig lam 'dir 'jug 'gyur ba//de la byang chub rnyed dka' min//chags
199a7(dkon brtsegs): lo sogs pas gzir ba yi//sems can grol byed su 'dod pa//de ni khyim na gnas pa yis//skrag cing dgon pa kun du bstan//gang zhig bdud las rgyal ba dang //'chi
199b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma/sa a ma camasam tham/a na chaH tha sa masma yal kam/ma ya yamam sa/
199b2(dkon brtsegs): med go 'phang rtogs pa dang //'khor lo dam pa bskor 'dod pa//des ni dgon pa bsten par gyis//'od srung de ltar khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis tshigasu bcad pa de dag smra zhing //grong khyer
199b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po de nas phyir byung nas bcom ldan 'das me tog sna tshogs ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
199b4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/'od srung
199b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas/khye'u da gnyis rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do//'od srung de
199b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung ba thos nas bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag ste/bu stang du gcig gis mtshad pa rnams dang yang lhan cig bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang
199b7(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig/rgyal po lnga stong tsam po dag dang yang lhan cig tu/skye bo phal po tsha gzhan dag dang lhan cig tu thams cad khyim gyi gnas la mi lci bar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par
199b8(dkon brtsegs): legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par byung bar gyur to//de'i tshe na srog chags bya ba tha ma pa mngon par byung bar gyur te//de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
200a1(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs ga la ba der dang ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
200a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag cig bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs
200a3(dkon brtsegs): pa me tog sna tshogs des sems can de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas/skye bo'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/dge
200a4(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dngos po la rab tu bkod do//'od srung de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis bu thu bo rgyal sbrid la bzhag pa gang yin pa de yang zhag bdun 'das pa dang /gcig pu dben par song
200a5(dkon brtsegs): nus/'du shes rjer rtog pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te bdag la rgyal srid kyis ci bya/dbang phyug gis dang ni bya ste/bdag 'dod pa lhur len cing 'dod pa'i 'ching bas bcings nas bla na
200a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu spang bar ni mi bya'o snyas nas de/dor mod la rab tu byung ba'i sems chen po bskyed de tshes bcwo lnga'i zla ba nya ba'i tshe/gling chen
200a7(dkon brtsegs): po bzhi dag tu rgyu ba'i tshe na des tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras//kho bo'i pham phu nu dang //rtsa lag rnams kyang rab byung phyir//nges par byung ste chos don phyir//srog chags kyi/
200b1(dkon brtsegs): bzam pa byung //ngal khyim gyis ci bya ste//bdag kyang der ni 'gro bar bya//gal te khyed cag 'dod 'gyur na//nga ni khyod kyi yongs 'dren te//gang dag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir//sems bskyed
200b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag ni//khom ldan shin tu rnyed dka' bas//nga dang 'grogs te myur du 'dod//glang dag khyo mi nas khyim med par//rab byung sems bskyed mi byed pa//de dag 'dren chos gnas
200b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis la//khyim ni legs par bsrung gyis shig/'od srung de ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des tshigasu bcad pa de dag smras pa na gling chen po bzhi po de dag nas khang khyim na gnas pa la sems
200b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems can ni gcig kyang byung bar ma gyur te/thams cad rab tu byung ba'i sems dang ldan zhing rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang /mngon par byung ba'i bsam pa dang chas te
200b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur to//'od srung de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des sems can de dag thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu chud nas/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
200b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams thams cad kyi grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang
200b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dag sprul pa mdzad do//'od srung ngo nas gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/sems can gcig kyang khyim na gnas par ma gyur to//de dag thams cad dang
201a1(dkon brtsegs): pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung ngo //de ltar rab tu byung ba de dag la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru dag kyang byung bar 'gyur/dpag
201a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyi shing dag las dpag bsam gyi ras bcos bu gos rin po che dag kyang byung bar gyur cing /lha rnams kyang de dag gi g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byed do//'od srung dge slong
201a3(dkon brtsegs): chos dang chos bzang de gnyis de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang /brtson 'grus brtsam sa shing gnas par gyur te/de gnyis lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du nam yang drug
201a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang gnyid kyis kun nas non par ma gyur cing /nam yang zas za ba ma gtogs par 'dug par ma gyur te/'gro ba dang ldog pa kun du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
201a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed cing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la yang rlomA sems byed par ma gyur to//lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gsum po de dag la kun gyi rjesu song ba zhes
201a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje'i gnas dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs par gyur te/de gnyis sa'i phyogs gang dang gang du 'dug pa dang /skyil mo krungs
201a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas par gyur pa'i sa phyogs de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du kun dug ni sa par gyur to//phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
201b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis chos ston pa rnams kyang thos shing bzung ngo //de ltar thos shing bzung nas kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par yang gyur to//'od srung gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig
201b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag las nyan thos kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag las sems can gcig 'ga' tsam yang so so'i skye bor gyur bzhin 'chi
201b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i dus byas par ma gyur te/gang dag thams cad kyi nang na le lo can du gyur pa de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong bar gyur cing /de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha
201b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to//gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag ni de nas shi 'phos nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba med
201b5(dkon brtsegs): bri gzhan dag tu skyes par gyur tsong /der yang de dag phyug po'i khyim chen po dag tu skyes par gyur to//der skyes nas kyang dbang po 'phel ba dang yongasu smin pa dag kyang rjesu thob nas sngon/
201b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis yang dag par bskul te/thams cad dad pas khyim nas bye mi med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung ngo //de dag de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang zhag bdun 'das nas/
201b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis rang byang chub rje su thob ste/de dag gis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gi don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//gang dag byang chub sems
202a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa bar gyur pa de dag gis ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgrubs cing /mi 'phrogs pa'i spobs pa nyid kyang thob
202a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/gzungs kyang thob par gyur to//'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis sam the tsom za
202a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi'i dbang phyug rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba der gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni rgyal bu
202a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu blo bor gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po zhes bya bar gyur to//
202a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos dang chos bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa de gnyis gzhan dag cig yin snyam du khyod do snyam sems na/'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o//de ci'i
202a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos shes bya bar gyur to//khye'u chos bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
202a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i stong pa yin te/'od srung sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sems can dag pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi gnasu gyur cing ji tsam du mdzes par gyur pa
202b1(dkon brtsegs): la ltos/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de
202b2(dkon brtsegs): ni sgyu tshe'i tshad yun ji srid cig tu gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma trog sna
202b3(dkon brtsegs): tshechogs de ni bskal pa brgyad kyi bor du bzhugs par gyur to//'ad srung de bzhin gshegs pa mye tog sna tshogs de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa gcig gi
202b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du gnas par gyur to//de'i sku gdung rnam kyang rgyas par gyur cing /de dag lha rnams kho nas mchod par gyur te/de na khyim par gnas pa ni 'ga' yang med do//'od srung dge
202b5(dkon brtsegs): skyong chos dang chos bzang gnyis bya ba nyung ba dang /bdag gi don la sbyong ba'i rdzu su brtson par gnas shing /bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung rnams la yang mchod par mi byed/
202b6(dkon brtsegs): mor mi byed la de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mchod rten gyi drung du yang mi 'gro'o//'obasrung de nas lha 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dang dge slong las dang po pa gang dag yin pa de dag/dge
202b7(dkon brtsegs): slong chos dang chos bzang gnyis la 'di gnyis ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod pa yang mi byed de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba mi byed pa las na/ma
203a1(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang ma gus pa yin zhes kha zer bar gyur to//'od srung de nas dge slong chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis dge slong dang lha 'bu mo phrag mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i dag/
203a2(dkon brtsegs): slong gi 'khor dang lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la smras pa/grogs po dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur zhing rgyu gang gis ni de bzhin gshegs
203a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gdung sems pa mi mnga' ba rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur snyam/dge slong dang lha de dag gis smras pa/sku gdung 'di dag ni tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
203a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas rab tu phye ba yin pas na/de'i phyir 'di dag ni mchod par 'os pa yin no//dge slong chos dang chos bzang
203a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po dag 'o na tshul khrims dang ti nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dag nyid mchod
203a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'os pa yin gyis/sku gdung dag ni mchod par 'os par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam/dge slong dang lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smraso//de ni de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhino//
203a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis smras pa/grogs po dag 'o na tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid ni gang yin/ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /
203b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dag gi mtshan nyid kyang gang yin/dge slong dang lha de dag gis smras pa/tshul khrims ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no//ting 'dzin dang //
203b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dag kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no//'od srung de nas dge slong chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis dge slong dang lha de
203b3(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po dag 'o na mngon par 'du byed pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mchod par nus sam/dge slong dang lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smraso//de ni mi nus//
203b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed kyang bdag dang mngon par 'dum byed cig dang /des ni mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//sangs
203b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas su 'du shes pa la ni sangs rgyas mthong ba yang med na mchod pa'i las lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ni gnas med do//gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pas ni/bdag/
203b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid mchod par bya'o//dge slong dang lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smra so//ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pas bdag nyid mchod par bya/dge slong chos dang chos bzung
203b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis smras pa//grogs po dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa gang gis bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi
204a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i gan su 'os par mchod pa/de ltar bdag nyid mchod par bya'o//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bslabs pa de ltar bslab par bya zhing bslabs pas rlom
204a2(dkon brtsegs): sems su yang mi bya'o//chos rab tu dbye bar bya zhing rab tu phye nas kyang chos 'ga' yang bsam par mi bya ste/gang gi tshe khyed cag de ltar bdag nyid mchod par byed pa de'i tshe na de bzhin
204a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yang mchod par 'gyur ba/khyed cig nyid kyang mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod par 'dod pas ni bdag nyid mchod par
204a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nyid mchod par mdzad pa de ltar mched pa bya zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yon tan gang dag ldan pas mchod pa brnyas par
204a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i yon tan de dag bdag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ste/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur ro//gang 'du shes dang mtshan ma bskyed par mi byed pa de ni de
204a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yino//gang bdag tu rtog par mi byed pa dang /rnam par rtog par mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin//gang 'jig rten pha
204a7(dkon brtsegs): rol du mi 'gro ba dang /'jig rten 'dir mi 'ong ba dang /gang tshu rol la yang mi gnas pha rol la yang mi gnas ma de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no//gang la
204b1(dkon brtsegs): chad pa med pa dang /rtag pa med pa dang /gong la 'dzin pa med pa dang spong ba med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no//gang la 'bri ba med pa dang /'phel ba med pa dang /gang la skye
204b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /gang la zad pa med pa dang /mi zad pa med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin//gang la sems med pa dang /sems las byung ba'i chos
204b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams med pa dang /yid la byed pa rnams med pa dang /bdag gi med pa dang /yongasu 'dzin pa med pa dang /tshor ba med pa dang /'thab pa med pa dang /rtsod pa med pa dang /'gal ba med pa
204b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa dang /gnyisu med par 'jug pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yino//gang la 'dus byas med pa dang /bgrangs pa med pa dang /bgrang du
204b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no//gang la lus dang ngagra dang /yid kyi mngon par 'du byed pa'i bya ba med pa dang /lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs pa de ni de
204b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no//gang la 'das pa'i 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /de ltar dang mi 'ong ba'i 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /glang rten par mi byed pa dang /mngon/
204b7(dkon brtsegs): par zhen par mi byed pa dang /mtshan mar mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yino//sangs rgya su 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /chos su ma yin dge 'dun du ma yin/gang
205a1(dkon brtsegs): zag tu mu yin bdag tu mu yin/gzhan du ma yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no////bam po bzhi pa ste tha mu/grogs po de dag de
205a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas/de ni skye bas mchod par sla ba ma yin//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mngon par 'du byed pa med
205a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de ni mngon par 'du byed pas mchod par sla ba ma yin//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/gnyi su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/de
205a4(dkon brtsegs): ni gnyis kyis mchod par smra ba ma yin no//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyi dri yin pas de ni zag pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba sa
205a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod par sla ba ma yin//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni stong pa nyid kyis bsgos pa yin pas/de ni bdag tu lta ba 'am/sems can du lta ba 'am/srog tu
205a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba 'am/gang zag tu lta ba 'am/chad par lta ba 'am/rtag par lta ba 'am/ngar 'dzin par lta ba 'am/nga yi/ 'dzin par lta ba 'am/'byung bar lta ba 'am/'jig
205a7(dkon brtsegs): par lta bas mchod par sla ba ma yin//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/do ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul gyis mchod par
205b1(dkon brtsegs): smra ba ma yin no//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i su ni smyon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/de ni smyon pa la gnas pas mchod par smra ba mA yin//grogs po dag de bzhin
205b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de ni dngos po'i 'du shes la gnas pas mchod par smra ba ma yino//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni g.yo ba
205b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/da ni g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i blo rnams kyis mchod par smra ba ma yin no//grogs pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mngon par 'dus mu byas pa'i
205b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yin pas/de ni 'dus byas la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yino//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas de
205b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod chags spyod pas mchod par smra ba ma yino//grogs po drag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas/dri ni gnod sems dang tha ba'i nyes pa la
205b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas mchod par smra ba ma yin no//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gAti muk+Sha dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas/de ni shes rab 'chal pa dang rmongs pa dang mi
205b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no//grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam
206a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bral ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongasu bslus pa yin pas/de ni tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /brji dngas pa dang shas+t+ra rab 'chal pa dang /rnam par grol ba
206a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no//grogs pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni byams pa dang /snying rje dang /
206a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang /btang snyoms kyis yongasu bsgos de yid pas/de ni gla nad sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /snyid rje mang pa dang /dga' ba'i sems med pa dang /rnam
206a4(dkon brtsegs): par g.yeng ba'i sems yid la byed pa rnams kyis mchod par smra ba ma yin no//grobs pa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ni/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa
206a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyis yongasu bsgos pa yin pas don ser sna can+da dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /gnod sems dang
206a6(dkon brtsegs): thutha ba'i nyes pa dang /khong khro ba mang ba dang /le lo can dang /brjod ngas pa dang /shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis mchod par sra ba ma yin no//'od srung de myur duste/
206a7(dkon brtsegs): slong chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis 'khor de dag la de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na/'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i tshe
206b1(dkon brtsegs): la bzod pa thob par gyur to//srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni shes pa dang /mthong ba bskyed cing /'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /phyir mi 'ong ba nyid kyang rje su thob par gyur to//sdod
206b2(dkon brtsegs): sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags nyi khri sum stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//'od srung dge slong chos dang chos bzang gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam
206b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa la ltos la/'od srung skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag gis zab mo la bslab pa de dang thobs la mkhas pa de la bslab par bya'o//'od srung de ltar skyes bu dam pa de
206b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyis dge slong dang lha de dag zab mo'i bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas/de phyin chad de dag thams cad bdag gi don la sbyar ba'i rje su brtson pa dang /bya ba nyu ngur ro gnas pas gnas
206b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing /phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams kyi drung du'ang mi 'gro/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par yang mi byed do//de
206b6(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag gi sems chos zab mo bla na med pa'i bdag nyid la zhugs par gyur pa'i phyir/'od srung de nas zhugs dus 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod/
206b7(dkon brtsegs): rten de dag thams cad kyang sa la nub par gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag thams cad kyang sgrog mar blugs pa bzhin nam/snod du blugs pa bzhin du de nyid du mi snang
207a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/'od srung de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rdza su bslab par bya'o//'od srung yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa ba'i
207a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa sems ma bsgoms pa/tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ngadag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ga
207a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod pas 'tsho bar sems kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ni ma yin//de dge ni bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /brjod ngas pa dang //
207a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab 'chal pa dang /rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin bzhin du 'tshe ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung tshul khrims dang /ting nge/
207a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongasu bsgos pa dag la bkur bsti bya ba dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar sems
207a6(dkon brtsegs): sa/de dag ni bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang /zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /gti mug dang bcas pa yin bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam g+hi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
207a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod chags dang bral ba/zhe sdang dang bral ba/gti mug dang bral ba'i sku gdung dat+te la bkur bsti bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang mchod par bya
207b1(dkon brtsegs): b.ro sems so//de dag ni bdag nyid ser sna can dang 'jungs pa dang /gnod sems dang tha ba'i nyes pa mang ba dang /lo lo dang ldan pa dang /brjed ngas pa dang /shes bzhin med pa yin bzhin/
207b2(dkon brtsegs): du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bdag chen po yang dag pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa mnyam par gzhaSh+Na pa thugs rtse gcig po'i sku gdung drag la bkur bsti bya ba
207b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /ri mo bya ba dang /mchod pa bya bar sems so//'od srung nga ni rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo las dang po pa dag gi sems mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir/sku gdung rnams
207b4(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis rlob par mdzad te/gang dag de dag la mchod pa byed pa dri dag ni/lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyamasu myong bar 'gyur zhing /de yang de dag gi yongasu mya ngan las 'da'
