214a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis gzhan ma ma rgyun blags shing skad byung ste du mos btab nas/byang chub sems dpa' di'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs kyang /de de dag gi gdang du yang me ltar//'ang
214a6(dkon brtsegs): sna nas rgya'i b+hU'i ba b+h+ri na lha zhig gnas pa gyur pa gang yin pa stong gi b+ha snang la tshe 'phrul chen thos 'dug nas/sgru ba phal ba ched dag la tshigs bA nad de smras pa/
214a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag byang chu khyi rten //de dag sbyin pa 'dra bar me//mjug ni nga tum me ste//yadi dam gtang bar mi byud //sa rnams thams cadags yang sring //
214b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gyur srid kyi//grogs dag 'di ni gnas 'di las//bskyod par nus pa ma yin no//'di las mi dga' phyis mi bya//sdig pa'i las rnams ma byed cig/phyin chad dmus long 'dra bar
214b2(dkon brtsegs): ni/bsgril pa bye ba par d+hanasmras re//'di ni sems can thams ca de la//pan phyir byang chub chugs bste//mngon par byang chub badzin rnams mi//byang chubangs pa rnyed mi dag la
214b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i phyir dang longs spyod phyir//byang chub spyad pa mi spyod kyi//sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi//ye shes tshul rnams ji ltar bad+ma//stong gsum rin chen rnams drang ni//gos
214b4(dkon brtsegs): dang yul gzhan lha rdzas kyis//chal por bka' bar gyur kyang ni//de dag chags par bya mi nus//mi shes pas ni gang byas pa'i//sdig pa'i lus ni bshags par gyis//mkhas
214b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyes pa bshags nas ni//las dang lhan cig mi gnaso//'od srung da ltar lha des bskul na/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma de gnyis dang /mdza' bshes
214b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gros grogs dang /nye du dang rgan rabs de dag dang /skye bo phal po che dag gis nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas/gzhon nu de la 'di skad ces smras te/gzhon nu khyod ji
214b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar bsam pa gzhin song shig/rab tu yang byung shig zan yang zo shig/zas ma zos pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ta re zhes byaso//'od srung de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
215a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po des zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad zin kyang /'di lta ste sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa yod la byed pa dang /zhag bdun gyi bar du lha rnams kyis de'i
215a2(dkon brtsegs): lus la mdangs bcug pas na dbang po gzhan du gyur par yang ma gyur/bzhin gyi madrangs yong su nyams par yang ma gyur to//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen
215a3(dkon brtsegs): bopo des/de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcadwa te khyim gyi gnas la mi lta zhing rgyal srid chen po de mchil ma'i thal ba banani du bor nas/bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag
215a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /pha ma'i nye du'i tsho gas de dag gdong mchi mas gang ste/ngu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te/rang gi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/dgon pa
215a5(dkon brtsegs): mi med pa gcan zan gdug pa gnas pa'i nags shig tu bzhugs so//de der bzhugs nus rAs bcos bu'i gzhi gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de bris pa'i
215a6(dkon brtsegs): ras bcos bu'i gzhi de bris nas/ras bcos bu'i gzhi de nyid kyi mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting ba'i steng du skyil mo krungs bcas nas lus drang por bslang ste 'jug nas/de bzhin
215a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la rtog par byed//de de la rtog par byed pa na 'di snyam du sems te gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di tsam du mdzes pa
215b1(dkon brtsegs): yin na/bcom ldan 'das de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de do tsam du mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar bas/gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba de dag
215b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dpal yon can yino snyam mo//de 'di snyam du ji ltar de bzhin gaushegs pa blta bar bya snyam du yang sems par yang gyur to//de nas nags khrod de na lha zhig gnas par gyur pa
215b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa des byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongasu shes nas byang chub sems dpa' de la'i de skad ces smra so//grogs po khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
215b4(dkon brtsegs): pa blta bar bya snyam du rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du lta bar bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
215b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang blta bar bya ste/de ltar mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ban no//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
215b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ji ltar bltas na/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di lo ji ltar blta bar bya snyam nas/de
215b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di sems par mi byed/rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du/chos thams cad kyang sems par mi byed//
216a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa shes pa byud ngadu shug pa stsa rgyun nyi na na// nan ga/shegs bu'i sgra gzugs 'di mad du
216a2(dkon brtsegs): btsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyid ming du btags pra tsam du byung la/ming de yid dbo nyid kyis spyod pa dang /rang bzhin gyis gi yo ba med pa yin te/de bde
216a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yino//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la thob pa med pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang /shes pa
216a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /mngon sum du bya ba med pa dang /'bras bu med pa dang /'bras bu rtogs pa dang /gnas med pa dang /rten med pa dang /'grob med pa dang /
216a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa dang /skyo ba myed pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /skra med pa dang /tshul med pa dang /
216a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul ma yin pa med pa dang /'dod chags zud pa med pa dang /zhe sdang zad pa myed pa dang /gti mug zad pa med po dang /phung po rnams med pa dang //khams rnams myong
216a7(dkon brtsegs): padang /skye mched rnams med pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' meng pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang dbus med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/de bzhin
216b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yi no//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di g.yo ba med pa dang /spyod pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang dri dang
216b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu kho na yino//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di lta bar mi byed nyan par mi byed/snom par mi byed/myang bar mi byed//
216b3(dkon brtsegs): reg par mi byed/sems par mi byed/nyel bar mi byed/ldang bar mi byed/dbugs 'byung bar mi byed/dbugs rngub par mi byed/rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos
216b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di 'dod/
216b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khamasu gtogs pa yang ma yin/gzugs kyi kham su gtogs pa yang ma yin/gzugs med pa'i kham su gtogs pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang
216b6(dkon brtsegs): de dang 'dra ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yino//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la tshu rol yang med/pha rol yang med/bar yang med//
216b7(dkon brtsegs): thog ma yang med/tha ma yang med/'jig pa yang med/rgyu ba yang med/spyod pa yang med/blang ba yang myed/dor ba yang med/bya ba yang med/byed pa yang med/ltung ba yang med
217a1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa yang med/brdzun pa yang med/bden pa mngon par shes pa yang med/kun tu 'dod chags chags pa yang med/yad la byung ba yang med/'khor ba yang med//
217a2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa yang med pa de bzhin du/chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin/
217a3(dkon brtsegs): no snyam mo//'od srung de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'jug pa de lta bu des rab tu rtog par byed pa na nyin mtshan du skyil mo krung zhig par ma gyur cing /des nyin mtshan du
217a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga dang /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag kyang bsgrubs par gyur nos ting 'dzin kun du snang ba zhes bya ba yang bsgrubs par
217a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/de la snang ba yang byung bar gyur te/snang ba byung bar gyur pa des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
217a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang mthong ngo //lha'i rna ba bsgrib pa med pas/sangs rgyasra bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa thams cad kyang thos te/de bzhin gshe
217a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig gis chos bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la sgrub par ma gyur cing thams cad kyang mnyes par byaso//'od srung byang chub sems dpa'
217b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po zla ba bdun gyi bar du 'argyag cing 'dug par gyur te/shes pa'i zas ma gtogs par zas gzhan yang mi za zhing /lha rnams kyis de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rig nas
217b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus mdangs bcug por yang gyur to//'od srung byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des gos ngur smrig dag kyang ma 'gis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du ma mthong
217b3(dkon brtsegs): bsrub pa'i gzhi rnams kyang ma blangs med kyi/'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes NI su thob cing /da ltar bsgrub par 'dong par gyur pa la ltos/'od srung byang chub sems dpa
217b4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu rnam par 'byed de/ci nas kyang 'phel bar mi byed pa dang /'bri bar mi byed pa de ltar rab tu rnam par byed do//'od srung byang chub sems
217b5(dkon brtsegs): dbus ni/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bsnyen bkur byas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul
217b6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen dkur bya'o//des da ltar bsnyen bkur byas shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog par byed pa na ye shes chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag kyang bskyed par gyur te/ye shes
217b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam pa des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshang med grangs med dadag tu meng pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur/de dag chos ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur to//'od srung de
218a1(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de nags khrid de nas phyir byung ste/grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
218a2(dkon brtsegs): dag tu zhugs nas/sems can rnams la chos ston par byed cing de srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod do//sems can tshang
218a3(dkon brtsegs): med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsod nams dag la bkod par gyur to//pha ma de gnyis dang btsun mo'i 'khor de dag dang 'khor gzhan thams
218a4(dkon brtsegs): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byaso//'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig/
218a5(dkon brtsegs): yin snyam du khyod nem nur dang yid gnyis dang /the tsom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson
218a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus chen po zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyiraro//'od srung de lta bsan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po
218a7(dkon brtsegs): de dang /de las gzhon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rjesu bslab par bya'o//'od srung yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga
218b1(dkon brtsegs): ban+d+ha pa tha ma la/byang chub sems dpa'i thogs pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang bu ma thongs la mi mkhas pa brkam pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur to/de dag ni ras btsos bu
218b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rtsig ngos la bris pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas dngos grung dang rdzu 'phrul 'thob par sems shing de dag 'di sgyum du bdag cag ni
218b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin gyi/gzhan dag ni mchod pa byed pa ma yin snyam du rlom semasu 'gyur te/de dag dge ba ba cung zad tsam po des bdag la bstod par byed gzhan la
218b4(dkon brtsegs): smod par byed cing gzhi des 'tsho bar sems par yang 'gyur//'od srung de'i tshe na gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug pa dang /'dus pa dang gzhan yang de
218b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag ma gtogs par/de ltar lung mnod pa yongasu tshol bar mi 'gyur/kha don mi byed bsam gtan mI bsgom/nang du yang dag
218b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jog la gtses par sems par mi 'gyur te/de dag de'i tshe na khyim pa dang /rab tu byung ba dag gis mchod pa dang /ri mo bya ba dang /shes pa dang /shin tu yongasu shes par yang
218b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing /gzhi des de dag gi chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dag kyang rnyed par 'gyuraro//'od srung ngas ni byang chub
219a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi las su 'di lta ste/tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas te/mang du thos pa yongasu btsal bar bya'o zhes bstan na/de dag ni de'i tshe na
219a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal pa kho nar gnas shing chos yongasu btsal ba spangs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur zhing gzhi
219a3(dkon brtsegs): des 'tshe bar sems pa la ltos/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas
219a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi sgyu dang g.ye dang /gyu gyu de dag mang du bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags te/bcom ldan 'das
219a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo drad pa dang ldan pa dag gi sde mdo sde 'di lta bu thos nas/su zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs sbyong bar mi bgyid lags/bcom ldan 'das
219a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di lta ste/slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa//
219a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs pas na/bdag cag yul 'di lta bu la spyod pa las phyir ldog par bya'o zhes kun du skyo ba skye bar 'gyur zhing rab tu spyod par
219b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs byas chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang byin gyis brlab tu gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brdzun 'od srung chan//
219b2(dkon brtsegs): po la 'dre skad ces bka' stsal to//'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa gnas rnam pa 'di lta bu gang ci ston pa dang /yang dag par ston par mdzad pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu dang //
219b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du ste/'di ltar de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang skyon de dag yongasu spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de
219b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems
219b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /lha dang mi dang /lha mo yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///
219b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchos brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po'i le'u zhes bya ste/nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs s+ho///
219b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /su ren dra bo d+hi dang /pradz+nyA wa ra ma dang /zhu tshon gyi lo ts+tsha baM ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//shA lo ka
220a1(dkon brtsegs): / nyes brgya////bam pa bzla'o//d+ha ga skad du/Ar+yA bin ma be nr-i sh+tsa yang /u pa la~M pa phreng rgyun ma ma hA sa na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa
220a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mang ///bam po drang ba//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cadat+pal
220a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byad kyi tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun+da dga' ra ba na/dge slong lnga
220a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong tham pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
220a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de dag la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs te bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag khyed cig phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i
220a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ad yang dag
220a7(dkon brtsegs): par bzung ba dang /sems can rnams yongasu smyin par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang tshul dang bsam pa sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskyang bar su spro//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
220b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bya de logs su/
220b2(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slad ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i slad du/de
220b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par
220b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' sengags gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni thabs dang tshul dang /bsam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongasu skyong
220b5(dkon brtsegs): bar spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams ngan song du mchi ba las yongasu thar par bgyid par spro
220b6(dkon brtsegs): lags so//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyis gang zag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyid par spro
220b7(dkon brtsegs): lag so//byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can ma 'tshal ba rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lags so//
221a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tog gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par sgro lags
221a2(dkon brtsegs): so//byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i tog gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan rnams kyis sems can yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lagaso//byang chub
221a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' nyi ma'i tog gis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni theg pa bde bas sems can yongasu smin par bgyid par spro ba lagaso//byang chub sems dpa'
221a4(dkon brtsegs): bag tsha ba med pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa drag yongasu smin par bgyid pa dang yongasu 'dzin par spro ba lags so//
221a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ming 'bras bu mchis par sgrogs pas sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par
221a6(dkon brtsegs): spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pas gsil pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam rgya chen pos sems can gyi khams bsi ma 'tshal ba rnams
221a7(dkon brtsegs): yangasu thar par bgyid par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pi/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis soms can
221b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu 'god par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' mig bzangs kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rtsa bar nye
221b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bsgrub par spro lags so//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro dag las sems
221b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongasu skyob par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dag las ma rgal ba'i sems can
221b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams sgrol bar spro logaso//byang chub sems dpa' tshogs chen gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can ma dul ba rnams la dul ba'i shul nye bar bston par
221b5(dkon brtsegs): spro lags so//byang chub sems dpa' yid bzangs kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spo lags
221b6(dkon brtsegs): so//byang chub sems dpa' nges pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can shes rab dman pa rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lagaso//byang chub
221b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gzi brjid phung pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lags so//
222a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med pa rtogs par khong du chud pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shul yang dag par ston pas sems can rnams yongasu sbyin
222a2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid par sgrol gso//byang chub sems dpa' mngon dgas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad tshad ma mchis pa dang bde bar bsgrub
222a3(dkon brtsegs): par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rAbA sngags gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sdug bsngal dran par bgyid pas/sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid
222a4(dkon brtsegs): pAr spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsam pa tsam gyis
222a5(dkon brtsegs): yid btags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongasu thar par bgyid par sgro lags//byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
222a6(dkon brtsegs): se na yongasu ma smin pa rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems
222a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyis bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid stobs kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni
222b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gums par sgro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis stong gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa
222b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams sgrol bar sgrolag sa//byang chub sems dpa' bag chub med par gnas bsdu gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams bsdu ba'i slad du legasaso zhes bgyi ba stsol
222b3(dkon brtsegs): bar spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mes pa ji lta ba bzhin yongasu
222b4(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' gsal ba dpag med kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la 'dus ma bgyis kyis shul nye bar ston
222b5(dkon brtsegs): par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
222b6(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa ji lta ba bzhin yang dag par ston par sgro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la rin po
222b7(dkon brtsegs): che'i phung po kun du ston par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzugs sdug pa ston pas sems can rnams yongs
223a1(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid par sbre lag so//byang chub sems dpa' dri med bzi brjid kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyags pas sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzin
223a2(dkon brtsegs): cing yongasu smin par bgyid par spro legasaso//byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon gyi skye ba rjesu dran par bgyid pas sems can rnams
223a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bgyid par spro leg so//byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams 'od zer gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang dag pa'i smon lam gyis sems can
223a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dren par spro lags so//byang chub sems dpa' dpal bzang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdeg ni sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las gtan yongasu
223a5(dkon brtsegs): thar par bgyid par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams rin po che dag gis bde bar bgyid par
223a6(dkon brtsegs): spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni semasan+dan dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par bgyid par spro lag so//byang
223a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu thar par bgyid
223b1(dkon brtsegs): par sgro lags//byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'od kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la shul bzang po nye bar ston par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa'
223b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gzugs sbyin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsam pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas sems can rnams yongasu thar bar bgyid par spro lag so//byang
223b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos mngon par 'phags kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba bston par spro lags so//byang chub
223b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sgrib pa dag las yongasu thar par bgyid par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' chos
223b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyis sems can rnams yongasu thar par bgyid par spro lags so//byang chub sems dpa' ci yang min gyis gsol pa//
223b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad gzhig par spro legs so//byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis gsol pa/bcom
223b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi phyogs rab tu ston par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sen
224a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa sgrol bar spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu 'od kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams dman
224a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas nas yongasu thar par bgyid par smre lag so//byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'angs bdag ni shul bzang po ston pas
224a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi na song ba'i shul 'grog par sgrol ga so//byang chub sems dpa' gasder 'od kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus ston pas sems
224a4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can don bgyid pa rnams
224a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi don bgyid par spro lagaso//byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sgo 'gums
224a6(dkon brtsegs): par spro lag so//byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi 'chang gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol bar spro legs so//
224a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol po/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'od bstan pas sems can rnams kyi
224b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid par spro lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i go cha la 'jug pa bstan
224b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu thos nas ngo mtshar dang rma du byung bar 'dzin par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kye ma ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems
224b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po 'di dag snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa dang /ji tsam du sems can thams cad kyis thul
224b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bka' ba dang /gting dpag par dka' ba dang /bsnyen par dka' ba dang /rdzi bar dka' ba dang /zil gyis mi non pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/bcom
224b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa rnams kyi drung du mgo dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig slong ba dag
224b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/dngos po thams cad skyong bar bgyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun du zhum par mi bgyid/sgyid lug par mi bgyid cing rab tu spro bar bgyid pa
224b7(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag ngo mtshar du 'dzin lag so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/sems can gang su dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen//
225a1(dkon brtsegs): po rnams la gnod par bgyis te/nad dang phyi'i dngos po dgra slong bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la granas pa'i byang chub
225a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shA stag tu 'gyur bar sems lagaso//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
225a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ti nge 'dzin dang /thabs dang shes rab dang /ye shes kyi yul ni de lta bu yin no///
225a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma yino//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni
225a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kun tu ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las
225a6(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo'o//shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can khyim bdag gis rgyagis pas myos pa rnams la dbang phyug gis rgyags pa
225a7(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i phyir/khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do//sems can spo bas rkyakas shing myos pa rnams la spro ba'i rgyags pa'i rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir//
225b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po che chen po'i stobs dang sred med kyi bu'i spro ba'i stobs nye bar ston par byed do//sems can mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba rnams la/mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam sna tshogs
225b2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar ston par byed do//nyan thos kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni/nyan thos kyi theg pas yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston
225b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed do//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par
225b4(dkon brtsegs): byed do//byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob par bya ba'i phyiraro sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do//shA
225b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams yongasu smin par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rab tu
225b6(dkon brtsegs): 'god par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu mya dran las 'das pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi
225b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa gzhan med do/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyiraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'di
226a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud de/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /gdags pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la rnam par rig par mdzad de de'i phyir da bzhin/
226a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang mi dge ba'i chos thams cang sbyangs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /sems can+d+ra
226a3(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa rnams la thar pa nye bar ston par mdzad pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la lam bzang po nye bar
226a4(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad pas/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /stong pa nyid gsung ba dang /stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
226a5(dkon brtsegs): byA ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam par rmongs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i chos rjesu rtogs par
226a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir pa ji lte ba bzhin du/rnam par rig pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa nye bar smon par byed byed byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g.yo'o//rim gyis
226a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la sgyu ma'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang nye b.raro ston to//shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
226b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni sbyin pa gnyis la gnas par bya'o//gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste chos sbyin pa dang /zang zing sbyin pa la ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub
226b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pa ni rje su chags pa med pa dang /khong khro ba med pas sbyin pa de gnyis la gnas par bya'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
226b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa chen po bzhi lta gnas par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/skyu gu sbyin pa dang /sdig tsha sbyin pa dang /
226b4(dkon brtsegs): glegs bam sbyin pa dang /chos sbyin pa la ste/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi po de dag la gnas par bya'o//
226b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po ni skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni gtong ba gsum la gnas par bya'o//gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gtong ba
226b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /gtong ba chen po dang /shin tu gtong la'o//de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid yongasu gtong ba'o//de la gtong ba chen po ni chung ma dang /bu dang bu mo yongasu gtong ba'o//
226b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gtong ba ni mgo dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig dang /lpags pa dang /rus pa dang /rkang yongasu gtong ba'o//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
227a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni yongasu gtong ba gsum po de dag lnga gnas par bya'o//shA ri'i dus gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
227a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams 'dod chags kyis mi 'jigs lags sam/zhe sdang /grati mug gis mi 'jigs legs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu
227a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te gnyis grang zhe na/'di lta ste zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /gti mug dang ldan pa ste//
227a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa yin no//shA ri'i bu de la 'dod chags ni kha na ma tho ba dang
227a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa chung la/'bral ba bul ba yin no//zhe sdang ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la 'bral ba myu ba yin nA//gti mug ni kha na ma the ba dang bcas pa che la/'brel
227a6(dkon brtsegs): babul ba yan no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu 'dod chags ni 'khor ba'i khri shing kun du 'dzin pa'i phyir nying 'tshums sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang /zhe sdang ni
227a7(dkon brtsegs): myur du yongasu spong ba'i phyir don song du 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa dang /gti mug ni rnam par grol bar dka' ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad de rab
227b1(dkon brtsegs): du lhung ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro//shA ri re bu de la byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa dang po'i lci ba ni tshogs bcu la dang por bshags par bya'o//bud med kyi lag pa nas 'dzin pa'i lag pa'i
227b2(dkon brtsegs): rnaMs pa lce bo ni tshegs lnga la bshags par bya'o//nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis mog gis bltas pa'i nyes pa ni gang zag gcig gam gnyis kyi mdun du bshags par bya'o//byung
227b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas mtshams med pa lnga dang /ldan pa'i nyes pa dang /bud med kyi nyes pa dang /khye'u'i nyes pa dang /lag pa'i nyes pa dang /mchod rten gyi nyes pa dang /dge 'dun gyi nyes
227b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa lci ba rnams ni sangs rgyasu bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga'i spyan sngar gcig pus nyin mtshan du bshags par bya'o//de la bshags pa ni 'di yin te/
227b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o//chos la skyabasu mchi'o//dge 'dun la skyangasu mchi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
227b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo//rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo//rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tsha lo//klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo//
227b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba'i sngol phyag 'tsha lo//dpal dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo//rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo//rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshalo//mthong ba don yod la phyag 'tshal lo//
228a1(dkon brtsegs): rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo//dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo//dpal byin la phyag 'tshal lo//tshungs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//tshangs
228a2(dkon brtsegs): pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo//chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo//chu lha'i lha lo phyag 'tshal lo//dpal bzangs la phyag 'tshal lo//tsan dani dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
228a3(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo//'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo//me
228a4(dkon brtsegs): tog dpal la phag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa
228a5(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma ma'i 'od zer rnams pha rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo//nor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//mtshan dpal
228a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo//dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal
228a7(dkon brtsegs): lo//g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo//rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal
228b1(dkon brtsegs): mang mas sa na masam thama.an tan thas mamatha.a mas
228b2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo//rin chen pad myas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad mo la
228b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bzhugs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
228b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dgra thams cad bdagra la dgongs su gsol//bdag gis
228b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba 'di dang skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas/'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sdig pa'i las bgyis pa dang /bgyid du stsal pa dang //bgyid pa la rjes
228b6(dkon brtsegs): s+yo yid rang ba'am/mchod rten gyi dkor ram/dge 'dun gyi dkor ram/phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor phrogs pa dang /'phrog tu stsol ba dang /'phrog pa la rjes su
228b7(dkon brtsegs): yid rang ba 'am/mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang /bgyid du stsal ba dang /bgyid pa la rjes su yid rang ba'am/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang
228b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par blang ba la zhugs pa dang /'jug tu skyel ba dang /'jug pa la rjes su yid rang ba 'am/las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas/bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi
229a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/yi dgas kyi yul du mchi ba 'am/yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba 'am/klak+ko skye ba 'am/lha tshe rings po rnams kyi
229a2(dkon brtsegs): nang du skye ba 'am/dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba 'am/lta ba log pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am/sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par mo bgyid par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa
229a3(dkon brtsegs): gang legs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shesu gyur pa/spyan du gyur pa/dbang du gyur pa/tshang mar gyur pa/mkhyen par gzigs pa de dag gi
229a4(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar mthol lo//'chags so//mi 'chab po//mi srid do//slan chad kyang sdom par bgyod leg so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongasu gsol//bdag
229a5(dkon brtsegs): gis skye ba 'di dang /skye ba thog ma dang thu ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su skyes pa la zas kham cig tsam
229a6(dkon brtsegs): sprul po gang legs pa dang /tshul khrims bsrungs pa gang lags pa dang /bdag gis tshangs par skyed pa la gnas pa'i dge bo'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /badrug gis
229a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongasu smin par bgyis pa'i dge bo'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /bdag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /bdag gi bla na med pa'i ye shes
229b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te/sdom nus bla na mas mchis pa dang /gong na ma mchis pa dang /gong ma'i yang gong mar
229b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o//ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongasu bsngos pa dang /
229b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ma 'ong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yong su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar yongasu bsdu bar mdzad
229b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ltar bdag gis kyang yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o//sdig pa thams cad bshagaso//bsod nams thams cad la rje su yid rang ngo //sangs rgyas thams cad la gsil ba 'debs
229b5(dkon brtsegs): so//bdag gi ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag du ltar bzhugs pa dang /gang dag 'das pa dag dang de bzhin gang ma byon yon tan bsngags
229b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas rgyal tshe 'dra kun la/thal mo sbyar ba bgyis tre skyabasu nye bar mchi/shA rI'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga po de dgi/
229b7(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o//de ltar sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa
230a1(dkon brtsegs): de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid kyang sems can rnam par thar par bya ba kho na'i phyir zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do//de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye
230a2(dkon brtsegs): bo 'khrul pa rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings lus kyang mi g.yo la sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang
230a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed//shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po snying
230a4(dkon brtsegs): rjechen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/sems can dmal ba dang drod 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten
230a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba nye bar ston par byed//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin
230a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog gi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can
230a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid drag po'i ting 'dzin
230b1(dkon brtsegs): la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/brgya byin pang tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
230b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa ni sems can yongs smin par bya ba'i phyir/nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis
230b3(dkon brtsegs): su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nyo bar ston par byed//byang chub sems dpa' sems
230b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do/
230b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba
230b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gzugs nye bar ston par byed//shA ri'i bu de ltar na skyes bu de ma pa rnams ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs/la lar ni
230b7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gzugs/la lar ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed la/chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/byang
231a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni sems can+da yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa sna rmugs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par rig pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna
231a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang de la bdag tu dmigs pa yang med/sems can du dmigs pa yang med la/sems can+da rnams la 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs nye bar
231a3(dkon brtsegs): ston par yang byed pa'i phyir ro//shA rI'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra skad gang yin pa de/byi lhas bzod par nus snyam 'am/shA ri'i bus
231a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lpags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/spos kyi glang po che'i kha li gang yin
231a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bong bus bzod pa de nus snyam 'am/shA rI'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu 'di
231a6(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de mi dbul pos bzod par nus sgyu ma 'am/shA rI'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan

231b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rnams kyis sems dpa' bya dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs bskyed pa las byung zhing shes pa las rnam par byung ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa dang /nyes pa 'gyod po'i gnas
231b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas rnam byar skyong ba gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi thegs pa

231b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sde tha ma'o//de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dir song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
231b8(dkon brtsegs): pos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'duko/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor/
232a1(dkon brtsegs): gyes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas nAng du yang dag par bzhug pa na sems la yongasu rtog pa 'di lta bu

232a5(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i sdom po ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis/
232a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog lags par bka' stsal na/ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las 'dul ba la mkhas pab mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du bzung nas
232a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa thob cing 'khor rnams la rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba de ltar/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan du gsol/bgyi lagaso snyam ste/bcom
232b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gcigs ga dben par gnas nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na/sems pa bdag dri bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa yongs
232b2(dkon brtsegs): /snyam pa de lta bu'i ying su rtog pa skyes par gyur mig nA/da'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi 'khor dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po 'dre
