232b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de'i phyir khyod kyis nyan thob kyis thog pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni sbyor ba gzhan dang lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongasu dag pa yin par smros shig/theg pa chen po la yang
232b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa na ya skyo shu gzhan dang lhag pa'i bas mas gzhan gyis yongasu dag pa yin par smros shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
232b6(dkon brtsegs): bang 'khor nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan/lhag pa'i bskum pa yang gzhan la/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skye
232b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang gzhan lhag pa'i ngesam pa yang gzhon yin pa'i phyir/nye bar 'khor del nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg po chen po la yang drag byezhugs
233a1(dkon brtsegs): mam/sa sa nathamasamama.a macanathas masma khams mama
233a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa nyid dang /shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin la/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
233a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshul khrims yong su dag pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yong sum dag pa nyid dang shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/nye bar
233a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye ba len par mi byed do//de ni nyan thos kyi me kha nga'i tshul khrims yong su drug pa nyid min la/de ni zlog pa chen po la
233a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa nyid dang /shin tu 'tshal ba'i tshul /khrims nyid yin pa'i phyi ro//nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par
233a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yong su dag pa nyid gang yin pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa nyid dang shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid du gyur pa
233a7(dkon brtsegs): nga na/nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa tshad med grangs med ngar srid du'i skye ba yin kyang sems yong du mi skyo zhing ming su mi
233a8(dkon brtsegs): skyob de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yong su dag pa nyid yin la/de ni nyan thos kyi theg po pa'i tshul khrims yong su ma dog pa nyid dang /
233b1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu tshul pa'i tshul khrims nyud yin//nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis rdeg du chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrub pa ni rjes bsrung ba dang bcas pa
233b2(dkon brtsegs): drin par smros shig/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjesu bsrung ba med pa yin par smros shig/thug pa chen po la yang dge par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa/
233b3(dkon brtsegs): nI bco bu yod pa yin par smros shig/nyan thos kyi zag pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bco su med pa yin par smros shig/zag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
233b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa ni ring du rje su zhugs pa yin par smros shig/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin par smros shig/nye bar 'khor 'di la ji ltar na theg pa chen po la
233b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rjesu bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la/nyan thos kyi theg pa po rnams kyi bslab pa rje su bsrung ba med pa yin zhe na/nye bar
233b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di la thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyi rjesu 'jug par bya dgos kyi/nyan
233b7(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ni mi dgos te/nye bar 'khor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag pa bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rje su bsrung ba dang bcas
234a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin la/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rnga su bsrung ba med pa yino//nye bar 'khor ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
234a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrub pa bco su yod pa yin le/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa bco su med pa yin zhe na/nye bar 'khor 'di la the ga pa chen po la yang dag par
234a3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni galA tI snga dro'i dus kyi cha nyes pa byed la/gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma drul bas gnas par byedan
234a4(dkon brtsegs): thig pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu ma gtugs pa kho ni yin//gal te gung tshogs kyi dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/
234a5(dkon brtsegs): phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang sa bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung
234a6(dkon brtsegs): po ma gtugs pa kho na yi no//gal te phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la mtshan mo'i thun dang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/theg pa chen
234a7(dkon brtsegs): po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yong su ma gtugs pa khe na yin//gal te mtshan mo'i thun dang po la gnas pa byung la/mtshan ma'i gung
234b1(dkon brtsegs): thun la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu ma gtugs pa kho na
234b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no//mtshan mo'i gung thun la nyes pa byung la/mtshan mo'i gung thun tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
234b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu ma gtugs pa kho na yi no//nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen+da pa le yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab
234b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni bco su yod pa yin te/de la ni byang chub sems dpas 'gyod pa'i kun nas ldang ba ha cang bskyed par mi bya zhing /ha cang yid la gcagasra par yang mi bya'o//nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa
234b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dang yang du nyes pa byung na ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang /rab tu nyams pa dang /yongasu gtugs pa yin par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nyan thos kyi
234b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spyang ba'i phyir mug dang gos la tshe 'bar ba lta bur bya dgos pa'i phyir te/de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa da lhag po'i bsam pas yongasu mya ngan mas
234b7(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcosu med pa yin no//nye bar 'khor ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslob pa ring
235a1(dkon brtsegs): du rjes su zhugs pa yin la/nyan thos kyi theg smra ba rnams kyi bslab pa mthar chags pa yin zhe na/nye bar 'khor 'di la gal te theg pa chen po la yang/
235a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang /dga' ba dang dga' mgur spyad pa byas kyang byung
235a3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems mi gtong na/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs po'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su ma gtugs pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o//de ci'i
235a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni rmi lam na yang
235a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun du reg par mi 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod skabs kyang yod par 'gyur ba dang /nye bar 'khor yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
235a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas ni srid pa gcig gis nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mi byed de/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag/
235a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rim gyis zad par 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pas ni de'i skad cig tsam yang srid par skye
235b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi bya ba'i phyir te/nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin la/nyan
235b2(dkon brtsegs): zos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin no//nye bar 'khor de lta bas na theg po chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni
235b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa dang /bcos su yod pa dang /ring du rjes su zhugs pa yin par smros shig/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjes su bsrung ba med
235b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /bcos su med pa dang /mthar chags pa yin par smos shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/nye bar 'khor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni tshogs chen po dang
235b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin pas na/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu skyo bas ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor
235b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bslab pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/nye bar 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang de gzigs pas ni theg pa
235b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gcig tu skyo ba'i gtam mi gsung /gcig tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gtam mi gsung /gcig tu
236a1(dkon brtsegs): yid 'byung ba'i gtum mi gsung bar dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ngo //zab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang //
236a2(dkon brtsegs): phra ba dang brtags pa dang /'gyod pa med pa dang /kun nas ldang ba med pa'i gtam gsung ngo //thigs pa med pa dang /sgrib pa med pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi gtam gsung ste/de dag
236a3(dkon brtsegs): gis gtam de dag thos nas mngon par dga' zhing 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med pa yang yongasu rdzogs par
236a4(dkon brtsegs): byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'dri skad ces gsol//bcom ldan 'das nongs pa gang lags pa de dag las kha cig ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par
236a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa lags/kha cig ni zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags/kha cig ni gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan par gsung ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das ci 'dod chags dang mtshungs par
236a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'am/'on te zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/'on te gti mug dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'am/gang zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
236a7(dkon brtsegs): nangs pa shin tu lci bar 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bangar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nye bar 'khor gal te theg pa
236b1(dkon brtsegs): tshon po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byung bar gyur la/zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan
236b2(dkon brtsegs): paba'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni gcig gcig byung bar gyur na yang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa tshad mar byas na zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang
236b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa de dag pas chos nyes pa lci bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nye bar 'khor zhe sdang ni sems can yong su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin la/'dod chags ni sem
236b4(dkon brtsegs): can sdud par 'gyur ba yin te/nye bar 'khor de la sems can sdud par 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang /'jigs pa med la/sems can
236b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gtong bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgyu bag dang 'jigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro//nye bar 'khor de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags
236b6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dral ba bul la/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung ba dang /zhe sdang ni 'bral ba myur la/kha na me tho ba dang bcas pa che bA dang /gti mug 'bral ba bul la/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che bar gsung
236b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de la/nye bar 'khor 'bral ba dul la kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung ba gang yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ma yin par blta'o//'bral ba myur la kha na ma zo ba dang
237a1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa che ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa yin pas/rmi lam na yang 'dod par mi bya'o//nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis byang chub sems
237a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye bag dang nyos pa med pas de dag thams cad ni nyes pa ma yin par smos
237a3(dkon brtsegs): shig/zhe sdang dang mtshungs par ldan po'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpe'i skye bag dang nyes pa yod pas/de dag thams cad ni nyes pa yin par smros shig/
237a4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'khor de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs la mi mkhas pa de dag ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyes pa dag 'jigs par byed la/zhe sdang dang mtshungs par
237a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do//byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs la mkhas pa de dag ni zhe sdang dang mtshungasre par ldan pa'i nyes pa gang dag gis 'jigs par byed la 'dod
237a6(dkon brtsegs): chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag gis ni 'jigs par mi byed do//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dres par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di
237a7(dkon brtsegs): da ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shin tu dul ba'i chos thams cad la 'dul ba ci zhig mchis/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
237b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal gal te byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes na ni de bzhin gshegs pa yang dang yang du 'dul ba 'cha' bar mi mdzad
237b2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhig na/gang gi phyir sems can rnams kyis mi shes pa de'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos thams cad shin tu dul ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rim gyis bya ba'i 'dul ba 'cha' bar
237b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jim dpal gzhon nur gyur po 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa
237b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bshad pa 'di la ci yang mi ston lags na/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di bstan pa 'ga' zhig legs par ston par mdzad
237b5(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal dge slong nye bar 'khor 'dul ba la mkhas pa nyan par 'dod kyis shin tu dul
237b6(dkon brtsegs): ba las rtsoms la khyod spobs par gyis shig/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa nye bar 'khor chos thams cad ni shin tu du
237b7(dkon brtsegs): bste/rang gi sems gdul ba'i phyir shin du dul ba kun du ston to//chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/bdag mi dmigs pa'i 'gyod pa dul ba kun du ston to//chos pas/
238a1(dkon brtsegs): cad ni phyin ci ma log pa ste rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i phyir shin tu dul ba kun tu ston to//chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtha'i sgo yin te//bslab pa la rlom
238a2(dkon brtsegs): sems med par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa yongs su dag pa kun du ston to//chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa dang /blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa ste bsam gyis mi khyab pas
238a3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa nyid kun du ston to//chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa dang gnas med pa ste yun ring du mi gnas pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongasu dag pa kun du ston to//
238a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni namakha'i mtha' la gnas pa ste//dngos po dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin med pa nyid kun tu ston to//chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med par gyur pa
238a5(dkon brtsegs): ste sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kun du ston to//chos thams cad ni gdags pa dang bral ba ste//sems
238a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa'i phyir the tshom sbyang pa kun du ston to//btsun pa nye bar 'khor de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su rtogs pa chos kyi dbyings shin du dul po
238a7(dkon brtsegs): yin te/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos nyid 'di la mamos pa de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las ring du gyur pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das
238b1(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni gang dang gang ston pa de dag thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa kho na las
238b2(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te ston lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang //bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nye bar 'khor 'jam dpal gzhon nung
238b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i chos ston pa ni rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa yin te/bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la ma brten par rnam par grol ba med pas na//de'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
238b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang //sems la mos pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das
238b5(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan na lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
238b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nye bar 'khor 'di la dge slong gal te 'dod chags spang bar sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//
238b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te zhe sdang spang ba dang gti mug spang bar sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te 'dod chags kyi chos kyang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan no zhes de snyam
239a1(dkon brtsegs): sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te zhe sdang gi chos kyang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang gzhan pa dang /gti mug gi chos kyang gzhan la sangs rgyas
239a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyang gzhan no zhes de snyam sems na lhag po'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te dga' ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//bya ba la sems na lhag pa'i
239a3(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//rnam par grol ba la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//stong pa nyid la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//mtshan ma med pa la sems
239a4(dkon brtsegs): na lhag pa'i ngo rgyal la spyod pa yin no//smon pa med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyalo la spyod pa yin no//mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems na lhog pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//
239a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba med pa la sems ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//dngos po med pa la sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te chos rnams yod do snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga
239a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal la spyod pa yin no//chos thams cad mi rtag go snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//chos thams cad stong pa yang bya ba ci yod ces de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal
239a7(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa yin no//de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal gang she na/gal te bdag gis thams cad
239b1(dkon brtsegs): las khyad par du 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la sems bskyed do zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes da snyam
239b2(dkon brtsegs): sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin par sems te de snyam du sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal lo skyed pa yin no//gal te/
239b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni zab pa 'di ni zab pa ma yin no zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te 'dris ni rnam par dag par 'gyur la 'dis ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ro zhes de
239b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam sams na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so zhes ji snyam sems na
239b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te 'di ni rigs so//'di ni mi rigs so//zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can
239b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no//'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//dal te 'di ni lam yin no//'di ni lam ma yin no zhes de snyam sems na
239b7(dkon brtsegs): lhulhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//gal te myur du bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod
240a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no//dal te chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas 'di la bsam par bya ba med do zhes de snyam sems na lhag pa'i nga rgyal la spyod pa yin no//
240a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas bsam par bya ba ci yang med do zhes de snyam sems na dmigs pa chen po yin te/da ni
240a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces
240a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa lags//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor
240a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nye bar 'khor dge slong gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la mngon par zhen par mi byed na/de ni
240a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa de nyid rgya cher ston cing de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//gang dag
240a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas chos rnams 'di shes pa'i//mi rnams de dag rtag tu bde ba yin//chos dang chos min rnams rtog med pa ste//thams cad sems kyi spros pas phye ba yin//thams cad
240b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam yas thams cad byung min pas//dngos dang dngos med shes pa rnam par zhig/byis pa gang dag sems kyi dbang song ba//de dag srid pa bye ba brgyar sdug bsngal//dge slong glang dag bsam
240b2(dkon brtsegs): yas yod min pa'i//sangs rgyas mi mchog de sems tshul bzhin min//rtog pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnam par brtags//rtag pa de yang nam yang byung ma yin/gang dag
240b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams stong la sems byed pa'i//byis pa de dag lam ngan zhugs pa yin//chos rnams stong pa yi ges brjod pa ni//de dag yi ge med par ye shes bstan//gang dag zhi
240b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing rab zhi'i chos sems pa'i//sems dpa' de yang nam yang byung ma yin//spros kun sems kyi rnam par rtog yin te//de phyir chos rnams bsam yas rtogs par gyis//
240b5(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di thams cad sems med sems pa med//ji srid mi sems de srid stong pa yin//mi grang stong la sems par byed 'dod pa//bsam yas kun la phyir zhing sems pa
240b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/mig nI thams cad ldan na mthong 'gyur te//mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba gang yin pa'ang //mtshan mo rkyen rnams med na mthong mi 'gyur//de phyi ldan dang bral
240b7(dkon brtsegs): brnam rtog yin//mig ni snang la brten pa yid 'ong dang //yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas//de ltar ldan las brten te mthong bas na//de phyir mig gis nem yang
241a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba med//yid du 'od bu'i sgra grags grang yin pa//de yang nam yang nang du zhugs pa med//der 'gro dmigs su yod pa ma yin te//rtog pa'i dbang gis smra///
241a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams byung ba yin//chos rnams 'di dag yi gre'i sgra skad kyis//grangs dang tha snyad gdags par bstan pa yin//chos dang chos min nam yang yod min yang //skye bo byis pa//
241a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de mi snang //sbyin pa bsngags pa 'jig rten ngas brjod kyang //ser sna'i chos de'ang dmigs su yod ma yin//de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams bsam yas te//de yang dmigs/
241a4(dkon brtsegs): med de yang mthong ba med//tshul khrims bya ba dag pa ngas bshad kyang //'chal pa'i tshul khrims mkha' la lag pa bzhin//tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad mkha' 'dra ste//
241a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tshul bzang de yang de dang 'dra//bzod pa gya nom nga yis bshad byas kyang //de yi rang bzhin nam yang mthong ba med//'di ni chos 'ga'ang 'khrug pa yod min yang //bzod/
241a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang rgyalnga bas rab tu bshad//nyin mtshan bag yod bya phyir nga yis ni//mi nyal dam pa bsngags pa brjod byas te//bskal pa brgya snyed brtson 'grus bskyed byas kyang //
241a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar mi 'gyur zad pa yod ma yin//bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin gya nom pa'i//ji bzhin sgo dag 'gro la bstan byas te//'di la chos 'ga'ang zad pa yod min/
241b1(dkon brtsegs): yang /1de drag cha shas phye ste rab tu bstan//shes rab chos rnams shes rab gyis shig ces//shes rab lhag mthong blo gros blo brtan kyang //rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa num du yang //
241b2(dkon brtsegs): shes par mi nus de yang nges par bstan//rab dben mchog shes dbyangs la dga' bgyis zhes//dka' thub ngan pa 'jig rten ngas bshad kyang //mchog shes yongasu mi 'thob gang
241b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa//chos de 'dir ni dmigasu yod ma yin//sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te//sems can stong phrag du ma skyob byas kyang //grang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro/
241b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i/'gro ba de dag nam yang yod ma yin//grang dag ral dri mda' chen mtshon 'byin pa'i//gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te//rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na//lus la
241b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bab mthong de na mtshon cha med/6/sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha bye zhing //gaskor gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba//'dri na de la'ang byed pa 'ga' med te//de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis
241b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhug pa yin//rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnam brtags te//'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye//'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang byung min te//yongasu rtogs pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin//
241b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro don byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed ces//spyod mchog khyad par 'phags pa bstan byas kyang //byang chub nim yang dmigasu yod min te//'dod pa gang yin de yang yod ma yin//sems
242a1(dkon brtsegs): ni rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag cing //rdul med rdul bral dri ma med par gsungs//byis pa yod pa min la rnam rtog pa//chags kyar sdang bar 'gyur zhing mongs
242a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//mnyam gzhag gya nom chos ni thob 'gyur na//'dod chags yod min sdang med rmongs pa'ang med//'dod chags bral zhing rnam par grol ba'i chos//kun gzhir ma gyur mya
242a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'das pa thob//mkha' 'dra'i chos rnams 'di dag shes gyur na//zhing brgya rnamasu thogs med 'gro 'gyur zhing //de dag yid kyang chags pa med 'gyur bas//de phyir thogs med
242a4(dkon brtsegs): lam ni bskyed par gyis//bskal pa brgya phrag mang por spyad byas shing //sems can brgya phrag mtha' yas grol byas kyang //nam yang sems can dmigs su yod min zhing //
242a5(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'ang yod min mtha' yas gyur pa'ang med//ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'jig rten na//sems can brgya phrag mang po sprul byas te//sprul pa de dag thams cad bsad gyur kyang //mya
242a6(dkon brtsegs): mdu dag bsad pa yod min ltar//'gro ba 'di kun sgyu mi'i rang bzhin te//'di la mtha' ni nam yang dmig su med//gang dag de ltar mtha' yas mos byed pa//de dag 'jig rten
242a7(dkon brtsegs): na ni tshe rab med//gang dag rang bzhin med chos 'di shes pa//dpa' ba de dag 'jig rten mya ngan 'da'//'dod pa'i yon tan spyod kyang chags med cing //chags pa rnam spangs
242b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dul bar byed//'di na sems can 'ga' med srog med kyang //mi dbang rnams ni sems can phan pa mdzad//sems can yod ma yin yang don mdzad pa//de dag rnams kyi de ni
242b2(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba che//ji ltar chad pa bcangs te byis pa la//ston cing lag tu yod ces brjod byas nas//de yis chang pa stong pa mthong nas ni//byis pa de ni tshe nges ngu ba ltar//de bzhin sangs rgyas
242b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa//sems can tshul la mkhas shing mkhyen pa rnams//chos rnams 'di dag gsob gsog mkhyen gyur nas//'jig rten dag la dngos po bstan pa ston//shin
242b4(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba'i bstan pa 'di la ni//khyim pa'i rtag spangs rab tu 'byung gyis la//'bras bu yod pa'i mchog tu 'gyur gyis shes//thugs rje can gyis de skad bstan pa'ang mdzad//khyim
242b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtags spangs rab tu 'byung gyur nas//'bras bu thams cad thob par 'gyur yang ni//chos kyi rang bzhin dag la gzhal byas nas//'bras bu kun med 'bras bu thob pa'ang med//'on
242b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'bras bu thob pa thob gyur pa/kye ba mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa yi//rgyal bas rigs pa shin tu legs bshad ces//de dag ngo mtshar che ba skye bar 'gyur//de ltar zhi ba'i chos rnams de dag
242b7(dkon brtsegs): la//'di dag dbang po bsam gtan rnam dag dang //stobs dang byang chub yan lag zhi ba zhes//ming dang tshig stong snyed kyi bstan pa mdzod//dbang po 'ga' yang ma skyes stobs kyang
243a1(dkon brtsegs): min//byang chub yan lag zhi ba'ang ma skyes te//chos 'di gzugs can ma yin gzugs med kyang //'jig rten dag la shes pa'i stobs kyang bshad//'gro ba
243a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la thob pa ngas bshad pa//de kun mtshan ma rnam par spang ba yin//'di na gang dag bdag gis thob sems pa//de ni ma thob thob par rlom sems med//'jig rten dag
243a3(dkon brtsegs): na gang dag ngoms med pa//de la thob pa 'ga' yang yod ma yani//thob dang thob med 'gro la ston mdzad pa//gang gis de ltar shes pa de thob yin//kun las khyad zhugs
243a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu thob pa yi//sems can de ngas sems can med par bstan//de la sems can nam yang dmigs med de//sems can med na gang gis 'thob par 'gyur//zhing
243a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos gang la sa bon yod min pa//de la myu gu skye ba med pa ltar//de bzhin sems can nam yang dmigasu med//sems can med la thob pa ga la yod//sems can 'di
243a6(dkon brtsegs): kun mya ngan 'das pa ste//'di la rtsa ba nam yang dmigasu med//gang zhig chos tshul 'di la mos gyur pa//de ngas lhag med mya ngan 'das pa bstan//sangs rgyas brgya mang
243a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'das gyur pa//de dag gis kyang sems can kun ma btul//gal te sems can 'ga' 'dir byung gyur na//de dag nam yang mya ngan 'das mi 'gyur//de ltar
243b1(dkon brtsegs): lAm 'di sgrib pa yod min te//de la nam yang chags pa yod ma yin//gang dag chos nyid 'di la mos gyur pa//de dag yid ni sred la chags mi 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis
243b2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa bsgrubs pa bstan pa na/dge sbyong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//byang chu sems dpa' drug khris ni mi
243b3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di
243b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nye bar 'khor de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/sems
243b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang //'jam dpalnga gzhon nur
243b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang //byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /dge slong de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang //lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang //dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom
243b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u stong phrag brgya pa las 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa nye bar
244a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/'dul ba nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho////mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /pradz+nyA barma dang /lo ts+tsha ba zhang ye shes sde la sogs
244a2(dkon brtsegs): pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//sho lo ka drug brgya//bam po gnyis so////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya A d+yA sha ya san tso da nA ma ma hA ya na/
244a3(dkon brtsegs): su tra/bod skad du/'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo////bam pa dang ngo //sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
244a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das pa ra na sin drang srong lhung ba ri dag kyi nang na//dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
244a5(dkon brtsegs): dong /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya phral cher dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa las kyi sgrib pa bsal ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' kha
244a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig 'du 'dzi la dga' bar gnas shing gnyid la dga' ba dang /las la dga' ba dang /smra ba la dga' ba dang /spros pa la dga' ba dang /sbags pas sbags par gyur pa
244a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rigs pa med pa dang /mi brtson pa dang /le lo can dang /brtson 'grus dman pa dang sbyor ba btang bar gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
244b1(dkon brtsegs): pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yon tan ma yin pa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di dang ldan par mthong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam sems te/kyem
244b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba las yongs su nyams kyus//bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bskul bar bya//dran par bya
244b3(dkon brtsegs): gor ma chag snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/byang chub sems dpa'adi dag gol
244b4(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang /yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs
244b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//ci rigs kyi bu dag khyed dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel ba 'am yongs su nyams par ma gyur tam/de dag gis
244b6(dkon brtsegs): smyos pa/tshe dang ldan pa byams pa bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams te 'phel bar ma gyur//bdag cag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam pa'i the tshom
244b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang bdag cag gi sems kun nas dkris shing 'dug go/bdag cag log par ltung ba'i chos can yin nam//log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin zhig gu snyam pa'i 'gyod pas kyang
245a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gi sems kun nas dkris shing 'dug ste bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos rnams la yang 'dun pa mi skye'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems
245a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas//byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu dag khyed tshur shog bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
245a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa//thams cad gzigs
245a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ye shes sgrib pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa ste/des khyod kyi spyod pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par 'gyur
245a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' drug cu tsam po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhag/
245a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas gdong la mchi ma zag cing mgo ma
245a7(dkon brtsegs): bteg go/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang //bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te//bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
245b1(dkon brtsegs): bskor bu byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag lnga 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed ma du ma 'gyod par longs//
245b2(dkon brtsegs): khyed nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi rtog par dga' zhing mgu la yI rangs pas gzhan la gtse zhing gshe ba byas te/las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas da ltar khyed
245b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs shing chod de kun nas bskor cing kun nas dkris nas brtson par mi nus so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' drug cu po de dag gis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas//pus mo g.yas
245b4(dkon brtsegs): pipa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag gis gang thos na rang
245b5(dkon brtsegs): gi sems bzlog par bgyid cing las kyi sgrib pa gzhan yang mngon par 'du mi bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bdag cag gi las kyi sgrib pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bka' stsal du gsol/
245b6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa drug cu po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
245b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa log pa dang sel gyi gsung rab la khyod rab tu byung ste 'khod pa na tshul khrims kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang //thos pa'i rgyags pas myos pa dang //sbyangs pa'i yon
246a1(dkon brtsegs): tan dang yo byad bskyangs pa la mngon par zhan pa dang /dge slong chos smra ba gnyis la 'di ltar rnyed pa dang bkur bsti'i rgyu dang //mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /
246a2(dkon brtsegs): slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi gzhi las phrag dog dang //ser sna dang ldan pas 'khrigs pas skur pas skur te//chos smra ba'i dge slong de gnyis kyi mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang
246a3(dkon brtsegs): slongs mo ster ba'i khyim du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag kyang khyed kyis phyi the tso spyad cing ma dad par byas la//dge slong chos smra ba de gnyis kyi mi snyan pa mang po dag kyang smras//sems
246a4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bcad cing dge ba la sgrib pa byas te mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa des khyed lo drug khrir sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so//lo bzhi
246a5(dkon brtsegs): khrir ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skyes so//lo nyi khrar ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu skyes so//lo brgyad stong du ni sems can dmyal chen po che bar
246a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes so//khyed de nas shi 'phos nas mi'i lus rnyed pa rnyed nas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mig med de dmus long du gyur to//khyed las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis bsgribs nas gang dang grang du
246a7(dkon brtsegs): smyos pa de dag thams cad du sems brtul ba dang brjed nges par gyur to//mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgrib pas bsgribs shing dbang chung bar grags par gyur to//mi sdug pa'i skyon gyis zil gyis
246b1(dkon brtsegs): nan pa dang /smras pa dang /bshung ba dang /skur pa mang bar yul ngan pa dang //yul 'khor ngan pa dang ljongs ngan pa dag tu/rigs dran pa dang dbul po'i rigs dag tu skyes nas//rnyed pa chung
246b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /bkur bsti chung ba dang //mi bkur ba dang mi mchod par gyur to//khyed 'di nas shi 'phosra nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe//yul ngan pa sha stag tu rigs
246b3(dkon brtsegs): dma' ba dang dngul po dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/skur pa mang ba dang //brjed ngas pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyong ba dang /brtson pa byas kyang bar chad 'byung ba dang //snang ba byung yang phyir nub
246b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//khyed lnga brgya tha ma la las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te/zad par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
246b5(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar 'gyur te//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de yang khyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur//de nas rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
246b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa pa drug cu po de dag gi gdong las mchi ma phyis nas skyo zhing skyo ba'i yid kyis yang dag par dga' ste//spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
246b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa pa'i gang zag rnams la tha ba'i nongs pa'i sems bskyed pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa dang //gzhan yang las kyi sgrib pa gang ci mngon par
247a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus bgyis pa rnams bdag cag gis bshags so//bcom ldan 'das dang slan chad bdag cag 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yid dam 'di/
247a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu bca' bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gi ltung ba med pa 'am/med pa ma lags pa yang rung ste/
247a3(dkon brtsegs): glengs na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gi deng slan chad
247a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la brnyas sam//de la mi snyan pa brjod na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
247a5(dkon brtsegs): bslus par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim pa 'am//rab tu byung ba yang rung ste//'dod pa'i

247b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zag rnams kyi lus la gnod pa 'am//sems la gnod pa bgyis na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis

247b5(dkon brtsegs): nor thob pa 'am//lus dang srog dang yang ma bsngos na/bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan
247b6(dkon brtsegs): chad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag la brnyas te bdag cag ni ches drag gi dri dag ni de lta ma yin no snyam na//bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus
247b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad dma' ba'i sems dang gdol pa dang /khyi'i sems lta bur gnas pa ma bgyis na/bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs
248a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la bslus par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi deng slan chad bdag la bstod dam//gzhan la smad na//bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
248a2(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga bslus par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad gnod sems dang //rtsod pa'i 'jigs pas bskul ma thag tu dpag tshad dam dpag tshad brgyar
248a3(dkon brtsegs): ma phyin na//bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad bdag nyid tshul khrims dang ldan par khas
248a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho 'am//mang du thos pa 'am//sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa 'am yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig bdag gis brjod na//bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par
248a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad dge ba'i mi spyom shing sdig pa mi bca' bar gnas par ma bgyis nu//bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
248a6(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dra ba'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag la legs so
248a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba byin te//rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so//tshig de khyed kyis legs par smras so//yang dag par blang ba 'di khyed kyis legs par byas so//khyed yang dag
248b1(dkon brtsegs): par blang ba 'di la gnas na/las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa yang thob par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
248b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa//byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar 'dod pas ji ltar kyi bu 'dri dag gis byas pa de bzhin du yid dam bca'o//
248b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci rigs kyi bu 'di dag yi dam 'di yongs su rdzogs
248b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid par 'gyur lags sam//'on te yongs su gtong bar 'gyur lags/bka' stsal pa//byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni yid dam 'di lus dang srog gi phyir yang spong bar

248b6(dkon brtsegs): pa pa'i gang zag chos du dang ldan ni//lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe ma snad cing ma sbas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'gyur lags/de skad ces

255b1(dkon brtsegs): don dang ldan pa yin gyi/don dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang /chos dang ldan pa yin gyi cho sa dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang /nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa 'phe/

255b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na spobs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs par rig par bya'o//byams pa dge slong ngam/dge slong mA 'om/dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang su yang
255b4(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/rgyu bzhi po 'di dag gi spobs pas spobs pa 'am/spobs par 'gyur yang rung ste/de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can dag gis de dag la sangs
255b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas su 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing ston par 'du shes byas nas dam pa'i chos mnyan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na//byams pa legs par smras pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni
255b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis gsungs po yin pa'i phyir ro//byams pa dri la gang zag la sdang ba'i phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes spobs pa bzhi po dge spong zhing de dag la
255b7(dkon brtsegs): mgus pa bskyed par byed pa des ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i spobs pa thams cad spangs pa yin te/chos spangs nas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pas
256a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan sdong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//byams pa de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i las las yongs su grol bar/
256a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas gang zag la sdang ba'i phyir chos la sdang bar mi bya'o//byams pa spobs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis spangs pa yin te/byams pa bzhi gang zhe na/spobs pa don med
256a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyi/don dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /chos dang mi ldan pa yin gyi/chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi/nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa
256a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang /'khor bzhi nyes pa 'phel bar byed pa yin gyi/mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang phan yon mi ston pa ste/byams pa spobs pa bzhi po de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis
256a5(dkon brtsegs): spangs shing ma gnang ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor ba 'phel bar
256a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i spobs pa sangs rgyas kyis ma gnang ba legs na/byang chub kyi yan ldag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
256a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phan 'dogs pa lags par bstan cing 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang bka' stsal pa/'di ji lta ba zhig lags te/bcom ldan 'das spobs pa 'di
256b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa ma lags par mi 'gyur lags grang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag
256b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs pa yin par bstan cing 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa bstan pa gang yin pa de don dang ldan pa yin nam/'on te don dang
256b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par smra bas smra bar bgyid na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du///
256b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa la dga' ba ni don dang ldan pa legs shing chos dang ldan pa lags shes mchi na yang dag par smra bas slu ba lagaso//bka' stsal pa/byams pa de lta bas na rnam grangs
256b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/nyon mongs pa phan 'dogs par 'gyur bar bstan pa dang /'khor
256b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa ni legs par smras pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir na na/byams pa don gang la byang
256b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbang phyug thabs la mkhas pa rnams kyis dbang bya ba dang /gang na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yo su ma yin pa de na nyon mongs par blta bar
257a1(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ste/nyon mongs pa'i gnad pa ma yin no//byams pa de lta mod kyu nyon mongs pa gzhan dag la phran par mi 'gyur ba dang /byang chub kyi yan lag yongasu/
257a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa don du mi 'gyur ba dang /don dang ldan pa yang ma yin pa dang //dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i rgyur yang mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la ni/byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog
257a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bsngo bar bya'o/nyon mongs pa de'i dbang du 'gro bar ni mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byam pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i nyon mongs pa
257a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang gzhan yin la/byang chub sems dpa' stobs bskyed pa ma yin pa'i sa la chags pa rnams kyi yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
257a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' gang
257a6(dkon brtsegs): las kyi sgrib pa mngon par 'du mi bo byed par 'tshal ba dang /las kyi sgrib pa sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang /ma sdud cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar par 'tshal bas lnga brgya
257a7(dkon brtsegs): pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mos par bgyi'o//the tshom ma mchis par mang bar bgyi'o//gzhan gyi 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang /phan yon yongs su
257b1(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba dang /sring po btsal bar 'gyir//bkar sprul ba/byams pa de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa spyod pa rnams la the tshom med pa mang bar bya'o//
257b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ro//byams pa dper na rgyun du zhugs pa ni so so'i
257b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i spyod pa yang snang la/bris pa so so'i nyes pa dag gas kyang gos par mi 'gyur te/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug gang dag gis byas pa so so skye ba rnams log par ltung
257b4(dkon brtsegs): por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug de dag nyid kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ji ltar 'jig tshogs yongs su rtogs pa'i
257b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro//byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams ni bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir chags shing sdang la rmongs par 'gyur du zin kyang /de dag gi sa yang
257b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la/byis pa so sor skye bo rnams kyis yang gzhan no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag gi bag la nyal ni sems la kun nAs dkris shing 'dug pa gang gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
257b7(dkon brtsegs): sam/byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtul zhing nges par 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa rnams dang mnyam par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po shes rab spyod pa rnams ni nyes pa thams cad kyi nang na lci ba byung du zin kyang shes rab kyi stobs kyis rdul du rlog par byed te/de'i rgyus log pa ltung bar 'gro bar
258a2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur ro//byams pa dper no me'i phung po 'bar ba la ni shing gi tshogs chen po bsnun na ji lta ji ltar bsnun pa de lta de ltar de phyir zhing cheng 'bar bar 'gyur gyi/me shi bar mi 'gyu
258a3(dkon brtsegs): ro//byams pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar ba de la ni nyon mongs pa'i len pa ji lta ji ltar bsnan pa de lta de ltar de'i shes rab kyi me
258a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bar bar 'gyur gyi/shi shing zad par mi 'gyur ro//byams pa de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa ni 'jig rten
258a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang mi mthun par rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das las
258a6(dkon brtsegs): dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pas chos gang dag ni yongs su spang bar bgyi/chos gang dag ni kun tu bsten/
258a7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/chos gang dag yongs su spong zhing kun tu bsten par bgyid na/shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa ma skyes pa ni skye bar 'gyur la/skyes pa yang rnam par 'phel zhing yang
258b1(dkon brtsegs): su 'grib par mi 'byung ba lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa byang chub sems
258b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lngas dang po pas khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba dang /shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa zab pa dang /rnyed pa dang bkur bsti yongs su spang ba dang /rnyed pa dang bkur bsti'i nyos pa mthong bar bya'o//
258b3(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'di la dga' ba yongs su thang pa dang /bdu 'jil dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya'o//sgru ba la dga' ba yongs spang ba dang / da la nyis me byo'o//nyid me dga' ba ya sus mdo/nyid
258b4(dkon brtsegs): /dga' ba'i nyes pa mthong bar bya//las ma dga' ga yongs su sbyang ba dang /las sa dga' ba'i rnas pa mthong bar byer//smras pa la dga' ba yongs su spang ba dang /sbas pa la dgra'
258b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes pa mthong bar byar//rnyed pa dang /bkur bsti dang /tshogs su bcad pa yongs su spang ba des ni 'dod pa chung ba bskam par bya'o//'du 'jil dga' ba yongs su tshungs pas ni gni
258b6(dkon brtsegs): pur dga' ba yongs su bstan par bya'o//smra ba la dga' ba yongs su spang bas ni ngan la rtag pa kun tu bsten par bya'o//gnyid la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni nam gyi rgyu snod dang /nam gyi
258b7(dkon brtsegs): ung la mthil bkun tu brten par byer//las la dga' ba yongs su spangs pas ni sems can thams cad la byams bkun du brtan par bya'o//byams pa las dang po pa'i byang rgya sems
259a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa rjes su thob par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams ni yongs su spang bar bya'o//
259a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bsten par bya ba'i chos rnams ni kun tu bsten par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa ye shes kyang rkyen la rag las pa yin la/mi shes pa yang rkyen la rag las pa yin te
259a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni rkyen ma 'tshogs par thob par sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro////bam po gnyis pa ste thu ma/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
259a4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa dang bkur ba ste'i skyon ji ltar mthong bar bgyi/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti'i nongs dmigs ni gang
259a5(dkon brtsegs): lags/byang chub sems dpas gang dge la brtags na 'dod pa chung ngu la dgra' zhing yongs su mo gdung bar 'gyur ba lags bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems
259a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni 'dod chags bskyed pa yin par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni dran pa 'joms par byed par brtag par bya'o///
259a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pas khengs pa dang 'dud par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti nI gti mug bskyed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur
259b1(dkon brtsegs): bsti ni bdag gi don bsgrub pas khyim la ser sna byed pa dang /chags par byed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni g.yo bskyed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti/
259b2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi yongs su spangs pas ngo tsha med pa dang /khrel med pa bskyod par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma
259b3(dkon brtsegs): gnang bar brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa bskyod par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni bla ma rnams khyad
259b4(dkon brtsegs): du gsod par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni bdud kyi phyogs su brtag par bya'o//rnyed po dang bkur bsti ni gcig tu bag med pa'i rtsa ba yin par brtag par
259b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phrog par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni glog dang 'khor lo dang lce 'babI pa lta bur brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang /
259b6(dkon brtsegs): bkur bsti ni skrag sta pA mAng bas sbags par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni mdza' ba shes kyi khyim dang spongs mo ster ba'i khyim la blta bar brtag par bya'o//
259b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni yid mi bde ba bskyed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni blo rnam par 'khrul par byed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni sdug pa'i/
260a1(dkon brtsegs): dngas par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir mya ngan bskyed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni dran pa nye bar gzhug pa bzhi brjod par byed par brtag par
260a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni dkar po'i chos nyam chung bar byed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su nyams par byed par
260a3(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni pha rol gyi dad pa'i bar chad byed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa nyams par byed
260a4(dkon brtsegs): par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni sngar bkur bsti byed la phyis bkur bsti mi byed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni mi mdza' ba dang gnas par
260a5(dkon brtsegs): byed par brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni mdza' bo spong bar brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni pha rol 'drid pa'i phyir smad 'tshong ma dang 'dra bar
260a6(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni bsam gtan dang tshad med pa yongasu spong bar brtag par bya'o//rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud
260a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung bar byed par brtag par bya'o/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni lhas sbyin dang lhag spyod kyi go cha dang mthun par brtag pa
260b1(dkon brtsegs): ra//bya pabyu chub sems dpas rnyed pa dang bkung bstim nyas dmig sa gang dag brtag bya ba ni 'di lta bu 'do nan/brtags nas kyang 'dod pa chung bar bya'i/yongs su gdung bar ma
260b2(dkon brtsegs): spyi byar//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa chung ba la skyon 'di lta bu 'di drug med pa'i phyir te/de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad med pa yin/
260b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/lha dang mi rnams yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir gnas pas rjes su bsrung bar 'os pa yin/ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
260b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis smrig pa med pa yin/sdig pa dang bral bas zil gyis mi non pa yin/dudu kyi yulo las yongs su grol bas mi 'phrogs pa yin/sdug bsngal thams cad kyiskye
260b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshugs pa yin//lha dang mi rnams kyi mngon par 'dod par bya ba yin/bsam gtan la goms par byed par gnas pas gsul ba yin/g.yo dang skye srang pa dang /'angs
260b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan la snron+da du lta bas bag yod pa yin/'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pas ji skad smos pa de bzhin rnyed pa yin/mkhas pa rnams tshangs pa mtshungs par skyed
260b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi 'dim pa yin te/byams pa phan yon 'di lta bu/'di dag shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po mkhas pa rnyed pa dang /dkur brti yongs su spangs
261a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dod pa chung ba la gnas par bya zhing 'dod pa chung ba la kun tu bsten pa
261a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang
261a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i skyon de dag ni gang lags/byang chub sems dpas gang dag la
261a4(dkon brtsegs): brtags na gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'du 'dzi'i nyes dmigs ni
261a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu po 'di dag yin te/nyi shu gang zhe na/byams pa 'di la lus kyi snga ma bsdam pa yin//ngag gis ma bsdams pa yin/yid kyis ma bsdams pa yin
261a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags che ba yin/zhe sdang che ba yin/gti mug che ba yin/'jig rten pa'i gtam gyis kyang gos pa yin/'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam lasra yongs
261a7(dkon brtsegs): su nyams pa yin/chos la ma gus pa la brten pa yin chos yongs su spangs pa yin/de la bdud kyis grags rnyed pa yin/bag med pa la brtan pa yin//
261b1(dkon brtsegs): bag med pa dang ldan pa yin/da rtog pa dang spyod pa shas che ba yin/mang du thos pa las yongs su nyams pa yin/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mi 'thob pa yin/myur du
261b2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod par mi 'gyur ba yin/sangs rgyas la dga' ba lngas yongs su nyams pa yin/chos la dga' ba las yongs su nyams pa yin/dge 'dun la dga' ba las
261b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams pa yin te/byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs yin par rig par bya ste/byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na
261b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pur dga' ba la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba yin+do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//'dod
261b5(dkon brtsegs): chags spangs shing zhe sdang rab spangs nas/rnal 'byor can ni 'du 'dzi mi gnas te/de ni ngi la gzhol zhing dri la 'bab/nyes pa des na dga' bar byed mi 'gyur/
261b6(dkon brtsegs): rgodra dang dgod drang dri bzhin rnam rtog pa//'di drug thams cad 'dra 'dzi rnams las byung //snying po med pa'i 'du 'dzi su byed pa//de ni lang lor spyod cing ma bsdoms yin//
261b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dag ni 'jig rten smra la dga'//byas pa de dag mchog gi lam las nyams//zhe sdang 'di la rnam rtog shes kyang che//nyes po des na de la mi chags so//
263a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa ma yin smra la dga' bskyed nas//dge slong thos pa rnam par 'phel mi byed//de lta bas ni mi rigs smra spongs la//chos la gcig tu
263a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba thob par gyis//byang chub mngon par 'dod phyi nga yis ni//rang gi yan lag lan stong snyed du btang //chos nyan pas ni nga la ngoms med na//chos
263a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa na skyo bar yong mi 'gyur//tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir//nga ni chung ma bu la dga' ma gyur//rgyal srad dag dang longs spyod ngas spangs na//
263a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ji ltar chos ni nyan mi byed//rigs min sgra dang dam pa min smra ba//rnam pa kun tu yongs su spangs par bya//bskalnga pa brgya phrag du mar gang dkon pa/
263a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dam pa de la dga' bskyed cing //thar par 'dod pas yon tan dron gnyer bas//'jig rten bya ba yongs su btsal mi bya//gang zhig zas dang gos kyi
263a6(dkon brtsegs): don tsam 'dod//de ni mchog dang gtso bor bsngags pa yin//gang zhig 'dri zhing dge slong legs par 'ongs//stan yang gdang gis tshur shog 'dug par gyis//
263a7(dkon brtsegs): mi yi rnyed pa rab dkon rnyed gyur gyis//gcig le gcig ni chos kyi gtam yang bya//lung nong kha ton bya ba bsam gtan rnams//khyod kyi dkar po'i phyogs rnams
263b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel gyur tam//gal te khyod ni 'dod na dri bar gyis//khyod la'ang bdag 'dri skabs ni dbye bar gyis//de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan yongs 'das nas//bstan pa rnam par 'jig
263b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba na//dge slong dag ni rgad cing khengs pa dang //dgon pa bor nas 'du 'ji dga' bar 'gyur//rnyed pa dang ni de bzhini zas ched du//nyin dang mtshan rnams su yang
263b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam byed la//byis pa dag ni gnyid log gyur na yang //lo tog skye ba'i rmi lam rmi bar 'gyur//byis pa 'di kun shes pa rab tu nyams//ngan srong ngan 'gro gsum du
263b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhol 'gyur gyis//dga' ba dang ni mos pa bskyed nas kyang //bse ru lta bur rtag tu nags gnas kyisi//yon tan 'dod pa nags na gnas pa yi nI//pha rol dag
263b5(dkon brtsegs): gi skyon la brtag mi bya//bdag ni khyad par 'phags shing bdag mchog ces//de snyam du ni sems bskyed mi bya'o//rgyags 'di bag med kun gyi rtsa ba ste//dge slong/
263b6(dkon brtsegs): dman la brnyas par yongs mi bya//bskal pa gcig gis thar pa thob mi 'gyur//'di ni bstan pa 'di ni go rami bzhin//de ltas dge slong yon tan 'dod gyur pa//dpa'
263b7(dkon brtsegs): bos mi rigs brjod pa spangs nos kyang //dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba yis//bse ru lta bur dgon par gnas par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
264a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dkar po'i chos yongs su sbyongs pa'i slad du 'du
264a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzinangs pa mang po'i skyon chags shing yon tan ma mchis la/gnod pa dang ldan te 'du 'dzis nyon mongs pa 'phel bar bgyid cing /spyod pa bzang po ma lags pa ni
264a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshar lags te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dge ba 'tshul paM su zhig gcig pur dga' ba la mngon par dag bar mi bgyid/bcom ldan
264a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpas smra ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/byang chub sems drabs gang rtogs na don rnam par nges pa la dga' zhing don la rtog
264a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su gdung bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
264a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpas smra ba la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shu yod par brdag par bya'o//nyi shu gang zhe na/
264a7(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di la dge slong sla ba la dga' ba ni mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas gus pa med par 'gyur ba dang /rtsod pa'i smra ba lhur len pas phyogs la mngon
264b1(dkon brtsegs): pabapa zhen par 'gyur ba dang /nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang bral bas dran pa brnyed par 'gyur ba dang /lus dang sems shin tu ma sbyangs pas shes bzhin med par spyad par 'gyur ba dang /
264b2(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa las nyams par khengs pa dang /'dud par 'gyur ba dang /zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su spangs pas sems can gyi rgyud dmu rgod du 'gyur ba dang /smra ba'i spag
264b3(dkon brtsegs): pas sbags pas dus ma yin par smra bar 'gyur ba dang /'phags pa'i shes pa ma thob pas ma bsdams par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang klu rnams kyis ma bkur bar 'gyur pa dang /
264b4(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang /lus mngon sum du gyur pa rnams kyis spyod par 'gyur ba dang /bsgrub pa la mi gnas pas yadi la gcags
264b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang /the tshom ma spangs pas rab tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba dang /sgra lhur len pas thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang /rnam par shes pa'i spyong
264b6(dkon brtsegs): yul can yin pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la chags par 'gyur ba dang /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par mi byed pas myur du chos spong bar byed pa dang /gzhan dang gzhan rtsom pos
264b7(dkon brtsegs): mi brtan zhing rten med par 'gyur ba dang /sems yongs su ma dul bas bkur bsti med par thob par 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi dbyings khong du ma chud pas gzhan gyi dring 'jog par
265a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang /dbang po rnams yongs su ma shes pas nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba ste/byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' smra ba la dga'
265a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing sgra lhur len la rtog pa dang bral ba'i nyes dmigs yin no//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//thos pas rgyags nas gus
265a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te//rnam par 'gyed pa'i smra ba rnams la chags//brjed par 'gyur zhing shes bzhin med par 'gyur//smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go//nang gi
265a4(dkon brtsegs): sems las shin du ring bar 'gyur//lus dang sems kyang rab sbyangs ma yin 'gyur//khengs pa dang ni 'dud pa mang bar 'gyur//smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di
265a5(dkon brtsegs): dgra go/byis pa dam pa'i chos bsam rab tu nyams//sems ni me mnyen shin du rtsub par 'gyur//zhi gnas lhag mthong dag dang rab tu ring //smra la dga'
265a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/rtag tu bla ma dag la gus pa med//sbags pa'i gtam dag la ni dga' ba bskyed//snying po med la gnas shing shes rab nyams//smra la
265a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/de ni lha tshogs rnams kyis mi bkur zhing //de tshe de la'ang 'dod pa mi bskyed la/so so yang dag rig las nyams 'gyur te//sgra
265b1(dkon brtsegs): la dpa' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go//gang dag lus ni mngon sum bag yod pa//mkhas pa de dag gis ni spyi bor 'gyur//de yi srog ni don med 'gyur ba ste//smra la dga' ba'i
265b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag go/bdag ni sgrub nyams da ni ci bya zhes//'chi ba'i dus tshe byis pa mya ngan byed//gting rnyed me gyur shin du sdug bsngal 'gyur//smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di
265b3(dkon brtsegs): dag go//rtsa bskyod bzhin du 'gul zhing g.yo ba ste//de ni de ltar the tshom 'gyur du nges//de ni nam yang blo ldan mi 'gyur te//smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/gar la
265b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i khrod na 'dug pa zhig/dpa' bo gzhan gyi yon tan brjod pa bzhin//bdag nyid nan tan nyams par 'gyur ba ste//smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/de yi sems
265b5(dkon brtsegs): ni rna ba'i rnam shes la//rab tu chagras shIng sgras rgyags shes rab nyams//log par sems shing lam ngan 'gro bar 'gyur//sgra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/de ni g.yo
265b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan srung zhing re chad 'gyur//phyi phyir zhing ni rnam par 'gyed par rtsom//'phags pa rnams kyi chos las rab tu ring //sgra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/mthu chung ba ste//
265b7(dkon brtsegs): steng gis ni dgar 'gyur te//mi shes ldan pa g.yo zhing 'gyur ba yin//spre'u ltar de yi sems ni g.yo bar 'gyur//smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go/rang gi blo ni
266a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pas dman pa'i phyir//rmongs pa de ni glezhan gyi dring la 'jog/de ni nyon mongs phyogs kyi dbang du 'gro/sgra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go//
266a2(dkon brtsegs): mig kyang 'khrul cing de bzhin rna ba'ang 'khrul//sna yang 'khrul cang de bzhin lce yang 'khrul//lus kyang 'khrul cir yid kyang 'khrul bar 'gyur//smra la dga' ba'i
266a3(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag go/yun rings dus nas smra la dga' bas na//de ni bdag nyid dga' ba mi thob bo//tshig gang dga' ba mtha' yas thob 'gyur ba//tshig gcig tsam/
266a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig bsdams pa mchog yin no/6/bu ram shing shun snying po ci yang med//dga' bar bya ba'i ron ning ni 'dug/shun pa zos pas mis ni bu ram ro//zhim po rnyed par nus
266a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin no//ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste//ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin//de lta bas na slu la dga' spongs te//rtag tu bag yod byos la don
266a6(dkon brtsegs): sems shig/smra ba'i nyes pa 'di 'dra rtogs 'gyur zhing //don gyi yon tan mchog 'di shes nas ni//'odi ni byang chub mkhas pa gang yin pa//des ni don bsam
266a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la dga' bar gyis//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar smra ba
266b1(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i skyon rnams dang /don la sems pa'i yon tan rnams de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
266b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' snying po btsal ba rnams kyis ni don bsam pa btang ste/snying po ma mchis pa'i smra ba la dga' bar bgyid pa'i rngo ma thog lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
266b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyid kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i skyon ji ltar blta bar bgyi/byang chub sems dpas ji ltar brtags na rmugs pa dang gi nyid kyi nongasu dmigs
266b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas brtson 'grus rtsom zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba legs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'di la grwanyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs
266b5(dkon brtsegs): nirnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya ste/byang chub sems drapa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing skye bar yang mi 'gyur ro//nyi shu gang zhe na/byams pa 'di
266b6(dkon brtsegs): labyang chub sems dpa' gnyid che ba ni tshugs pa da ga nyid kyis nen te la la che bar 'gyur ba dang /lus sha che ba dang /mdog yongs su ma dgu pa dang /de'i 'byung ba rten
266b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams nad bzhis non par 'gyur ba dang /de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang /de'i kha zas legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ba dang /de'i lus la 'bras dang pol
267a1(dkon brtsegs): mig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /le lo can du 'gyur ba dang /de'i gti mug gi dra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /de'i shes rab nyamasasu chung bar 'gyur//
267a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /de kha zas 'dod pa las yig 'chu bar 'gyur ba dang /de gti mug mun pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /de la mi ma yin pa rnams bkur bsti mo byed pa dang /
267a3(dkon brtsegs): sems brtul bar 'gyur ba dang /mi ldang ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /de'i sems bag la nyal gyis kun nas dkris shing 'dug par 'gyur ba dang /de dge ba'i chos la 'dun
267a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba dang /spyod pa zhum par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams skyed pa la smod pa dang /'khor//
267a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du song na brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyid la dga' zhing rmugs dang gnyid mang ba'o nyes dmigs yin te//
267a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa
267a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bka' stsal to//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//de yi lus ni sha cha mkhregs ma yin//le lo de che blun zhing mthun mi byed//de yi mdog//
267b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//bad kan rlung dge bzhin ma bris par 'gyur//de dag de yi lus las shas cher 'byung //de yi khyams
267b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//kha zas nyes pas lto ni ma dag cing //lus kyang lci la zo mdog bde ma yin//de yi tshig
267b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro//grang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//de yi lus la phol mig mang po 'byung //de ni nyin dang mtshan du bde bang nyal//de la rma rnams
267b4(dkon brtsegs): mi bzad mang bar 'gyur//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//le la byed cing brtson 'grus yongs su nyams//de ni bde las nyams shing nor rnams 'grub//
267b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni rtag tu zhen cing sems kyang rmongs//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//gti mug dra ba chen po 'phel 'gyur zhing //de ni the tshom can de lta ba thob//de
267b6(dkon brtsegs): ni lta bar gyur pa mang bar 'gyur//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid lnga dga' 'gyur ba//de yi shes rab shin tu nyams chung 'gyur//de yi blo yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur//
267b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur//gang shi'i rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//mi shes le lo snyoms las shes rab 'tshal//mi ma yin pa dag gis glags rnyed de//
268a1(dkon brtsegs): na nasmra//nan dugs drug su rgyu/smrasas na du ma na rdzus//kun kun
268a2(dkon brtsegs): bye la de myi gnas//chos sman ya dri ni rtags tu thogs//gang zhig rmugs dang ga nyid la dga' 'gyu ga/de yi nyon mongs kun+da nas ldang bar 'gyur//rnam par 'tsha
268a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing g.yo la rmongs pa dang //de yi sems ni rtag tu gdung bar 'gyur//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid lnga dga' 'gyur ba//de yi bye ba mang po nyams shing 'gags/
268a4(dkon brtsegs): lus kya drugadungs shing yid kyang yongs su gdungs//bag la nyalta ba 'phel bar des mi shes//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la draga'o 'gyur ba//de ni dge sems
268a5(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu mi 'didade//de ni chos la 'dun pa sgyu mi byed//phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dga' 'gyur//gang shig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//de ni rmongs
268a6(dkon brtsegs): chos la 'dun pa nyams//dris pa yon tan don nas yongs su ngas//dkar po 'jom sa shing mun par bdu 'gyur//gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dgra
268a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyung ba//'jigs par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rab tu zhum//den rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur//gnyid kyis non pa lus kyang lhod par 'gyur//gang gi
268b1(dkon brtsegs): rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba//bdag nyid mi shes le lo can gyur nas//brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag dog byed//brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams la mi snyan smra//
268b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rtogs gyur na//mkhas pa su zhig rmugs gnyid dga' bar byed//shin tu gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu//don bzang ngam chos yon tan chud gson pa//
268b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phrog par rtogs gyur na//mkhas pa yon tan ldan pa suM der dga'//sdug bsngal kun dang mun pa spel byed cing //ngan song yongasu spong ba'i gzhir
268b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa//sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'phags//gang yin de ni rtag tu brten pa bgyis//'jig rten 'di na bzo gang ci yod dang //'jig rten 'das
268b5(dkon brtsegs): bzo gang dag ci yod pa//brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dka' na//mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis skyo//gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur pa//de
268b6(dkon brtsegs): dag rmugs gnyid skyon rnams mthong nas ni//rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed//'di ni nga ya si de dag bskul byas yid//de nus bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
268b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos ni spong bar mi
269a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid cing skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi bskyed pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das
269a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'chal ba su
269a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na/le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i chos rnams bskyed par mi bgyid/brtson 'grus kyi yon tan dang /phan yon 'di lta bu
269a4(dkon brtsegs): thos na byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/su zhig brtson 'grus brtsom par mi bgyid de/de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs
269a5(dkon brtsegs): dmyigs dang /brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legaso par bka' stsal lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas las la dga' ba 'jig rten
269a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sbags pa'i sbags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi/byang chub sems dpyas gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal
269a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269b1(dkon brtsegs): chen pos las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson
269b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur ro//nyi shu gang zhe na/byamos pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la brtson par 'gyur ba dang /las ngan pa
269b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /lung nod pa dang kha ton la brtson pa dag gis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang /nang du yang dag 'jog la dga' ba rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba dang /
269b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i las brtsams par 'gyur ba dang /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon sbyong bar mi byed pa dang /de ni sems dngos por
269b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang /khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang /dbang byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /bzlog byed kyi ngang tshul
269b6(dkon brtsegs): can yid smon mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang /khyim gyi bya ba dag brtson pa dang /de ro dag la shas cher 'dun cing chags pa bskyed pa dang /len pa med par mi dga' ba dang /kun nas
269b7(dkon brtsegs): mnar sems mang ba las kyi sgrub pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la rton par 'gyur ba dang /de'i zas kyi rnam par rtog pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa
270a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /'jig rten pa'i bya ba drag gi rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa dang /ma rig snga pa'i skye ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /zhal ta byed pa'i rgyags/
270a2(dkon brtsegs): pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar gcod par byed pa dang /pha rol gyi 'khrul pa la rtog cing bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang /don dang
270a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag la skyo nas brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' zhing zhal ta byed pa'i srab mas sbags pa'i///
270a4(dkon brtsegs): nyis dmigs yin te/byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog nA 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur lo/'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba la
