270a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//de ni las ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing //las mchog dag las
270a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyang yang rang //'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar 'gyur//rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin//dge slong lung nod kha ton dga' rnams kyis/de la brnyas shing
270a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa mi byed la//bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur//rtag tu las gnas skyon ni 'di dag yin//'khor ba'i las la mngon par brtson pa dang //thar pa las
270b1(dkon brtsegs): ni rlung ring bcings par gnas//de ni yul 'khor zas la mi rigs spyod//nyes pa 'dri dgu las la tshugs pa yin//rtag tu dngos po dag ni len par byed//yongs su 'dzin pa lnga ni dga' mi
270b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed//nor med nor ni don du gnyer bar byed//nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin//khyim du rgyu ba dag ni chags par 'gyur//'du 'dzi dga' bas thams cad 'jig par byed//
270b3(dkon brtsegs): gzib kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin du 'gyur//nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin//khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed//yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byung //nams
270b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te//nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin//bla mas bskul nu dka' blo mi bde zhing //rjes su bstan pa mthun par 'dzin mi byed//de ni myur du
270b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur//nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin//khyam na gnas bu'i las rnams rtug sems pas//de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur po ste//bas mi gtan
270b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ni spong ba de ma byed//nyes pa 'di dag lngas la dga' bra'i yin//de yi 'dod chags shes ni che bar skye//de ni ro bro rnams la chags shing zhe na//de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' mi
270b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//nyes po 'di ni las la dga' ba'i yin//de ni 'khor mang phal chen dgar 'gyur te//de nyams na ni shin tu sdug bsngal 'byung //de ni bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur//
271a1(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin//de sems drug tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur//las rnams 'phel zhing zad par mi 'gyur te//sred pa'i tha shi
271a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis dam du bcings//nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin//de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi bsten//phyogs 'dod khyim pa la ni brten par byed//tshul khrims gnas pa
271a3(dkon brtsegs): dag la phrag dog byed//nyes pa 'dri dag las la dga' ba'i yin//nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni//zas dang gros la rgyun du sems par byed//de ni rtag tu
271a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'dod mo yin//nyes pa 'a dag las la dga' ba'i yin//de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri//rigs pa min pa'i smra ba rnams la dga'//rigs pa'i smra la
271a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni dga' mi 'gyur//nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin//sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu gshe/dbang phyug nyes pas de dag nges tshar gcod//mi sdug
271a6(dkon brtsegs): las rnams mngon par 'du byed de//nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin//de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing //bdug la yod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong la//yon
271a7(dkon brtsegs): tan ldan pa rnams la 'khrul po che la//nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin//byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyas//de ni pha rol dag la chos ston tshe/blo nyams pas/
271b1(dkon brtsegs): na mngon par shes mi 'gyur//nyes pa 'di dag lngas la dge'u ba'i yin//gnod 'gyur nyes pa 'dri dag mthong nas ni//lus ngan dag la su zhig dga' bar byed//dpa' bo dag ni rtag
271b2(dkon brtsegs): tu las mchog byed//byas pa gang yin chud ni gson mi byed//lan stong brjod kyang tshig gcig mi 'dzin pa//de ni blo can dag gis spyo ba yin//gang zhig las ngan dag na
271b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa la//dam pa dag gis de ltar rtag tu smad//de lta bas na mkhas mis de rtag tu//las ngan dag ni rnam par spangs nas kyang //thub dbang rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa
271b4(dkon brtsegs): yi//bzang po'i las rnams gang yin de dag bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang
271b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa de dag rtsom pa de dag na shes rab shin tu chung zhang shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so//de skad
271b6(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//
271b7(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' gong dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas los dran pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung shing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur
272a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no//byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o//byams pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing bskum gtan med la spongs pa med cing
272a2(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa med pa dang /mang du thos pa yongasu tshol ba med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no//byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam
272a3(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang /spong bas phye ba dang /ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang /ye shes kyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang brtson pas phye ba yin gyi/khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed
272a4(dkon brtsegs): pas phye ba ni ma yin te/'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang /'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /'jig rten bya bas spags pa
272a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o//byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa'o zhal tu byed pa la brtson pa rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong
272a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkung na des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin/ri mor byas pa ma yin/bkur bsti byas pa ma yin gyi/byams pa gal te byang
272a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/'chang ngam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/'chad pa des ni nga
272b1(dkon brtsegs): la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/
272b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos por yongs su 'dzin pa lngas byung ba ni me yin pa'i phyir ro//byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpal dz+wal tu byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /kha ton byed
272b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i sngags pas sbags par byed na bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te/las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su
272b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro//byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems
272b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhalnga te byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o//'dzam bu'i gling 'dri zhal ta byed pa la yongs su gang bar
272b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i zhal te byed pa de dag thams cad kyis ni byang chub snrums dpa' lung nod pa dang /kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o//byang chub sems
272b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lung nod pa dang /kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu gling gang ba snyed kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog la brtson pa gcig la rimo gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o//
273a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pas rdzas su yid rang ba dang gnang ba yin te/de dag ni bsnyen bkur ni legs par byas pa yin no//gang zhig shes
273a2(dkon brtsegs): rab spyod pa la mos nas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad med par skyes par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi las de ni dka'
273a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i los dang /bla na med pa dang /gong na med pa dang /'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i phyir ro//byams pa de lta
273a4(dkon brtsegs): bas na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtson pa don du gnyer zhing brtson 'grus rtsom par 'dod pas shes rab la brtson par bya zhing shes rab yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus
273a5(dkon brtsegs): brtsam par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
273a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /las la dga' ba rnams kyi nings dmigs rnams ni bka' stsal lagasmra na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs
273a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na nye bar zhi ba la gnas shing rtsod pa mi mchis par gnas pa lags/bcom ldan 'das
273b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub semasad pas spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdu ni nyi shu po 'di dag tu rtag par bya'o//rgyas par ni de bzhin gshegs pas
273b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas par bstan te mthar thug par yang mi 'gyur ro//nyi shu gang zhe na/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' spros pa la dga' ba tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang
273b3(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas pa dang /bzod pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang /de'i mi mdza' ba rnams yod rang bar 'gyur ba dang /de la bdud kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /de la bdud kyi
273b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /de'i dag pa'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang /'thab pa dang khon du 'dzin pa dang 'gyed pa
273b5(dkon brtsegs): mang bar 'gyur ba dang /'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang /bag med par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu 'dzin par
273b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang /de'i lce'i skad po rtsub par 'gyur ba dang /de'i lung mnos pa'i chos rnams legs par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang /mdo sde lung ma mnos pa rnams rna lam du grag
273b7(dkon brtsegs): pabar mi 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang /sdig pa'i grog po rnams dang myur du phred par 'gyur ba dang /dka' ba'i lam
274a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /rgyun mi 'chad par yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ba dang /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der the tshom du/
274a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang /de la mi khrom pa brgyad po de dag nye bar 'gyur ba dang /rtag tu de'i dkar po'i phyogs la brtson pa la bar chud 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/byams pa nyi shu bo de
274a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams 'dor bsdus pa yin te/de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
274a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to//de ni tshe 'dir badre bar mi 'gyur te//bzod dang rung zhing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas//de yi dgra rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ste/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di
274a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gro/bdud kyang de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur//bdud kyi phyogs kyang de la dga' bar 'gyur//de yi dge ba'i chos skyes chung zar 'gyur//spros spyod de yi nyes
274a6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag go/de ni rnams kyang dge ba mi skyed de//'chi kar tha dad rgyu la gnas pa dang //ngan srong 'gro ba'i las ni byed par 'gyur//spros spyod de yI nyes pa 'di dag go/mi
274a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa dang bltan mi sdug dang //de ni rtag tu rus rigs dma' bar 'gyur//de yi lce yi dbang po rtsub 'gyur to//sbas spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/lung mnos tsha
274b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams legs par mi gnas shing //lung mnos ma byas mdo sde thos mi 'gyur//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang rnam par spong //spos sbyong de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/sdig
274b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grogs po dag dang phrad par 'gyur//dka' ba'i theg pas rnam par dga' 'gyur zhing //mi 'dod pa yi tshig rnams rgyun du thos//spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di drug go//
274b3(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i blo can de ni gar skyes der//yin nam ma yin snyam du de rtog cing //rtag tu des ni the tshom rnyed par 'gyur//spos spyod de yi nyes po 'dri dag go/de ni mi khom bdag
274b4(dkon brtsegs): dodang ring mi 'gyur//de ni dol ba ldan zhing mchog mi 'gyur//de la 'dod pa 'di dag rtag 'byung ste//spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'odi dag go//de yi dge ba dag la bar chad mang //
274b5(dkon brtsegs): dgegs su 'gyur bas myur du 'thab mi 'gyur//brtson dang ldan yang de la dgra rnams 'byung //spros spyad de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas
274b6(dkon brtsegs): ni//spros pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya//spros spyod deg ni gnod pa rnyed pa smra//de lta bas na spos lnga dga' mi bya//gang na spros pa 'am rtsod pa yod pa las/
274b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad brgya yo pha rol 'gro ba mchog/gang na nyon mongs yod pa de dag tu//yud tsam zhig kyang gnas shing 'dug mi bya//rab byung don 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams//
275a1(dkon brtsegs): nga songs kyis cad pang+yas rno na/'a la spyong shing las chung na myod//gang san TIg da sgyu 'dradun nasad la rlung sa byung du /
275a2(dkon brtsegs): med//khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang yod ma yin//blun po blun mo med cing dbang phyug med//rab tu byung nas rtsad par ma byed cig/shi shing rab tu de bas bstan pa yi//dur
275a3(dkon brtsegs): smrismig gos rnams dad ngas blangs nas ni//zhi zhing rab zhi nye bar zhi bar byos//spros pa rnam par spongs la bzod pa bskyed//mi bzang sems ni sbrul gdug 'dra ba bsrungs//
275a4(dkon brtsegs): smros la spyod pa sems can dmyal ba dang //dud 'gro gshin rje'i yul dang mi ring 'gyur//de lta bas nu bzod drang brtson 'grus bskyed//tshogs pa gcig phyir spos
275a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed no ni//sdug bsngal gsod dang 'ching ba ci yang rung //go rar brdeg dang bsdigs pa de dag ni//'jig rten 'di na gnas pa rnams la 'byung //tshegasra par
275a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur lo nyes pa 'dri dag dkon//tshogs byur bag la nyal la 'phel ba med//tshogs gyur rnams la dga' bar 'byung 'gyur na//mkhas pa su zhig tshogs pa bskyed mi byed//
275a7(dkon brtsegs): glegs tshol dag gis skyon rnams rnyed mi 'gyur//nams kyang 'khor rnams phyed par mi 'gyur te//de yi mdza' bshes dag kyang rgyun du 'byung //spros pa spangs ngo'i phan
275b1(dkon brtsegs): yon 'di dag yin//theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dag 'gyur shing //las kyi sgrib pa mnus drung nas ni//stabs dang bcas shing bzhon bcas bdud thul cig/brtun pa gang yin des na
275b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa bskyed//spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon mang chags//nyes pa de dag ngas ni bstan mi nus//rtag tu spros med bsngags pa mtha' yas 'gyur//su zhig don gnyer des ni
275b3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa bskyod//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs pa de tsam du
275b4(dkon brtsegs): gleng nga ni de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs te ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das ci lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'dri
275b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag thos na skyo bar 'gyur shing kun nus nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spongs bur 'gyur lags sam/bka' stsal pa/byams pa lnga brgya pa za ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
275b6(dkon brtsegs): grang zag rnams tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur ba 'byung ba de dag ni nyung ngo //byams pa gang dag sems
275b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa med pa dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa dang /gcig la gcig the tshom za ba mang ba dag ni phal tshe/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
276a1(dkon brtsegs): pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo bstan pa'i yon tan dang phan yon zab pa dag lung nod par mi byed/kha ton du mi byed/'chang bar mi byed/kun chub par mi
276a2(dkon brtsegs): byed/de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa de shas che su pas yon tan dro dag dang /phran yon de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//dri dag dad pa med pa des mdo sde de dag la the tshom zla bar 'gyur te/
276a3(dkon brtsegs): phyis kyang lung nod par mi byed/'chang bar mi byed/de dag gi drung du bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha lugs su 'dug nas 'di skad du/mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/'dri dgra
276a4(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mdo sde 'di dag las yon tan dang phan yon bshad pa gang yin pa de dag khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung zhing med pa'i phyir
276a5(dkon brtsegs): ro zhes mos pa bzlog par byed do//de dag de ltar mos pa bzlog pas mdo sde zab mo dag mi 'dod cing the tshom du 'gyur te/lung nod par mi byed/kha ton mi byed/mi blon po de dag gis yon
276a6(dkon brtsegs): tan de dag thos na/'dri ltar ches spong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni sbyang bar mi nus so snyam du shes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang lags pa 'di dag las
276b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba zhig yid la bgyid cing /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la bgyid pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das
276b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa de dag gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
276b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa sems bskyed pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni byis pa'i sems
276b4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ma yin/skyed bu dam pa ma yin pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin te/byams pa sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin no//
276b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/byams pa 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zho 'gras pas ni/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi nus te/sems
276b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad lo byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /'tshe ba yongs su spangs te sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed pa dang /lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos
276b7(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /zab mo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /rnyed pa dang bkur bstis ma gos pas bsam pa
277a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /brjed pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang /zhum pa med pas sems
277a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la bla ma bzhin du gus pa bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag la nges pas nyi tshe ba'i bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi bya ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /ma 'dres pas dge
277a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems bskyed pa dang /mtshan ma yongs su spangs te sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/byams pa sems bskyed pa bcu po
277a4(dkon brtsegs): ni de dag yin te/sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag las sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sems bskyed pa de dang ljon na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye
277a5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i chos
277a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la legaso zhes
277a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byin te/kun dga' bo legs so legs so//kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/bcom
277b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dro dag dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
277b2(dkon brtsegs): g+hu dang /mi dang /l+h+wa ma yin dang /dri bang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de//'phags pA da/na mtshig brgyags pa
277b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po chos kyi rnam grangs spyod phrag brgya pa las lhag pa'i bsam bskul ba zhes bya ste/'dul ba nyi shuHlnga pa rdzogs so/rgya gung gi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang /
277b4(dkon brtsegs): suran dra bad+hA dang /shuchen gyi nu ba ban de ye shes sna la sogs pas brgyar cing zlos te/gtan la ngab //shA lo kad+hag brgya bas po gnyis so//
277b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyargyu gar skad du/Ar+yA swa bA hu pa ri prid+d+he/nA ma ma hA ye na sUtra/bod skad du/'phags pa ldog bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i med//bam po drang po/
277b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dung byang chub sems dpa'athams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal byA kA lan dka'i gnas na/
277b7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lags bzangs shes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te/rgyal po'i kham
278a1(dkon brtsegs): kye grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la bu der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
278a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/byang chub sems
278a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thol mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
278a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
278a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snga
278a6(dkon brtsegs): myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di drag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste sbyin pa'i phra
278a7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
278b1(dkon brtsegs): /sanams na pa ste/sdug sas sa stsams sgyu na ngas na ga pa nga sgyus rgyu dus nas pa phyug/
278b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dI ltar sbyin pa'i phyi rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ldog bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyis so
278b3(dkon brtsegs): spyong+ge /rnams yongs la kyi/rgyas ma yin pas nim yinan//mam pa nyid na kyi mi mo pas ni ma // ni sa na /rlung /rnams can gan rnams la
278b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/nyamang ba mi byed par sbyin pa byin te brjod pa dang sgra dang rdzogs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/'dzem pa'i b.rIm yiH/'jigs pa'i phyi ma yin/lan du phan 'dogs su
278b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyo ma yin/mthunas kyi phyi ma yin/tshula'os pa ma yin//khabs d+he po ma yin/bzlas pa ma yin no//sbyin blanas sa masbyin gnas ma yin pa'am/mngon par grags
278b6(dkon brtsegs): po ma mang par grags pa mo yin pa'am/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/'dris pa 'a'i ma das pa 'am/mdza' ba'am mi mdza' ba yang rung
278b7(dkon brtsegs): bya/thas gyur//mched pa byed ci'i dun pa drug po dang /dga' ba dag pa dang /rang dge pas dbyung du bdadan la nga nga
279a1(dkon brtsegs): bdog na yang rung thang du sbyin/ngan pa bdog na yang ngan pa sbyin/gya nom pa bdog na yang gya nom pa sbyin no//lags bzangs ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong sbyin pa dang /
279a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs po che'i sems dang /rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du/dgra ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs po che'i sems dang rangs pa'i sems kyis skyon no//de zas 'dod pa rnams la sems
279a3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zas sbyin no//skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems cad thams cad nyon mongs pa'i skom thams
279a4(dkon brtsegs): cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir skom sbyin no//gos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no//bzhon
279a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa sbyin no//spos 'dod pa rnams
279a6(dkon brtsegs): la ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsrung thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir spos sbyin no//me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang
279a7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams sbyin no//phyi ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can nyes par spyod pa'i dri de ba'i dri ma gzhom pa'i stobs thob par
279b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin no//byub pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /skyod pa'i byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byug pa sbyin no//gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni
279b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyin no//lham 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba mngon
279b3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyin no//mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad lha dang /tshangs pa dang /'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha'i bde ba sbyar ba'i stongs thob
279b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir mal cha sbyin no//stan 'dod pa rnam la ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyan mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed par dpa' ba'i stan thob
279b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir stan sbyin no//gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad skyabs drang gnas dang mgon dang /dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no//phra
279b6(dkon brtsegs): tog dang /bum pa dang /'chog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu thob par bya ba'i phyir phra tog dang bum pa dang /'tshogs chos sbyin no//sems can thams
279b7(dkon brtsegs): cad zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la dka' thub kyi nags
280a1(dkon brtsegs): chal sbyin pa sbyin no//sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byud bzang po brgyad nu thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten rnams lnga
280a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyun sbyin pa byin no//sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lto'i spyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam/lam rnams la mar me sbyin pa byin
280a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/chos la mchod pa rnams sam/dge 'dun la
280a4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rnams la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sbyin pa byin no//sems can thams cad cha byed dang tshul khrims dang spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang chos gos sbyin
280a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byin no//sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba sbyin nga'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir snod chagagus skyon pa sbyin no//sems can thams cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongs su
280a6(dkon brtsegs): bslong ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sgyu gu dang /skrag tshe dang /glegs bu dang /chos kyi khri ston sbyin pa byin no//sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir na
280a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad sbyin pa byin no//sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi sa dang /bdud rtsi dbyings kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir sa bzhi sbyin pa sbyin no//sems
280b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten mthon po dang /sku gzugs mthon po byed do//bdog pa lha na sems can thams cad mngon par shes
280b2(dkon brtsegs): pa myur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par ma gyur par sbyin pa byin no//sems can thams cad bar du gcod pa med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rung
280b3(dkon brtsegs): ba sbyin gyi rung ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no//sems can thams cad spobs pa chen po yongs su mi 'chad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su mi gcod par yin no//sems can thams cad snying rje
280b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mtshungs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la munyam par sbyin pa byin no//sems can thams cad bdud dang mu steg mi byed pa thams cad kyis tshar mi chod pa dang /
280b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod par mi nus pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir gzhan lo mi gnod par sbyin pa byin no//lag bzangs gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du
280b6(dkon brtsegs): nor med cing 'byor phra med par gyur na/de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa mtha' yangang shing dpag tu med pa 'di dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing smon pa
280b7(dkon brtsegs): smon lam 'debs te/lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag byin pa'i nus pa dang ldan yang rung /nus pa dang mi ldan pa yang rung ste/gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
281a1(dkon brtsegs): cad na sems can thams cad bdag gi bde bar sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa dang /yang dag par ldan par 'gyur cing 'bad pa med pa dang 'dod pa med par brnag pa rnams//
281a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shin du yongs su rdzo gas shing /bsam pa ma lus par yongs su rdzogs nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'byung bar
281a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi de bzang por gyur cig/de dag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debaso//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams
281a4(dkon brtsegs): cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho yang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'deb so//dbyig gi ri dang gser gyi ri dang /gos kyi ri dang /yo byad thams cad kyi ri dang /bza' ba rgya mtsho dang /
281a5(dkon brtsegs): btung ba rgya mtsho dang /gnas logs par byas pa//legs par gnas pa/mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa dag kyang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs so//
281a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang /gtong ba dang /rnam
281a7(dkon brtsegs): par gtong ba gang yin pa zang zing sbyin pa 'am/mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa 'am/chos sbyin pa ma lus pa de thams cad la tha na dus gsum du yang mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yid
281b1(dkon brtsegs): rangango //gal te de la bslangs la nor sbyin mi nus na yang rang gi zas skal sbyin pa 'am/grogs su 'gyur ba 'am/kun du btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la ston par 'gyur ro//chos kyi
281b2(dkon brtsegs): gtam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do//de sbyin par 'dod par gyur po na yang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral pa dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can
281b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
281b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//sbyin pa dag byin nas kyang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad
281b5(dkon brtsegs): dpral ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi
281b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdu'o//gal te sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang /rnam par gtong ba de la slob pa'i
281b7(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slong ste/dus dus su 'am/chung zad chung zad du yang chags pa dang /ser sna dang /sbyin pas 'jigs pa spang ba dang /dor ba
282a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba la pa 'bad//dus dus su'am/cung zad cung zad du yang sbyin pa dang /gtong ba dang /rnam par gtong ba la slob pa dang /mngon par 'phel bar byab
282a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtso lo 'bad do//srid pa gzhan du gyur pa ni yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung
282a3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rjes su ngan pa dang /byang chub kyi sems bskam pa dang /byang chub tu smon pa dang /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de
282a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang /gtang ba chen po dang /rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no//de ci le b+h+ri zhe na/'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can
282a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lo dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang /bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang /dam pa'i chos kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang /bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi tshor gtong bar
282a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang /dam pa'i chos kyi rgyu rnam par gting bar 'dad pa dang /'dud rtsi'i dbyings kyi chang rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang /rnam par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na
282a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog yin na//de na dem pa yin no//lag 'azangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid dad pa dang ldan zhing tshogs chung dang /sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen 'ang sbyin pa/
282b1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba rnams kyis bslangs pa na yan lag dang nying lag gcod dam bcad nas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi
282b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen par 'gyur ba dang //mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya che ba yongs su ma sbyin pa'i phyir ro//sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/sems
282b3(dkon brtsegs): can gzhan phyir des de rang gi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su mi gtong ba ma yin no//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na pha ma la gnod/
282b4(dkon brtsegs): pa byas shing skrangs te sdug bsngal bar byas/bu dang chung ma dang /bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa byas shing spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas nas/
282b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dog pa thams cad slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/ji ltar pha ma la gnod pa mi byed
282b6(dkon brtsegs): cing ma spong la sdug bsngal bar yang mi byed pa dang /bu dang chung ma dang /bran po dang /branu mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa myi byed cing mi spongs ste/sdug bsngal bang
282b7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed par sbyin pa yang sbyin pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gso ba byed do//de ni sems can gzhan gyi phyir rnam sems can gzhan gyi tshod la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi
283a1(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba yang ma yin no//lag bzangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gnod pa'i sbyin pa'i sngags pa gsung ba ma yin na/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
283a2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag bcad pa lta lnga de ltar ga la 'gyur/lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/lug bzangs 'di la byang chub
283a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang /sems can gzhan rnams la mi brdeg mi sod cing /gsod pa la rjes su yid rang bar mi byed do//srog gi phyir yangs
283a4(dkon brtsegs): byin par mi len la ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing /mi byin par len pa la rjes su yid rang bar mi byed do//srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la ldog par g.yem
283a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi byed la/'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du mi 'jug cing 'dod pa la le gr-I par g.yem pa la rjes su yid rang ba dro mi byed do//srog gi phyir yang brdzun mI sgra la brdzun
283a6(dkon brtsegs): zer du mi 'jug cing /brdzun smra ba la rjes su yod ring bar mi byed do//srog gi phyir yang chang mi 'thung la chang 'thung du mi 'jug cing /chang 'thung bA la rjes su yi rang bar mi
283a7(dkon brtsegs): byed do//de bslab pa'i gzhi lnga pa de dag la ring du gnas shing brten por gnas la dam por gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub po//de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang /zhing rmed
283b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa dang /'ching ba dang 'ching bu 'jug pa dang /glo rang gzhug pa dang /gau rang gzhug tu 'jug pa dang /brdeg pa dang /brdeg tu 'jug pa dang /gcod pa dang /gcod du 'jug pa dag/
283b2(dkon brtsegs): sring ba dang /dor bu dang bsal bar 'bad pa byed do//de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag la ring du gnas shing brten por gnas le ngom par gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub bo//
283b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du phra ma'i tshig dang /ngag rtsub po dang /tshig kyal pa spang ba dang /dor ba dang bsal bar 'bad par byed do//de srog chags thams cad dang /sems can thams cad ni
283b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi pham ji lta ba bzhin no//bu gcig pa phangs pa ji lta ba bzhin te/ji ltar pha ma dang bu gcig pa phangs pa bdag la 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya la/lag pa 'am/bong ba
283b5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/dbyug pa'am/ral gri'am mangs brdegs kyang slar brdag par mi bya/gsod kyang slar bsad par mi bya zhing /ji ltar pha ma dang bu gcig pa phangs pa 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya
283b6(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du bdag srog chags thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyis lag pa'am/bong ba 'am ral gri'am mangs brdegs kyang slar brdag par mi bya/gsod kyang slar bsad par
283b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bya'o zhes de ltar slob po//dper na pha 'am/ma'am/bu gcig pa phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyu ste 'ongs pa mthong na dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du lag bzangs
284a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yang srog chags thams cad dang /sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba dang /yod bde bar 'gyur ro//de'i srog gcod pa spangs pa'o/
284a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa sbyangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro//de'i ma phyin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can
284a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims ma byin par len pa spang ba la dgod pa'i phyir ro//de'i 'dod pa la ldog par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can thams cad mi
284a4(dkon brtsegs): slob pa'i tshul khrims tshangs par spyod pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro//de'i brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba
284a5(dkon brtsegs): spang ba la dgod pa'i phyir ro//de'i chang 'thung ba spang pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims chung 'thung ba spang ba lnga dgod pa'i phyir ro//de'i
284a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing rmed pa dang /zhing rmad du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i 'ching ba dang //
284a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ching du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad bcad pa'i phyir ro//de'i go rar 'jug pa dang /go rang gzhug
284b1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag pa dang bsal ba'i phyir ro//de'i brdeg pa dang /brdeg du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can//
284b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis zil gyi mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i gcod pa dang /gcod du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul
284b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni/sems can thams cad lus dang /ngag dang yid kyi las kun du bsrungs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge
284b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/yon lag lnga ba'i ngagra gi lam dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//
284b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/tshig bzung bar 'os par thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni/
284b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa'i 'jigs
284b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i gzhan gyi nor dang yo byad 'jig cing chung za ba yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni/sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi nor bla na med
285a1(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par byunga'i phyir ro//de'i gzhan gyi bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed pa dang /gtong bar byed du jug pa'i tshul mas na/'azum pa ma na nga
285a2(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i 'gug pa gtong bar byed pa dang /gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni/rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i
285a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba 'grol ba dang /'grol du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni/dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi skang por bdud kyi dmag dang /nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyiraro///
285a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i khyim nas 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol ba sgrib pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i brdeg pa mi 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis
285a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i gcod pa bzlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun du bsrung ba'i chos bzhi thob pa du bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i mi slu ba'i tshig smra
285a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du bcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i bye ba
285a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sdums byed cing mdza' ba brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i tshig
285b1(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa dang 'jam po smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi rnar bde zhing snying du 'ong la/bden pa'i ngagra thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i kun du 'thun pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni
285b2(dkon brtsegs): tshar mi chod cing bzung bar 'os la 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon
285b3(dkon brtsegs): tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun dang /g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /
285b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems
285b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por mi phyed cing sra la shin tu brtan pa'i dad pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /dran pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam
285b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi cho snga thams cad yongs su bskrad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir
285b7(dkon brtsegs): ro//de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro//de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra
286a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir//de'i dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su/
286a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro//de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang //byang chub
286a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyis stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs po'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur ba gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i
286a4(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad la bskal par chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sbyin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i dus gsum du
286a5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang /sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang /sdig pa thams cad la smod pa'i tshul khrims ni brag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba thams cad
286a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su
286a7(dkon brtsegs): bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
286b1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams thams cad tu gtogs pa 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba thams cad dang /sems can 'gro ba thams cad du song ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs
286b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yid rang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa
286b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i tshul khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro//
286b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims ni gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs dang mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir///
286b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i pha ma dang /bla ma dang /rgan pa dang /slob dpon dang /mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i 'jigs pa dang /
286b6(dkon brtsegs): skyugs pa dang /nyam thag pa dang /mgon med pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar lan 'debs pa la mkhas pa thob por bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i rgyal
286b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang chom kun dang /me dang chu dang /bgo skal la spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams yongs su bskya cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang /sa dang /pha rol tu phyin/
287a1(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po yongs su bsrung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i sangs rgyas dang /rlung sangs rgyas dang /'phags pa nyan thos dang /byang chub snyoms dpa' rnams
287a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rjes su bsngags pa'i tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i pha rol gyi sems rjes su
287a3(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba dang 'thun pa'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang /pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang /yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang /
287a4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang 'thun pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang /pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang /yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las
287a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol kyi sems mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i tshe 'di'i don dang /tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang /
287a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i denAM dang /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang /brjed pa rnams kyi dran pa yang dag
287a7(dkon brtsegs): par bskyed pa'i tshul khrims dang dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims dang /chos 'dzin
287b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshul khrims dang /chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul khrims ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsrung ba thob par bya
287b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro//de'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par 'dod pa dang /lhag par spyad par 'dod pa na yang lus dang /ngag dang /sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams
287b3(dkon brtsegs): cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
287b4(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /lhag par spyod pa dang /yang dag par blangs pa dang /lhag par spyad nas kyang sems
287b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi
287b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//gal te tshul khrims de ma zhig pa dang /ma ral ba dang /'dren ma ma yin pa'i slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan
287b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/dus dus su 'am/cung zad cung zad du yang mi dge ba spang ba dang /dor ba dang /bsal bar rtsol lo//'bad do/dus dus su 'am/cung
288a1(dkon brtsegs): zang cung zad du yang dge ba la slob pa dang /mngon par 'phel par bya ba dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo//'bad do//srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum
288a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /byang chub kyi
288a3(dkon brtsegs): sems bsgom pa dang /byang chub tu son pa dang /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa 'di nyid de dag gi dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /dge ba'i tshul khrims
288a4(dkon brtsegs): la lhag par spyod pa grangs med cing dpag tu med pa ma yan no//de ci'i phyir zhe na//'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i tshul
288a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang /zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i tshul khrims
288a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni dag pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /dge ba'i tshul khrims lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin no//de ni dam pa yin no//lag
288a7(dkon brtsegs): bzangs de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing /tshogs chung ngu dang sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
288b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byed de//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan dag gos
288b2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lus kyi srog gtsad dam/bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam chung ma 'phrog gam/brdzun du smra ba 'am/phra ma 'am/ngag rtsub po 'am/tshig kyal pa smra ba 'am/gshe'am/gsod dam/
288b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin nam/brdeg gam/gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing slar mi khro ste/shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par mi byed do//de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi srid pa
288b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i lus 'di dag byas shing bsags pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang
288b5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi las rnam par smin pa rang gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan la slar gnod pa bya zhing slar khro ba dang /shar gnyer khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub
288b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/gal te bdag gi srog gtsud pa 'am/bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa 'am/chung ma 'phrog pa 'am/brdzun du smra ba 'am/phra ma 'am/ngag rtsub pa
288b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/tshig kyal pa smra ba 'am/gshe baM 'am/gsod pa 'am/'dzin pa 'am/brdeg pa 'am/gcod pa yang rung ste/gzhan dag la slar gnod pa byas sam/slar khro 'am/shar ga
289a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing khon du bzung na srang gnad pa byas pa dang /slar khros pa dang /shang gnyer zhing ljon du bzung ba sdig pa mi dge bde'i sdug bsngal gyi tshur ba mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong bya 'dis bdag la
289a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par smin pa dang /las kyi rgyu 'thun pa brgya 'gyur ram/stong 'gyur ram/de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan ying 'byung bar 'gyuraro snyam//lag bzangs
289a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/srog yod pas srog gcod par 'gyur/rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/rna be'i dbang po yod pas brdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur
289a4(dkon brtsegs): phram dang /ngag rtsub po dang tshig kyal pa thos par 'gyur la/lus yod pas 'dren pa dang /'chi ba dang /'dzin pa dang /brdeg pa dang gcod par 'gyur te/bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gyi dngos po sdug bsngal gyi
289a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhi/srog gi dbang po dang /rna ba'i dbang po dang /lus blangs par gyur na/ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang slar khro ba 'am/shAr gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar byaskya mo//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub
289a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par sprob ste/dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste/de ni ngo bo nyid/de ni chos nyid de ni rang bzhin//chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gsher ba/me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
289a7(dkon brtsegs): ni tshe ba rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo ba ste/de ni ngo bo nyid/de ni chos nyid/de ni rang bzhi no//de bzhin du srog thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/dgod pa'i chos can/'gog pa'i chos cano///
289b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can/lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi rgyas/sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos//
289b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal myong ba'i chas te/de ni ngo bo nyid/de na chos nyid/de ni rang bzhin no//srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/'god pa'i chos can/'gog pa'i chos can/zad cing dengs la 'gog pa dang /
289b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po drug sdug bsngal gyi chos can/sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la/sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pas ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod
289b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/slar khro ba 'am/shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar bya/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni ngo bo nyid 'di ni chos nyid/'di ni rang bzhin no snyam mo//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems
289b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste bdag gi mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin la/gzhan dag gI mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /
289b6(dkon brtsegs): lce dang /lus dang /yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin na/mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid bdang med cing /yid bdag gi med pa la
289b7(dkon brtsegs): mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang yid bdag med cing /bdag gi med pas ji ltar dga' ba 'am/rjes su chags pa 'am/yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/brdeg pa'am
290a1(dkon brtsegs): slar gnod par byed pa 'am/slar khro ba 'am/shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar slob ste/
290a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste mir skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni nyung zhing chung gi/yid btags kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzad la ches bzod par dka' ba yin/dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang /sems
290a3(dkon brtsegs): tsacan dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin/bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang /slar khro ba dang /
290a4(dkon brtsegs): shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar bya snyam mo//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/gang bdag gcig pu'i don 'dod pa dang /bdag gcig
290a5(dkon brtsegs): pu la phan par 'dod pas/gzhan dag la phyir gnod par byed cing phyir khro ste/shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa yang mi rigs te/cha ma yin na bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi don 'dod pa/
290a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/go cha chen po bgos pa/yad dam bcas pa chen pos yid dam bcas pa/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/sangs rgyas kyi chos
290a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po yongs su bstang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/mi bzod pa dang /phyir gnod pa byed pa dang /phyir khro ba dang /shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pas ni/sangs rgyas
290b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos 'di dag sogs pa dang /'phel ba dang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi/bzod pa dang phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang /phyir mi khro ba dang /shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa mi byed pas
290b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs shing 'phel te yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam mo//legs bzang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang bar 'dod
290b3(dkon brtsegs): pas/mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi reg pas reg kyang gzhan dag la slar gnod par mi bya/slar khro bar mi bya/shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung bar mi bya na mi'i sdug bsngal gyis reg
290b4(dkon brtsegs): pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/de spyos sam/brgyad dam/smad dam/mi snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs shin tu dri ma med
290b5(dkon brtsegs): cing dag la dkar po thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len no//de drud bshal tam/bcings sam/bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /skad cig gcig la ma rig
290b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgrib pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gzhom pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to//de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'chags pa dang /khyong
290b7(dkon brtsegs): khro ba bzlog pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len no//de rna ba bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /sems can thams cad la dad par bya ba'i chos kyi rna ba bskyed pa'i phyir bzod/
291a1(dkon brtsegs): cing dang du len no//de sna bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems dang /sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi yan tan mdzes shing /bla na med pa la longs
291a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod par bya ba'i phyir zo cing dang du len no//de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi theb
291a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len no//de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag pa sbyin pa thob
291a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzod ning dang du len no//de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su rdzogs
291a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len no//de'i mig phyung yang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi migra g.yung drung thob par bya ba'i phyir
291a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len no//de mgo bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /snying rje'i sems dang /sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi mgo thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod
291a7(dkon brtsegs): cing dang du len no//de bzod pa 'di dag dang ji mi snyam pa 'di dag mngon gsum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can
291b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbug dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su
291b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngo bar byed do//mngon gsum du byed pa dang /yid la byed pa dang /mngon sum du byas pa dang /yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams
291b3(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su/
291b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngo bar byed do//gal te bzod pa 'di dag dang /ji mi snyam pa 'di dag ma nyams pa dang /skyon med pa dang /'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar
291b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par slob ste dus dus su 'am/cung zad cung zad du yang mi bzod pa dang /mi snyam par mi byas pa spang ba dang /dor ba dang /bsal bar rtsol lo//'bad do//dus dus su 'am/
291b6(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cung zad du yang bzod pa dang /mi snyam pa la slob pa dang /mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo//'bang ngo //srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum
291b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing skye de lug par mi 'gyur ro//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /byang chub kyi sems
292a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa dang /byang chub tu smon pa dang /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi bzad pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang /bzed pa yang dag par sgrub pa
292a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad zag pa med pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang //
292a3(dkon brtsegs): mi slob pa'i bzod pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang /zag pa med pa'i bzod pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i bzod pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni bzod
292a4(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu spyad pa dge ba dang /bzod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yino//da ni dam pa yin no//lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la
292a5(dkon brtsegs): yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshogs chung ngu dang /sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar
292a6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/l-ig po zangs 'di la byang chub sems dpra' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste phyogs bcu'i phyogs re ngeng yang 'jig rten
292a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mtha' yas mu med dang /'jig rten gyi khams re re ni yang sems can mtha' yas so//de ltar sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas mu med pa la mtha' yod pa ma yin/mu
292b1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ma yin te/bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de la phan pa'i phyir go cha bgos la sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing /mtha' yas pa la bde ba'i phyir po chu
292b2(dkon brtsegs): bgos na sems can thams cad la phan par dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas po dang /sems can thams cad la bde bar dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge
292b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dag bag med par 'gyur tam/sems gzhan du gyur tam/gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du sems kyi sgod cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang /
292b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye ba dang /byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung
292b5(dkon brtsegs): po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na/bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba
292b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas shing mtha' yas dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'gyur ba mtha' lus shing mtha' yas pa yang dag par rjes su mthong la gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dga'
292b7(dkon brtsegs): bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub
293a1(dkon brtsegs): sams dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par sgrub ste/gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mthar yas shing mahAr yas pada'i rga pa'i sdug bsngal gcig pu bsal ba dang gnam pad+ma
293a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/gang zhig
293a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bar 'dod pa dang /sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /mi sdug pa
293a4(dkon brtsegs): dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /'dod pa mi 'byor pa'i sdug bsngal dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang /sems can
293a5(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /grangs pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /che ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo//
293a6(dkon brtsegs): log bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag pa slob ste/gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sdug bsngal sems kyi skad cig
293a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'i sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam dang 'brel pa bsal bar 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa 'phel la/dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha'
293b1(dkon brtsegs): sa shing mthar yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/glang zhig ma 'ong shing ma phyin pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sgra
293b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bar du brtsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/gang
293b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nam nyan thos kyi yon tan 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa 'phel la/dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing
293b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yon tan mtha' yas shing yon tan mu med pa/stobs mtha' yas shing stobs mu med pa mtha' dag
293b5(dkon brtsegs): nuchub pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'dod pa dang /smos pa dang smon pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/bag med par gyur ram gnyid kyis log kyang /rgyu bzhi dang /rkyen bzhi dang /dmigs pa bzhi po de dag ni de'i
293b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi dang /byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bani sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur
293b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung ngo mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skyes pa dang /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha'
294a1(dkon brtsegs): yas par ni skye ba dag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' na bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing
294a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa bzhi dang /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mthong lnga/gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' bar
294a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo//brgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni shwa ra
294a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi mtha' yang mngon zhing mu yang mngon la/lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og dang /steng gi mtha' yas mngon zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya mtsho mtha' yas mu med
294a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhi po de dag la ni mtha' dang mu yod pa ma yin na bdag gis sems kyi skad cag sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'phel/
294a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing rgyas na/rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba la srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo//ldeg bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
294a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar yang dag par sla ste/gang dag seng ge dang /stag dang /khyi dang /lho skyong dang /bya rgod dang /khrubo drung dang /bya rog dang /'ug pa dang /srin bu dang /sbreng ma
294b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /sbrang bu dang /shA sbrang du gyur pa de dag gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na/badrag mir gyur bzhin du srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub
294b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya sgyu ma mau//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/mi brgya 'am/mi stong gis kyang sangs
294b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nyid rtogs shing thob na/bdag gis 'dir ci'i phyir mi rtogs shing thob par mi 'gyur/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
294b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rtogs shing brnyes grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtogs shing brnyes
294b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gyur na bdag gis 'dir srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo//lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems
294b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin tAM/sangs rgyas ston pa'o zhes ston na/sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/nyan thos kyis bshud pa 'am/byang chub sems dpas
294b7(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa 'am/tha na bsnyon pa rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos gang yin pa dag dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
295a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun 'grus kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas
295a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thob par 'gyur ba dang /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba
295a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rtag par rgyun du nyan no//nges par byed do//rtog go//mkhas pa le lo med pa ni ngu shing bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de mgo dang gos
295a4(dkon brtsegs): la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du chos de drag 'dzin no//yongs su shes par byed do//'chang ngo //klog go//rjes su sems so//gzhan dag la ston no//go bar byed do//
295a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa le lo med pa ni ru shIng bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gi po zlog kyang de bcol yang rung /ma bcol kyang rung /sems can thams cad kyi don dang ni byang
295a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa 'jig rten 'di la bde ba 'am/'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba dag la rang gi lus nye bar spyod pa dang yo byad du 'gyur bar byed do//'di lta ste dper na 'byung ba
295a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po bsgrub pa med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can thams cad la nye bar spyod pa dang yo byad du 'gyur ba rnams yin no//lag bzangs de bzhin du bya
295b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' yang rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa dang yo byad du gyur par byed de/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /slar
295b2(dkon brtsegs): dpon dang /bla ma dang /rgan pa dang /nang pa dang /mgon med pa rnams la yongs su spyad par bya ba dang /sri zhu bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya bas bye dar+k+ka tu 'gyur ro//de mdo dang gos lan
295b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba bzhin du gzhan gyi sems dang gzhan gyi snying dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig dang rjes su 'thun pa dang /'thun par byed pa dang /yang dag par 'god pa dang /grogs byed pa dang /grogs
295b4(dkon brtsegs): su gyur pa dang /dge ba 'thun pa dang /don 'thun pas rje su zhugs nas mngon du dad par byas shing bsdus te/nyan thos kyi theg pa lnga 'os pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud//
295b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul lo//'god do//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o//rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la ros pa rnams ni rdzogs pa'i byang
295b6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi theg pa la 'dzud do//'dul lho 'god do//mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang /mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi rgyu dang /dam pa'i
295b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi ched dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi tshad dang /dge ba'i rgyu dang /dge ba'i ched la grang ba yang khyad du gsod la/tsha ba dang bkres pa dang /skom pa
296a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /rlung dang /nyi ma dang /sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang /gzhan gyis ngan du smras pa dang /ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi las dang /ngal ba dang //
296a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang /gnyid dang /mi dga' ba dang /lus dang srog kyang khyad du gsod do//mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu dang rdzogs
296a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi ched la lha'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do//lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do//mi'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal
296a4(dkon brtsegs): yang khyad du gsod do//dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do//mkhas po le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog
296a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba dang /spyod lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson/
296a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtan zhing bachal ba brtan no//de brtson 'grus 'di dang rtul ba 'di mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /brtsam par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems
296a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
296b1(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//mngon sum du byed pa dang /rnam pa dang /mngon sum du byas pa dang /brtsams nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can+d+ra
296b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbu gos dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
296b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//gal te brtson 'grus 'di ma nyams pa dang /skyon med pa dang /'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/de 'di ltar lung dag
296b4(dkon brtsegs): papopar slob ste dus dus su 'am/chung zad chung zad du yang snyoms las dang le lo spang ba dang /dor ba dang bsal bar rtsol lo//'bad do//dus dus su 'am/chung zad chung zad du yung
296b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang brtul ba la slob pa dang /mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsal lo//'bad do//srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang bum par mi 'gyur zhing
296b6(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /byang chub kyi sems bsgom
296b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /byang chub tu smon pa dang /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi brtson 'grus dge ba dang /rtsol ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no//de
297a1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang /zag pa med pa'i brtson/
297a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang brtson pa dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no//
297a3(dkon brtsegs): ni drim pa yin no//lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du sbyin par brtson 'grus
297a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do////bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
297a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed ce na/lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtag su mi 'dzin pa yin te/gang gi phyir mig
297a6(dkon brtsegs): gi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdom pa'i
297a7(dkon brtsegs): byaphyir nan tan byed cing bsrung ste mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang po sgom par byed do//de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang /snas dri rnams tshe ba dang /lces ro rnams myong ba dang /
297b1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi rig bya rnams reg pa dang /yid kyi chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin zhing mngon rtagasu mi 'dzin pa yin te/gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams
297b2(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing bsrung ste/yid kyi dbang/
297b3(dkon brtsegs): bos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do//de 'gro 'am/'greng ngam/'dug gam/nyal lam cung mi smra bar gyur kyang rung ste/mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas dang zhi granas kyi gnas mi
297b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ro//rnam par mi 'dor ro//de la mi rgod pa dang /mu cor mi smra ba dang /tshig mi mang ba dang /mig mi g.yeng ba dang /dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang /mi rgod pa dang /tom
297b5(dkon brtsegs): col med pa dang /lus 'khrul pa med pa dang /ngag 'khrul pa med pa dang /sems 'khrul pa med pa dang /dben yang rung /mi dben yang rung spyod lam mi nyams pa yin no//
297b6(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang btung ba dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /gnas drang /na ba'i gasros sman dang yo byad ji lta bu yang rung ba dag gis chog shes shing gso slu ba dang /dgang sla ba dang /
297b7(dkon brtsegs): rim gro bya sla ba dang /cho ga dang spyod yul dge ba dang /'du 'dzi las dben pa'i spyod yul yin/thob pa dang ma thob pa la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med do//ma khengs mdud pa yin/
298a1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /stod pa dang /smod pa dang /grags pa dang /ma grags pa dang /'tsho ba dang /'chi ba la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ma khengs mi
298a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dud pa yin/mdza' bo dang dgra dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /yid du 'ong ba dang 'thun pa dang /yid du mi 'ong ba dang mi 'thun pa dang /'phags pa dang /'phags pa
298a3(dkon brtsegs): ma ya ni pa'i chos rnams dang /dben pa dang lung long rnams la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ma khengs ma dud pa yin/gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la yang 'thun
298a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mi 'thun pa med pa yin/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang chos sdug pa dang /mi sdug pa rnams la yang 'thun pa dang mi 'thun pa med pa yin no//de 'dod pa
298a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni rang gi sems kyis kun du bslang nas log par rnam par rtog pas ro myang ba ya ni pras keng rus lta bur yid la byed do//'dod pa rnams ni dgra mang ba'i phyir sha sna
298a6(dkon brtsegs): gu l+ya bur yid la byed//'dod pa rnams ni blangs na sdug bsngal la yongs su btong na bde ba'i phyir rtsa me lta bur yid la byed do//'dod pa rnams ni gnod pa mang ba'i phyi shing gi
298a7(dkon brtsegs): mo'i shing tog lta bur yid la byed do//'dod pa rnams ni dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir slong ba lta bur yid la byed do//'dod pa rnams ni skad cig tsam zhig nor byas dga' ba'i/
298b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir rmi lam lta bur yid la byed do//'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir mdze lta bu yid la byed do//'dod pa rnams ni shes par spyod pa tham
298b2(dkon brtsegs): cod kyi dngos po yin pa dang /ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dang /sems can dmyal ba'i mtho' yin pas mchi la lta bu yid la byed do//'dod pa rnams ni ngoms par mi byed pa dang /skom pa
298b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir tsha chu lta bur yid la byed do//de 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang /bcas pa dben pa
298b4(dkon brtsegs): las skyes po'i dga'o ba dang bde ba can bsam grotan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so//de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med
298b5(dkon brtsegs): dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin lngas skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrungs te gnas so//de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas
298b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin to/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis blang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste bsam gtan gsum pa
298b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pata
299a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa chad
