299a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de sems can thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de sems can rnams la
299a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de sems can rnams sdug bsngal yang med/bde ba yang med pa yid la byed pas btang snyoms
299a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de gzugs lnga rags pa'i 'du shes yid la mi byed cing na mkha' la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
299a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par shes pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yad la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas sgo//de ci yang med pa la
299a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so//de 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'du shes med/
299a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes med min skye mchod rdzogs par bsgrubs te gnas so//de rang gi dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba ji ltar gnas shing ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams
299b1(dkon brtsegs): la yang rgyun thung ba'i 'du shes dang /rgyun rnying ba rnams la yang rgyun ring ba'i 'du shes yod la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de sems can gyi lus rnams
299b2(dkon brtsegs): la mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so//da 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so//den pa dang rga ba'i
299b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so//de kha zas yongs su tshol ba dang 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang gnod pa'i rgyur yid la byed pas kha zas la mi
299b4(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so//de khyim dang grong dang grong khyer dang /ljongs kyi 'jig rten thams cad la 'byor pa dang 'brel ba'i mtshan mar yad la byed pa dang /nags tshal
299b5(dkon brtsegs): rmad du byung ba dang /kun dga' ra ba rmad du byung ba dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pas 'jig rten thams cad mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so//de nang
299b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chu ngu kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drang po bsgrubs te gnas
299b7(dkon brtsegs): denang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs gzhan med pa kha dag bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnod pa'i skye mtsho de gnyis pa
300a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs te gnas so//de shi bI'i lus bsregs pa de la rlung ngam chus thal ba yang med pa de byed pa'i 'du shes dang /zhibs pa la phye ma yang med pa dang /rdul du gyur//
300a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la rdul kyang med pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jig pa bsgom shing bsgrubs te/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chu ru kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan
300a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs
300a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de de bzhin du nang gzugs
300a5(dkon brtsegs): med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mer yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa bsgrubs te gnas so//
300a6(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po dang /dmar po dang dkar po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed
300a7(dkon brtsegs): pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang /bdun pa dang /brgyad pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de sa 'di mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par
300b1(dkon brtsegs): sar bsgrubs te gnas so//de chu dang me dang rlung dang /sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /na mkha' dang rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad
300b2(dkon brtsegs): par chu dang /zad par me dang /zad par rlung dang /zad par sngon po dang /zad par ser po dang /zad par dmar po dang /zad par dkar po dang /zad par na mkha' dang /zad par rnam par
300b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa bsgrubs te gnas so//de snyoms par 'jug pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs te/snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang dam pa'i chos yongs
300b4(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ba la dmigs pa dang dkon mchog gsum gyi risdes ma 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku dang rgyan la dmigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi gsungs tshangs
300b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang /sngon gyi smon lam la dmigs pa dang /sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i dmigs pa dang /'jig rten rnam par sbyang ba la dmigs pa
300b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /byang chub kyi snying po'i bkod pa la dmigs pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang /sems can+da thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmogs pa lnga sems te/
300b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dogaso//de bsam gtan byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do//sa'i khams la mi gnas/chu'i khams la mi gnas/me'i khams la
301a1(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas/rlung gi khams la mi gnas/nAmakha'i khams la mi gnas/rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas/'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/'jig rten
301a2(dkon brtsegs): pha rol la mi gnas par bsam grotan byed do//de ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan la gnas shing bsam gtan la
301a3(dkon brtsegs): dga'o//de bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams
301a4(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
301a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngo bar byed do//bsam gtan byed pa dang /bsam gtan byas pa dang /langs nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /
301a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed//
301a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/dus dus su 'am/cung zad cung zad du yang sems rnam/
301b1(dkon brtsegs): par g.yeng ba dang /ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa spang ba dang /dor ba dang bsal bar rtsol lo//'bad do//dus dus su 'am/cung zad cung zad du yang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /sems mnyam
301b2(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag par slob pa dang /mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo//'bad do//srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par
301b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro//lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang /byang chub tu smon
301b4(dkon brtsegs): lAm dang /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang /sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no//de ci'i
301b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par
301b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang /zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par bskyed/
301b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa de ni sems mnyam par gzhag par dge ba dang /sems rtse gcig tu dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no//lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan
302a1(dkon brtsegs): la/yid badre ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /sdug bsngal chung ngus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//lag bzangs byang chub
302a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa yongasu rdzogs par byed ce na/lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung thung dag gi bzlog kyang /gang zag gdo dag
302a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pa mang ba/thos pa 'dzin pa/thos pa bsags pa/don shes pa/bshad pa shes pa/dpyod pa can ji ltar thos pa'i don la yongs su rtog pa/de dag la bsnyen cing
302a4(dkon brtsegs): brten te/bsnyen bkur byed do//de thos pa'i ched dang /bshad pa'i tshad dang /don gyi tshad dang /don la yongs su rtog pa'i ched dang /slob dpon dang /mkhan po la bsnyen bkur
302a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i ched la/grang ba yang khyad du gsod/tshwa ba dang /bkres pa dang /skom pa dang /sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu dang /rlung dang /nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyis rag pa dang /gzhan
302a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis dran du smras shing /ngan du brjod pa 'chag gi lam dang /lus kyi tshor ba drag pa/rtsub pa/mi bzod pa/srog 'tshed par 'gyur ba yang khyad du gsod do//de chos rnams
302a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni rin po che'i 'du shes nye bar gnas/chos smra ba rnams la ni rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/chos nyan pa la ni dkon pa rnyed par 'du shes/chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod/
302b1(dkon brtsegs): drar 'du shes/srog phyogs par 'du shes/chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog dan yod par 'du shes/chos la yong su rtog pa la ni tshe rabs brgyar mi rnyed par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa
302b2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/de chos dedag nyan cing 'dzin la/mang du byed cing yongasu rtog pa na/khams rnams kyang rab tu shes/phung po rnams dang /skye mched rnams dang /'phags pa'i badren pa rnams dang /
302b3(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /dus dang theg pa rnams dang /dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes so//khams rnams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/khams ni gnyis te/'dus byas
302b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ste/khams gnyis po de dag go//'dus byas kyi khams ni gang /'dus ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/gang ci yang rung ste/skye ba dang /gnas
302b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /'gog pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams shes bya'o//gang ci yang rung ste/skye ba med pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /'gag pa med pa de ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams shes
302b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/de ltar 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams rab tu shes so//gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/dag pa'i khams dang /mi dge ba'i khams dang /lung du ma
302b7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i khams te/khams gsum po de dag go//dge ba'i khams ni gang /mi dge ba'i khams ni gang /lung du ma snyan pa'i khams ni gang zhe na/gang ci yang rung ste chags
303a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang /chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /gang ci yang rung ste/zhe sdang med pa dang /zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang /gang ci yang rung ste/gti mug med pa
303a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /gti mug med pa dang ldan pa de ni/dge ba'i khams shes bya'o//gang ci yang rung ste/chags pa dang /tshegs pa dang ldan pa dang /gang ci yang rung ste/zhe sdang dang /zhe
303a3(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang ldan pa dang /gang ci yang rung ste/gti mug dang /gti mug dang ldan pa de ni/mi dge ba'i khams shes bya'o//de gnyis la ma gtogs pa ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid
303a4(dkon brtsegs): de/de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so//gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/gsum gang zhe na/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med
303a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams so//'dod pa'i khams gang zhe na/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /yi dwags dang /lha ma yin dang /mi dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams
303a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/gang de dag 'thun pa dang /chags pa dang /zhi
303a7(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang /gti mug dang /yid kyi smon pa dang /smon lam 'debs pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod po'i khams shes bya'o//gzugs kyi khams gang zhe na/tshangs ris
303b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don rnams dang /tshangs chen dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /
303b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che dang /'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang dang /shin tu mthong dang /'og min gyi lha rnams te/gang de
303b3(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'dun pa dang /chags pa dang /zhe sdang ba dang /gti mug pa dang /yid kyis smon pa dang /smon lam 'debs pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams shes bya'o//
303b4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams gang zhe na/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang /ci yang med
303b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/gang de dag la 'dun pa dang /chags pa dang /zhe sdang dang //
303b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug pa dang /yid kyi smon pa dang /smon lam 'debs pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa gang ya ni pa de ni gzugs med pa'i khams shes bya ste/de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so//
303b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/gzhi gang zhe na/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams shes bya ba'i
304a1(dkon brtsegs): khams pa ni pa de dag ste/de ltar khams bzhi rab tu shes so//gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/drug gang zhe na/'dod pa'i khams dang /gnod sems kya 'dra//
304a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang /mngon par 'byung ba'i khams dang /gnod sems med pa'i khams dang /rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i khams te/khams drug po de dag rab tu/
304a3(dkon brtsegs): shes so//gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/drug gang zhe na/sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams dang /rnam par
304a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams te/khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so//de la sa'i khams ni mi rtag pa/mi brtan pa/'gyur ba'i chos tsan+da te/mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o//
304a5(dkon brtsegs): drug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa'o//de bzhin du chu'i khrims dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /na mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi
304a6(dkon brtsegs): bya pa/mi brtan pa/'gyur ba'i chos can te/mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o//sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa ste/de ltar khams drug rab tu shes so//
304a7(dkon brtsegs): dachos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/gzugs kyi phung po dang /tshor ba'i phung po dang /'du shes kyi phung po dang /'du byed kyi phreng po dang /rnam
304b1(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma shes pa'i phung ba ste/phung po lnga rab tu shes so//gzugs ni lbu brngas pa lta bu dang /ngan pa dang /'jig pa dang /ring du mi gnas pa dang /char ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu dang /ngan pa drung /
304b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang /ring du mi gnas pa dang /'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu dang /ngan pa dang 'jig pa dang /ring du mi gnas pa dang /'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu dang /ngan pa dang 'jig pa
304b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /ring du mi gnas pa dang /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /ngan pa dang /'jig pa dang /ring du mi gnas par de ltar phung po lnga rab tu shes so//de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin
304b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/mig nang gi skye mched dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid nang gi skye mched ces bya ba nang gi
304b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched drug po de dag go//de la mgri nang gi skye mched ni/na ba'i chos can dang /rga ba'i chos can dang /'chi ba'i chos can dang /bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang /'dod chags kyi me
304b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /zhe sdang gi me dang /gti mug gi me kun du 'bar ba dang /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde
304b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /'khrug pa rnams kyis kun du 'bar ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar rab tu shes so//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid nang gi skye mched
305a1(dkon brtsegs): la yang na nga'i chos can dang /rga ba'i chos can dang /'chi ba'i chos can dang /bdag dang bdag gis stong ba dang /'dod chags kyi mi dang /zhe sdang gi mo dang /g+hAti mug
305a2(dkon brtsegs): me kun tu 'bar ba dang /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams kyis kun du
305a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bur bar rab tu shes te/de ltar nang gi skye mched drag po dag rab tu shes so//gzhan yang phyi'i skye mched drug rab tu shes te/mig gis rnam
305a4(dkon brtsegs): par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyi'i skye mched dang /rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang /snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang /lces rnam par shes par bya bar
305a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang /yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chis phyi'i skye mched rnams shes bya ba ste/skye mched drug po de dag go//de la
305a6(dkon brtsegs): mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs phyi'i skye mched la skyabs med pa dang /mgon med pa dang /stobs med pa dang /nyams chung ba ste/de la rtag pa 'am/brtan pa 'am/
305a7(dkon brtsegs): ther zug pa'am/de bzhin nyid dam/ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dam/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/sgyu mad ni yod/sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/sems rmongs par
305b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de ni ya de/gang ci yang yod pa dang /de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes pad+ma byA ba s+thArna mas dang /snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang /lhas rnam pa shes par bya ba ro rnams dang /lus/
305b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos phyi'i skye mched la yang /skyabs mod pa dang /mgon med pa dang /stobs med pa dang /nyams chung ba ste//
305b3(dkon brtsegs): de la rtag pa 'am/brten pa'am/ther zug pa 'am/de bzhin nyid dam/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/sgyu ma de ni yod/sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/
305b4(dkon brtsegs): sems rmongs par byas pa de ni yod de/gang ci yang yod par phyi'i skye mched drug po de ltar rab tu shes so//de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa ni/'phags pa'i
305b5(dkon brtsegs): bden pa bzhi rab tu shes so//bzhi gang zhe na/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i
305b6(dkon brtsegs): lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag go//phung po lnga rnams dang /khams drug po dag dang /nang gi skye mched drug po dag dag phyi'i skye mched drug po dgag pa'i
305b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ni sdug bsngal zhes bya ste/sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /nad dang /'bras dang /zug rngu dang /sdig pa dang /bdag med pa dang /rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid
306a1(dkon brtsegs): du lta'o//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /nga rgyal dang /nga'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa dang /bdag gi bdag ni 'di yin no snyam du bdag du mngon par
306a2(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa dang /'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /gzugs can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /'du
306a3(dkon brtsegs): shes can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /phung po rnams las bdag go snyam pa dang /phung po rnams las bdag gzhan
306a4(dkon brtsegs): no snyam pa dang /phung po rnams la bdag go snyam pa dang /khams rnams dang /skye mched rnams bdag go snyam pa dang /skye mched rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang /skye
306a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod rnams la bdag go snyam pa dang /bdag la skye mched rnams so snyam pa dang /tshor bar byed pa bdag go snyam pa dang /gzugs can chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang /gzugs
306a6(dkon brtsegs): can ma yin pa chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang /gzugs can mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang /gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang /bdag rtag
306a7(dkon brtsegs): ge snyam pa dang /bdag mi rtag gi snyam pa dang /rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go snyam pa dang /rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang /bdag mtha' yod
306b1(dkon brtsegs): do snyam pa dang /bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no snyam pa dang /mtha' yod kyang yod la/mtha' med kyang med do snyam pa dang /mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/mtha' med pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang //
306b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /'byung yang 'byung la/mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo //snyam pa dang /de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung
306b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin/mi 'byung ba yang ma yin no snyam pa dang /srog du lus yin snyam pa dang /srog kyang gzhan lus kyang gzhan no snyam pa dang /sems can 'di gang nas 'ongs de 'di nas shi
306b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /sems can yod pa las tshad de 'jig cing med par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /byed pa de myong ba de yin no snyam pa dang /byed pa yang gzhan myong ba
306b5(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan no snyam pa dang /bdag yod pas bdag gi yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /'di ni bdag de lta bu'am/bdag gzhan/
306b6(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ba zhig gam/de bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig gam/gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ram/de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ram/gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
306b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir bdag sngon 'byung ngam/bdag da ltar byung ba 'am/bdag gzhan du byung ngam snyam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen te/'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal
307a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /sems kyi gnas dang /mngon par zhen pa dang /nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal ba dang /snyems pa dang /nga rgyal byed pa dang /bdag tu smra ba'i len pa dang /'dod chags dang /

307a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba dang /'dod par gtogs pa 'am/gzugasu gtogs pa 'am/gzugs med par gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags

307a5(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o//gang sdug bsngal la yang sdug bsngal ba/kun 'byung ba la yang kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa la yang 'gog
307a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /lam la yang lam du yid la byed pa dang /'du byed rnams la nyis dmigs su lta zhing gnas pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta zhing gnas pa dang /ji ltar mthong ba dang //
307a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu byas pa la so sor rtog pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba
307b1(dkon brtsegs): dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de 'phags
307b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la dpyod cing rtog la khong du chud par byed cing /rnam par 'jig pa na 'dus byas kyi khams la mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med par mthong ngo //
307b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyi khams la ni skyabs dang /gnas dang /mgon dang /dpung gnyen du yang mthong la/'dus ma byas kyi khams mngon sum du yang mi byed do//de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa

307b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis reg pa dang /reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang /sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang /len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang /srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang /skye
307b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi ste/'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa dang /mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ni
308a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa zhes bya'o//gang cung zad lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba 'am/mi g.yo ba
308a2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'gro ba 'am/'dod pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/gzugs kyi kham su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/gzugs med pa'i kham su nye bar 'gro ba de dag ni 'du byed rnams shes bya
308a3(dkon brtsegs): gang chung zad de las byung ba sems shes bya ba dang /yid ces bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//de las byung ba gang ci yang rung de las byung ba tshor ba dang /'du shes dang

308a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod drug ces bya'o//mig la rten cing gzugs lnga yang brten te mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang /gsum 'dus pa ni rig pa'o//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang //

308b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag ni tshor ba gsum zhes bya'o//de las byung ba 'dod chags dang /chags pa dang /dga' ba de ni srid pa zhes bya'o//de las
308b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba kun du chags pa dang /lta ba dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs dang /bdag tu smra ba de ni len pa zhes bya'o//de las byung ba gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
308b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa de ni srid pa zhes bya'o//gang srid pa de 'byung ba dang /skye ba dang /mngon par 'grub po de ni skye ba zhes bya'o//gang srid pa de 'gyur ba dang /'jig pa dang /nye bar
308b4(dkon brtsegs): khrid pa de ni rmya ba zhes bya'o//gang khrid pa de 'tsho 'pho ba dang /'bral ba du ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o//de de ltar rten cing 'brel por 'byung ba la dpyod cing yongs su rtog la/khong du chud par byed cing
308b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig pa na sa rlom sems su mi byed/sas rlom sems su mi byed/sa bdag gi snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do//sa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do//chu dang /me dang /rlung
308b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /na mkha' dang /rnam par shes pa la gcig pa dang /tha dad pa dang /mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /bye brag phyed pa dang /rnam par shes pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems su

309a1(dkon brtsegs): de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dgu par rjes su mthong byan/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum pa chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /

309a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa rab tu shes so//de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na/dus gsum rab tu shes te/gsum gang zhe na/'das pa'i dus dang /ma 'ongs
309b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus te/de dag ni dus gsum rnams shes bya'o//'du byed gang la la 'gags pa de ni 'das pa'i dus shes bya'o//'du byed gang la lam 'ongs shing ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs
309b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus shes bya'o//'du byed gang la la da ltar byung ba da ltar du gyur pa de ni da ltar byung ba'i dus shes bya'o//de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rjes sgra dran na spyod cing bshung
309b3(dkon brtsegs): ste nges par sbyong ngo //ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdul tsam la yang gcig tu rnam par smin par mthong /mi sdug par rnam par smin par mthong /yid du mi 'ong bar rnam par
309b4(dkon brtsegs): smin par mthong /'jigs par mthong zhing gnas so//da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsu ba skye ba'i skabs mi 'byed de/lus sdom pas bsdams ngag sdom pas bsdams/
309b5(dkon brtsegs): yid sdom pas bsdams/dbang po drug po sdom pas bsdams//de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems la smon
309b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /byang chub kyi sems la smon lam 'debs pa rjes su dran zhing 'dun pa drag po dang /dga' ba drag po dang /dad pa drag pas sems can thams cad bskal ba dang /sems can
309b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsgo
310a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed do//ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub tu smon pa dang /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa yang 'dun pa drag
310a2(dkon brtsegs): po dang /dga' ba drag po dang /dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgyel pa dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen
310a3(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod do//smos so//yid kyis smon no//da ltar byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang /dge
310a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang sems can thams cad dgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba
310a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun tu mi 'dor ro//nyams par mi byed do//brjed par mi byed do//bag med par mi byed do//gang 'angs
310a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phung po drung /khams dang /skye mched ni 'das pa/'gegs pa/med pa yod pa ma yin pa ste/de ni da ltar bdag med pa/bdag gi med pa'o ma 'ongs pa'i phung po dang /kham sa dang /
310a7(dkon brtsegs): skye mched de ni ma skyes pa/ma byung ba/yod pa ma yin pa ste/de ni de ltar bdag med pa/bdag gi med pa'o//gang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched de ni mi
310b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa mi 'dug pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jig rten ni skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro//skad cig pa de'i skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan/gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan/'gag pa'i dus/
310b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzhan/gang yin pa'i skad cig de ni gnas med pa/'dug pa med pa'o//skad cig gi dus gang yin pa de ni/nang dang /phyi'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched do//nang dang /phyi'i phung
310b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang /khams dang /skye mched gang yin pa de ni dus so//da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched gang yin pa de ni skad cig tsam yang mi gnas pa/mi 'dug pa ste/mi gnas
310b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/mi 'dug pa la ni bdag dang /bdag gi med do//de yang gang gi tshe mra 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe ma skyes pa/ma byung ba yod pa ma yin pa'o//bdag tu ma gyur cing /bdag gir ma gyur
310b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//gang gi tshe 'das te 'gags pa dang /ma byung ba ste yod pa ma yin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang bdog med pa dang /bdag gi med pa nyid du 'gyur ro//gang yang dus gsum dag tu bdag
310b6(dkon brtsegs): med cing bdag gi med pa de ni byung zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag gi'o//'di ni nga'i 'o//bdag gi 'dri ni yod do zhes bdag tu lta bar nges pa ma
310b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no//de srid pa thams cad dang /'du byed thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /spangs pa'i 'du shes dang /'gog pa'i 'du shes
311a1(dkon brtsegs): can du gnas te/'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin no//gang de ltar dus gsum rab tu shes pa de/chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na//
311a2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/gsum gang zhe na/lha'i thog pa dang /tshangs pa'i theg pa dang /'phags pa'i theg pa ste/de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o//bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i
311a3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa ste/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa yang lha'i theg pa'o//byams pa ni tshangs pa'i theg pa ste/snying rje dang //dga' ba dang /btang snyoms kyang tshangs
311a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i theg pa'o//yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba
311a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o//de dus dus su lha'i
311a6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa sgom ste/sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa sgom ste/sems can rnams kyang de la 'god do//dus dus su 'phags pa'i theg pa can rnams
311a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de la 'god la/rnam par grol ba 'phags pa mngon sum du yang mi byed do//gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/gsum gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs/
311b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg pa chen po ste/de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o//mas pa dman pa dang /dbang po dman pa skad cig tsam yang srid pa la mos par mi byed/skyed par mi byed kyi 'dor te/smad
311b2(dkon brtsegs): TIg de la de ma thag tu mya ngan las 'das pa thub pa'i phan yon mthong bas/mgo dang gisngal me 'bar ba bzhin du/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa de dag khong du chud pa rtogs par bya ba'i
311b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/'dun pa dang rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o//mos pa 'bring dang /dbang po 'bring dang /dben par dga' ba dang /rang gidon lhur len pa dang /bsam gtan
311b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /snyems par 'jug pa la gnas par brtson pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang /rang byang chub tu smon pa dang /rang byang chub tu smon
311b5(dkon brtsegs): lam 'debs pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya'o//mos pa khyad par 'phags pa/dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa/sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can
311b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa
311b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang /'jig rten gyi don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la mi lte ba dang /'khor ba'i bde ba la yang smod pa mang ba yin na/'khor
312a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal la spyod pa mang ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/tshul khrims dang /spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa la rnam par gnas pa dang /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can
312a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdo sde rnams klog pa dang /kha don du byed pa dang /lung nod pa dang /yid la byed pa la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa de dag dge ba'i
312a3(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen yin pa dang /de dag gi byin gyis brlabs bzhi po bden pa dang /gtong ba dang /nye bar zhi ba dang /shes rab la slob pa dang /shes bya thams cad nyan pa dang /len pa dang /
312a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang /dpyod par dga' ba dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /rang gi don la mi lta ba dang /'jig rten gyi don lhur len
312a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad theg pa gsum po dag la dgod par 'dod pa dang /dgod par spro ba dang /bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi theg pa la shin tu gnas pa
312a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /mi phyed pa dang /mi bskyod pa dang /rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang /rtag par rgyun du byang chub tu smon cing /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa do ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ste/de ltar theg
312a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum po dag rab tu shes so//de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na dge ba'i thabs rab tu shes te/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun/
312b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /chos thams cad dang /dge 'dun thams cad
312b2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo zhes dmigs par byed do//de phyag lan gcig 'tshal ba na mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do//de byang chub tu smon pa na/sems
312b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung po dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
312b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//de bzhin du skyabasu 'gro ba na yang sems bskyed do//de 'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba dang /khrus
312b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang /za ba dang /'thung ba dang /zhing rmo ba dang /sa bon 'debs pa dang /las thams cad byed pa na yang mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab par bya'o/
312b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems bskyed do//mang du byed do//snyoms par 'jug pa dang /bsam gtan byed pa na yang /sems can thams cad bskul ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /
312b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/mtha' yas shing dpag tu
313a1(dkon brtsegs): med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab po zhes sems bskyed do//mang du byed do//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog dang /sems can
313a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gdul ba dang /mtshungs pa med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /'jig rten thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /'jig rten thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang //
313a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gdab po zhes sems bskyed do//mang du byed do//de dge ba gang
313a4(dkon brtsegs): ci spyod kyang /de sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /ngan 'gro'i rgyud bcad pa dang /sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad
313a5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//nyan thos kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang /ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa
313a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang /ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs
313a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed de//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang /mi 'ongs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya
313b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnams bskal par bzhugs pa dang /bskal par
313b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa dang /bskal par dge 'dun 'thun par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar byed do//mtho ris kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/nyan thos kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod
313b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa'am/sbyin pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/snyan par smra bas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/don spyod pas rjes su 'jug pa 'am/don 'thun pas rjesu
313b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa 'am/ji lta ji ltar gzhan dag dge ba'i phyogs yang dgra par bskyed cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so//de chos kyi tshig 'di dag la nyin gcig bzhin du
313b5(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum du 'jug go/yid la byed do//de 'di lta ste/'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad na//yang dag bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //chos dang dge 'dun byang chub
313b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la//ngan 'gro mgo bos mtha' yas phyag kyang 'tshal//'gro ba'i nang na yon tan mnyam med cing //mi mnyam mnyam pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas can//yon tan dpag med
313b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad la//bdag ni mgo bos mtha' yas skyabs su mchi//sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang tshogs rnams dang //byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams//gang yang
314a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya lam stongs par mi 'gyur bar//de ltar gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs//zhinga'i chos ni ra tu ston mdzad cing //bskal pa ma lus rnam su bzhugs par yang //
314a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams rnams kun gyi bde gshegs la//mgo bos gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs//sngon dang 'di dang skad cig tsam yang rung //bdag gis sdig pa gang dang gang
314a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa//sdig pa de dag thams cad smad par bgyi//sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spangs par bgyi//rked cig tsam yang bdag gis dge ba 'di//ma lus mer ni yang dag babyung
314a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi//tshe yos dzi tsim+b+ha thub kyi bar du ni//dge bdun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal//sangs rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams//byang chub chos kyi 'khrod lor
314a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor bya//'jig rten 'dir ni byang dang byung gyur dang //'byung 'gyur rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang //rgyal ba rnams dang 'phags pa thams cad kyi//tshul khrims dang ni ye shes
314a6(dkon brtsegs): tinge 'dzin dang //rnam grol tshe dang chos rnams gang yin pa//de dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur cig/'gro ba lnga'i sems can thams cad dag/b+h+ring dang byung gyur 'byung ba
314a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur rnams kyi//dge bdag la bdag ni phyi phyir zhing //mgo bos mtha' yas rjes su yi ring ngo //yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa//de dag thams cad 'gro ba ma lus
314b1(dkon brtsegs): pas//sems can re re dang ni bdag nyid la'ang //yod par bdug ni smon lam mtha' yas 'debs//bdag gi dge ba dag ni 'das pa dang //ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyis//'jig
314b2(dkon brtsegs): rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du//dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shog/dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams//bsgral par bzhugs pas phongs par ma
314b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/bar du gcod pa med par byang chub dang /pha rol phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs par shog/sems can drag ni thams cad bde ba dang //'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang //mi dge
314b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ni bral ba dang //dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gyur cig/theg pa gsum po dag la ci rigs par//de dag la ni smon lam mthar phyin cing //tshe ring ba dang rnam par grol ba
314b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /khyad par can gyi don kun rdzogs par shog/rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam 'debs pa na//mtha' yas dpag tu med par rab tu 'debs//sems can thams cad bdag gi sdug
314b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang //nyon mongs dag ni nye bar zhi gyur cig/chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir//'jig rten gyi ni khams rnams thams cad kyi//rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' la//
314b7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lus ni nges par dbul bar bgyi//rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar du//ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas gdab//skye dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la//bdag ni
315a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs spyad pa bgyi bar shog/'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi//dkan mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' la//na mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spros mchog
315a2(dkon brtsegs): dang //phreng ba me tog tshun pos mchod byed shog/lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang dngul dag dang //gos dang rin po che yi phung po dang //gzhal med khang bcas gzhon dang mal cha dang //
315a3(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par shog/'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing //skyabs dang lus dang pha 'drar gyur par shog/bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang
315a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang //'gro la chos ni rab tu ston gyur cig/byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang //dkon mchog gsum phyir go cha sra ba bgro/pha rol phyin pa yongasu rdzogs byed cing //sangs//
315a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos rnams yongasu rdzogs byed shog/sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus ngag dang //yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig/byang chub las ni me log bdag 'gyur zhing //
315a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dga' dang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur//srid dang sred par byang chub sems dpa' dang //sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob//bdag gi chos rnams de dag kun la yang
315a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod par bgyi//de de ltar ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi/dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes//de shes rab de dang /ye shes mngon sum du bya bar 'dod
315b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //yid la bya bar 'dod ngan yang //sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa/
315b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do//mngon sum du byed pa dang /yid la byed pa dang /mngon sum du byas pa dang /yid la byas nas kyang
315b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
315b4(dkon brtsegs): cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do//gal te shes rab de dang ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/dus dus su 'am/
315b5(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cung zad du yang 'chol ba'i shes rab dang /mi shes pa spang ba dang /dor ba dang /brtsal bar rtsol lo//'bad do//dus dus su 'am/cung zad cung zad du'ang shes rab dang /ye shes la slo
315b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /yongasu rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo//'dod do//srid pa gzhan du kyang pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /myid khyog par mi 'gyur ro//lag bzangs byang chub
315b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang /byang chub tu smon pa dang /byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa
316a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dag po dang /ye shes dge bgrangs med cing dpag tu myed pa yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/
316a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad lnga/zag pa med pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang /zug pa med pa'i shes rab yang drug par
316a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par 'dod pa dang /mi slob pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni shes rab dge ba dang /ye shes dge ba thams cad kyi mchog ljin no//de ni dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
316a4(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du sbyin par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
316a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//chos
316a6(dkon brtsegs): kyirnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag theg pa gsum dang /mtho ris su skye ba'i don byas par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das
316a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag/nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha dang mi dang /lham
316b1(dkon brtsegs): yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa
316b2(dkon brtsegs): las/lag bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/'dus pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha na shI la dang /'dzin mi tra dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de zhang ye shes sdes
316b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar chad kyis kyang btses nas gtan la phab pa///bam po gnyis dang she lo ka brgya rtsa brgyad///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya su ra ta pa ri prid tshA nA ma me hA
316b4(dkon brtsegs): ya nA sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa nges pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po gcig pa//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad
316b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nA rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
316b6(dkon brtsegs): po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/'khor bzhi dang /rgyal po dang /blon po dang /grong rdal gyi mi dang /ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis bkur sti
316b7(dkon brtsegs): byas/blo mar byas rim gror byas/mchod pa byas so//de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer na grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa zhes bya ba/sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/chos la dad pa
317a1(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongasu bzung ba/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/byams pa la gnas te sems
317a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/snyi'i rje la gnas te yid yongs su skye ba med pa/dga' ba la gnas te chos kyi kun dga'
317a3(dkon brtsegs): la dga' zhing mos pa/gtang snyoms la gnas te/bde ba dang /sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/sngon gyi
317a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul phun sum tshogs pa/thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /dbul por ming du chags pa zhig gnas te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i mig
317a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa shin du 'dod pa chung ba/chog shes pa/tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/yid 'khrug pa med pa/rtag
317a6(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhin 'dzum pa/gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyon du mi lta ba/sems can thams cad kyi sems bsrung ba/brkam pa med pa/shes bzhin du spyod pa/chog shes shing dbang
317a7(dkon brtsegs): sla ba/gso sla ba/bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/g.yo med pa/nga rgyal med pa/bka' blo bde ba/mthun par 'dzin pa/rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/lag
317b1(dkon brtsegs): na shing la'i snod thogs pa/rtsa bting ba la nyal ba/gos ngan pa gyon pa/rnyed kyang mi len pa/bzang yang rung /ngan yang rung /bgo bsha' byas nas za ba dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs
317b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la blta ba/chos nyan par 'dod pa/gtam sna tshogs byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan pa/sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' ba de mthong ngo //mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te//
317b3(dkon brtsegs): ci grong khyer gyi dbul po 'di yid dam la brtan nam ma brtan pa bdag gis brtag go snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas/grong khyer gyi dbul
317b4(dkon brtsegs): po des po la tshig ngan pa dag gis gshe zhing smyos par byed do//bong ba dang /dbyug pa dang /mtshon cha dag kyang bstan na nges pa de'i bzod pa'i stobs kyi sna dang du len par byed de/mi 'khrug
317b5(dkon brtsegs): cing gnod sems mi bskyed do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan dag ni gu sprul nas nges pa de'i mdun du bzhag ste/nges pa de la dga' ba'i tshig gis kho bo cag ni khyod kyi don byed par
317b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa yin gyis/tso ste khyod 'drod pa lta na/khyod la sdigs pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gris char gtsang par bya'o zhes smraso//nges pas smras pa/grogs po dag thong de skad ma
317b7(dkon brtsegs): zer cing //gal te mi 'di dag gis kho bo'i lus dum bu brgyar dum bur btub su zin kyang /kho bo ni mi 'di dag la sdig pa'o sems mi bskyed do//bregs po dag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba
318a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la de'i 'gro ba ni gnyis kha na ste/dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o//mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o//de bas na ya ba na sems
318a2(dkon brtsegs): can pha rol tshig pa za bar byed pa yang mi 'dod na gtse ba lta ci smos/de nas de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa 'di dag smra so//sa bon tshab rnams kyi ni//'bras bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur//sa ban dang nga
318a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ni//'bras bu dador ba skye bar 'gyur//dpe zlar bya ba 'di yis ni//sdig pa'i rnam smin che ba dang //dkar po'i 'bras bu dang ra ba dang //mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur//
318a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi//sdig pa rnams gsum mi bya zhing //gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas pa yis//rjes su dga' ba mi bya'o//lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis//baglang po rnam
318a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum rtag tu byas//gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa//gzhan dag la yang yid rang bya//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya bya ni gyis dus gzhan zhig na/nges pa la dbyig dang /gser mang po bstan
318a6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di skad ces smra so//des pa'o ni las khyer la sbyin pa dag byin cig/bsad na mos ngag gyis shig/gos dang rgyan dag kyang thogs shig/khyod ngan zhing dbul bas ci zhig bya/des
318a7(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/grags po dag snga na sems can rnams la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /ngag dang yad kyis nyes par spyad pas/'dir dbul po zhes bya bar gyur to//de bas na kho bo ni me byin
318b1(dkon brtsegs): pabar len pa de byed par mi 'drong ngo //brgya byin gyis smras pa//des pa khyod da ltar je bde bar 'tsho bar gyis shig/'jig rten pha rol bsam pas khyod lan+di zhig bya/nges pas smras pa/grogs gang tshe 'dri
318b2(dkon brtsegs): ched cher 'dzin pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos yin gyis/mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi mched cher 'dzin to//'dod pas zi'i gyis non pa dang /zhe sdang gis zil gyis non pa dang /gti mug gis zil gyis
318b3(dkon brtsegs): non pa dang /'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no//sog 'jog ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas
318b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni srog 'jog mi byed do//bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongasu 'dzin
318b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed do//lus dang srog la lta ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o//ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes pa dag ni ma byin par len par
318b6(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni ngoms shes shing chog shes pa yin no//'tsho ba yongs su ma drag pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba yongasu dag pa yin no//
318b7(dkon brtsegs): las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni las mthong ba yin no//rnam par 'tshe ba tshad cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni
319a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi 'tshe ba chad cher 'dzin to//byams pa'i sems med pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan na//phyin ci ldog bzhis
319a2(dkon brtsegs): sems bslad pa ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/mkhas pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no//gzhan yang sems can dbul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos tshig su bcad po dag gis bshad
319a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyon cig/bye ba phrag stong gter yad kyang //gang dag la ni gtong med pa//de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes//thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad//gang la zad cing meng bzhin du//
319a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni gtong la rab gnas na//de ni 'jig rten nor che zhes//yang dag gzags pa rnams kyis bshad//gang la sdig med 'phags pa ni//rnam pa kun gyis mdzes pa yin//byis pa sdig
319a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byed pa ni//shin tu brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin//mkhas pa dag gis spyos bla yi//byis pas bsngags pa de lta min//byis pas sdig la bsags par byed//mkhas pa dag ni
319a6(dkon brtsegs): sdig la smod//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig tu sprul to//de nas ngas gser mang po khyer te/nges pa la 'di skad ces smras//kye nges pa gser khyer la
319a7(dkon brtsegs): kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la khyod gcig pus che bzhi bya bar kho bos byas kyis/der kho bo'i cha bzhi gyis shig/des pas smras pa/grogs po thong khyed de skad ma zar cig kho bo ni berdzus
319b1(dkon brtsegs): zer du mi 'dod do//kye grogs pa brdzun du smra ba ni bdag la yang slu zhing pha rol la yang slu la/'phags pa la yang slu ba yin te/grags pa nyams par byed pa dang /yid mi ches pa dang yid du mi 'ong ba dbyed
319b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /brnyas par byed pa dang /sems yongasu bdung bar byed pa yin no//kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni kha mnam par byed pa dang /lus smad por byed pa dang /lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no//
319b3(dkon brtsegs): kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rku ba dang /dran pa rmugs par byed pa des mtho ris kyi lam la sgrib pa smin no//kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis btsun
319b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya ba dang /yang dag par smra ba rnams kyi nar tshig mi mdzes pa dang /mkhas pa rnams kyis smad pa dang /sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang /brtul zhugs yongs su spang ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa
319b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rtse bar gyur pa yin no//de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyis dbul po des pas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//brdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni//rul ba'i dri yang mnam par
319b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//dgon par ji ltar bcom pa bzhin//sngon gyi dkar rnams spong bar byed//rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang //'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar byed//mi ni gang zhig brdzun//
319b7(dkon brtsegs): zer ba//de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur//brdzun du smra ba byed pa de//sdig po kun gyi rtsa ba dang //dka' thub can gyi rtsa gcod dang //ngan 'gror 'gro ba zhes kyang bya//gal te 'dzam gling
320a1(dkon brtsegs): gang ba yi//gser dag khyed kyis byin na yang //kho ba chos na bsrung bu'i phyir//rtag tu brdzun ni sgra mi byed//de nas brgya byin gyis sprul ba'i mis nges pa brdzun zer du gzug ma
320a2(dkon brtsegs): nus nas song ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu ma nye 'od dang /lha ma yin gyi bu me bde sogs la 'di skad ces smras//khyod gnyis song la brtul zhugs dang dka' thub byed pa
320a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ci 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhig gam/'on te 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba zhig yin pa rtogs shig/de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang /lha'i bu mo nyi 'od nam langs nas
320a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gang na dris pa 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas/des pa la tshig snyan pas smras te/des pa bzhengs/bdag cag gnyis ni khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lag so//des pa
320a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/sha tshugs dang /kha dog dang /dbyibs dang /lus byugs pa dang /rgyan dang /chas dang /lhab ltub la gzigs/
320a6(dkon brtsegs): na chod dang lang tshal bab pa la gzigs/ngas pa khyod kyi bstan bkur bgyid pa 'di 'dra bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la gzugs/des pas bltas nas smras pa/
320a7(dkon brtsegs): khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/lha dang mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yin//
320b1(dkon brtsegs): khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang /rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo //khyed gnyis kyi gzugs ni lbu ba dang /chu bur dang /smig rgyu lta bur mthong ngo //khyed tsan dan gyi 'dre gus byug
320b2(dkon brtsegs): popa ni lpags pa rlon pa shes g.yogs pa lta bur mthong ngo //khyed kyi rgyan dang /lhub lbu ba ni mi slu ba'i sgyu ma byas pa lta bur mthong ngo //khyed kyi lang tsho ni mi rtag pa dang /'gyur ba'i chos can du/
320b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo //bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir/khyed gnyis la kho bo ma chags so//khyed gnyis ni spre'u dang /bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/
320b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dran pas kun nas bsrung ba dag gi ni ma yin no//che zhe dag 'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi sdug pa'o//'dod pa la brten pa de ni dri nge ba'o//'dod pa la brten pa na rul po'o//'dod pa la
320b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni bde ba thams cad yongasu 'grab par byed pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
320b6(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten la brten pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni ngan 'gro na gnas pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyid pa dag la bsten pa'o//'dod pa la bsten
320b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni mi mthun pa dang /gor na gnas pa'o//'dod pa la bstan pa ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni sred pa'i bag la nyal gnas pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni rnam par/
321a1(dkon brtsegs): rmongs shing shin tu mos la kun tu rmongs pa'o//'dod pa la bstan pa ni nye bar gzir cing rnam par gzir la rab tu gzir ba'o//'dud pa la bstun pa ni kun du gdungs shing rnam par gdungs
321a2(dkon brtsegs): lnga yongasu gdungs pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug cing /dge ba yongasu nyams par byed pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni
321a3(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i sgron gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa dang /gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang /sha za mo dang 'dris par byed pa'o//'dod
321a4(dkon brtsegs): pApa la bsten pa ni ba glang dang /bong bu dang /khyi dang /phag dang /rnga mo dang /glang po che dang /rta dang /lug dang /waM la bsten pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la
321a5(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa'o//'dod pa la bstan pa ni tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /gtong ba yongasu 'dor ba bsten pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni brertul zhugs dang /dka' thub 'dor ba'o//'dod
321a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la bsten pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin tu phal bar byed pa'o//'dod pa la bsten pa ni shin tu bar du gcod par byed pa'o//de nas de'i tshe grong
321a7(dkon brtsegs): khyer gyi dbul po des pas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu smad pa s+ho//shin tu sdug bsngal bde ba 'jig par byed//rtag tu ngan songs rnams khyim du gyur/
321b1(dkon brtsegs): sems rmongs gyur ba dag gis rtag tu brten//'bab rtsod can ta mi bden 'chang du gyur//rtag tu 'gyed cing mi mthun gro rlung gnas//'di dag phyin ci log bsgyud bzhi yin te//'dod bstan sred pa 'bar /
321b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba med//rnam rmongs rab rmongs de bzhin kun tu rmongs//'dod brten rtag tu gzir cing gnod pa bste//'di ni kun gdungs rnam gdungs yongasu gdungs//sdig par sbyor zhing dge ba chung gos
321b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste//'dod bstan dper na sprin gyi dra ba 'dra//'dod bstan sha za ma dang srin ma dang //bud med gzugs mi stug dang 'dres byed bzhin//'od ni ba lang bong bu tangs
321b4(dkon brtsegs): dang //phag dang khyi dang wa dang rngo mo dang //gling chen lug rnams kyis kyang bstan pa ste/'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs//'di bsnyen tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang //dka
321b5(dkon brtsegs): thub brtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa ste//'di la rtag tu bgra med nyes pa 'phel/de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bud med spong //gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i//mngangs ldan gzugs
321b6(dkon brtsegs): can dag gis gang gyur kyang //yon tan gnas pa kho bo'i sems gcig kyang //'dod chags la ni nams kyang rtogs mi 'gyur//de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang /lha'i bu mo nyi 'di song nas
321b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshig su bcad de smras pa/des ni 'od na bud mad rnams kyi skyon yang dag/gang lags de dag shin tu mthong bar dogs ma mchis//ji ltar de'i sems ni yul las log gyur
322a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis//de na sa lha'i dbang po brgya byin grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa'i thad du song nas tshig su bcad de smras pa/ci zhig don
322a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyer nges pa chos skyed pa/brtul zhugs de ni spyod pa rnams dag smros//'di yis nyi zla 'am yang na dbang po 'am/tshangs pa'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod spong byed//des pas smras pa/nyi ma zla ba
322a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin brgya byin dang //tshangs pa 'am rgyas po 'o ma 'di na gzhan dag kyang //'gro ba rgya chen gang yod de dag kun//gar byed la bzhini mi rtag mi brtan na//mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed//
322a4(dkon brtsegs): glang la skye mod rga med 'chi ba mud//sdug dang mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa'ang med//'gro ba grol mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes//de thob bya phyir sems kyi spyod pa nges//brgya byin
322a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjesu yid rang ste//khyod kyis smon lam btab pa legs par grub gyur cig/bdud rnams sngar bcas myur du nges par bcom nas ni//shAkya snying gi
322a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ltar byang chub thob gyur cig/de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyed nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/nor bu rin po che
322a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu gyur pa 'di bdag gis mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang yin pa de la sbyin pa gor ma chag go snyam nas/de grong bar du song ste/thams
322b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang /dbul po mgon med pa phal po che der 'dus te/bdag cag dbul po yin gyis bdag cag la byin cig
322b2(dkon brtsegs): ces 'dzar to//des pas smras pa/khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi/mnyan yod 'di na ches dbul po gzhan zhig yod kyis de la sbyin na//de dag gis smras pa/gang yin dris pas smras pa/rgyal
322b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gsal rgyal 'di yin no//de dag gis smras pa/khyod de skad ma zar shAg/rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yin gyi/'dug cag ni dbul zhing mgon med pa yin/
322b4(dkon brtsegs): des pas smras pa/nor mang gi ni ci zhig bya//rgya mtsho la ni klung rnams bzhin//gang dag la ni chog med pa//mA bsdams de dag dbul ba yin//gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phral zhing //yang
322b5(dkon brtsegs): yid ni skye 'gyur ba//rmongs pa de dag tshe 'di dang //pha rol tu yang dbul por 'gyur//de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa skye bo phalnga po che dag gris yongasu bskor cing /nor bu rin po
322b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer nas/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba dar song ngo //de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam
322b7(dkon brtsegs): ge g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad phrogs//grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas nor bu rin po che rgyal po la phul te/rgyal po chen po nar bu rin po tshar ni thang ma mchis pa/
323a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i blang thams cad rib bdag gis rnyed pa 'di la bdag gi 'di snyam du bsams te/mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam//
323a2(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/khyod ni 'drin thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lagaso snyam bgyid kyis/kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhi su gsol/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yu
323a3(dkon brtsegs): yul por gyur cing ngo tsha bar gyur nas/grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la 'di skad ces smra so//nges pa cing khyod pas kyang ches dbul lam/nges pas smras pa/lha de lta lags te
323a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag pas ches khyod dbul ba lag so//rgyal pos smras pa/rnam grangs gang gis dbul/nges pas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/gang gi 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing longs
323a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod dag gis chog ma 'tshal/gnod pa bgyid pa'i slad du rgyal srid 'khrug cing bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa//de ni 'di na 'jig rten mi bsrung yon tan chung ngu dag la mchog tu
323a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin//de phyir 'du ni de la rtag tu chos 'dod rnams ni dbul po lags par sems//gang zhig byams pa rab tu bsgoms te sems can rnams la tha ba ma mchis shing /rtag par rgyun
323a7(dkon brtsegs): du ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing 'dod pa ma mchis la//nyan thag mthong na rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis pa//de ni phyug cing nor bzang shin du ni
323b1(dkon brtsegs): tshodadabu la sags yongs spyod gnas//gang zhig 'gro bla 'di na dbyung phyug r+b+ha chen ldan la chos spyad sa brji dang //gang zhig 'dzin skye ba ngas na b+h+ri sdug bsngal gzir ba bzung nas chud pas dAH//
323b2(dkon brtsegs): ga zhig chung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' shing 'jig rten pha rol mo lta 'o//dan chos srung mi bgyid shin tu dbul zhing dman po'i mi shes rig par bgyid//dad pas bsam pa dri ma med nga
323b3(dkon brtsegs): rab brtan tshul khrims dag la yang dag gnas//rtag tu ngo cha shes shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te gtang la dga' ba dag/shes rab kyi ni mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten kun le ba
323b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa//de dag tu ni mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags//gang dag longs spyod rnams la rab chags bde la dga' zhing gtong ba ma mchis la//lus dang /
323b5(dkon brtsegs): srog la snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang //gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yod myos rnam par rgyu ba dang //lhan cig gang dag dran pa ma mchis de dag dbul ba
323b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni thob pa lags//gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dang /lus dang srog dang nar rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i mkhas pa dag/rtag tu rmi
323b7(dkon brtsegs): brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis//lha cig gang dag chos kyis brgyan pa de dag nar che skyes bu dam pa lags//lhan cig me ni rtag tu nags kyi dran
324a1(dkon brtsegs): spun skam po brlag mchog ma 'tshal/spu cig 'di na rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi chu 'dzin pas kyang tshug ma 'tshal//'di na nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar gyis rgyu bas/
324a2(dkon brtsegs): cho ga mi 'tshal//rgyal po brkam phyir rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas brlag par 'gyur//zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtsa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yod mi
324a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid//de bzhin mkhas pa shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyis 'bar mi bgyid//chu'i thig pas bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig par rab phyogs na//gnod
324a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni su zhig 'tshal/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas/grong khyer gyi dbul po dbul po nges pa la 'di skad ces
324a5(dkon brtsegs): smras so//nges pa de ltar nga ni dbul//khyod ni phyug par khyod la dbang su yod//des pas smras pa/lnga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
324a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yod 'di nyid na bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gsan nam/rgyal pos smras pa/ngas mthong yang mthong ngo //des pas smras pa/b+ha de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu
324a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing tshad mar gyur pa ste/de ni bdag gi dbang lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/song la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs shig/des ji skad nga lung bstan pa bzhin du nges gzung
324b1(dkon brtsegs): babya'o//des pas smras pa/snyan pa de la ngan bu'am//pha nya gzhan gtang 'os ma lags//'dir ni bdag gis bsam bgyis na//dam khyen nas ni gshegs par 'gyur//'jig rten 'di 'am
324b2(dkon brtsegs): pha rol na//des ni mo mi khyen cang mi mnga'//thugs kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas kyang //'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur//sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas//de la nga rgyal skye mi
324b3(dkon brtsegs): mngara'//sems can rnams la legs dgongs pas//shin tu rab tu'ang gshegs 'gyur gyis//rgyal chen bdag gis gsol ba la//da ni legs par thugs rjes mdzad//gang
324b4(dkon brtsegs): gis ston pa 'dir gshegs pa'i//bden pa'i byin brlabs bgyi bar 'tshal//me tog spos dang me tog phreng //rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byug pa dang //sil snyan sta blon mdzod cig dang /
324b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur//nges pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang //phrag pa gcig tu gos gzar 'dug/pus mo sa la btsugs byas dAs//'di skad ces ni tshig kyang smras//kun
324b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa ni gang bsdu su//bdag gi busas pa mkhyen nano//bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid ces//thub pa bdag gi mdun du bzhugs//danas tshig 'di smras nas kyang //sa nI ga tug
324b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur//sa gzhi rnam par rto ma nas ni//de bzhin gshegs pa byung bar gyur/rdzu phrul dag dang ldan pa yi//nyin bris lnga brgyas yongasu bskor//brgya phrag bcu gnyis rnyed dag ni//
325a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni//skyong ba dang ni lha klu dang //brgya byin tshangs pas mdun gyis bltas//de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni//de tshe 'jig rten ngo mchod//
325a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin//rgyal po dpung bcas blon por bcas//ston pa'o zhabs la 'dud par byed//der ni srog chags stong dag gis//ston pa la ni mchod pa byas//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
325a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod byas nas//byang chub don du yid btud do//de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan
325a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod 'di na 'khyam zhing mchis mchis pa la/nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed
325a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid te/mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal lo snyam nas/de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/rgyal po gsal
325a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal 'di ni thams cad kyi nang na ches dbul ba ste/'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'phrog par bgyid pas ni ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags//slar zhing don du gnyer bar bgyid pas na cho ga ma
325a7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba lagaso//gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms ma 'tshal ba lag so//sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par tho 'tsham pa lag so//skyid pa rnams tha mar 'byin pa la kas/
325b1(dkon brtsegs): /dbul po rnams rab tu phung bar bgyid pa lag so//phyug po rnams tshar gcod pa lag so//shin tu rab tu myos pa lag so//rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang /sred par rnam par bcings pa lag so snyam nas/
325b2(dkon brtsegs): de la bdag gis stsal na len par mi bgyid par/'di skad du de ltar nga ni dbul la/khyod ni 'byor par khyod la dpang su yod ces kyang mchi'o//de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad
325b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs snyoms pa/ngos bzlog mi spyod pa ma mnga'/tha ba dang /dri me dang /khong khro ba mi mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis
325b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod ni tshe 'di'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi longs spyod gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byi ru dang /sa le sbram
325b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /dngul dang /rta dang /glang po che dang /shing rta dang /dpung bu chung dang /gzhon pa dang /mdzod dang /bang mdzod thob pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so///
325b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po des pa ni sbyin pa dang /dul ba dang /legs par sdom pa dang /bzod pa dang /des pa dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs dang /dka' thub dang /bag yod pa dang /
325b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang /byems pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun
326a1(dkon brtsegs): la dang ba dang /dad pa dang /tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /gtong ba dang /shes rab dang /ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa dang /brtan pa dang /sdom pa gang yin pa 'di dag
326a2(dkon brtsegs): gis bdag phyag go snyam du sems so//rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sa 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'di ltar khyod dang 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag ni/dris pas/
326a3(dkon brtsegs): gom pa bdun pa'i bar gyi tshul khrims dang /thos pa dang /brtul zhugs dang /dka' thub dang /bag yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i nga rgya'i char yang mi phod pas/dpe'i bar du
326a4(dkon brtsegs): yang mi bzod do//gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yul na sems can yon tan gyis che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag gnas pa ni bdag gis snyed pa lags/
326a5(dkon brtsegs): par rnyed lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul nA sems can yon tan gyis che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dgra mang du gnas so//de nas
326a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis nges pa la tshig su bcad de smras pa/khyod kyis glengs pas kho bo'i nga rgyal nges bcom phyar/nges pa khyod ni kho bo'i ston pa gnyis pa ste/rgyal srid 'di
326a7(dkon brtsegs): kun kho bo dpung dang bcas/khyod kyis slob ma yin gyis khyod kyis bdag slobs shig/kho bo yun ring dag tu nga rgyal gyis kyang bslus//sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis bskor cing
326b1(dkon brtsegs): brdung ba las//nges pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pa na//rab tu bsdams te kho bos chos bzhin spyad par bya//khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dgra ni//nor gyi ched du kho bos gro rang bcug/
326b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste//kho bos thams cad btung gis bde bar 'khod gyis shig/phyin chad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bos yong mi byed//lnga brgya btang bar gyur pa gang yin de dag kyang //des pa la ni zhes lags
326b3(dkon brtsegs): smra bskyed nas kyang //sems ni skyo bar gyur cing ci la'ang mi blta bar//bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam bteb//dra ni dbul po ma yin khyod ni dbul po zhes//nges pa khyod kyi
326b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di legs par smras pa ste//nges pa la ni gang zhig dbul po zhes brjod pa//mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal bar byed pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu des pas 'di skad
326b5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa de ni/bcom ldan 'das la blta bas chog ma 'tshal ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du ci nus 'dri dag gis dri
326b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par gyur pa de lta de ltar 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nges pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang
326b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//bzhi gang zhe na/yid ches pa dang /dad pa dang /phangs par 'dzin pa dang /bus pa ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin
327a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//gzhan yang bzhi ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong na bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag
327a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni slu bar mi mdzad pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag par sems bskyed pa dang /sems can thams cad la
327a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston cing cher na rab tu grol bar bya ba'i phyir yang sems bskyed pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung bar yang sems de bskyed pa
327a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//gzhan yang bzhi ste/gzugs dben par mthong ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
327a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa dben par mthong ba dang /khams bzhin mkha' dang /'dra bar mthong ba dang /skye mched grong stong pa lta bur mthong ba ste/bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/de bzhin gshegs pa
327a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong ba yin no//gzhan yang bzhi ste/bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang /sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa dang /srog med pa'i phyir srog rnam par dag
327a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gang zag med pa'i phyir gang zag rnam par dag pa ste/bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yon no//gzhan yang bzhi ste/lha'i mig mngon par 'du
327b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa dang /shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa dang /chos kyi mgo gis sngar rtog pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjes su rtogs par byed pa ste/bzhi po de dag dang ldan na du bzhin gshegs pa
327b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par mthong ba yin no//gzhan yang bzhi ste/ches thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po yong su dag pa dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
327b3(dkon brtsegs): po yong su drag pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /de'i rnam par grol ba mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
327b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba'i phreng po yongasu drug pa ste/des pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye za'i tshogs chen
327b5(dkon brtsegs): pode dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor dang bcas te bar snang lnga gsheg so//de nas ko swa lnga'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs
327b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu nges pa la 'di skad ces smraso//nges pa khyod nam de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'gro ba'i tshe kho bo la yang sbron cig dang /kho bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'gro'o//des

328a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal lo//rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig pu la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma lags te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor phal cha

328a4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so//rgyal po chen po sems can g.yon can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so//

328a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor logs//rgyal po chen po sems can gnod sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lagaso//rgyal po chen po sems
328b1(dkon brtsegs): can le lo can yongasasu smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lagaso//rgyal po chen po sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa yongasu smin par

328b3(dkon brtsegs): rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so//rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lagaso//rgyal po chen
