328b7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lagaso//rgyal po chen po bdud kyi las thams cad yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
329a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /smon pa meng pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lag so//rgyal po chen po tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang /mi rtsub pa ni byang chub sems

329b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing /gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcang bar bgyi'o//rgyal pos smras pa/
330a1(dkon brtsegs): des pagal te de ltar nas bcos bu zung 'di dag khyod mi len na/khab la snying brtseb+ha'i phyir rkang pa brdzis shig/dris pas lha de bzhin du bgyi zhes smras nas/ras bcos rba
330a2(dkon brtsegs): zung de dag la rkang pas brdzis te song ngo //rgyal pos smras pa/nges pas ras bcos bu zung khyod kyi rkang pa'i dmon mar gyur pa 'di rnams ji ltar bya/nges pas smras pa/rgyal po chen po sems can
330a3(dkon brtsegs): dbul po gcer bu gos ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig/rgyal pos nges pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/rgyal pos mi rnams la sgo ste/de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin
330a4(dkon brtsegs): du byas so//ras bcos bu zung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgros ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyod de/badrag cag gis nges pa la ji ltar lan glan par bya snyam pa las/sangs rgyas
330a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /des pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis de dag gis par snang la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag thos so//'dod pa bzhin du lan no glen bya ba//me tog dang ni spos drang
330a6(dkon brtsegs): byug pa dang //zas skom nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te//byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' bar 'gyur/des bzas dang gos 'dod ma yin te//red dang bkur sti grags pa 'dod ma yin//
330a7(dkon brtsegs): des pa byang chub sems las chos 'dod de//byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' ba skye//de na dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu nges pa dang /rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang
330b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas/blon po dang bcas/'khor dang bcas pa dang /mnyan yod kyi skyes pa dang /bud med dang khye'u dang /bu mo dang /srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dong ngo //de
330b2(dkon brtsegs): nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkru ba blta na sdug pa/yangs shing mtho ba la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/'di lta ste dper
330b3(dkon brtsegs): na/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/dbus su shing yongs 'dus rdo ba sprul lo//yongs 'dus rdol gyi drung du yang /bcom ldan 'das kyi
330b4(dkon brtsegs): gdan seng ge'i khri bkra ba blta na sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la/lha'i ras bac+doMs bu brgya stong du mas bting ba mngon par sprul to//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stan drug khri dag kyang mngon par
330b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul to//lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la sogs pa/lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag khyer
330b6(dkon brtsegs): nis/sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag byed cing nges pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri brgyan par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag 'ong
330b7(dkon brtsegs): bar thugasu chud nas/gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing gdan pa shams pa la bzhug so//de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga
331a1(dkon brtsegs): pas lha'i bu mo nyi 'di la smras pa/bzang mo tshur shog/des pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi sgra dang /glu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mched pa bya'o//de nas lha'i bu
331a2(dkon brtsegs): mo nyi 'od kyis/lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang /thabs cig tu rgyud kyi sgrar sbyar ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gisde bstod pa khyod kyis skal pa brgyar ni sngan chad dka' thub spyad//khyod ni
331a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sbyin la dges/khyed kyi sku gsung thugs rnams yongasu dag pa ste//srid gsum 'jig rten bla mo la ni bdag phyag 'tshal//khyod ni tha ba mi mnga'o bzod dang byams
331a4(dkon brtsegs): la dgyes//khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyi pha rol gshegs//khyed ni bsam gtan bro dang tshul rnams snang la dges//dri ma gsum gyi nyes pa sel la bdag phyag 'tshal
331a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sel la dges//khyed kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rjer ldan//khyod ni ldeng dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang mkhyen//sred pa gsum
331a6(dkon brtsegs): po thar par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal/khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tshom sel bar mdzad//khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag sel//khyod ni 'gro ba rnams la mchog
331a7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' bar mdzad//bdag ni rgyal la srog gis skyabasu mchi bar bgyi//lha'i bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa//gang gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur/
331b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang bas dran pa shin tu rgya chen thob 'gyur te//dga' bas sdug lnga 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur//mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gis brgyan rnams kyis//legs par brgyan
331b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba//gsung mchog mi yi dam pa gsung ni rnam par dag/mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal//'phags pa 'dzam bu'i/
331b3(dkon brtsegs): chu bo'i gser mdog phyag mthil sdug/thub pa'i sku stod seng ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen skyabs//smin tshugs legs shing shangs legs tshoms snyoms thags bzang mdzes//

331b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mtha' yas bsgrubs pa gang lags pa//de yis 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas mnyam gyur cig/de nas rigs kyi bu des pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis yongasu

332a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas pa yang //bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi sbyin la 'khod do//de nas rigs kyi bu gang dag gis ngem pa sgron ma mthong
332a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag 'di skad du/dbul po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'di la/'di lta bur mchod pa byed do zhes 'dzer to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smra so//grogs
332a3(dkon brtsegs): po dag 'di la brnyes par ma byed cig/rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid ji snyed dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to//grogs po dag khyod re shig sdod cig dang /rigs

332a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabras dang /ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan

332b2(dkon brtsegs): /mchog tu ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no//ye shes la gnas rgya mi gas par ston cing /mi shes par smin kyang /shes par snang ba 'dzin de'i bkod pa yin no//ma sa
332b3(dkon brtsegs): mthab pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang /spyod lam gyis dad pa bskyed par byed cing /ye shes thob pa rnams la yang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas/rdzu 'phrul ston par byed

332b6(dkon brtsegs): bAr 'byung ba stan pa 'dri ni de'i bkod pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu nges pas/ji skyid
332b7(dkon brtsegs): cig nas byang chub 'i phyir spyad pa bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' ba rigs kyi 'angs pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bstan bkur byas pa/
333a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa bzod pa gsum thob pa/spobs pa thob pa/mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba byas pa/sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la mkhas/
333a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/dran cing dbul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dis ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ji snyed cig brtul lags/bcom ldan

333b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam pa gang yin pa//de dag 'dir ni 'grang ba nus par mi 'gyur ro//pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bsgrub ste//mngon par shes pa dag gis stan chad rtse ba byas//tshangs pa'i gnas//
333b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis ni mtha' mar phyin par song //thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag lo lpags par bslabs//'dir ni de yis 'dus byas skyon rnams legs par mthong //spangs rgyas byang chub

333b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa yin//snying rjes gnas shing sems kyang yongs skyo ba med//shin du bsdams shing nem nur can la byams sems ldan//sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par
333b7(dkon brtsegs): blta//skyon la mi lta 'khrul pa dag dang ldan ma yin//ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa rnams la gnas//'di ni ji skad skyes pa bzhin du spyod par byed//chos nyid la ni chos kyi

334a2(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas//'di ni 'jig rten gang du rgyu ba byed pa na//der ni skye bo mang po rnam par grol bar byed//sangs rgyas kyi ni smag 'di gang du gnas pa der//de
334a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni stongs pa ma yin te//de la lci dngo bcas pa'i 'jog rten ma lus pas//ji ltar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis//da ni mya ngan 'dus

336b8(dkon brtsegs): 'am/'on te rang sangs kyi theg pas sam/'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba bya zhes mthun par 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad de lta bu'i dpyod pa skyes
337a1(dkon brtsegs): nus bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na meng pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/nyan thos kyi theg pas ma yin/rang sangs rgyas kyi zag
337a2(dkon brtsegs): pas ni ma yin no snyam mo//de nas khyim bdag dpal sbyin khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/lhan cig tu grong khyer chen po mnyan yod nas byung ste/
337a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
337a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/khyim bdag dpal sbyin dang /khyim bdag
337a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya tsam de dag lnga bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag khyed don gang gi phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags de nas khyim bdag
337a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal sbyin dang /khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzer nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gas
337a7(dkon brtsegs): bde log phu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dus gcig cig na/bdag cag khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam ge cig tu
337b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ta mchis par gyur nas/de'i tsha bdag cag 'dus ta mchis pa thams cad par skabasu 'di lta bu'i bka' mchid brjod par byung ste/sa grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/mang
337b2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba rnyed par dka'/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka'/dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par
337b3(dkon brtsegs): dka'/nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/sems can gang dag byas pa grazo zhing byas pa shes la/gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi gson na/mang po lta ci smos te de dag rnyed par dka'/de
337b4(dkon brtsegs): bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches rnyed par dka'/de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nas nan tan gyis
337b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka' na/'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par dka' na//
337b6(dkon brtsegs): ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya 'am/'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongasu mya ngan las 'das par bya
337b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bka' mchid bgyis so//bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'di lta bu'i rtog pa skyes te/bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni
338a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog lags kyi/nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma lags/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma lags pa snyam bgyid de/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes 'di dang chas te/
338a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgu btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du mdzes na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
338a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bras ji ltar bslab par bgyi/bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ji ltar bsgrub par
338a4(dkon brtsegs): kyo//dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drupa la sbyin dang /khyim dag lnga brgya tsam po de dag la legs zhes bya ba byin te/khyim bdag rnams legaso legaso//khyim bdag rnams
338a5(dkon brtsegs): khyed 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thang du lhags pa
338a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod yang legs//khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
338a7(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'drid pas/ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba dang /ji lcer gnas phyir bya ba dang /ji sbyar bsgrub par bya ba des rkyer la bshang //bcom ldan
338b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dras de bzhin no zhes gsol te/khyim bdag dpal sbyin dang /khyim bdag lnga rgya tsam de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to///
338b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa'a'i sems dpa' chen po bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'dod pas/sems can thams
338b3(dkon brtsegs): cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya/kun tu bsten par bya/nges par bsten par bya/bsgom par bya/mang du bya'o//khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
338b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po des/lus la chags par mi bya/srog la chags par mi bya/de bzhin du nor dang /'bru dang /khyim dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/bza' ba
338b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /btung ba dang /bgro ba dang /gzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /mai togra dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /sbreng ba rnams la chags par mi bya/yo byad rnams la chag
338b6(dkon brtsegs): po mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/khyim bdag rnams sems can dag ni phal cher lus dung srog la changs par gyur nas/sdig pa'i lus rnams byed de/de dag sdig pa'i las byas
338b7(dkon brtsegs): shing bsags pa des ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o//sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/lus dang srog lnga chags
339a1(dkon brtsegs): par byas na bde 'gro rnam su skye'o//khyim bdag rnams de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
339a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/lus la chags par mi bya/srog la chags par mi bya/de bzhin du nor
339a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /'bru dang /khyim dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/bza' bo dang /btung ba dang /bgo ba dang /bzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /me tog dang //
339a4(dkon brtsegs): bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa rnams la chags par mi bya/yo byad thams cad la chags par mi bya/bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bar bya ba dang /yongasu
339a5(dkon brtsegs): btang ba mang ba dang /rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bya/tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongasu dag par tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par bya/sems can thams cad
339a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyes par byas pa lA ji mi snyam par bzod pa dang /des pa phun sum tshogs par bya/lus dang srog la mi lta bar brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po bgo bar bya/rnam pa
339a7(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis sems rtse gcig tu bya/bdag dang /sems can dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes dang /shed bur lta ba
339b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas par bya/des sbyin pa byin pa na/sems can thams cad yid la byas te/sbyin pa byin par bya/sems can thams cad yid la byas te//
339b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/sems can thams cad yid la byas te/bzod pa bsgom par bya/sems can thams cad yid le byas te/brtson 'grus brtsams par bya/sems can thams
339b3(dkon brtsegs): cad yid la byas te/bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bya/sems can thams cad yid la byas te/shes rab bsgom par bya/sems can thams cad yid la byas te//
339b4(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa bslab par bya'o//de nas khyim bdag dpal sbyin dang /khyim bdag lnga rgya tsamo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
339b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag cag ni lus la lta zhing gnas pa lags/srog la lto zhing gnas pa lags/de bzhin du nar dang /'bru dang /khyim dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo rnams la lta
339b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas pa lags/bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /bgo ba dang /gzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /spos dang /bdug pa dang /phreng ba dang /byubra pa rnams la lta zhing gnas pa
339b7(dkon brtsegs): lags/yo byad thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa sor rtog cing /lus la mi lta ba lags/bde bar gshegs
340a1(dkon brtsegs): bdi lta phrag la mi sgru ba lags/de bzhin dun dang /'bru dang /khyim dang /chung ma dang /bra dang /bram rnams la mi skyo ba lags/bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /bag
340a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /gzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /mye tog dang /bdug pa dang /thos dang /phreng ba dang /drug pa rnams la mi lbu ba lags/yo byad thams cad la mi lta ba lags/de nas bcom
340a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang /khyim bdag lnga chu tsam de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
340a4(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di la rnam pa du mar sa sor brtag par bya'o//rnam pa du ma gang she na/'di lta ste/lus 'di mthar gyis grub pa dang /mthar gyis 'jig pa dang /rdul phra rab bsags pa
340a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /khong stong dang /gye grwa can dang /bug dgu dang /sku'i khong bu nas zag pa dang /grog mkhar ltang sbrul gdug pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang /sbrul gadrug pa ltar byas pa mi
340a6(dkon brtsegs): bzo ba dang /ma skyes dgra'i spre'u ltar grogs la 'khru ba dang /bshes gnyen ngan bltar 'drid pa'i bdag nyid can dang /lbu brdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba chu bur lta
340a7(dkon brtsegs): byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba dang /smig rgyu ltar slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang /chu shing ltang gshig na snying po med pa dang /sgyu ma ltar smra ba'i bdag nyid can dang /rgyal po lta
340b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgo bag mang ba dang /dgra ltar glags lta ba dang /rkun po ltar yid gtan du mi rung ba dang /gshed ma ltar rje su chags pa med pa dang /mi mdza' ba ltar mi phan par 'dod pa dang /gsod pa
340b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar shes rab kyi srog gi bar chad byed pa dang /phyir rgol ba ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang /grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang /rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mthar 'jig pa
340b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /sbrang ltar mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis yongasu gang ba dang /sbrang ma'i snod ltar mi gtsang ba zag pa dang /sbrul dang /mi dang /khyi'i ro ltar dri mi zhim pa dang /ngan skyugs kyi khu ba ltar mi gtsang ba'i
340b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas dang /rma ltar bskyed mi bzod pa dang /zug rngu ltar gnod pa'i bdag nyid can dang /rje'o sdang ba ltar bsnyen par dka' ba dang /khang rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing brten pa dang
340b5(dkon brtsegs): gru rnying ltar bcos ldegs bya zhing spyad pa dang /bum pa sa ma btang ba ltar nAn tan gyis bag bya dgos pa dang /grogs po mi srun pa ltar rtag tu rjes su bsrung dgos pa dang /chu 'gram
340b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi shing lhar g.yo zhing 'gul ba dong /chu klung chen po'i rgyun ltar mthar 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho la thugs pa dang /blo bur ba'i khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnasu gyur pa dang /
340b7(dkon brtsegs): mgron med pa'i gnas pa da ltar yongasu gzung ba med pa dang /btson bsrung ltar gsug gis bsgrub par bya ba dang /mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang
341a1(dkon brtsegs): ya ma tha mamam thamamamatha mas sa nathabasam thaca/a mamathas namaHthas mam thamamamamam a.a thamamamam yama.am yamaHma bam
341a2(dkon brtsegs): bye ma'i grong khyer ltar rtag tu 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang /me ltar chog ma shes pa dang /rgya mtsho ltar dgang dka' ba dang /sbrul gyi gze ba ltar nan tan gyi ngag
341a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang /byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongasu bskyang dgos pa dang /snod chags pa ltar rtag tu bag bya dgos pa dang /yul ngan pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang /zas dug
341a4(dkon brtsegs): tson ltar rtag tu yongasu spang bar bya ba dang /re shig dgos pa'i phyir snod brnyan ma lta bu dang /khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rtswa lta bu yin pa 'ba' shig tu blos gzung bar bya'o//khyim bdag
341a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas lus 'di yi thog ma dang /tha ma'i rgyu la so sor brtag par bya'o//pha ma'i khu chu dang /khrag 'dus pa las 'byung ste/'di la khu chu
341a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /khragA ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu yin no//tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'ju ba la sogs pa ste/kham gyis bza' ba'i zas zlos ma thag tu bad kan gyi gnas su 'gro'o//bAd kan gyi
341a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas su phyin nas/bad kan gyis rkyang rkyang por byas te/shin tu mr-i gtsang bar 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu mkhris pa'i gnas su 'gro ste/mkhris pa'i gnas su phyin nas/shu
341a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing skyur por 'gyur te/rlung gi gnas su 'gro'o//zhus te rlung gi gnas su phyin nas/rlung gis tshigs ma logs shig/dngas mi logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/
341b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig ma las ni gcin dang ngan skyugs la sogs te/dro ma rnams 'byung /dngas ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/khrug las sha'o//sha las tshil lo//tshil las rus pa'o//rus pa las rkang
341b2(dkon brtsegs): doro//rkang las khu chu'o//khu chu las lus 'di lta ste/de ltar thog ma dang /tha ma'i rgyu mi gtsang ba'i phyir/lus mi gtsang bar byang chub sems dpas bsam par bya'o//lus la
341b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang bar lta ba na/byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/lus shes bya ba 'di ni rus pa sum brgya drug cus khog pa bslang pa/shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs
341b4(dkon brtsegs): sum brgyas sbyar ba/rtsa'i dra ba bzhi brgyas klas pa/sha s+phar tshad lnga brgyas g.yogs pa/sdom rtsa drug gis khyebs pa/rtsa bdun brgyas gang ba/rgyus pa bdun brgyas sbrel ba/chu
341b5(dkon brtsegs): nga bcu drug gis brtan pa/chu ba gnyis gyis khyab par dkris pa/rgyu ma 'dom phyed drang bzhis nang khrol byas po/long ka dang /pho ba dang /'brel ba'i gnyer ma rim pa bcu drug tu
341b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khyil pa/rtsa bran nyis stong lnga brgyas skar khung byas pa/gshis brgya rtsa bdun gyis snod chag pa ltar shig shig por gyur pa/spu'i khung bu bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad bcus rtswa lta
341b7(dkon brtsegs): khengs pa/dbang po lnga'i bu ga dgu yod pa gnas bdun dang ldan pa mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/klad pa snyim pa gang dang /tshil snyim pa gang dang /zhag snyam pa gsum dang /bad kan snyim
342a1(dkon brtsegs): badrug dang /mkhris pa snyim pa drug dang /rlung gis mtha' dag drangs pa dang /khrag bre gang dang /ngan phyugs phul gang dang /de dag thams cad kyis bang ba bar bcad bltar
342a2(dkon brtsegs): so sor yongasu gang ba/lpags pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ro blo ba drug gis gso ba/lus kyi me la ngan sgyogs kyi sbyin bsreg byed pa/rtag tu mthar 'dzag pa/lus kyi yan
342a3(dkon brtsegs): lag de dag thams cad kyis blta na mi sdug pa dri nga ba/rnag gi rang bzhin yin na/'di la su zhig gus par byed de/skad cig dgos pa'i phyir/snod brnyan pa tsam du zad pa dang /khur
342a4(dkon brtsegs): bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu 'bra' shig yin par chos kyis blos gzung bar bya'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/'di ltar mi gtsang phung po'i lus la ni//gzugs sngon nga rgyal can gang gus
342a5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa//byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du//mi shes ngan skyugs bum po thogs shing 'gro/de'i sna nas rnag gI rnam pa 'jug/kha nas dri mi zhimi pa rtag tu 'byung //mig rdul chags
342a6(dkon brtsegs): shing skye bo srini bu can//de la su zhig chags shing gus pa byed//dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su//'di ni dkar por bya zhes bdar byed kyang //dkar po'i dngos por mi 'gyur
342a7(dkon brtsegs): zad par 'gyur//byis blo phyin ci log gi nga rgyal can//de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros ldan//nga yis lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te//bskus phyis 'bab stegs brgyar ni khrus
342b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'a ya mams cam thamamam camacasas nathabasam saca/a mtha tha.a namaHThas mam thamatham/thamam a.a la thamamam/mam mayas ma yam sa yamaHma bas Na
342b2(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang //'di bdag dbang gis za 'gyur bcang mi 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang /khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub
342b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'dod pas/rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis lus la brtag par bya ste/rnam pa bzhi bcu
342b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yid du mi 'ong ba dang /rang bzhin gyis mi mthun pa ste/smad par brtag par bya/byang chub sems
342b5(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus rnag zag pa ste/dri mi zhim par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dra bas lus tha mar 'jig pa ste/snying po med par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus rgyus pa'i bog
342b6(dkon brtsegs): res sbrel ba ste/nyam chung bar brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus mi gtsang ba zag pa ste/mi gtsang bar brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/
342b7(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma lta bur brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus skye bo mi mkhas pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'khrul pa byed par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus 'jig pa dang /bu ga
342b8(dkon brtsegs): dgu'i sgo nas 'dzag par brtog par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar bar brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus zhe sdang gi mes tshig par
343a1(dkon brtsegs): brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus gti mug gims me lce gcig tu gyur par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /
343a2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug rnams kyis ldongs par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi dri bas khebs shing srid pa'i dra bar chud par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas
343a3(dkon brtsegs): lus kun nas bu gas yongasu gang bas bu ga'i gnas su brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gtses par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas
343a4(dkon brtsegs): lus srani bu'i rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnas su brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus 'chi ba'i chos nyid yin pas mi rtag par brtag par bya/byang chub sems
343a5(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus chos la rmongs pas bems po yin par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus mthar gyis grub cing mtha' mar 'jig pas bum pa lci bu ro brtag par bya//
343a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus mya ngan gyis gnon pa mang pos gong bsngo nyams thag par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar rga shir 'gyur bas brtan pa
343a7(dkon brtsegs): med par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus g.yo dang sgyu'i nye bar sprod pa dag gis glags par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus dgang dka' bas sa'i
343b1(dkon brtsegs): gting lta bur bajug par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzugs dang bde ba'i gzugs la zhen pas me long lta bur brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod pa'i dran
343b2(dkon brtsegs): tan lnga pa dag gis chog mi shes par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus rjesu chags pa dang khri bdag gis 'joms par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus bsti stang dang
343b3(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa myong bas mi brtan par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus chu klung gi rgyun bzhin du gzhan 'byung bas rkyen gzhan dang gzhan du brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas
343b4(dkon brtsegs): lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis yid kyi sems pa yin par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar dur khrod la thug pa
343b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa mi gzo bar brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus sbyang ki dang /lce sbyang dang /khyi rjen sha za ba gzhan gyi zas su brtag por bya/byang chub sems dpas lus rus pa dang rgyu
343b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bag res sbal bas 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /mchil ma dang /sna bas dang /rnag dang /khrag gis yongs
343b7(dkon brtsegs): su gang ba ste/blta ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus zas dang skom las byung ba ste/rang gi kha na las pa ma yin par brtag par bya/byang chub sems
344a1(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus mi rtag pa ste/shin tu zad pa' chos nyid yin pas/don med pa'i glags pas glags par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus phyir rgol ba mang po
344a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bas dgra lta bur brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus yang dang yang sdug bsngal myong bas gsod pa lta bur brtag par bya'o//byang chub sems dpas lus sdug bsngal
344a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyis gtses te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang /'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang /sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis ste/sdug
344a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi snod yin par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus phung po lnga grub pas sdug bsngal gyi gong bu yin par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus rkyen
344a5(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa las byung bas bdag med pa dang /bdag po med par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus skyes pa dang /bud med dang bral bas srog med par brtag par bya/byang
344a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas lus phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus rmi lam lta bu ste/gsog tu brtag par bya/byang
344a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas lus sgyu ma lta bu ste/yang dag pa ma yin par brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus smig rgyu lta bu ste/'khrul par byed par brtag par bya/byang chub
344b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus brag cha lta bu ste/slu bar brtag par bya/byang chub sems dpas lus mig yor lta bu ste/slu ba'i bdag nyid du brtag par bya ste/khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa'
344b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis lus la brtag par bya'o//de ltar rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus su 'dun pa dang /lus
344b3(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba dang /lus bdag gir byed pa dang /lus la sred pa dang /lus la gnas pa dang /lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad slong ngo //srog la srog tu 'dun pa dang
344b4(dkon brtsegs): srog la dga' ba dang /srog bdag gir byed pa dang /srog la sred pa dang /srog la zhen pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin du nor dang /'bru dang /khyim dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo dang /

344b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa dang /dga' ba dang /bdag gir byed pa dang /sred pa dang /gnas pa dang /zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ste/de lus dang /srog la mi lta'o//de bzhin du nor dang /
344b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bru dang /khyim dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /bgo ba dang /bzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /
345a1(dkon brtsegs): byug pa rnams la mi lta bar/pha rol tu phyin pa drug myur du yongasu rdzogs par byed//khyim bdug rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
345a2(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag blo rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rgya cher yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/

345a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug cig/g.yo ldan lus la sred pa bskyed nas na//byas pa rtag tu rnam par rmongs te 'khyim//lus 'di byas pa mi bzo dngos yin pas//nyon mongs tshang du sdug
345a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal tshor ba myong //rtag tu nad 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te//lus 'di ngan skyugs dang ni mchil mas gang //bkres dang skom pas rtag tu mngon par gtses//mkhas
345a6(dkon brtsegs): pasu zhig lus la sred pa skye//lus ni sa gting 'dra ste chog mi shes//gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byas pas gso//lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las kyang byed//de phyir de dag
345a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal tshor bskyed//lus 'di rdo rje lta bur sa ma yin//lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig/'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myur du byos//de bzhin sa ng+yas bstan la dang
345b1(dkon brtsegs): ya' mthamamamam sa sa nathathasam saca/a mamamathasamaHthas mamathamatha/ ma taH a a ka thabamamam ya yam ma yamaHma am/
345b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed//zas drang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis//lus 'di ji srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te//brtan pa byas kyang 'jig pa 'gyur yin na//'di lnga 'bad pa don med ci phyir bya//bskul
345b3(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed dka' ba//thub pa 'byung 'di khyod kyis rnyed pa la//sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhoni dad pa bskyed//shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro shig/lo stong
345b4(dkon brtsegs): bye bar su zhig 'tsho 'gyur ba//des kyang chags pa yongasu spang bya na//su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba//de phyir dga' bi mo rnyed smos ci dgos//ma bsngos mi rnaMs kha cig 'di skadadu//mir rnyed
345b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la//gzhon tshe rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing //nor btsal bde ba mong ba bya zhes zer//nor tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod//bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur//de phyir
345b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas chags pa yongs spangs la//ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos//longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs//'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin//skad cig
345b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung zhing skad cig 'jigs par 'gyur//mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod sred pa bskyed//sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar mkhan lta dang mtshungs//dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba//longs spyod de dag
345b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra byis pa 'drid//de ltar log pa tshol zhing byis pa 'khyar//sdug bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba//lus la gnod pas mtshungs med bskyed byas nas//rgyal po
346a1(dkon brtsegs): mthu las de dag thogs gyu pa//de dag la nim pas gang dgu' ba bskyed//drung chung ma 'odapung du mi 'gyur byu //rta lA bas nyes pa byung ba ma/ phyogs pa//nyes pa 'di 'dud
346a2(dkon brtsegs): dag rigs nas su//mkhas pa rnams ni ma la srung mi 'phye//rtag tu ngan ba cing long sa sbyo tshol byed pa//de ni 'ad ngapral mi lus shing //bu dang rlung ma la yang ma byams par//dadag ta/
346a3(dkon brtsegs): chags la 'dug par byed//bdag gi lings spyod 'grib par bgyu 'dzigs//bana'i mo byas rnams cang rnyed mi 'gyur//gas dang rgyu sa na nai rnams tshol byed pa//nganapa mdag
346a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yid mi ston//sems can panapa mgo mo ldan 'drid pa nyid//yad bzhin sems la tshig gis dga' bi dbyed//yid baspyan k+She ni de la yid mi dz+nyAn+ta//n+d+ha kyang bu 'drang sdug pa
346a5(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed//sems can brnab mi 'jig rten gang rgyu ga//sman dang bstan chos dag la mkhas ston cing //slad tshong lta bur tshog gis 'dri byed la//khong nas mi bdade shin tu rtsub pa yin/
346a6(dkon brtsegs): rlab mdog lnga mdza' ba rnams kyang med//nyadu meng cing snying srabs gagyis kyang med//'on kyang de dag na dpyi ston par byed//skye bo 'arda ba lo ma khas pas yid mirton//banatsam
346a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyid ched du bya min byed//shin du mi bzang sa mas ni kun du bskyed//dbyer mkhas pa yang dgatogs byas lo//ngan na ci yang rung bas chog shes kyis//gsar dang sa ti gnar ba byi dang /
346b1(dkon brtsegs): los dag su da dan smra ba las byung 'byung //de dag sgyu ma'i dang bzhin ma rtags nas//de dag phyir ni 'thub cing cad pa byed/byams pa zhes bya ba shig 'dir 'byung ste//de bzhon ga shegs padan/
346b2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i tshe//sa 'od gser gyi sa rab tu gang bar 'gyur//de yi chen de ni ga las 'byung //'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dgra 'byung bas ste/brdzun pa'i chos can 'khrul byid rmongs par byed/dbar
346b3(dkon brtsegs): saM ka'i nyi ma'i gung dus na//smig rgya chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no//bskal pa gcig lon nus ni 'jig rten 'di//na mkha'i rang bzhin na mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong //lhun po dag kyang tshig cing
346b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'jig/de dag gang nas 'das shing gang du 'gro//chu mig mtsho'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams//de dag med 'gyur snyam 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur//de bzhin dang pa gAs praste snying
346b5(dkon brtsegs): med//mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed//mkhas pa su zhig blo yo stobs ldan pa//de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyon la rtog/'di la ro myong byed pa su yod na//dri dag ci'i phyir ni slong mi byed
346b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing //bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed//shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa de dus na//bu dang chung ma skyabasu 'gyur ma yin//ji ltar sna tshogs
346b7(dkon brtsegs): las byas blangs pa bzhin//bu deng chung mo dag kyang 'ding bar 'gyur//bdag nyid gcig pus sdug bsngal myong bar 'ong //de dag de tshe bdag gi rgal mo len//mya ngan rnams kyis ba

347a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag blangs//'di ni de dgang sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur//srid gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes kyang med//de bzhin bu dang chung martsa lag med//pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang //

347a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mi grol//de phyir sdig bas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis//bsgrims tre sdig pa yongasu spang bar bya//ji ltar las rnams byas bla ma gtogs par//gshin rje'i rang rta dang //

347b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis//de tshe pham rang gi chung ma rnams//sdug bsngal nyan pa yongs su thar mi byed//legs pa'i las byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur//de ltar khyim na
347b3(dkon brtsegs): yayongs su spang bar bya//kho sgro dbyug pa ltung gi chad pa rnams//su zhig spong 'dod zhi ba don gnyer bas//khyim la 'jigs par gyis tre spang byos la//'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan

348b2(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i bye mo grangs snyed kyis//sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis//rin chen dag gris rab bkang ste//'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas//glang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te//byung

348b7(dkon brtsegs): du//sems de 'dor bar mi 'gyed cing //de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston//sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba//shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/sangs rgyas ci 'dra 'drar 'gyur//
349a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
349a2(dkon brtsegs): pa na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs//kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste//sngon po dang /ser po

349a5(dkon brtsegs): dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan
349a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis/rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra
349a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/byin gang lags/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol/

349b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ci slang de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs//bka' mchid che ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa//dbul por gyur pa nor dang ldan par mdzod//'jig rten ldongs la myur du mig kyang stsol//de skad
349b3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
349b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso//bcom
349b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/kun dga' bo khyim bdag/
349b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lhag par bya ba byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dag ste/khyim bdag 'di
349b7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/nam du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro ba mi gyur zhing phyis kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong nas/mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
350a1(dkon brtsegs): ya 'a ya mamasacam thamamamacamasas na thabasam thaca/a mamatha.amaHShas mamathamathamamamam ma a.a ka thamamamam yaHthama.aH ma yam tham bam/

350a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/kun chub par byed par 'gyur/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na

350a7(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//kye ma chos kyi rnam
350a8(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di/'di ltar rgya che ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji

350b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen+d+ra po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las khyim bdag dpa' byin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs//

357a2(dkon brtsegs): thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa ni bud med

357a4(dkon brtsegs): ro lo mo byas pa dag rjes su dran par byed cing /skyo ba mi bskyed/yid byung bar mi byed de/rgyal po chen po byis pa'i chos la kun tu spyod cing /kun tu spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i
357a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa ni ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa la rten c-ing /ngan 'gro re 'gro por 'jug pa de ni/skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon
357a6(dkon brtsegs): dngo bo yin no//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//'dod pa dring mig tsang smad par 'os pa dang //mi mthun 'jigs byed mi rtag los
357a7(dkon brtsegs): byung sdug bsngal byed//don med phung bar byed cing dman pa yin pas na//mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la brten par byed//brtsog pas gang ba'i tshob khung dring
357b1(dkon brtsegs): bud //marnam par gyur cing rul ba'i khyim rnams ji bzhin dang //shi ba du khrod sa na shin tu smad pa ltar//de bzhin 'dod pa rnams kyang mchog tu smad pa yin//sbrang
357b2(dkon brtsegs): bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang //phag ni ngan skyugs mthong na rgyug pa ci 'dra drang //khyi na sha yaM don du she na sar 'gro ba ltar//de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dge la
357b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed//grags pa med cing mi snyan yon tan 'dri ba dang //de las tshul khrims mtho la nyams par gyur pa dang //mtho ris nyams shing dmyal ba drag tu ltung
357b4(dkon brtsegs): bAbyas na//mkhas bya su zhig 'dod pa'i sgom la rten par byed//ji ltar hA la hu la'i dug ni zlos pa na//lus drugra rma zhing rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ltar//de bzhin 'di na
357b5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams ni 'drod pa'i rgyus//rang gi lus kyi dbyibs ni dug tu mi rig go/ji ltar sbu bra shin tu bslabs pa'i mi zhig gis//rnam par 'phrul pas sems can brgya dgu dag
357b6(dkon brtsegs): byed ltar//de bzhin byisri ba bdag la bde bar 'dod pa rnams//'dod pa dga' ba'i rgyu las dran 'gror rab tu ltung //zas skom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang //glu byo sel
357b7(dkon brtsegs): snyan bzang po tha dad pa dag gis//khang pa mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa ni//gnod pa rnyed pa yin zhing sdug bsngal sogs pa yin//'dod pa'i dga' la brkam pa dag ni/nod
358a1(dkon brtsegs): yin te//mig tsang mtshon 'dra rmongs gyur dag la bsngags pa brjod//'dod pa dman pa dag lnga bsngags shing bstun nas ni//dman pa de/
358a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ngan 'gror rab tu ltung bar 'gyur//gnod pa 'dod pa dag gis yul rnams rab bsngags shing //'dod pa gnod pa yin le dga' ba'i byis pa rnams//de dag don
358a3(dkon brtsegs): med 'tshe ba rnam par spangs nas ni//mi bzang g.yangs chen por rab tu ltung bar 'gyur//nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skye dgu 'di dag ni//rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma
358a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba yi bye bzhin du//lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur nas//byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'khyam por 'gyur//'di ni byis pa nos shing
358a5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rmongs pa rnams//shin tu mi mthong snod mchog yin par sems pa ltur//lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir//rtag tu 'dir gnas
358a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rgyu no ma yin zhes 'dzer//glang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes nges//'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gud pa yod sbyinu pas//pa dang ma dang bu dang bu ma
358a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la ni//don gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thos ma yin//de dag rtag tu bud med 'dis pa brjod byed cing //de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug par byed//de
358b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gti mug dra ba sdig par rab sogs shing //ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang sogs par byed//mi rnams de dag der chags bde bar 'du shes shing //pha dang ma
358b2(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su rab tu spong bar byed//de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod par mi byed cing //smod par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag ni tshol bar byed//phan tshun gdung bur
358b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing //rnam rtog mu yis nges bcom mi rnams nyon mongs pa//bkur bsti yongs su tshul la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams//chos ma
358b4(dkon brtsegs): yin par 'jig rten rab tu 'dzud par byed//grazhi de las ni mtshon cha dag drang lcags rnams dang //de bzhin 'ching ba dang ni 'thab cing rtsod pa dang //nges par
358b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur//shi 'byos nas ni mnar med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro//tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur zhing //nor
358b6(dkon brtsegs): nyams snying du sdug pa rab tu 'jig 'gyur la//mtho ris nyams zhing dmyal bar rab tu ltung bas na//mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed//ljags
358b7(dkon brtsegs): las grub pa'i nags tshal sngon po'i khrod dag tu//mkhas pas bdag nyid khrod du bor ba de blang zhing //mdzangs pa spu gri'i so yis bcad pa byis bla lo//ral gra dag gi/
359a1(dkon brtsegs): /khrod du ma la yang bcas sgra dang //rab tu me 'byur rngu lum bzung ba de skal//de bzhin lcug kyi thu lum 'bar ba zla smra zhing //mdong 'jigs/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): su rung ba rnams la reg sla'i//lag pa gnyis ni nam yang bud med reg mi bya//mis ni ji lta ji ltar 'dad pa rnams bsten pa//de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad ra
359a3(dkon brtsegs): spong shing //'di ltar 'dod rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi gtsang bas//'dod pa sdug bsngal ba dag rnam par spongs//'dod pa sdug bsngal kun gyi gzhi por gyur pa da
359a4(dkon brtsegs): glang phyir nor ni chung zer 'gyur bar byed pa dang //yid lo skye bo rnams kyi nyams pa'i rtsa ba bas//bud med nges par bsten pa gnong po gnod pa thob pa yin//skyes pa gang
359a5(dkon brtsegs): gis de 'dra'i chos tshul rig nas ni//bud med rnams lo rab tu bag med mi 'gyur ba//des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam yang rnam spangs shing //des ni byang chub dam pa
359a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par dka' ma yin//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang mi'i pha ma dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin te//zla ba dgu 'am/zla ba bcur mngal na bzung ste/shin tu sdug bsngal
359a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gso zhing /gcin dang phyis yang 'phyi bar byed/ngang du blangs nas nu zho ldung par byed pa/phung po rnams bskyed par byed//sems rnams gso bar byed/'jig
359b1(dkon brtsegs): rten ston par byed/'jam+bu'i gling sna tshogs ston par byed//don du 'dod/phan par 'dod/grub pa dang /bde bar 'dod/'jig rten lnga phan par 'dod pa ste/sbyin pa'i
359b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin la/zu la phan pa dang /bde bar 'dod pas/de dag gis rang gi nor gyi tshogs kyis/gzhan gyi khyim nas/gzhan gyi bu mo blangs pa dang /de de kho chags shing
359b3(dkon brtsegs): myos lnga 'chums shing brgyal ba dang /lhag par zhen pa dang /lhag par zhen cing 'dug par gyur nas/gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med de la chags shing mos
359b4(dkon brtsegs): pos sbyin pa'i gnas pha ma dag rgas/'khogs/gtugs la/lus nyams chung zhing mig gis mi mthong ba drag brnyas shing longs spyod med pa dang /nor med
359b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byos nas/rang gi khyim nas phyung ste/skrong par byed do//rgyal po chen po 'di ltar pha ma dka' ba byed byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang
359b6(dkon brtsegs): dag po'i bde bas/bsti stang du bya/bla mar bye/brjod par bya/mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/des de'i che pha mo dag rang gi khyim nas phyung bskrad nas gzhan gyi
359b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la/bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byed/gces su byed/rim bro byed la mchod pa byed cing //
360a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i badre bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi pha ma la ni ma byed pa'i snying brtse ba med pa dang /mau lta ba dang /ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pas ltos/rgyal//
360a2(dkon brtsegs): po chen po des byed 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la/ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te/'dug pa'i mi de bdag gi thos/
360a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas/'dod pa rnams la rten cing /pha ma la brnyas pa dang /ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gnyis pa

360a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la//'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang //de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs su 'gyur//gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni//de dag
360a6(dkon brtsegs): song nas phyir 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhes//rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste//de ltar byed pa dag ni rab mchog rnyed pa yin//gang dag pha ma rgas pa
360a7(dkon brtsegs): gso bar byed pa yi//tshong pa rnams ni yon tan kun gyi gtsor 'gyur zhing //de bzhin zhing las 'bros bu phun sum tshogs 'byung ste//bsod nams bgrang ba'i
360b1(dkon brtsegs): dodron du brjod par mi nus so//gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni//de dag khur rnams khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang yad//yang na glang dang bung bu rtag tu mi 'gyur/
360b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams de dag spu gro'o so la rje mi 'gyur//gang dag pha mo rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni//de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang //spu gri'i so dang ldan pa la yong ma rgal te//
360b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag zangs khu bskol ba 'thung ba yong mi 'gyur//gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bor byed pa ni//de dag nor dang 'bru ni mI nyung mang ba dang //chung ma bu dang bu mo dam pa dag dang
360b4(dkon brtsegs): yang //bai DUr+ya dang rin chen sa le sbram yang rnyed//gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bor byed pa ni//de dag rab 'phrul lha'i pho brang dag dang ni//rtsub 'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i
360b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul yang mthong 'gyur te//lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur//mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa//thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung
360b6(dkon brtsegs): ni thos gyur na//rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyams chung gyur pa yi//pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin na//
360b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing //log par blta ba la mngon par zhon pa yin te//don dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shos shing mi brtan pa yin
361a1(dkon brtsegs): pas skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing //byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang //'dod chags dang zhe sdang gis rmongs par gyur pa dang ///
361a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu mdzangs pa dag gis smad pa dang //khro bas zil gyis non cing /sdig pa'i las byed pa dang /sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu spangs
361a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang /longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang /ser sna can du gyur pa dang /gzhan la gnod par mngon par dga' zhing /chos goms pas mi dga' ba yin te
361a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa ma yin po/skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las la mngon par dga' zhing /skyes bu dam pa'i yus la mi dga' ba de lnga ltos//rgyal po chen
361a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'dod pa rnams la rten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag

361a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing //de ni rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//log dang ldan pas yin tan kun gyis rnam spangs shing //de ni rtog pa med cing blo yang nor pa
361b1(dkon brtsegs): yin/gang dag chu klung dag tu ud pa la rtswa tshol ltar//log par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin//bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongs su skyong byed cing //chos ma yin/
361b2(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa'i mi rnams mang po drag/de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba//de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro//gang dag 'dod pa
361b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni//de bzhin sems la gcags pa'i skyes bu tha ma dang //'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang //'du shes log pa dag la bde ba
361b4(dkon brtsegs): ga la yod//mi rnams de dag byas pa mi grazo sdig bcas shing //dad pa rnam nyams tshul 'chos gus pa med pa dang //'phags pa'i tshogs gyis rtag tu rnam par
361b5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas na//dmyal ba bzod rlag shin tu 'jigs su rungs pa dang //gzugs dang sgra dang ro la chags pa'i mi rnams ni//byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
361b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa mi mchod cing //log par blta bAs chos kyang nyan par mi byed la//lan 'ga' 'ang dge 'dun legs par mchod par mi byed pas//'phags pa rnams
361b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis rnams spangs ngan song ltung bas na//de phyir mi yi srid pa 'di ni rnyed pa la//sbyin du la yang dag sdom la nges par bsten cig dang //de las byang chub dam pa mchog/
362a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang thob par 'gyur//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes bu ni bcoM'i gnas sna tshogs dang /las kyi mtha' sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed do//rgyu/
362a2(dkon brtsegs): bo chen po 'di ltar lci ba lAm/rtsis sam/grangs sam/lag rtsis sam+b+ha mtshon cha'am/rgyal po la 'o shas 'tsho ba 'am/zhing las sam/tshong byed pa'am/khol
362a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe ba 'am/de lta bu'i bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang /las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing /'di lta ste/nor gyi phyir lam ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/lam ngan par yang 'gro bar
362a4(dkon brtsegs): byed/cong rong du chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/mtshon cha'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par yang byed/grang ba'i dus na yang
362a5(dkon brtsegs): lhags pas gnod par byed/dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par byed cing /bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du/'gro ba la yang spro bar byed/longs

363a3(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa rnams//'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/byis pa'i 'dod rnams bsten pa dag/khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no//sgra dri ro dang reg rnams kyis//

363a6(dkon brtsegs): ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa//ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin//bsad pa'i gshed ma rnams kyis ni//ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar//shis nas thar pa
363a7(dkon brtsegs): thob 'gyurare zhing //bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur//'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i//kun tu sbyor la 'jigs pa skye//byis pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams//'dod
363b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i srid pa rab tu 'phel//so ka'i dus na mi zhig ni//dgon pa chen por sdong gyur nas//byis pas lan tshwa 'thungs pa na//skom pa 'phel zhing rlab smyo ltar//rnga
363b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i//byis pa rmongs pas 'tsho ba rnams//'di na phyir zhing bud med lo//'dod pa'i sred pa brtan par 'gyur//ji ltar mi lus mdze can la//
363b3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags rnams ni za ba ltar//'dod brkam so so'i skye bo rnams//de bzhin bud med rnams kyis zos//mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig/kha dog ldan par snang
363b4(dkon brtsegs): mos kyi//nang na ha la hA la'i dug/drag po chen po yod pa ltor//de bzhin bud meng brgyan pa dag/gang dang gang na snang ba yang //gcan dang phyi sas gang ba yin//
363b5(dkon brtsegs): rkyargyal pa rlung gis bkang ba bzhin//'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon//gos kyis dkrisau pa ji bzhin du//de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang //ral gri klong ba g.yogs/
363b6(dkon brtsegs): sa bzhin//ji ltar me dong gang gyur la//du ba med cing 'bar ldan ltar//bud med de bzhin me 'dra zhing //srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo//bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'dir//
363b7(dkon brtsegs): byung na//sa ni kun tu 'bar gyur la//rtswa dang gel ba 'jig 'gyur zhing //chu klung dag kyang skam par 'gyur//'byung ba chen po'i gnas gyur pa//rgya mtsho yang ni skam 'acu
364a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing //ri bo chen po rnams bsreg la//de bzhin lhun po'ang 'jig par 'gyur//rgyal po chen po 'dzin pa yi//sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig
364a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing //blag chen rnams ni 'jig 'gyur la//skyob par byed pa yod mi yin//ji ltar me yis rir bcas dang //rgya mtshor bcas pa bsreg pa ltar//de bzhin
364a3(dkon brtsegs): bud med me 'dra ste//gtum zhing skyes bu g.yo bar byed///snabs dang mchil ma kha chu dang //glad rgyas rus pa'i klad pa dang //lus la dring 'dzag de la//byos pa
364a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni sbrang rtsi bzhin//kha sgo rus pas gang ba dang //sha dang lpags la sogs brtsegs shing //de bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste//dring smad par bya ba yin//mi gtsang sna
364a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs gang ba dang //'bras ni sbyin par gyur pa ltar//de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba//sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no//lho ni mnyi ma mtshor pa dang //glo bas gang zhing
364a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhal ma dang //khrag dang 'khris pas grang gyur la//glad rgyas kyis ni glad pa dang //khong pa'i nang na srin bu'i rigs//brgyad khri bo dag gnas gyur kyang //gti mug d+ha
364a7(dkon brtsegs): bas bsgribs pa yi//byis pa rnams kyis phyis mi mthong //rma sgo dgu nas rtag tu ni//mi gtsang rul pa zag gyur kyang //smra bdag dang lta ba la//byis pa rnams ni/
364b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar 'dzin//gang zhig kun gyis smad pa'i yul//chags pa rnams kyis phyis mi shes//mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams//snabs dang mchil ma za bar byed//smad
364b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'os la chags med pa//sbrang bu rnams kyis rma mthong bzhin//chan khung dag nas rdul 'dzag cing //smod pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur//byis pa sdug bsngal tshogs byed pa//
364b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yo//des ni myur du phongs gyur te//nywa rnams chu nas bton pa bzhin//'jigs rung lag na mtshon thogs kyis//ji ltar mi zhig gces pa ltar
364b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshon 'dri' bud med sdig can gyis//'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no//rnam rgyal lag na mtshon thogs pas//ji ltar rgyal po gces pa ltar//'dod chags me dang
364b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba yis//'dod la chags rnams de bzhin bsreg/shen pa'i gnas pas khyi rnams ltar//myang bar 'du shes byis pa rnams//ji ltar dgra yis bsreg pa ltar//
364b6(dkon brtsegs): myur du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur//rang gi las kyi nyes pa yis//de la skyob po med pa ltar//de bzhin bdag gi nyes pa yis//sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro///
364b7(dkon brtsegs): dedag sangs rgyas chos spangs nas//bud med rnams kyi rnag la rten//sems ni ro la chags gyur pa//de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//ji ltar spre'u zhig shing las
365a1(dkon brtsegs): ni/shing gzhan du ni gyur pa'am//de ni gnas dorang gnas gyur na//de nyid du ni sdug bsngal 'gyur//dro bzhon 'dod la brkam pa dang //
365a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'dod chags bstan pa dang //gti mug rgyal thogs pa rnams//dus ni yang dang yang du'ang//mau kun rnams nigasal shing la//rab tu btsugs nas
365a3(dkon brtsegs): nga bster//de zhin 'di la chags pa rnams//shal ma li ya~M ma thol 'bying // m+b+hir ma ni sran rje dang kror//lcags zangs rnams sa thugs byas nas/
365a4(dkon brtsegs): mos ni rab tu bsregs pa na//lbu bar bcas shing khol bltar//de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing //'drod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams//shi nas ngan song 'gro 'gyur nipa
365a5(dkon brtsegs): ljalcags zangs rnams su btso bar 'gyur//mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i//sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas//zangs ni bye ba drug nu dang //gzhan yang bzhi pa dag
365a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no//zangs ni sa so re ral//tshad ni dmigs su med min nong //me yi phung por ldan rnams su//bskal pa du mar btso bar 'gyur//kha cig zangs rnams de dag tu
365a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi las kyi skal brgya'am//nyis brgya sum brgya chang bar 'tshang//yang na bzhi brgyar betso bar 'gyur//sra skam rnon po rnams kyis ni//bzung zhing yang dang yang skyugs
365b1(dkon brtsegs): byas/dadag sha na yang min zhing //dud sgyur da/rab rnam sa 'gyur//lcags kyi gzhong par 'dug nas ni//rab tu cha zhing 'dren pa med//shi shing sha'u ste 'gyur te//rang glul/
365b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gnas par 'gyur//gang tshad dmyal po'i srungs rnams kyis//ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni//brtan la sogs pas brdungs pa na//sha rkang rlas pa phye mar 'gyur//de yi tshun
365b3(dkon brtsegs): dedag la//shin tu grang ba'i rlung yang ldang //des ni dmyal ba'i sems can rnams//sdug bsngal gyur pa de las 'tsho//mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa//brtun bu drag po
365b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis 'joms/sta ro rnams kyis gshog pa dang //de bzhin gsal shing gzugs par 'gyur//mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i//sems can rnams kyi lus la
365b5(dkon brtsegs): nilcags mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang //rtse gsum pa drang rtse lnga 'bab//mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa//ral gri mchu can kha rnams kyis//mgo yang glad pa gtogs 'gyur zhing
365b6(dkon brtsegs): wa dang sbyang kis zos par 'gyur//mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa//dran skyugs rul pa dri nga zhing //kun gyis snad par ltung 'gyur la//spu gri'i chu klung rnams su lhung //
365b7(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa//rab tu che bar bsreg 'gyur zhing //ngu 'bod de nga ni ngu 'bod che//thig nag tu yang bsreg par 'gyur//mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa//thig na//
366a1(dkon brtsegs): tu ni skyes nas kyang //yang dang yang du me myur dang //spu gri chu klung rnams su ltung //gang che lcags kyi zangs po char//mi rnams gang dka' tshod pan//
366a2(dkon brtsegs): khyi rnams kyis ni gtses gyur nos//de dag bde ba tshol bar byed//mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa//dmyal ba drag po chen por ni//lhung nas dpung gnyen yod min zhing //
366a3(dkon brtsegs): lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur//mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag/ljags las grub pa'i breg chen dang //mi sdug ri bo rnams kyis ni//de tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed//
366a4(dkon brtsegs): des ni rang gi las byas pas//'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur cing //de yis tshor ba myong ba na//de la skyob pa 'ga' yang med//ji snyed rten pa thams cad ni//bdag gi mdun///
366a5(dkon brtsegs): der 'ga' yang med//der ni mgon meng bdag cig pu//sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed//gang dag bde phyir don min par//sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang //
366a6(dkon brtsegs): pha ma de dag de ring ni//rnam par grol ba'i mthu yang med//gang dag dade phyir don min par//sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang //bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams//de
366a7(dkon brtsegs): ring bdag la 'grol mi nus//gang dag bde phyir don min par//sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang //mdza' bshes nye du de dag kun//rnam par 'grel par long mi
366b1(dkon brtsegs): nus/gang dag bdi phyir don min par//sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang //bdag gi rtsa lag de dag kun//de ring 'grel bar mi nus so//'dod pa dman pa rnams bston
366b2(dkon brtsegs): cing rdadaman pa'i chos rnams bsten nas ni//nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa drug/de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//shes rab 'chal ba mnar med par//song nas
366b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal tshor ba myong //sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag/phyi sa'i dri ltar mnam par bsgrags//de phyir dman pa rnams dang ni//dman pa'i bud med rnams bstan
366b4(dkon brtsegs): bi/byis pa de ni phye sa yi//rgyal ba bzung nas gnas pa yin//ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar//de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob 'gyur te//rgyal po yi ni chad pa dang //sdug
366b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bcing ba'ang myong bar 'gyur//bud med gzhi las skyes pa yang //bsad dang bcing ba myong 'gyur zhing //dmyal srungs rnams kyis bsregs pa dang //nges par 'cha
366b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'adra myong bar 'gyur//bud med rnams la brkam pa yi//blo ngan de dag bde mi 'gyur//gsal shing mthon po rnams su ni//btsugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur//
366b7(dkon brtsegs): sa yi ser khar bcug nas ni//de bzhin ral bris gdab par 'gyur//de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni//de dag yi ched bde mi 'gyur//rmongs pa bud med lhan cig tu//yang
367a1(dkon brtsegs): dang yang du 'du 'dzi byed//sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams bstan cing //dman pa rnams kyang smra bar byed//rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas//dge ba
367a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs shes brjod byed kyang //de sems bud med phyi bzhin song //byi ba la ni byi la bzhin//rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas//yud tsam zhig ni yid byung yang //ha la
367a3(dkon brtsegs): ha la'i dug 'dra ba'i//'dod chags kyis ni de yang 'khrug/ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig/bsdangs shing skrag pa byung gyur kyang //des ni phyis mthong ba na//chags pa bskyed
367a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa ltar//de bzhin byis pa bde 'dod rnams//rgyal ba'i bstan pa spangs nas ni//'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pas//des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//
367a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas//shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing //tshul khrims can dag bslus byas nas//phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur//shes rangab can gyis
367a6(dkon brtsegs): dal rnyed cing //de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas//'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni//mkhas pa mngon byung rab byung zhig/rgyal po chen po skyes pa 'dod pa la rten pa rnams
367a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyon ni de dag yin te//'dod pa'i gzhi dang /'dod pa'i rgyu dang /'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa rnams ni/sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro///
367b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis rtag par rgyun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//khyod kyi lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//de ltar
367b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bad so'i rgyal po 'char byed la//de lta de ltar chos bstan par mdzad do/chos bstan pa des/bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/de bzhin gshegs pa la
367b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba thab par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
367b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skyes pa dang /bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab
367b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar de dag bka' stsal cing /legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gis dge
367b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun la skyabs su 'chi ste/mtshon cha spangs shing /dbyug pa spangs la/ngo tsha mchis shing /srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar zhugs pa legs kyis//
367b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang /dge slong de dag
368a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
368a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs/stong phrag brgya pa las bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u

368a5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya pa la sa/le'u sum cu pa ste/bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa lung bstan pa///bam po phyed/rgya gar
368a6(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ar+ya su ma ti dA ri ka brid nA na ma ma hA ya na sU tA/bod skad du/'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba/theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs
368a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad laM phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/bya rgod phung por
368b1(dkon brtsegs): ril dge slong stong nyis brgya lngang ngu'i dge slong gri dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//de'i
368b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes bya ba btsas nas/lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba//gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa
368b3(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya

368b6(dkon brtsegs): byasna nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa//gal te skabs phye bdag gis ni//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang

369a1(dkon brtsegs): da nga rgyus//byang chub sems pa sakun//tsi pa da la stan b+ha //denas bcom ldan 'asal//zlum zlogs pabazang mas chags

370b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi gong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzhan dag gi dag pa

371a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na/dgra zla med par 'gyur te gzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/g.yo med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la brtan pa dang //

371a4(dkon brtsegs): med/gzhan gyi rnyed la dga' zhing ser sna med//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi smod na//rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang //

371b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang btsun par 'gyur//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing /yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na
371b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/lhag pa'i bsam pa sgrub pas/sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang /mdo sde zab mo rnams mi spong ba dang /sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams
371b3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed pa dang /sems can thams cad la byams pa bsgom pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ljon na/las kyi sgrib pa med
371b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing /yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/lhag pa'i bsam pas sdom pa gsum la gnas//mdo sde zab mo rnams la rtag tu

371b6(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa dang /dge
371b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshul
372a1(dkon brtsegs): rtags la//na 'anas sa ngasangs rgyub rdzas su dran//sa su ts+tsha ga shag kya byug 'am ga/dalab nas na chud mi 'byung /

372a4(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum mtshang pa la sbyin paste/bum byang chubs pang dngu'i chos blon po dru ga rdzun ni/ sa kyi la na dus mA sa babags shing /de las

372a6(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyin par byed//de'i phyir de mngon de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs//de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das la/bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di skad ces gsol to/
372a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji skad bus pa 'di dag la/bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bslab pa pan
372b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa/'di dag las chos gcig ma spyad na yang /bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bslus par gyur cig/de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/
372b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo byang chubo sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni nyams 'og du chud par dka' na/khyod 'di lta bu yang dag par len par byed na/ci khyod
372b3(dkon brtsegs): kyekyis sems la dbang thob bam/de skad ces smras nas bu mo blo gros bzang mos/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu bden

372b6(dkon brtsegs): bzang mos/de ltar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas ma thag tu/de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/lha'i me tog gi chare
372b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing //ma dkrol bar lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung bar gyur to//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig gang gis/da ltar de bzhin gsheg
373a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasra pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur
373a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /drin song rnams kyi ming yang med pa dang /bud med kyi skyon rnams med par 'gyur ba'i

373a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/bu mo blo gros bzang
373a7(dkon brtsegs): mos la 'di skad ces smras so//blo gros bzang mo khyod chos gang la gnas te/bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas/blo gros bzang mos smras pa/'jam dpal
373b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas/de la gnas par mi nus te/'dri la dri ba ma mchis so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/blo gros bzang mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla
373b2(dkon brtsegs): dgas yin/blo gros bzang mos smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba ni/rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dwags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/blo gros bzang mo 'di
373b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dwags yin//blo gros bzang mos smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni/nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid
373b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi tshig bla dwags so//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/blo gros bzang mo ci/de bzhin gshegs pa yang byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa mdzad dam/blo gros bzang mos smras pa/'jam

374a1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs/byis pa rnams kyang gzhan la/mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te/byang chub kyang gzhan par de ltar gzigs sam/de ci'i slad du zhe na/
374a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du/'di ni dbyings gcig pa lags te/blang ba ma mchis shing dor ba ma mchis la/sgro btags pa ma mchis so//'jam dpal gyis
374a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/blo gros bzong mo bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/blo gros bzang mos smras pa/'jam dpal bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal ba ni/sgyu ma sprul pa'i

374a7(dkon brtsegs): legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/bu mo blo gros bzang mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
374b1(dkon brtsegs): chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/skal pa sum cu lon pa'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//khyod kyang bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di nyid kyis/

374b3(dkon brtsegs): yun ring mo zhig nas mthong ngo zhes kyang smras so//blo gros bzang mos smras pa//'jam dpal ma rtog shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam par mi rtog/

374b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des/bdag skyes par gyur cig/bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/de'i bud med kyi/
374b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes par gyur te/chos gos ngur smrig gyon nas/des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis//bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/dge slong tshur shog ces
375a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang /bud med kyi skyon
375a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas/lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig ces byas so//

375b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can 'gyur to//de nas sa blo'o lha rnams kyi lha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar byas te/kye ma byang chub sems dpa'

375b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal po/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
375b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi

375b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa na/srog chags bye ba drag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dgra par gnas par gyur to//lha bye ba phrag brgyad
376a1(dkon brtsegs): cu ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/srog chags brgyad stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to//byang chub/
376a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs shing

376a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos nas tshig 'di skad du/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rgyu ba 'dis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so//
376a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla ni med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskal pa dgu bcu'i 'khor bu bsnol te/thor nas/bla na myed
376a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gnas par gyur to//de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni
376a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bcu gnyis na/bskal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa

376b2(dkon brtsegs): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'jam dpal da ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed

376b4(dkon brtsegs): spyad la/gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas/zla ba phyed kyi bar du la ne re bklags na/bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas mi bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phyod

376b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la gtad kyis/khyed 'thun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na zung shig/kun chub par gyis shig/

377a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'jig rten na/ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/de bzhi na gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun dang /byang chub kyi

377a4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che 'di lta bu 'di yi ger bri ba dang /lung 'bog pa dang /bcung ba dang /bklag pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
377a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o//'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa yin no//phyis 'gyod pa can du 'gyur te raM/'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo byang chub

377a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /de zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyod do///
377b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/'dus pa sum cu pa rdzogs so//
