377b3(dkon brtsegs): grod ta ra prits+tsha ma hA yA na nA ma sU tra/bod skad du 'phags pa gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba'i mdo/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag
377b4(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na//
377b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so//de nas dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
377b6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug blo//phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcomo ldan 'das kyis
377b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen bzhin du dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog la/gang+gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs shes smras so//gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol ba//bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis sprul
378a1(dkon brtsegs): pa la smras te khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs shes de skad bgyis na/ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog
378a2(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa la ni 'greng ba med/'dug pa med/nyal ba med/'ong ba med/'gro ba med/'chi 'pho med/skye ba med na/'di nas 'ongs so zhes de ci zhig ston par 'gyur/gang+gA'i
378a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu legs sam/bka' stsal pA/gang+gA'i mchog de bzhin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
378a4(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/gAng+gi ma chog khyod da gzod gang nas longs shes ci'i slad du smras/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA
378a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog sprul pa ni ngan song du mi 'gro/mtho ris su mi 'gro/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro na/ci gang+gA'i mchog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro/mtho ris su mi 'gro
378a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro 'am/gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las
378a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan lags par mthong na ni/dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog/ngan song du 'gro ba 'am/mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lagaso
378b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bdag sprul pa dang /bstan du'ang mi rung lags na/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin nas gzhan lags par ma mthong ste/bcom
378b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis ma mthong na/dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'chi ba zhes ji skad
378b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang /g.yo ba dang /rlom sems dang /bskyed pa dang /spros pa ma mchis no/'di snyam du bdag ngan song du 'gro ba 'am
378b4(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris su 'gro ba 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni/rnams kyang ngan song du mche ba
378b5(dkon brtsegs): pho risna ma chib 'am/yongasu mya ngan las 'odas par marmi ba ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen me gang+gA'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so//bcom ldan
378b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog khyod ci yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis mi skye ba lce smras
378b7(dkon brtsegs): te/khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na/ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i
379a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dwags yin na/de ni ci zhig lan 'debs par 'gyur/gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/bcom
379a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ci chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang /mtshungs pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog de de bzhin te/chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang
379a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang /mtshungs pa lags na/gang+gA'i mchog khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
379a4(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de ci zhig smra ste/bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis sprul pa la smras te/khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam shes///
379a5(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bgyis na/ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'o//gsol pa/ci bcom
379a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i smra bas smras lugs sam/bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mcho ga dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mod kyi/'on kyang 'khor 'di na rigs
379a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dul ba dag yod de/de dag gis don chen por 'gyur bas dris so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang+gA'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos nyid ces
379b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na/gang de las byung ba'i chos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lta ga la zhig yod/gsol pa/gal te bcom ldan 'das
379b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos nyid ces bgyi ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/de las byung ba'i chos lta ga la zhig mchis par gyur na/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi slad du ji ltar dge
379b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog gang dmigs pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa
379b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni gang gi tshe/yang dag par sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro//gang gi tshwa srung dag par mu sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro//
379b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba/ci'i slad du bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa la bas mA gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi/bcom/
379b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog chos 'di ni sems pas thob par bya ba ma yin te/sems pas thob par bya bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di na
379b7(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos lta ga la yod//gang+gA'i mchog sems mi dmigs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o//bsam
380a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob pa ma yin/mngon par rtog pa ma yin/shes pa ma yin/mngon sum du byas pa ma yin te/de ni thob par
380a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin//rnam par byang ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang+gA'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad na mkha' ltar nges
380a3(dkon brtsegs): par thugs su chud de/gaN+DI mchog chos thams cad namakha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa
380a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po ma mchis pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs shes gtags pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //rnam par shes pa zhes btags
380a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /phung po rnams dang /khams rnams dang /skye mtshad rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa ma mchis pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam
380a6(dkon brtsegs): par byang ba dang /'khor ba dang /mya ngan lus 'das pa zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog 'di lta ste/dper na/bdug bdag
380a7(dkon brtsegs): tsas 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gang+gA'i mchog ngas/gzugs shes gtags te/gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so//de bzhin du ngas tshor ba
380b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnam par shes pa zhes btags te/rnam par shes pa zhes btags te/rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so/phung po rnams dang /
380b2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams dang /skyed ched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /zag mA dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par
380b3(dkon brtsegs): byubyang ba dang /'khor ba dong mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang ngas btogs te/mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang mi dmigs so//gang+gA'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na
380b4(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yang med de mi dmigs so//gang+gA'i mchog de bzhin du ngas gzugs shes bya bar btags kyang /gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so//nges tshor ba dang
380b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar btegs kyang /rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so//phung po rnams dang /khams rnams
380b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /skye mched rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang //

381a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa myong par tshas par spyad pa spyod pa d+ma lta buni lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin no//gang+gA'i mchog
381a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gnas la dmigs nas/rdzus pa spyod pa spyod par de dag gi changs par spyod pa de ni yongs sum dag pa'o zhes ngas smras so//gang dag tshangs par spyod pa
381a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs sum dag pa de dag ni zab mo rgyud chad pa'i chos 'dri lta bu'i de thos nas/bsngangs skrag par 'gyur te/de dag skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /myang ngan dang
381a4(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongs su mi 'grol te/de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi bskal pa can du 'gyur
381a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes nga smra'o//gang+gA'i mchog da lta re ram/nga 'das pa'i phyin yang rung ste/gang dag zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de dag le mi gti mug pa dag gsod pa'i
381a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur te/de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag log par zin pas/bsad pa'i blo sdang bskyed nas/ngan sdong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//gung+ge mchog gis gsol
381a7(dkon brtsegs): bde bcom ldan 'das rgyud chad pa rgyud chad bzhis bgyi de'o//ci'i slad du na rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang+gA'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyud
381b1(dkon brtsegs): bcud pa'am/b+h+yoba'am/rnam par gzhig pa ma yinate/de phyir rgyung chad pa zhes b+haste/'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' rnas bya/blasam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud zlos bya'o//
381b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po
381b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dang /shelA dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te/'od kyis
381b4(dkon brtsegs): khyab par byas nas/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/slararu log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nub bo/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos
381b5(dkon brtsegs): grag pa gcig tu bzar te/pus mo glayas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga le ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
381b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rlo ma mchis par 'dzum par mi mdzad na/'dzum par mdzad pa'i rgyu gang legs/rkyen gang legs/bcom ldan
381b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis/gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma sha stag la
382a1(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir shad do//dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'dras pa'i dbyings/
382a2(dkon brtsegs): su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnamo grangs 'di'i ming ci lags//
382a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ni dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/'di ni dri ma med pa zhes bya bar zung
382a4(dkon brtsegs): shig/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/dge slong bdun brgya dang /dge slong ma bzhi brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas 'dod pa na
382a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang /gdugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams padron par sprul te/bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces///
382a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na/dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la/de nge bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig smra yang /de'i lus ngal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar yang
382a7(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /yun ring po nas dge ba spyad pa dang /yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa dang /sangs
382b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mang po la bstan bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar ta zhes smras so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag dede bzhin te/'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya bar byas pa
382b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/yun ring po tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog dang /lha dang mi dang /

382b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/'phags pa gaN+DIr mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po
382b5(dkon brtsegs): dzi na mi tra dang /de na shI la dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba/banang ye shes sngas pa sbyar cing zhus te/skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gratan la phab pa/shwa lo ka brgya

382b7(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i mdo//bam po gcig go//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na
383a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po khab na/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' brgyu

383a3(dkon brtsegs): mA med pa la gnas pa/smon pa myed pa la gnas pa/mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/mi gnas pa'i chos ston pa/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa sha stag la

384a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing mthar gyis/rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang gi la bya der

384b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang po/rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba
384b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de ring gi pha'i khang bzangs na khri gseru gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par
384b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas/khri de las ma langs te/gsung yang mi 'gro phyag kyang mi byed/gtam yang mi zer/stan
384b4(dkon brtsegs): ying mi 'dings/bsod snyoms kyang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgus/nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes thos nas
384b5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi khang bzangs kyi sde khang gaM lwa ba der song ste phyin nas/nyan thos chen po de dag lo mchog tu sdug par 'dzin pas/mngon par dga' zhing stan yang btang ngo //rgyal po ma
384b6(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug pa ma thong nas/bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'dre skad ces smras so//bu mo 'di/
384b7(dkon brtsegs): dog ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa//
385a1(dkon brtsegs): /zug pa zad pa/bya ba byas pa/byed pa smras pa/khur bor ba/bdag gis don rjes su thob ma/sbrid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang
385a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/snying brtse ba can yin te/'jig rten la snying brdze ba'i phyir/bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu
385a3(dkon brtsegs): bar khyod kyis mi shes sam ci na/khyod kyis de dag mthong la/mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang /bsu bar yang mi byed phyag kyang mi 'tshal/gtam yang mi zer/
385a4(dkon brtsegs): stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/dad pa dang /gus pa yang mi bskyed par/ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing kho rog ste 'dug/khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong /

385a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po/rgyal phran la ljang po 'am/gsur mchi ba nam yang gisan ta mo/gzigs sum/rgyal pos smras pa/bu mo de ni ma yin no//bu mos smras pa/
385a7(dkon brtsegs): yab ci lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam sur mchi'am/rgyal pos smras pa/bu mod ni ma yino//bu mos smras pa/yab ci mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang
385b1(dkon brtsegs): du/dur mchi'am/rgyal ngos smras pa/bu mo de ni ma yin no//bu mos smras pa/yab+hA ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang /mchu drung /rgyu myug dang /mtsho bran dang /steng ka dang //zhon/
385b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/gzigs sam/rgyal pos smras pa/bu mo dri ni ma yin no//bu mos smras pa/yab ci ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri nag po gzhan dag la 'dud pa'am/
385b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/gzigs sam/rgyal pos smras pa/bu mo de ni ma yin no//bu mos smras pa/yab ci nyi ma dang zla ba dang /skar ma'i chags srin bu maM khyer gyi 'od 'dod
385b4(dkon brtsegs): pagasan tama?/gzigs sam/rgyal pos smras pa/bu mo de ni ma yin no//bu mos smras pa/yab ce ri dgras kyi rgyal po seng ge ni/wa la ldang ba'am/sur mchis pa gas
385b5(dkon brtsegs): tam/gzigs sam/rgyal pos smras pa/bu mo dri ni ma yin no//bu mos smras pa/yab de bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
385b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rje byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa la/dmin pa la mos pa nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang bral
385b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag la dga' zhing ldang ba 'am/sung mchi ba 'am/phyag 'tshal ba 'am/bkur bsti bgyid dam/yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa
386a1(dkon brtsegs): bskor ram/bskor bar bgyid pan/nyan thos dman pa zhan pa zhum pa/nyi cha ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la/dga' bsdu phyag 'tshal ba
386a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/srung bar bgyid/yab lha'i bdag po/lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dge ba'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba ni/dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag
386a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa dang /phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ldang ba'am/sur mchi bar bgyid/yang mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i snga khyung
386a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa dron du gnyer bya na/dge ba'i rtswa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ldang ba 'am/srir mche ba ram+ba/phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/
386a5(dkon brtsegs): su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa mi mnyam pa dang /mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na/ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjesu song ba'i
386a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/sur mchi ba 'am/phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/yub su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i
386a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na/yungs 'bru lta bu ti ngange 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dgra la/ltung ba 'am/sur mchi'am/
386b1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' tha mamsa.a mthamasam tham/a ma thasams tham a yas
386b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal ba 'am/'dud pa 'am/'dod par skyed par byed/yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid shes rab dang /bsod nams dang /ye shes dang
386b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan nyi mya dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thob nas/srin bu ma khyer gyi 'od lta bu'i rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su spong ba'i nyan thos dag
386b4(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /nyan thos rnams la phyeg mi 'tshal na/bzhugs
386b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du lta ci smos/de ci'i slad du zhe na/su zhig zla ba dang /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/srin bu me khyer la phyag 'tshalnga bar bgyid/yab gang nyan thos la brtan pa
386b6(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos kyi sems dang spangs par 'gyur ro//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten na/thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i sems bskyed pa gnas par 'gyuraro//
386b7(dkon brtsegs): de na sa rgyal po mu skyes dgras/bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du/mi ldang zhing sur mi 'gro la
386b8(dkon brtsegs): phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed do/'di dag stan dang /bsod snyoms la spun mi 'dren pa ni/bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go//de skad ces smras pa dang /
387a1(dkon brtsegs): /tha mo mya dran mod kyis sbyin pas/rlung gi pargyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so//yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so//
387a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i spyang du zhe na/yab khyod grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhengs/sur mi bzhud/stan mi 'di sde pa lags na/khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lpags pa snyam
387a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid do//rgyal pos smras pa//bu mo de dag ning dang mtshungs pa ma yin no//bu mos smras pa/yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni/nyan thos
387a4(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lag s+ho//rtul pos smras pa/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang /dregs pa spangs te/sems can thams
387a5(dkon brtsegs): cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/bu mos smras pa/yab byang chub sems dpa' ni khon du 'dzin pa dang /tha ba dang khro ba dang /gnod sems dang /nyes pa spangs
387a6(dkon brtsegs): bya dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo//yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ni khon du 'dzin pa dang
387a7(dkon brtsegs): khro ba dang /gnod sems dang /nyes pa spangs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/tha ba dang khro ba dang /gnod sems dang /nyes pa bsel bar bgyi
387b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bang ma mchos/spungs par bgyi ba dang /dge pa 'dol byar dgyi ba yang ma mchis te/yab nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis/nyan thos kyi rdul khyings dran/
387b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang /shes rab ji snyed pas chos bstan du lags kyang /yab de dag la ni rdul khrims cadagu las mchi/ting nge 'dzin kyang ga las mchi/shes
387b3(dkon brtsegs): ra kyang ga las mchi/rnam par grol ba yang ga las mchi/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang ga las mchi/yab 'di lta ste dper na/bum pa chab kyis grang
387b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nang du char bab na/de tshab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la/der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro//yab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la/gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis
387b5(dkon brtsegs): chos pa shid du lags kyang /de dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur la/tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol bdud/rnam par grol ba'i
387b6(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong ba yang de dag la gnas pa pa'i 'gyur zhing//rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro//yab 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang /rgyur
387b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par 'gyur ro//de ci'i slang dge na/rgya mtsho chen po ni chad pa mchis pa'i steng du'o//yab byang chub semam dpa' sems dpa'i chen
388a1(dkon brtsegs): mamam\u0f7fmasas nathamasam/ca/ a naHna tha sa mthaSha sa tha/ ma gcamayaaHma
388a2(dkon brtsegs): mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing //chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas//
388a3(dkon brtsegs): deci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad dur/
388a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces b+h+yo bye/ma sbyis drug yi bu mor gyur pa ni//sna dran med byin yon tan gzi brjod brgyun//nyan thos lde pa rgyu dag ni lcags gyur kyang //de li byug byi byed
388a5(dkon brtsegs): ni dem lagaso//ma skyes drog /yis de la smras po ni//bu mo don 'di dra las nyan par gyis//khyod kyi nyan thos lnga brgya mthong bzhin du//byug bya'i phyir ni nI phyir lhung mi
388a6(dkon brtsegs): byed//bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin na //nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na//tsI byor phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi skye ba/ dag ni chis yab cig chog ni ge snun
388a7(dkon brtsegs): por gso//dper na sti zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang //ri rkyen 'byung khung nas ni ma rnyed sa//de 'dzin lag ni nyan thos thams cad kya //ye shes
388a8(dkon brtsegs): nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid/dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug go//sa bdaga' khor ros bsgyur ba mnyam bgyis nas//kar sha pa ni gcir tsam gsol na no//
388b1(dkon brtsegs): nga lAs rgyal po bstan pa don ma mchis//gang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis na//bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na ni//des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid//des
388b2(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal po legs par bsten pa lags//kar sha ba ni slong ba'i mi bzhin du//gang zhig sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams//thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed pa//nyam
388b3(dkon brtsegs): thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid//nor rnams skud bgyid mi ni ji lta ba//byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste//rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal ba mnyes bgyis shing //byang chub ra
388b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas sems can 'dul bar bgyid//dper na nad pa nang ba rgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis//grol bgyid de bzhin gzhan gyi dgra phyir 'brang ba yi//nyan thas nyon mongs rnams kyis
388b5(dkon brtsegs): gzir ba thams cad kyang //byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid//sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni//sos gyur sems can la ni su zhib 'dud par
388b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid//de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na/sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/ji ltar nang po sros par gyur pa thams cad la//sman pa dag gis gso bar
388b7(dkon brtsegs): nus par mi 'gyur ba//de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur pa la//sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do//'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la//gso bar
389a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi sems can gzhan la mu lags te//de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyis//sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems kyi bskyed//sman pa
389a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta bar//de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa//de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang //'jig rten kun gyis
389a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags//gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas//bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags//de ni sman pa bdag nyid
389a4(dkon brtsegs): grol bar bgyid pa ltar//mkhas pa dag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma legs//gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas//sems can grangs med sdug bsngal
389a5(dkon brtsegs): dag las grol bgyid pa//de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun ba skyed pa ste//de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags//e ra na da yi shing sdong mdzes pa ma legs le//
389a6(dkon brtsegs): dedag rnams kyi grib ma'ang yangs po mA lags te/e ren da yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi//rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags//tsan+da dan mchog gi sdong
389a7(dkon brtsegs): chen dag ni tsha ba yis//gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten pa lags//de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang //lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis/
389b1(dkon brtsegs): sag//ba klog rjes can yangasas lags//tshabs gang+gAs ba b+ha m+b+hi kyid pa/ga kya ni sems can myong stong //rlom par gas nas rgyu /
389b2(dkon brtsegs): ma//ba lang rlig rjes chu 'dre nyan thos kun//sems can kun gyi tshe bzhi mi bgyid//gaN+DI klung 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//sems can mtha' yas
389b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis tshim par bgyid//ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa ni//dngul po dag ni 'gyon bu len par bgyid//gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni//sems can shA
389b4(dkon brtsegs): po nor dang ldan par bgyid//de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'byebs//nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las//chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams
389b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can don smad mang du len par bgyid//ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyi//drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur//ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis
389b6(dkon brtsegs): na gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rnams nI ri rA ba bzhin//gang drug mthus ni lhor bcas skye dgu rnams//rnam grol mngo/
389b7(dkon brtsegs): tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur//nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid//yab cig ji ltar rtsa bran rtse mo yi//zil pa'i thigs pas lo tig rgyas mi bgyid//rab tu khabs
390a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sprin gyis sa stong 'di//tshim par bgyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid//nyan thos thams cad zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin//byang chub
390a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rab 'debs sbyin dang 'dra//snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni//stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par bgyid//ka ri bI ra'i me tog dri mchog min//
390a3(dkon brtsegs): des ni skyes pa bud med dga'i mi 'gyur//tsam pa kai'u me tog dri la dga'//ud pal par shi ka yang de bzhin no//nyan thos ka rA bi ra'i dri bzhin te//de dag shes
390a4(dkon brtsegs): pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur//kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems drapa' la//lha drang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//gcig pu mchi ba de la mtshar ci mchis//gang
390a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad//nyan thos mi reng gcig pu mchi ba bzhin//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpon 'dra//mgron zhig gzhan gyis stsal pa
390a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba dang //skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun mgron bzhin//sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni mgron dang 'dra//byang chub sems dpa' kun la mgron bgyid bzhin//gzings
390a7(dkon brtsegs): las brten pas chub chen po las//gzhan dag bsgral bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi//brtan gyis gru yi nang du zhugs nas ni//sems can bye ba mang po sbrel bar bgyid//
390b1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos gangs las brten pa lta buste//sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus//rdzogs pa'i byang chub gru zhugs byang chub sems//sdug bsngal mtsho las sems can
390b2(dkon brtsegs): sgrol bar bgyid//di ltar gatshul ngor bong bu nyon+da na ni//dgra las rgyal bar nus par myi 'gyur sti//gling chen rta dang shing rta nan na ni//g.yul du legs pa'i dgra rnams choms
390b3(dkon brtsegs): par nus//nyan thos rnams ni bong ba zhon pa bzhin//byang chub sems dpa' glang chen non 'dra skye//sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du//de dag shing dang drung du bdud rnam
390b4(dkon brtsegs): 'joms//ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang //de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur//zla ba rab tu rgyas pa sha rabs ni//mtshan mo mkha'i la thig le bzhin du
390b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes//ya cig nyan thos 'di dag skar mU ng+ge//rgyal po byung chub sems dpa' zlab bzhin//gang dag sems can kun la sman skad du//ye shes shang bas skye ba
390b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid//yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis//las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyis//'jam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis//khya ba sna tshogs brgya ga bgying
390b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//nyan thos 'di dag srin bu mi khyer 'dra//de dag shes 'di yang dge mthong mi 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi//shes rab ye shes
391a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni sems can 'grel//yab cig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang //ri dwags tshogs rnams 'drog par mi 'gyur gyi/seng ge'i skad kyis
391a2(dkon brtsegs): glang chen ri dwags dang //byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer par 'gyur//yi ba gcig de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs//de dag skad kyis bdud rnams
391a3(dkon brtsegs): skrag mi 'gyur//rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smad pas//bdud dang de bzhin bdud rigs skrag par 'gyur//yab cig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na//
391a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod mo bskyed//su zhig blo med byang chub spangs nas ni//theg pa dman la 'dod pa bskyed par bgying //gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spangs
391a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/theg pa dman la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid//de dag 'tsho ngan rnyed pa thob ma 'gyur//de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchis//gang dag lhar bcas 'jig/
391a6(dkon brtsegs): rten sman slad du//byang chub mchog la 'dun pa bskyed par bgyid//de dag legs 'tshe rnyed par legs par rnyed//de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis//gang dag
391a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang //'jig rteni sman slong las bgyid yid kyang rnon//gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson//de dag u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin//
391b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgas/bu mo mya ngan mod kyis byin pas tshogs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems
391b2(dkon brtsegs): sna bu mAM 'di thobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na tso bzod pa thab bAm+b+ha/mthob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byeng nges so snyam mo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bras/
391b3(dkon brtsegs): spya ngan med kyis byin pa ste 'dren byas smras so//hU~M mo khyud nyan thos kyi mag pa la snang dag par zhugs sa ma/smras pa ma yin no//rangs su rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag
391b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs sam/spros pa ma yin no//bu mo khyod ni zhig don du gnyer na/'di ltar sring ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/bri mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bugal te bdag chos 'ag
391b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig don du gnyer na ni/bdag seng gro'i sgra ci yang mi sgrogs pa zhig na/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don du mi gnyer te/de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
391b6(dkon brtsegs): /btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du hrI zla me khyod theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni/btsun pa shA ri'i bris chos gang mngon sum du byas pa'i chos dul
391b7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos shes bya ba 'am/rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'am/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par bzhag pa yong da/gnas brtan shA ri 'jum
392a1(dkon brtsegs): /smras pa/bu mo chos de la ni theg pa rnam par bzhug pa med de/chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa
392a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod//shA ri'i bus smras pa/bu mo chos dri la ni don du gnyer ba ci yang med do//gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/bu mo mya
392a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/bu mos
392a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang /dben pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/tha dad du dbye ba ci yod/shA ri'i bus smras pa/bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yang
392a5(dkon brtsegs): med do//bu mos btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang /dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci ying med pa de bzhin du/btsun pa shA ri'i bu sangs
392a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams dang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing thu dad du dbye ba ci yang med do//btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dpe ru na/na mkha' dang bla gab med
392a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la yang /bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang medo//btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med
392b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' sa mamam mamamachamapabamamasas na thams ma tham amam thasamatha.a mtham tsamam am mama' mtsham aSha yas as mas yas a yas ma yam
392b2(dkon brtsegs): cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do//gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'o dgal gyi bu chen pos/bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces
392b3(dkon brtsegs): smrab so//bu mo ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu chos ldeg pa zhig tu mthong la/nyan thos kyi chos rnams shin tu dman pa mthong ngam cin/
392b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/phyag kyang myi 'tshal/sur yang mi 'gro/gtam yang myi zer/stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan 'dren par mi byed/de smad
392b5(dkon brtsegs): nos smras pa dang /bu mo mya ngan mid kyis byin pas gnas brtan mo dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa mo ru dgalaM gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po
392b6(dkon brtsegs): TIg rten gyi khams na/skar mA'i gzugs su gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/moru dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/kye mo snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes
392b7(dkon brtsegs): /snyoms par ma zhugs na ni myi shes so//bra myos sgrus pa/btsun pa mo ru dgal gyi thu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni lan cig mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis/spyong
392b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gaN+DI'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang rab tu
393a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lta ci smos te/btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu//
393a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na//
393a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod/'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/mo'u dogal gyi bus smras pa//bu mo de ni mi shes so//bu mos smras pa/btsun
393a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ma byon pa ni ji snyed cig yod/da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji skad cig yod shes sam
393a5(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/bu mo de ni mi shes so//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/
393a6(dkon brtsegs): zhesdang la spyod pa ni ji skyed cig yod/gti mug l+ya spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod//cha mnyam pa la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/mau dgal gyi bus smras pa/bu mo

393b1(dkon brtsegs): cig yod/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/mo'u drugal gyi dus smras pa/bu mo dri ni mi shes so//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa mau dgal
393b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems
393b3(dkon brtsegs): can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/bu mo de ni mi shes so//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa mo'u ngag la gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i
393b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/shes sam/maud gal gyi bus smras pa bu mo de ni mi sheso//bu mos
393b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/btsun pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni/de dag dang gzhan yang de'i grong du gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu
393b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen na/sems can gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/btsun pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no//btsun pa mau dgal gyi bu chen
393b7(dkon brtsegs): po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/btsun pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na de
394a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la/
394a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/shing ljon pa thams cad las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyad par
394a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i spos kyi nga ldang ba yod pa der slong shig/gnas brtan mau gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang de khro bos dag dod thos na/sangs
394a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas la lta bu dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/de nas bus mya ngan med kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so bden pa
394a5(dkon brtsegs): dang bden pa'i tshig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lta na/bden
394a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /bden pa'i tshig des/de bzhin gshegs pa spyos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer dus/bdag nyid dang /rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston
394a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos men po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bde
394b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byin gyis brlabs des/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spros
394b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od de dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku
394b3(dkon brtsegs): las bkye'o//chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'drir thos so//tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri ngas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'di khyab par gyur
394b4(dkon brtsegs): to//de bzhin gshegs pa spros rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des kyang /gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bu mo mya ngan med kyis
394b5(dkon brtsegs): byin pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to//
394b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshor nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
394b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das can dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'di gau las byung lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces
395a1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to//byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis/nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/des nyan thos chen po
395a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gying ba'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
395a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams la/chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan ngan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so//
395a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa'o
395a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam thos nas/nyan thos dman po zhan pa zhum pa/nyi tshe
395a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba'am/sur 'gro ba 'am/phyag 'tshal bar byed/btsun pa mo'u ngagal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'ad do ji tsam du thug

395b1(dkon brtsegs): mams pas masas mamasam tham/sam thasams ma la ma yamam

395b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin ga shugs pa mthong bar nus sa ma/de bzhin gshegs pas/gang dgang la gzugs su mthong //gang dge nga la blar shes pa//'grubs spong bar zhugs bya ste/
395b8(dkon brtsegs): de dgang mi mthong //sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lnga//'dren pa rnams na chos kyi sku//chos nyid shes par dramin papa//de ni rnam par shes mi nus//zhes me gsung zas ma/
396a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bu ma khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shU thub pa ston
396a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni/btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gos de bzhin gshibs pa mthong mod/sha'i mag gis ma yin te/gzugs su ma yin no//lha'i nAgro gis
396a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te tshor bar ma yin no//shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du shes kyis ma yin no//chos kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du byed du ma yin no//sangs rgyas kyi mig gis
396a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te rnam par shes par ma yin no//btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang
396a5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa la srid pa mthong ba bzhin no//btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/dper na/gnas brtan gyis ngan 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin

396a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ni med pa yin na//chos gang med pa de ni balci bar mi nus so//dri mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no//chos
396b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni med pa yin te de dag ni blta bar mi nus so//'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo ci sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/bu mos smras pa/gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos

396b3(dkon brtsegs): la yang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta ci smos/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i chos de
396b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ci yod pa yin nam 'on te med pa yin/'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na chos thams cad ni

396b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na/de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par 'gyur//'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo bdag gis rang bzhin
397a1(dkon brtsegs): yin/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gis rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do//bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no//rang
397a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin med pa des bdag dben no//rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no//'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis su las chos thos na/'di ltar khyod
397a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/bu mo yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes pa la ni rgyu gnyis dang /rkyen gnyis yod de/gzhan gyi sgra dang /bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhini yid la byed
397a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las 'byung ngo zhes de skad gsungs so//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra drang tshul bzhin du so sor
397a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa las lta ba rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ro//btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi skye mi tshol lo//btsun pa
397a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po ji ltar nu dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed
397a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de ltar na/dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin na//'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/bu mos smras pa//
397b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang lhan cig glanas byung sems can du 'du shes bskyed par mi byed pa de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin/
397b2(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs pa yin no//btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni/chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no//chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang
397b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan no//chos thams cad ni dri ltar gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/de tsam gyis na byang chub sems

397b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams cad la gnyis su med par mthong la/mi byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na/de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yino//btsun
397b7(dkon brtsegs): papo 'od srung chen po mthong ba zhes bya ba de ni/mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dwags so//'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/bu mos smras pa/btsun
398a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o//'od srung chen pos smras pa/bu mo kho bos ni bdag dang bdag gi ma mthong ngo //bu mos smras pa/
398a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o//gtam de skad brjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/bu mo
398a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/
398a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi/gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing /gang gisra nang nga mo phyi rol ci yang mi dmigs pa de spobs
398a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/bu mo gang ma rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/bu mos smras pa/gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/dge ba ma
398a6(dkon brtsegs): yin/mi dge ba ma yin/khwa ni ma tho ba drang bcas pa ma yin/kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/zag pa med pa ma yin/'dus byas ma yin//
398a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas ma yin/'jig rten ma yin/'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin te/'khor ba dang /mya ngan
398b1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa ma rnyed na/so san sna bu'i chos mi dmigs shing 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/sangs rgyas kyi chos mi dmigs na/btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na gang gis
398b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma rnyed pa'i sgrubs pa dang ldan pa yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ji ltar spobs byar 'gyur/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa rab byor gyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed
398b3(dkon brtsegs): pade bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro//chos kyi de bzhin nyid gling gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams mchog tu bsten pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid da la ci brjod cing
398b4(dkon brtsegs): sgrar rang ma/nyon mongs pa med pa de dang /chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la spobs pa ci yang yong ngam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/nyon mongs pa med pa dang /de bzhin nyid ni
398b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'am/brjod par mi nus so//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/khyod kyis bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni
398b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston to//bu mos smras pa/gnas bArta na ra
398b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor chos thams cad la brag cha lta bur mos sam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/bu mo mos so//bu mos smras pa/gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag cha la spongs pa ci yang yong
399a1(dkon brtsegs): dmA rab 'byor gyis smras pa/bu mo de ni med de bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas smra//
399a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba gang yin pa de la rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na//'di ltar gang brten nas byung ba de lnga ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
399a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo chos thams cad ni brten nas byung ba'o//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
399a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs so//de bzhin
399a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni da ltar bzhugs so zhes ci'i phyir bstan
399a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni nub par 'gyur bar mi 'dod pa'i phyir
399a7(dkon brtsegs): ro//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig ston to//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor bstan pa thams cad bstan
399b1(dkon brtsegs): du mad pa'o//de ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/de ni bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung ba dang ma yin te/dngos po med pa dang /brjod du med pa'i mtha' mo//

406a7(dkon brtsegs): byin pa bas/gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na rna lam du thos na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed na/gang 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog

406b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lnga dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
406b2(dkon brtsegs): bstod do//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
406b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus bu sum cu rtsa gnyis par rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi ni mi tra dang /sU ren tra bo d+hi dang /lo tsA ba zhang ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//
406b4(dkon brtsegs): bram po gcig shU lo ka sum brgyu//rgya gar skad du/Ir+ya bi ma li dad ti pa ri brid tsha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags
406b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyog 'tshalnga lo//'di skad
406b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zes sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge/
406b7(dkon brtsegs): rlorlung gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur
407a1(dkon brtsegs): pad+maHsems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa//bur bor ba/bdag gis
407a2(dkon brtsegs): don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son
407a3(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag ste/gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu phal cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa skye ba
407a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang //
407a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i blo gros dang /spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /mthu chen thob dang /byams pa dang /mya ngan med kyis byin
407a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /grom pa 'dor ba don yod dang /mthong po dron yod dang /ngan song spong dang /mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms po dang /yon tan rin
407a7(dkon brtsegs): po che'i me tog gis rtag tu rgyan dang /gser gyi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal can dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems thog pa med pa dang /
407b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang thabs gcig go//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu/
407b2(dkon brtsegs): gang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /nyan
407b3(dkon brtsegs): thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong dang /rin chen tog dang /mthong ba don yid dang /sgrib pa thams cad
407b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par sel ba dang /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /spobs pa brtsegs dang /byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang /byang chub sems dpa'
407b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas/lhung bzed thogs te bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du zhugs nas//
407b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam 'di skad ces gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam thos par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
407b7(dkon brtsegs): la snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o zhes brjod par gyur/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/gang gis grong khyer du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las skye bo'i
408a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad ni shes rab thogs pa med de/de dag gi shes rab la mun b+hu mun+da nAg med par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo mas
408a2(dkon brtsegs): par thugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/gang gis grong khyer du skye ba'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las rnams 'byung
408a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur bya rnam pa de lta bu'i ti nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ci nas kyang gzhan
408a4(dkon brtsegs): stegasna tsa ni spyod pa dang /kun tu rgyu ba dang /gcer bu sa dang /'chub pa da/rje bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag grong khyer na 'khod pa de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba dang ldan
408a5(dkon brtsegs): bair mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta ji ti nge 'dzin la kho ba snyoms par zhugs te slong khyer du 'jug parobya'o//tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ci nas kyang grong
408a6(dkon brtsegs): nA skyes pa da bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo gang dag bdag nAg la bsod snyoms sbyin por byed pa'i khong po de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'dis pa la byug gi bar du longs
408a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod zangad mi shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin po kho rje snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
408b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis grong khyer du skye ba'i tshogs thams cadanan mongs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//tshe nga ldan pa/
408b2(dkon brtsegs): nam grus skyes pa/gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho ba snyems par zhugs te grong khyer
408b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug par bya'o//tshe dang ldan po ma 'gogs pas smras pa/gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nad med pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge
408b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la sngon ma thos
408b5(dkon brtsegs): 'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bi snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa
408b6(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang gang gis grong khyer na sgo dang /skar khung dang rtsig pa dang /snod dang rgyan dang /shing dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang /gos rnams las stong pa nyid kyi sgra
408b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /skye ba med pa'i sgra dang /dngos po med pa'i sgra dang /bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba
409a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsdam par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' dran song spong gis smras pa/gang gis grong khyer na sems can rnams kyi
409a2(dkon brtsegs): las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba glang yod pa de'i tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong b.raru 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' mthong
409a3(dkon brtsegs): ba don yod kyis smras pa/ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong
409a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rtog gis smras pa/gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches

409a6(dkon brtsegs): yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa
409a7(dkon brtsegs): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag gis bcings pa dang bsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang 'jigs pas nyan pa rnams 'jigs
409b1(dkon brtsegs): ba mang ba thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams
409b2(dkon brtsegs): cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang /byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho boso bsam par bya'o//
409b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor po don yod kyis smras pa/ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
409b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o//de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa de
409b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i gtamo 'di brjod cing mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por phyin to//yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba
409b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa/mngon par shes pA lnga po dag thob po zhig yod de/bu mo
409b7(dkon brtsegs): des lha'i mig dag pa mi'i las 'das pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing de dag lam gyi bar skabasu gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so//
410a1(dkon brtsegs): rdumoM yang brdugs mdzes bA bstan sgrub pa/kha ga nga po rnam pa mchog dang ldan pa/pha mdung nang mo la byams pa/bcas nas lo bcug
410a2(dkon brtsegs): lon pa ste/de snyi zla ba chung ches brgyad skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par phams dge mtshan dang bkra shis byed du gnang nas/bram ze zho dang d+ha kro sha dang me tog dang /yam sr-ig+sa shing
410a3(dkon brtsegs): dang myur dang bum po thogs pra lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/khrus byas sar khrid pa las bram ze de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag byung mthong ngo //
410a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas kyang bkra mi shis so sgom pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas par gyur to//de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze che batshangs pa'i lha zhes du badres dri ma med kyim byin pa la
410a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo dge slong dag mngon na 'khod pa ni b+hakra mr-i shis te/de dag ma'adron dgos pa 'am nor rnam brtul zhugs sam mchod sbyin nam bag+sa shis kyi rlung ste
410a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du slar bzhud do//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs pa bcad de trA sA po//'di dag chags med mchog tu dge shis
410a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/skye bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jog par byed//'di dag rnam par dag cing bden bzhi mthong //dul la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par gzhag/'di dag rkang gnyis
410b1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa bsod namos zhing //'di la yon phul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur//'di la yon phul 'bras bu 'chi med 'thob//byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur//tshul
410b2(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin//'dod las brgal cing sdig med re ba med//'di dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgyu//sdug bsngal gzir ba'i srog chags thur pa/
410b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje//de yi sras dgra rdul med nyon mongs med//'di dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mang //shes rab ldan mis 'di dag ji//
410b4(dkon brtsegs): lhor spang //'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhi//bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pa sbyin char bab//'di dag rnams la bkur bsti chung byas kyang //mi rnams chos dang de
410b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nor yang 'grub//'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dge shis ldan//'di dag zhing mchog rnam dag sems dang ldan//bram ze 'di la su zhig dang byed pa//de ni bsod/
410b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ma po bskyed par 'gyur//dri nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la tshigasu bcad de slar smras pa//byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du mau bzhud cig/mchod
410b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dus 'dir dge slong ma gzigs shig/ngur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo bregs pa/de dag don 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyid//yab dang yum yang dges par mi 'gyur
411a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing //bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur//khyod kyang mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis//de bas dge slong rnams ni shin tu spros
411a2(dkon brtsegs): denas bla mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/yon tan ljon pa 'di dag ma gtogs par//pha dang me yang kho mo'i skyabs mi yin/
411a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen gyi tshogs dang nor dang lang tsho min//'di dag 'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi sgrubs//bdag ni sangs rgyas dag 'a bas lung btang zhing //de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams
411a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang btu //dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par//khaM mI'i sbubs rten sems can 'di ni med//de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lces bu mo dri ma med kyis byin
411a5(dkon brtsegs): bal 'di skad ces smraso//bu mo btsas nos khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs sngon chos kyang ma gsani sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur kyang ma mdzad na/ 'i nga
411a6(dkon brtsegs): dusangs rgyas la drung par 'gyur/bu mo dro ma med kyis byin dus smras pa/bram ze kho mo bcas nas zhag badren lon phran can don ci khyed bzlas kyi rlung na gasnod ni sman
411a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag pa'i tshe lha'i bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'dong ba kho mos mthong ste/de dag rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa/
411b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa kho mos thos su//de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nang nas gang gis ston de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gcig po de la lha'i bu rnams kyis dris pa/grogs po de bzhin bshegs/
411b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig de ni ji ltar shes par bya//de nas lha'i bu des kho mo'i bsam pa shes nas lha'i bu de dag kyang dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//de yi dbu
411b3(dkon brtsegs): sgra dri med snum zhing mdzes//gtsang 'jam g.yas su 'khyil pa'i lcang lo can//zhal mdog pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra//zla nya mtshan mo na mkhar mdzes pa bzhin//de yi
411b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzod spu kha ba shel mdog bzang //smin mtshams bar nas 'khyal cing shin tu mdzes//de yis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug/rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu
411b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byed//mi dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge 'dra//sems stobs mi zhum tshams mnyam thags kyang bzang //de yi ljags che zhol gyi dkyil 'khor khebs///
411b6(dkon brtsegs): dri yi zhal na dri med rnam par mdzes//de yi gsung ni phan zhing snyan la ran//tshig rngub spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med//skye bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing //'gro la phan
411b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir rgyal ba gsung yang sgrogs//de yi mgud ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra//de bzhin mi dbang phyug gi sor mo reng //de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra//bang yangs dri med lte ba
412a1(dkon brtsegs): mdza ma tshams sa mthams maca/a nathaH tha sams mammakam tha.a yaa yamaHtham
412a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhol zhing zab//rta mchog lta bur 'doms kyi sba ba nub//de bzhin spu yi khong bu gser dang 'dra//brla yi dbyibs ni glang po'i lhag dang mtshungs//
412a3(dkon brtsegs): zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa e na'i 'dra//thub pa'i dbang po bden gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral//ngan ltas bcom pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i lta ba 'jig/'khor
412a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byos kyang //'khrul ming skyon drang bral bas sems can kun tshim mdzad//gya gyur med drang tshig gis lus ni tshime mdzad cing //mya ngan 'das
412a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi//skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing //mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston//de ni rang gis sangs
412a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gyur pa ste//bdag nyid brgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol//'gro ba'i skyob dang skyabs dang dge ba shes shing //'jig rten kun la thugs brtse phan par mdzad//
412a7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa de yi yon tan 'di dag dang //gzhan yang mtha' yas kho bos deng ma brjod//thos nas lha rnams yid dga' dad gyur nas//rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang bsgom
412a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byis pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas
412b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos so//mngon par dran to do tshun chud nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to//nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i
412b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa dang //gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byas so//mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang pha la
412b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba 'am/ma la dga' ba 'am/ming po la dga' ba 'am/spun la dga' ba 'am/nye du la dga' ba 'am/nor la dga' ba 'am/rgyan la dga' ba 'am/
412b4(dkon brtsegs): gos la dga' ba 'am/lus la dga' ba 'am/srog la dga' ba 'am/grong khyer la dga' ba 'am/skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi/bram ze gzhan du na sangs
412b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su bran no//bram ze kho mos ni gsum yid la bya ba yid la byas te//de bzhin gshegros pa phyogs grang na bzhugs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas/
412b6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang bshad pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing /kho mos don nam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang tshus zos par ma byas so//de bzhin
412b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to//kho mos nyin mtshan gang du yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang chos ma
413a1(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to//bram ze kho mos ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang chos mnyan pa dang dge 'dun la bstan//
413a2(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya bas chog pa med do//de nas bramA ze tshangs pa'i lhas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u khyod song la lo rgyus 'di rgyal po dang btsun mo
413a3(dkon brtsegs): la gsol cig/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rings pa'i tshul du song ste ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyal po drang btsun mo lnga gsol to//bu mo dri ma med kyis
413a4(dkon brtsegs): byin pas ji ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi
413a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa brjod chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa shing rta las babs nas bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'
413a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag drang /nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba dUr song ste phyin nas de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas par/tshe dang ldan pa shA
413a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ri'i bu bud
413b1(dkon brtsegs): mngaga' mthamam satsa tshams sa na thams mamaca/a nathan tha.amakatham mthas thamamamam mams kas ma.a yamaHma yas ma
413b2(dkon brtsegs): med ni shes rab song gnyis pa/nyon mongs pa drag pa/bag med pa mang ba/dman pa la mos pa/tshul bzhin du ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchis pa lags na/bdag
413b3(dkon brtsegs): la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste ci nas bdag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs par bstan du gsol//ko sa li'i
413b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gtam 'byung ba 'di dang bram ze'i tshig thos nas myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/des nyan thos de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag
413b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo khyod na re kho mo nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to//nam yang dga' ba dang brtse ba dang ldan pa'i
413b6(dkon brtsegs): sems ma bskyed do zhes zer ba de ltar khyod bde ba dang yang badre ba la brtson nam/'on tam 'di ltar yod byung ba'i tshul gyis smra/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rang gi bu mo
413b7(dkon brtsegs): la tshigasu btsod de smras pa/khyod kyi gzugs byang lha yi bu mo mtshungs shing 'dra//rkyen rnams kyis ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin//ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyis kyis
413b8(dkon brtsegs): ma non pa//ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur//khyod kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor//ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du gyur pa yin//bu mo
414a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na//de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyed ma 'gyur//sdug cing phangs la yid du 'ong ba ste//skye bo kun la dga'
414a2(dkon brtsegs): babaskyed yin na//yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod//ci yi phyir ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med//bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig thos gyur cing //ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde//
414a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su nyams shing yid byung sems su gyur//khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'drang la smros//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po gsal rgyal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
414a4(dkon brtsegs): yab cig phung po nyes dmigs snod rnams dang //khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su ma chud dam//'khor ba'i gnas ni gar la blta dang mtshungs//'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi gnas 'jig
414a5(dkon brtsegs): pa can//sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la//gnyid dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa ga la mchis//khams 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sprul bzhi ste//srid pa sems pa bde ba ga
414a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchis//mi mdza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing //dgon par phyin la dga' ba ga la mchis//kun nas nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskor ba//ji ltar bde 'tho
414a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bka' stsol cig/dud 'thungs pa la bde ba ga la mchis//bsad sor bkril dga' ba ga la mchis//g.yang sa tshe 'dir su zhig yid rton bgyid//rgyal po 'tshob
414b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten de dag mtshungs//blo ngan drug gis lus rnams bo rang ni//ri rab tsam gyis phung por gyur to zhes//de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na//'dus byas slu ba'i chos la
414b2(dkon brtsegs): su yid rton//ba dang mngang sdug dang ming po dang //bu dang rtsa lag gnyen tshogs 'gro ba kun//'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs brnyan 'dra//'dri 'dra'i mi sdig gang la su yid rnon
414b3(dkon brtsegs): grang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong //de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang bskye//byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni//yab cig bdag gis ma mthong ma thos /
414b4(dkon brtsegs): so/bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba blta 'tshal gyur//bad buraru gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos//rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras po 'di dag mthong //yab cig ji
414b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'dod pa bstan par bgyi//de nus rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha cang mi smra bar gyur par rig
414b6(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus pa thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol//'di ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni
414b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam/'on te 'dus ma byas legs/de gal te 'dus
415a1(dkon brtsegs): byas lags na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no zhes bka' stsal to//ji ste 'dus ma byas lags nas 'dus ma
415a2(dkon brtsegs): byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so//gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
415a3(dkon brtsegs): bu cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//shA ri'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/shA ri'i bus
415a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/bu mo ni 'dus byas mi 'dri'i bu myos ni skye ba med pa dris te de ni lan gdab par mi nus so//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa mau dgul gyi bu chen po la
415a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so//'di ltar btsun pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ci tshe dang ldan pa sems
415a6(dkon brtsegs): can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/'on te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston//gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te sten na sems can
415a7(dkon brtsegs): ni ma mchis pa ste/de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro//ji ste chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o//'gyur
415b1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na rnam par mi rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor pur+ya 'gyur/tshe dang ldan pa mau dgral gyi bu chen po yang cang

415b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi dri'i bu mos ni 'gyur ba med pa dris te/'gyur ba med pa dang rnam pa rtag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yin/

415b6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni khyod byis pa so so'i skye de rnams dang mtshungs so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams cad ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i slang

416a1(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis par 'gyur te de ni mi 'thad do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gang po la

417a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad na sems ni brjod du ma mchis shing sgyu ma lta bu ste yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa lags na/ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis pa la gnas

419a1(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ba ma ljags shing gnyis su ma mchis la kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//dza ster ba nyid zab pas zab na ni ngo bo nyid gang yang sus k+Sha /

419a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so//'jam dpal yang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bu
419a7(dkon brtsegs): mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod pa la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa 'am bud med dam khye'u 'am
419b1(dkon brtsegs): mang ya mam tshams sa nathas maca/a mthan thasamaSha sa natha/makamma
419b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mo gang dag kho bor mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes
419b3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa de/ci de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur mthong ba mdzad dam 'on tam chos kyi skur mthong ba mdzad/gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong ba mdzad na de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka'am
419b4(dkon brtsegs): lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong //gang dag nga la sgrar shes bya//'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste//skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
