419b6(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa te blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o//mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur te//byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis smras pa/
419b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong bya don yong bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste de ni bstan par mi nus so//bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/bdag ni
419b8(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'am dngos po ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o//bstan pa slobs la de nas ston cig/mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems
420a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin po che'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad rin po che gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung
420a2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ci zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs par mdzad dam 'on te zang zing ma mchis pas
420a3(dkon brtsegs): phan 'dogs pa mdzad/gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad zhe na/
420a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o//ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phran 'dogs pa mdzad na zang zing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa
420a5(dkon brtsegs): lag so//rin po che tog kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad
420a6(dkon brtsegs): du gang gis grong khyer 'di na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba grang yod pa de/tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung dru myong bar 'gyur bu rnam pa de lta bu'i
420a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de de bzhin gshegs paso las ni bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan te de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do//gal te myid
420b1(dkon brtsegs): nade bzhin gshegs pa'i dka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro//ji ste bsam par mi spyod na mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar ji ltar
420b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro//gal te de ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro//ngan song spong
420b3(dkon brtsegs): gris smras pa/kho bos ni smon lam gyi dbang gis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur bar byed do//bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi chos
420b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur du mi nus lpags so//gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rI re'i
420b5(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa de smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar mi 'grub ste/rnam grangs 'dis ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur mi nus par rig par bya'o//ngan song spong yang cang mi smra bar
420b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la'i de skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du gang gis
420b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyan yid kyi grong khyer chen por skya bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bkram pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs par
421a1(dkon brtsegs): tsi ting nge 'dzin de bdag la ra ga las pa ljags sam 'ong te gzhan la rag las pA lags/gal te bdag la rag pa la sA lags nA ni mi 'pho ba'i//
421a2(dkon brtsegs): chos can lags te ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzad/ji ste gzhan la rag las pa lags na ni ting 'dzin de khyod kyi ma
421a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so//gra la khyod kyi ma lags pa des ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par mi spyod do//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/bu mo
421a4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo'i sbyor ba 'di ni byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'o//bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas pa
421a5(dkon brtsegs): lags ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can rnams la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa yang mchis so//byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
421a6(dkon brtsegs): yang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di
421a7(dkon brtsegs): skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang bsad par bkri ba de dag thor pa dang /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba
421b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ci khyod kyi sbyor ba 'di len pa dang bcas pa lags sam 'on te len pa ma mchis pa lags gal te sbyor ba
421b2(dkon brtsegs): de len pa dang bcas pa lags na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags te byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro//de lta bas na de yong mi
421b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs so//ji ste sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis pa logs na ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar bsgrub pa ma mchis so//byang chub
421b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
421b5(dkon brtsegs): phyug la 'di skad ces smras so//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i len thob shig/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gros smras pa//bu mo ni skye
421b6(dkon brtsegs): ba drang 'gag pa mi 'dri ste de ni lan gdab par mi nus so//bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug grang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma
421b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis so//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/bu mo gang na skye ba med cing 'gog pa med pa de na yi ge 'jug pa
422a1(dkon brtsegs): med do//bu mos smras pa/'jug pa ma mchis pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston
422a2(dkon brtsegs): yi ge rnams la mi chags so//chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te de lnga rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so//byang chub sems dpa' spyan ram
422a3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brdegs lnga 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu
422a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer ni skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang /spobs pa
422a5(dkon brtsegs): yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de/ci rnam par rtog pas
422a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa lags sam 'on te rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags/gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags na ni 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa
422a7(dkon brtsegs): logs te de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro//ji ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni mo byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa
422b1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs kyis smras pa/bu mo sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spobs pa thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon lam 'di ni dang po sems
422b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa nas bzung ste btab po//bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam gdab pa'i sems bskyed pa ste mchis sam 'on te ma mchis/
422b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so//ji ste ma mchis nA chad par lta ba lags te de gsung na ni khyod kyis gsung ba log pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa
422b4(dkon brtsegs): brdegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad
422b5(dkon brtsegs): du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
422b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am 'on te mi mchis pa zhes brjod per bgyi
422b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste yod pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so//ji ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' gom pa
423a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/bu mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dwags so//bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ci ye shes
423a2(dkon brtsegs): de skye bas rab tu phye ba legs sam 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags som/'on te zhi bas phye ba lags lags te skye bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid
423a3(dkon brtsegs): la bgyid pa las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so//ji ste zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni de dmigs pa ma mchis so//gang la dmigs
423a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa de la 'di ni so so'i skye bo zhe'am/nyan thos so zhe'am/rang sangs rgyas so zhe 'am/byang chub sems dpa'o zhe'am/sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa
423a5(dkon brtsegs): mi skye'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i sranga'o///
423a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'drong po don yod kyang cang mi slu bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' de drag la 'di skad ces smras so//bsod snyom
423a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'o slar 'dong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/deng bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa las chos pa gang yin pa 'di ni mkhas pa'i zas yin phra chog par
423b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i phyir te chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o//de nas bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor gang na gdog pa med pa dang bzhag pa med
423b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de la ci zhog khyod kyis btsal bar sems/btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi spros pa la dga' ba ni ma lag so//btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni
423b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma mchis pa gnas par mi bgyi ba lags te 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni mi 'khrugs pa lags so////bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad pa

423b7(dkon brtsegs): be der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ting 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mtha' yas mnga'//'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dga'
424a1(dkon brtsegs): stsol ba//mtshungs med ye shes bde ga shigs khyod la zhu//byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad pa spyod//ji ltar shing dbang drung mchis bdud rnams
424a2(dkon brtsegs): 'joms//ji ltar rir bcas sa rnams g.yo bar bgyid//grags pa mtha' yas ji ltar 'od zer gtong //byang chub spyod tshul logs par bshang du gsol//sangs rgyas nor gyi
424a3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs ni ji ltar 'thob//ting 'dzin zhi ba dam pa ji ltar bsgom//mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'thob//sems can rin chen rnams kyi spyod pa gsungs//gang gis

424a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu brtson//mngal gyi gnas ni ji ltar rnams spangs nas//pad+ma las ni rtag tu brdzus te skye//sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid//bdag med stong

424b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis ri rab mtshungs//rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang //stod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal dang //ji ltar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan nas//'jig

425a1(dkon brtsegs): du yang chos thos shing //ji ltar tshe ring sems can bde bar 'gyur//rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son//dgra bcom 'dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar

425a3(dkon brtsegs): gis 'gyur//longs spyod che la shes rab che//kun mkhyen rtogs par khong du chud//gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob

426a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu rnams su byams pa bsgom byas na/bdud 'dir btul nas byang chub reg par 'gyur//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas
426a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/bzhi gang zhe na bya ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /chos zab mo la mos pa dang /yi dam la brtan pa dang /skye bo mang po byang chub
426a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas sa daklagayo bar byed do//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//
426a4(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed//mkhas pa zab mo'i chos la bzod//yi dam la yang shin tu brten//dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par byed//rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med la//skye bo
426a5(dkon brtsegs): mang po dga' bar byed//de ltar chos bzhi de dag gis//zhing rnams bye ba g.yo bar byed//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med
426a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ste/bzhi ga pan+d+ha na/mar me sbyin pa dang /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /sems can bag med par gyur cing myi khom par gyur pa rnams
426a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi gan du sor ste chos ston pa dang /de bzhin gshesmras pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra ba 'debs pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sa
426b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dgra gtong ngo //de la 'di skad ces bya ste/mar mo byin pas 'od ni rnam par dag/zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs su 'dzin/
426b2(dkon brtsegs): 'og med gyur pa rnams la chos sbyin byed//mchod rten dag la rin chen dra ba 'bul//des na bye ba bsam yas zhing 'gro zhing //byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gtong bar byed//reg
426b3(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur//mkhas pa byang chub bla med don du gnyer//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/rgyan sna
426b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs gtsang zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang /bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang /rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang //
426b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mang du gnas pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs thob po//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sna tshogs byin pas
426b6(dkon brtsegs): gzus ni thob par 'gyur//slong ba rnams la bu mo brgyan te sbyin//rgyun mi 'chad par sa swa rgyas bsngags pa brjod//rgyal ba'i ye shes don du shes rab bsgom//chos bzhi 'di //
426b7(dkon brtsegs): gis ni gzungs thob 'gyur//bskal pa brgyar yang thos pa tshud mi za//phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa//de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin//bu mo
427a1(dkon brtsegs): mngama' ya mamamathamam phaH Nams sa na thams ma mam/a na thaHtha sa maTha sa mtha tham pa' kaH ShaNan/ya amatham yaHtham ma Nam
427a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'khor ba la yid byung ba mang ba dang //gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgul
427a3(dkon brtsegs): mos pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /las kyi mtha' shin tu yongs su mthar phyin pa yin te/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin thob bo//
427a4(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sred pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid kyang byung //bse ru lta bur gcig pur spyod la dga'//rtag tu shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin//de las rtag tu shin
427a5(dkon brtsegs): tu mthar yang phyin//rtag tu chos bzhi dag la zhugs nas su//byang chub spyod pa zhi ba myur tshol byed//byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la gor 'thob//rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang
427a6(dkon brtsegs): chub rtogs//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/lus yang ba dang /sems yang ba dang /chos thams cad la mngon par zhon
427a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang /khams bzhi na mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo//de la
427a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/lus yang ba dang de bzhin sems kyang yang //chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid//na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du//khams pa ni/
427b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byin gyis rlob pa byed//chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bstan byas na//blo ldan de yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas 'thob//skad cig gcig la zhing rnams stong du 'gro//sangs rgyas stong
427b2(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong //bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/khro ba med de gtso ba dang tha ba dang zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /de bzhin
427b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag bya bar mngon par dga' ba dang /tshul khrims kyi snoms pas bsdams shing tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes rtag tu smra ba dang /chos
427b4(dkon brtsegs): smra ba rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces
427b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/gzhan la khro dang khon du 'dzin ma byed//nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral//rtsol ba med la dga' zhing snyan par smra//gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyag par byed//de ni
427b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam dag rtag tu srung //de ni rtag tu legs par 'ong zhes smra//chos smra rnams la de ni tha ba med//de yis sems ni rdo rje ri rab mtshungs//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
427b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na brdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du 'jug cing /me tog ut+pal dang pad+ma dang pad+ma dkar po dag gis
428a1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa bkang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor ba dang /phan pa'i dngos po myong zhing yang dag par
428a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang /gzhan dag gi skyon mi 'dzin pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad lnga phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
428a3(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//sangs rgyas sku gzugs pad+ma mchog
428a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs byed du 'jug/chu skyes me tog lag pa bkang ste dbul bar byed//pha rol dag la dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshig kyang smra//dga' bar byed la mngon par brtson gyi skyon mi
428a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin//sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams yongs su bsngo//thub mchog rnams kyi sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa shes//sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i yon tan 'di bzhi
428a6(dkon brtsegs): bsten+da na //rgyal ba mi chog rnams drung du brdzus te skye bar 'gyur//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/brnyas pa med
428a7(dkon brtsegs): par sbyin pa'i tshul can dang /chags pa med par dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang /mos pa mang ba dang /lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/bu mo byang chub sems
428b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/nges pa brnyas pa med pa'i sbyin pa byin par byed//de ni dngos po kun la rtag tu 'dzin pa med//
428b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed byas na//de ni phyir zhing longs spyod chen po thob par 'gyur//dad dang ldan par 'gyur zhing g.yo mong sgyu yang med//pha rol dag gi skyon ni 'dzin par
428b3(dkon brtsegs): yong mi byed//lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gau lta ba dang 'gyur ba//des na de 'dir longs spyod bzang po rnams dang ldani//bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'acu
428b4(dkon brtsegs): te/bzhi gang zhe na/chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang /mi mthun par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang /gsol bya 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams ngag ston pa dang /
428b5(dkon brtsegs): sto pa nyid bsgom pa la mang du gnas pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//mkhas pa nam yang ser sna
428b6(dkon brtsegs): yong mi byed//mi mthun 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sal//yang dag rab ldan gdam ngag ston par byed//rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid bsgom//chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten bya
428b7(dkon brtsegs): mad rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob//sangs rgyas rjes su bstan pa bslab byas nas//rkang gnyis desab sangs rgyas de 'gyur ro//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan//
429a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/lung nod pa dang kha ton la brtson pa rnams lung mnos pa dang gdams ngag brjod nas yun ring du lon te gsol ba 'dabs/
429a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la lung 'bog cing dran par byed pa dang /'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan dag la dang ba nye bar bsgrub pa dang /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par dbyung ba dang mya ngan las 'das
429a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la chos ston pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma la mkhas pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
429a4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/lung mnos kha ton brjod pa dran par byed/gzhan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrogs//skyo ba med par chos kyang
429a5(dkon brtsegs): rjod par byed//ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i mtshan ma lags par 'dzin//chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/mthu chen ldan pa che rabs dran par 'gyur//bskal pa stong phrag bsam yas
429a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran//rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog nyid myur du 'thob//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phrad pa 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/srog gi phyir yang
429a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos mi spong ba dang /srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang mi bsten pa dang /srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting
429b1(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sangs rgyas byang chub kyi cam spong mi byed//chos sgrub
429b2(dkon brtsegs): la skur ba yong mi 'dabs//des ni sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong //g.yol ba med par rtag tu sangs rgyas ngan//chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na//bde gshegs rnams dang /
429b3(dkon brtsegs): bradrad pa des thob bo//bla med byang chub ma thob bar du yang //'dren pa ga la bzhugs bya der de skye//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po
429b4(dkon brtsegs): dag thob ste//bzhi gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che sbar gyis 'thor ba dang /'bru ma radra zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
429b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khru bar byed pa dang /me tog dang spos dang sil snyan sna tshogs 'brel ba dang /yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis mkhan po dang slob dpon la bsnyen bkur bya bas rim gro byed pa ste/bu mo byang chub
429b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag 'thob bo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/mchod rten la ni spyir gyis dbyig rnams 'thor//dri zhim 'bru ma
429b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mchod rten 'khru//spos dang me tog sol snyan sna tshogs 'bul//yid du 'ong bas mkhan po slongab dpon bsnyen//des lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan//rab tu mdzes shing dzi na/
430a1(dkon brtsegs): tan kun dang lda/gang gis shes rab mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa//chos 'di dag gis skyes chen mtshan du 'gyur//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na
430a2(dkon brtsegs): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul ba dang /gzhon la bsti stang byed pas mi skyo ba dang /chos smra ba la 'thab mo me rgol ba dang /
430a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ngobo byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob bo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
430a4(dkon brtsegs): stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'dul//gzhan la bsti stang byed pas skyo ba med//chos smra ba la 'thab mo yong mi rgol//sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin du 'jug/'di bzhis lus la dpe byad
430a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po rnams//'di na de yis rnyed par dka' ba med//yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsnyen byas na//byang chub sems dpa' 'di na brgyan par 'gyur//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
430a6(dkon brtsegs): naspobs pa 'thob ste//bzhi gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang /nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom
430a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas 'dzin pa dang /lus dang srog dang yo byad rnams la mi
430b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob bo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni//nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed//'jig rten
430b2(dkon brtsegs): kun dang mi mthun pa//skye ba med par rab tu sgrogs//mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas//sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par byed//lus dang srog la mi lta bar//de ni byang chub lta bar byed//bzhi
430b3(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dag bstan byos na//de yi spobs pa 'phel bar 'gyur//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun//sna tshogs phreng 'dras tshim par byed//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs
430b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/phrag drog med pa dang /ser sna med pa dang /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /'khor dang 'dre ba med pa ste/bu mo
430b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob po//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gzhan gyis rnyed la nam yang phrag dog med//mthong nas dga' bar
430b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te ser sna med//sems can kun la de yi sems kyang snyoms/'khor dang 'dre bar de ni yong mi byed//chos bzho 'dis ni zhing gi bkod 'thob cing /myur du byang chub mchog kyang thob par
430b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa thob ste/bzhi gang zhe na/gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang /mi mthun pa rnams kyi sdums byed//
431a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /lung nod pa dang kha ton byed du 'jug pas pa na 'dogs pa dang /phra ma'i tshogs yongs su spong ba ste/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang
431a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gzhan gyi 'khor ni nam yang yod mi 'byed//skye bo mi mthun pa dag 'dum par byed //lung nod kha ton
431a3(dkon brtsegs): byed la yang dge 'dzud//pha rol dag la dbyen sde tshig mi smra/chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na//dge 'dun rgyu tshon rnam dag thob par 'gyur//de bas dge 'dun rnam par
431a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyang ba'i phyir//mkhas pas chos 'di rtag tu bsten par bya//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye ste/bzhi gang zhe na/
431a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi shas kyi khyi dang rnyed pa la phrag dog mi bskyed pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongasu dag pa yongs su tshol ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams
431a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed de tha na sems dang po bskyed pa na byang chub sems dpa' la yang bsti stang byed pa dang /shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa ste/bu mo byang chub
431a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gzhan la mchod pa mthong na phrag dog med//pha rol phyin pa
431b1(dkon brtsegs): dag la yongs su tshol//byang chub sems dpa' ston par rtag tu sems//shes khe bde ba'i don du tshul 'chos med//yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bskyen byas na//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de
431b2(dkon brtsegs): phrad 'gyur//zhing gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa//'dod pa bzhin du zhing der skye bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
431b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma bgyis na/bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i
431b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen pos bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
431b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo khyod 'di skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar te//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' ba mi shes sam/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan mo gal gyi bu chen po
431b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras pa'o//btsun pa maud dgal gyi bu chen po bden pa'i tshig gang dag gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa de bzhin du de bzhin
431b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar brtags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/bden pa dang bden pa'i
432a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cig/sems can gang la yang gnod pa med par gyur cig/bden pa dang //
432a2(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag yongs su yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me tog gi
432a3(dkon brtsegs): char mngon par bab par gyur cig/ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig/bdag kyang bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te skyes pa'i lus su rod cing lo bcu
432a4(dkon brtsegs): drug lon pa 'dra bar gyur cig/smon lam de skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang
432a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu g.yos ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong gi sgra yang byung /lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo//bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pa yang bud med kyis
432a6(dkon brtsegs): lus mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon nu 'dra bar snang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mod dgal gyi bu chen pos 'dris
432a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar che ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po gnas pa'i
432b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar
432b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di ltar mthu che ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mau gal gyi bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/dang por sems
432b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang sbyin gnas yin te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang
432b4(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan
432b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste sngon po dang /ser po dang dmar po dang /dkar po dang leb rgan dang /shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/'od
432b6(dkon brtsegs): des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'bugs te/slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub
432b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de log su thal
433a1(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi mjed dadag po'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dbyangs ldan pa/mgon
433a2(dkon brtsegs): bo lha sgra yid 'ong ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi bar mdzad pa'o//gti mug spong ba 'jig rten dag na dga' ba bzang po gzhal yas bskyed mdzad pa//stobs bcu yon tan rgya mtsho mang
433a3(dkon brtsegs): ba gang gi don du 'dra btang bstan du gsol//rir bcas nags tshal bcas shing chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yos//lha rnams na mkhar gnas shing lha'i me
433a4(dkon brtsegs): tog yid du 'ong ba'i char pa 'bebs//seng ges wa pham bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad//dpa'o gang gi don du 'od kyis ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka'
433a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal gsol//nyi zla bye ba stong gi 'od bkye ba dang glog dang nor bu rnams 'od dang /lha dang klu dang dri za gnod spyan dag gi 'od rnams 'bar ba gang lags pa//shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas dge
433a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas//'od rnams thams cad mog mog por bgyis sangs rgyas 'od ni phyogs 'dra rnams su mdzes//khyod kyi smin mtshams par gyi mjeb sku rab
433a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzes dkar zhing dri ma ma mchis bzang //'bar zhing pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung dang me tog kund 'dra bas phyogs gsal bgyid//thams cad mog mog bgyis nas gdugs kyis srin bu me khyer
433b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rgyal bas mdzes//mi'i seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang dor der 'gyur bstan du gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'dis/

433b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis

433b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar yun ring du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod na/ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tshe bud med kyi dngos po las sre bsgyur//byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa//
