439b7(dkon brtsegs): shing /nga mtshon gyis min la chus min dug gis min//de ni brdzus te skye ba kho nar 'gyur//yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa byang phyogs na mun dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i
440a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyad pa'i blo zhes
440a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do//bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
440a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyad pa'i blo de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo drad pa can ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes
440a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed par 'gyur ro//thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro//zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ba nas bla na med pa yang
440a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yang 'gyur ro//ngan song gsum po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
440a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der dran song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar bar byed do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
440a7(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjod byed pa//de yi yon tan bgrang bar mi nus shing //de ni byang chub dam pa 'thob par
440b1(dkon brtsegs): the tshom med/de la the tshom med par gzungs skye'o//yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa shang lto 'tshams kyi phyogs na shin tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten khams na/de bzhin//
440b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do//bskal pa de ni
440b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i
440b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro//byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen
440b5(dkon brtsegs): po 'thob par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bad+mod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu
440b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ro//bud med kyi tshe brjes nas kyang skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di 'dzin byed pa'i//byang chub sems dpa' yon
440b7(dkon brtsegs): tAtran 'di dang gzhan//bsam gyis mi khyab rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mang po mthong //yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho nub 'tshams kyi
441a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs na bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpa/
441a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba zhag nga ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do//bskal pa de ni chos thams cad yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya
441a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo dang po can de'i mtshan de thos pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba
441a4(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//rgyu gang gis na sems can thams cad mchog tu
441a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar byed ces bya zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas chos ston par 'gyur zhing /de chos ston pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas stong
441a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
441a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sems can rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yongs su thar par 'gyur te/de ngas
441b1(dkon brtsegs): nas yongs su grol nas lha dang mi'i lus 'thob par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gser mchog 'od dpal
441b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa//de la gzi brjid dpal mdog stobs dbang po//tshe rabs kun tu rnyed par dka' ma yin//de la blo thogs med pa mtha' yas 'gyur//yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu
441b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa nub byang 'tshams kyi phyogs na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal
441b4(dkon brtsegs): snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do//bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
441b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang dri'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni che brjes ma thag tu spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
441b6(dkon brtsegs): gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro//tshogs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tran bkod pa 'dzin par
441b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i chos ston pa yang thos par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/gang zhig rgyal ba de yi mtshan 'dzin pa//tshe dpag med
442a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sangs rgyas shing du de//da ni tshe dpag med ldan chos shes 'gyur//skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'chang rgya//yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa byung /
442a2(dkon brtsegs): shar 'tshams kyi phyogs na mya ngan thams cing las brgal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams no//de bzhin gshegos pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa
442a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do//bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das
442a4(dkon brtsegs): dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa grangs med pa byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
442a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la dge
442a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste/sgra dbyings yan lag drug cu phun sum tshogs//da ni kun tu shis pa'ang pha rol phyin//rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu
442a7(dkon brtsegs): mchod byed pa'o//bsod nams gang yin bsam yas de 'thob 'gyur//yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gza
442b1(dkon brtsegs): brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar bzang po dang na mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar
442b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te 'tshe zhing bzhes pa yod do//bskal pa de ni tshad med len zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang na mkha'
442b3(dkon brtsegs): nges par sgrogs pa'i bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin kyi phung
442b4(dkon brtsegs): bo dpag tu med pa dang /shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su
442b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bar 'gyur ro//sa nas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro//tshig bzung bar 'os pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro//spobs pa bul ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro//myur
442b6(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//yi ge dang sgra'i brda yang 'thob par 'gyur ro//rigs mthon po dang /rigs mthon po yang 'thob par
442b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'thob par 'gyur ro//tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro//de la 'di skad ces bya ste//
443a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa//de ni yan lag brgyad byungs phun sum 'thob//de ni sangs rgyas bral bar yong mi skye//mi de mi thogs byang chub
443a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chang rgyar 'gyur//yon tan rin tshon me tog kun tu rgyas pa 'og gi phyog san tha dad pa med pa nyid lo dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
443a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do//bskal pa de ni ye shes kun nas bsdus
443a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das dedri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'di de'i mchin
443a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro//skye ba gcig gis
443a6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs bya'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro//
443a7(dkon brtsegs): bos nas kyang thams cid kun tu 'dzin par 'gyuraro//de'i 'di nad kyis bye ste/sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sa sa rgyab byi phrog/dgu bcu rnams kyi ches brtan pos 'gyu da //
443b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gcig thogs bla na med pa yi//byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang /byang
443b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang
443b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob bo//lha dang mi'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis
443b4(dkon brtsegs): de/ ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang /thams cad dong ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma
443b5(dkon brtsegs): yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi
443b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na mi tra
443b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /pra dz+nyA wa ra ma dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya a tsin t+ya bud d+hA bi Sha ya ni ra de shan
444a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma hA ya na sUt+ma/bod skad du/'byugs pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//balnga po dang //
444a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyaga'i tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
444a3(dkon brtsegs): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i
444a4(dkon brtsegs): bu rnams dang /gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston
444a5(dkon brtsegs): no//yang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go//lha'i bu dngal bzang yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das
444a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis khyod kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam las brtsams te/lha'i 'khor 'di dang //
444a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la spobs par gyis shig/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/bcom ldan
444b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul las bcoms te spobs par gyis shig/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gang mig gi
444b2(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags pa dang /gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang /rna ba'i yul ma lags pa dang /sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang /sna'i yul mA legs pa dang /dri'i yul ma lags pA dang /
444b3(dkon brtsegs): lce'i yul ma lags pa dang /ro'i yul ma lags pa dang /lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang /reg bya'i yul ma legs pa dang /yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang /chos kyi yul
444b4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lpags te/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bum
444b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas khong du chud pa ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di ltar khong du chud par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
444b6(dkon brtsegs): blas byang chub brnyas pa'i yul ci lags bka' stsal po/'jam dpal lta bar 'gyur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid ni des byang chub thob pa'i yul lo mtshan ma mnyam pa nyid
444b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir mnan ma med pa'i yul lo//khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rlon pa med pa ni yul lo//'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni yul lo//'dus
445a1(dkon brtsegs): byas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med pa dang zung ba med pa dang 'du byed pa med pa ni yul lo//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis kyi yul gang lags//
445a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yul lo//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te de la brjod pa ma mchis
445a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so//brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis pa lags so//bstan pa ma mchis pa la mngon par brjod pa ma mchis la/bcom ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma
445a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul legs so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul
445a5(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su btsal bar bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
445a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongasu rtogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lcags
445a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'am ldog pa yod dam ci na/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
445b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams las yongs su btsal/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das spangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis/ldog pa ma mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal gal te sangs
445b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing ldog pa med na/sangs rgyas kyi yul ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su shes/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
445b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du/nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis
445b4(dkon brtsegs): legs so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/gsol pa/sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang
445b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yang gzhan du gyur la/sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin kyang gzhan zhig lags na ni/de bzhin gshegs
445b6(dkon brtsegs): pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig la/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags
445b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi sal gyi rang bzhin lags te/de'i slad du//de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes ston lags so//
446a1(dkon brtsegs): ga' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas pa shes sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das tshal lags so//ka
446a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas 'dod chags dang
446a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang gti mug kun tu 'byung ba'i mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gung la gnas te 'dod
446a4(dkon brtsegs): chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug kun tu 'byung /gsol pa/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang smon pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin gshegs
446a5(dkon brtsegs): pa granas ljags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal ci stong pa nyid la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mchis pa gang gis stong pa nyid
446a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i mchis pa des 'dod chags dang she sdang dang gti mug rnams mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal yod pa gang gis stong pa nyid yod cing //yod pa gang gis
446a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams yod/gsol pa/yi ge dang skad dang sgra dang brjod pa'i mchis pas stong pa nyid mchis lags so//yig dang skad dang sgra dang yod pa mchis pas 'dod
446b1(dkon brtsegs): chags dang shezhe sdang dang gti mug rnams mchis lag so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang /ma byung ba dang /ma byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus ma
446b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang /ma byung ba dang /ma byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni med pa
446b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no//dge slong dag gal te mi skyes pa dang /ma byung ba dang /ma byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa med du zin na/skyes pa dang /byung ba dang /
446b4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag la 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/dge slong dag 'di ltar ma skyes pa dang /ma byung ba dang /mngon/
446b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus ma byas pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa yod do//de'i phyir skyes pa dang /byung ba dang /byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las
446b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gdags so zhes bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gal te stong pa nyid ma mchis su lags na//'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa 'di dag las
446b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni mchis pa de'i slad du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams las 'byung bar
447a1(dkon brtsegs): gdags lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de de lta yin du zin na/gang su dag stong pa nyid la gnas/
447a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la gnas par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa gang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug las gud du
447a3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid 'tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te rnal 'byor ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug las gud du stong
447a4(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid btsal bar 'gyid pa ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug nyid stong pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal ci khyod 'dod chags
447a5(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bcas pa yin num/'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags
447a6(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag mnyam ste/gang mnyam pa nyid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma lags 'dod chags dang
447a7(dkon brtsegs): bral ba yang ma lags te//zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags zhe sdang dang bral pa yang ma lags/gti mug dang bcas pa yang ma lags/gti mug dang bral ba yang
447b1(dkon brtsegs): ma blags so//bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta zhing /pha rol la 'dod
447b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bcas pa dang zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag ni lta bar gyur pa gnyis la chags pa lags so//gnyis gang lags zhe na
447b3(dkon brtsegs): chad par lta ba dang /rtag par lta ba lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rje su lta ba de ni de
447b4(dkon brtsegs): dge gi chud par lta ba lags so//gang pha rol lnga 'dod chags da bcas pa zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes smra lta ba de ni de dag gi rtag par lta ba lags so//
447b5(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang /bdag khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rjes su mi lha lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam
447b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de gang du zhugs pa yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang yang dag par zhugs pa de ni gang du yang zhugs pa ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/
447b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de lam la zhugs pa ma yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang lam la zhugs pa de ni 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa lags te/gang
448a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid drug la 'gyur lags/nga ci'i sladadu zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'dus bgyis pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang gnas pa
448a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la grangs gang yang yod dum/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma gyis la grangs gang yang ma
448a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la grangs mchis par gyur na de 'dus bgyis pa nyid du 'gyur gyi 'dus ma bgyis mya lags so//bka' stsal pa/
448a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang 'dus ma byas thob pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la grangs gang yang yod par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams
448a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga grungs gang yang ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams ni grangs ma mchis pa grangs dang bral ba lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal ci khyod 'phags
448a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam/'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags
448a7(dkon brtsegs): so//'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so//ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis spel pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa legs sam/'phags
448b1(dkon brtsegs): bA ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags/bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal sprul pa ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma
448b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no//gsol pa/chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan lags sa ma/bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal de lta'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan
448b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags la/bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags te/de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma legs
448b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lag so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod ci dang ldan/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid dang mi
448b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gal ba dang ldan pa lags so//bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/gsol pa/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyes na bdag gis kyang rnyed lag so///
448b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yul ma brnyes sam/smras pa/
448b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi yul gang yang rnyed dam/smras pa/'jam dpal 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med yul rnyed pa yang med do//smras pa/btsun pa rab
449a1(dkon brtsegs): mngag yams ma thamamamam thatshams samams mamaca/a namathas mkhas namamam thamam a Tha thams maya mam aHka/masasam a ya/ ma yas sa ya
449a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med yul brnyes pa yang med do//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su bsrung ba med par/
449a3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston te//khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su mi bsrung ngo //smras pa/de bas na gnas brtan nyid la yongs su dris/khyed kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig
449a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa yongs su bsrung zhing kha ba dang sgyur ba dang tsha ba'i sman ma byin pa na/ci des nad pa de la nad med pa'i bde ba
449a5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa yin nam/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma yin no//smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang los smra bas las dang po pa yongs su bsrung zhing zab mo'i gtam bcabs/
449a6(dkon brtsegs): to//gtam sna tshogs bstan na des de yang dang yang du 'chi ba las mthar par byas par mi 'gyur zhing shin tu bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa lnga rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro//bstan
449a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lde//lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par
449a8(dkon brtsegs): dag go//lha'i bu bdun brgyas 'jom dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thos nas/'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed//
449b1(dkon brtsegs): yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal nyan thos kyi theg pas sems can rnams 'dul na/ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas
449b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba yin nam/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yang yino///
449b3(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no//btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam/
449b4(dkon brtsegs): 'on te rang sangs rgyas sam/'on te lung dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos yin te pha rol las mnyan pa'i sgra la sbyor bar brtson pa ma
449b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no//kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te snying rje chen po dang mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no//kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te bya ba'i rgyun bcod pa ni ma yin no//
449b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ji ltar nyan thos yin/smras pa/chos ma thos pa mnyan pa sbyin tha~Mngathos par byed de/des na kho bo ni nyan thos yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ji ltar
449b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas yin/smras pa/kho bos chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs te kho bo rang sangs rgyas yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod ji ltar na yang dag par rdzogs
450a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas yin/smras pa/kho bos chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de/des na kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa/
450a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas so//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/sa gang la nges pa yin pa
450a3(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo nis thams cad la nges pa yin par zung shig smras pa/'jam dpal khyod so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya 'am/smras
450a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pu rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa'o//nges pa deng sems can thams cad kyang
450a5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa ste/kho bo yang nges par der nges pa nyid do//des na kho bo so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya'o//smras pa/'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du
450a6(dkon brtsegs): nges par nges pa yin na/'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o//'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o//'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes
450a7(dkon brtsegs): sa rnam par bzhag pa gdags par gal 'gyur/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bcu'i na mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs kyi namakha'o//'di ni lho phyogs
450b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi'o//'di ni nub phyogs kyi'o//'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o//'di ni shar lho'i'o//'di ni lho nub kyi'o//'di ni nub byang gi'o//'di ni byang shar gyi'o//'di ni 'og gi'o//'di ni steng gI phyog
450b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi namakha'o zhes brjod kyang phyogs cha la thu dad po yod kyi na mkha' la ni tha dad pa med pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la/de bzhin
450b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la thabs mkhas pas 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o//'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o//'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//
450b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang sA rnam par bzhag pa lo tha dad pa yod kyi yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do//smras pa/'jom dpal khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/
450b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/zhugs pa yang yin la byung ba yang yin no//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na khyod zhugs pa yang yin la byung ba yang yin/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
450b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang /shes rab dang /ye shes blta bar bya ste/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bri shad pa'i don depes shes par 'gyur ba yod de/
450b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o//btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper ni la phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig la sdug pa/mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba blta na sdug pa'i bu gcig pa zhig kyang
451a1(dkon brtsegs): yod/de la mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba phyir rgol bzhig kyang yod pa ltas/des bu gcig pa de thag ring po lam go lnga ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug pa mthong nas/
451a2(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no snyam du sems skyes te/des de bsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas 'phangs ma thag tu bu gcig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skyes te/de
451a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon goms par byas pas shin tu brgyugs te mnga' de bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o///
451a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la don du lta ba gang zhe na/btsun pa rab 'byor 'phong gi slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla gdags so//btsun pa rab 'byor bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems
451a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no//gsod pa phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig bla dwags so//
451a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dwag so//btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mda' 'phangs la bu
451a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin tu brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas
451b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par so sor rtog go/yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nus snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon
451b2(dkon brtsegs): sum du byed kyang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so//sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dzud do//smras pa/'jam dpal 'di
451b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi yul yin/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten nu yang spyod la 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyang mi
451b4(dkon brtsegs): gos shing /'jig rten na yang snang la chos thams cad la snang ba med pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo//btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
451b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sa thams cad la yang snang la sa ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir
451b6(dkon brtsegs): yang brtson la chos kyi dbyings zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la 'dus ma byas kyang
451b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la bskyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du yang 'du shes la mya ngan las 'das pa
452a1(dkon brtsegs): yang don du mi grany+dzar zhing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa yang thob
452a2(dkon brtsegs): la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin na mkha'i rang bzhin du yang
452a3(dkon brtsegs): shes la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang brtson pa dang /btsun po rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang /
452a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par yang mthong la/sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo//smras po//'jam
452a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o//smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos
452a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to//smras pa/'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos
452a7(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'da' ba la brtsoms te spobs par gyis shig/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'/smras pa/btsun
452b1(dkon brtsegs): bu rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o//lnga gang zhe na/gzugs kyi phung po dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o//de la gzug
452b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o//tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o//'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o//'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o//rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o//dbu ba dang /
452b3(dkon brtsegs): chu'i chu bu re dang /smig rgyu dang /chu shing dang /sgyu ma gang yin pa de la 'jig rten yang med 'jig rten du gdags pa yang med/phung po rnams kyang med/phung por gdags
452b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o//gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o//gang 'jig rten gyi chos
452b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'o//btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyisu
452b6(dkon brtsegs): meng pa/gang gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med/nga yar 'dzin pa med do//gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa med ba de la chags pa med pa/chags pa
452b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnyed pa de ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o//btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o//gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med 'o///
453a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag rag lus pa med pa de dag bdag pa med pa'o//gang bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o//gang dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin/
453a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o//gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med pa'o//gang la 'thab pa med pa de la cod pa med do//gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag dge sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o//
453a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi cod pa de dag na mkha' la lags pa dang mtshungs te/chos thams cad kyang na mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas 'jig rten las yang dag pa
453a4(dkon brtsegs): 'do'o//btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o//chos kyi dbyings kya dbyings med pa ste/gang khams med pa de la mig gi khams med do//
453a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khrims med do//mig gi rnam par shes de'i khams med do//rna ba'i khams med do//sgra khams med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//rtswa khams
453a6(dkon brtsegs): myed do// khams med do//rtswa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//lce'i khams med do//ro khrims med do//lce'i rnam byar shaMswa pA'i kham pa med do//lus kyi khams myed
453a7(dkon brtsegs): do//reg bya'i khams med do//lus gyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//yid kyi khams med do//chos kyi khams med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//
453b1(dkon brtsegs): mngal ya yams thamamamacam/mthams samamasamasaca/a natha/Tha sa nyaThaShas rbamathas tham/mamatham tham mas mamam la/am sa aHka/mam tham thamam ma yam sa yam
453b2(dkon brtsegs): gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do//chu'i khams med do//me'i khams med do//rlung gi khams med do//na mkha'i khams med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams med do//
453b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams med do//gzugs kyi khams med do//gzugs med pa'i khams med do//'dus byas kyi khams med do//'dus ma byas kyi khams med do//glang khams med pa de la
453b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag med/sems can med/srog med/gso ba med/gang zag med/shed las skyes pa med/shed bu med do//gang gis de dag rjes su rtogs pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du
453b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de nas dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de dag sems
453b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol nas rang rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkab ste/tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob
453b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med mngon par rtogs pa yang med do zhes 'dzer to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa brag gis ci zhig thob cing ci theg
453b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs//dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thob pa zhes bya ba de
454a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba nyid do//mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni rlom sems nyid do//g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so//lhag pa'i nga rgyal
454a2(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni bdag gis thob po//bdag gis mngon par rtogs so zhes 'di lta bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis lhag
454a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/smras pa/bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mkhyen te/bdag cag ni ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis
454a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes smra ba/lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhes/kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang /lam gyi mtshan nyid mi
454a5(dkon brtsegs): shes par/bdag gi lam bsgoms so zhes smra ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snya mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang /kun 'byung ba'i mtshan
454a6(dkon brtsegs): ljinyid dang /'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang /lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o//mtshan nyid med pa
454a7(dkon brtsegs): ni'ajigs pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o//chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so//gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo //
454b1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'gog pa mngon du byed do//gang lam bsgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas rmug pa de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o///
454b2(dkon brtsegs): de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no//
454b3(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gris de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid las zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di lta bu thos te/chos zab mo
454b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam po ni nyid kyis rgyas 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to//zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di ma yang rjes su mthun par gyur te mi mthun pa yin no//rab 'byor rnam grang
454b5(dkon brtsegs): des ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams mi gtogs par gang dag nga'i gsung rab 'dri la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dgu thams
454b6(dkon brtsegs): cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par bya'o//grang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni bzod
454b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yang rung ba 'thob par 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod rgyun du 'dzam bu'i gling na/
455a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ston tam/'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhud do//der dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol//de la lha'i bu sngon gyi rgyal/
455a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yod de//de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das dang khyod la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas na///
455a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag chos mi nyan pas yongs su nyams par gyur te/de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe
455a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis lha'i bu dpal bzangs dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang /nyams dga' ba'i kun dga'i ra ba dang //
455a5(dkon brtsegs): nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang /nyam snga dga' ba'i rdzing dang /nyams dga' ba'i bskyed mos tshal dang /rim pa bdun drang ba rgyud dang bcu dang nyi shu pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa
455a6(dkon brtsegs): bsil khang dang /ba gam dang /stegs bu dang /rta babs dang /skar khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba dang /lha'i bu mo rkang lag 'jam zhing mnyen pa gser gyi dra ba
455a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar 'od rnam par dag pa/smin ma legs pa/dpral ba legs pa/banan legs pa/mi ga pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa sngon po lta bur mdzes shing dri ma med pa shin tu yangs
455b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dod pa'i sems bskyed pa/zla ba tshos pa ltar mngon par dga' ba/bzhin mdzum pa dang bcas pa/de dag rgyud gcig pa dang /pi wang dang /sgra snyan dang /khar ba'i sil
455b2(dkon brtsegs): khrol dang /pheg rdob pa dang /rnga zlum dang /rdza rnga dang /rnga mnyam pa dang /gling bu dang /glu dbyangs dang /rol mo'i sgra dbyangs dang /gar dang /bzhad gang dang /'jo ba dang /dga' ba
455b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /rtse bas rgyags shing dga' ba dang /rtse ba dang dga' dgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so//de 'dra ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis
455b4(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs so//de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis rang gis gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang mthong /rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang
455b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar du gyur te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te/nyams dga' ba'i
455b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ro ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas dga' ba dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod pa dang /bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te 'di dag snang
455b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ngo mtshar to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu dpal bzang la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos la
456a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma phyin te/lha'i bu 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes
456a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /lha'i bu kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni//'jam dpalnga gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul
456a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon
456a4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
456a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dres phyogs 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos par 'di snyam du bdag cag dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te snyam pa ni ngo mtshur lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
456a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'dzum dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa las khyed kyis ji tsam zhig shes te/lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur
456a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ni 'dod na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par ston to//sangs rgyas//
456b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag gtsug blud kyis phug ste/steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'jog go//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ba'i tshu'i
456b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs kyang chu yis sems can rnams la gnod pa med de/thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas
456b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bdag nyid kyis shes so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ri de dag yungs kAr gyi 'bru'i
456b4(dkon brtsegs): nang du bcug kyang ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de dag la yang gnod pa med de/thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis shes so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro/
456b5(dkon brtsegs): ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems/
456b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag la bsgrub bo//grang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsreg par byed pa'i me dri dag thams cad mar me'i snying po gcig gi
456b7(dkon brtsegs): me lce tsam gyi mar byin gyis rlobs te/des bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i/
457a1(dkon brtsegs): khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis zil du brlag par byed do//lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul las brtsams nas nga
457a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par yang chos ston te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu dang ldano///
457a3(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma//de nas bdud sdig can 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug ste/des bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la
457a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dri bdag gis blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das tshig tsam du
457a5(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pas ci sman gyis bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can du mkhyen bzhin du sems can tshad med pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par
457a6(dkon brtsegs): sbrel ba'i phyir 'jim dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis khyod kyis 'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /
457a7(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul ston cig dang /sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar
457b1(dkon brtsegs): shes nas/chos thams cad sems kyis dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur byas chos thams cad sems kyi dab/
457b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam
457b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du ma chad pa dang ma lhag pa dang mi mang bar mthong ngo //de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis tshe 'phrul de
457b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/sangs rgyas 'byung ba legs so legs so//sangs rgyas byung ba ni sems can rnams la don chen por nye bar gnas so//de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di
457b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu 'di dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ba yin no//cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di yang 'jig rten na snang ba yino zhes che du brjod pa ched du brjod do//de nas bdud sdig can gyis cho 'phrul de mthong/
457b6(dkon brtsegs): ste ngo mtshar du gyur nas thal mo sbyar te 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyi
457b7(dkon brtsegs): mo khyab ste ngo mchod to//sems can gong dag cho 'phrul bshad pa 'od thos nas mos pa de dag ngo mtshar che bar bdag gis bsams so//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdud sdig can gang+gA'i klung
458a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed du gyur kyang de ltar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs lag so//bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can bdag ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/
458a2(dkon brtsegs): bar de bzhin gshegs pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba dang /sems can rnams la yang gtse bar sems pa dang /brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rtse ba'i bar
458a3(dkon brtsegs): chad bgyi ba'i slad du yang zhugs pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad grong dang grong khyer drang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs
458a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di rab tu spyod pa de kho ra 'khor yub tu dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mig gis mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag mi mchi bar bdag gi yi dam de lta bu blangs par bgyi'o//grang
458a5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'chad pa dang 'chad pa dang ston pa dang so sor rtogs pa dang bsgrub pa de la ston pa la bgyi ba ltar gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'on du lags kyang /bdag gi
458a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gang de bzhin gshegs de'i bstan pa'i bar chud bgyi ba dang brtson pa rnams g.yengs par bgyi ba'i slong du zhugs pa dag mchis te de dag chad pas dgum pa'i slad du rigs
458a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyi'o//tad ya thA/a na le/bi ma le/s+thi ta twe/a ka la pa ni rje ta sha tru/dza ye dza ya ba ti
458b1(dkon brtsegs): b+hu tra ma ti mA ti/sha mAM shanA ti/a pu me/phu phu mo/d+hi ri/a khe/ma kho/kha khe/mi si l-i/a ga mr-i/phu la lo/phu la/phu le/pha shu mo/shu shu me/d+hi d+hi re/A nA ba na to//
458b2(dkon brtsegs): s+thi ta twe/kri tAr te/krid ta bi d+yA/bi ro tsa tAna?/sad d+harma b+hA Na ko s+ya/su'u tra s+ya d+ha rA ka/a b+ha mu si tA/i b+ha su lu r+ya sA hA/bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba grang gsang sngags kyi tshig
458b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di rnams kyis kun tu gsungs pa de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing skabs mi legs te/de ni gnas ma mchis kyi steng du de lnga gos dang
458b4(dkon brtsegs): zas dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub pa dang spro bar bgyi ba dang spobs par bgyi bar spro bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu

458b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi lags pa rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur te/de dag la slar rgol ba'am mi mdza' ba gang gis
458b7(dkon brtsegs): glegs bltas kyang glags brnyed par mi 'gyur lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la legs so zhes bya ba byin te sdig can legs so leg so//'di ltar khyod kyis/
459a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung sngags kyi tshig bstan pa brjod pas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/khyod kyi spobs pa de thams cad ni 'jam
459a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabasu rig par bya'o//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs 'di bstan pa dang /
459a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi gsang sngags kyi stobs dang //rig sngags kyi stobs bstan pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te//da
459a4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas lha'i bu dpal bzang la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu khyod dga' ldan gyi gnas su song la/dga' ldan gyi ris kyi
459a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rnams bsdus shig dang kho bo yang der 'ong ngo //de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lhar mnyan te/bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal/
459a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad dang /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dge 'dun la bskor ba byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas 'khor de nas mi
459a7(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur te/dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la smras pa/grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/
459b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'u bu cag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong gis/de la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khyed dga' ba dang rtse bA la bag med par dor te brag yod par gyis la
459b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos nyan du shig shig/de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbus su
459b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i yid las byung ba/rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor gyi 'khyams chur shar nub du dpag tshad sum brgya drug khri nyis stong yod la zheng lho byang du dpag tshad khri drug stong yod
459b4(dkon brtsegs): pa byas te/der seng ge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa'i lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba stong phrag du ma byas so//de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'khor
459b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyams bkod pa de dag dang seng ge'i khri rnams kyang byas nas thal mo sbyar te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal khyod kyis khyams bkod pa dang seng ge'i
459b6(dkon brtsegs): khri bkod pa bgyis lags na/dra de'i dus la byab par mkhyen na gshogasu gsol//de nas 'dzum dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' khro nyis stong dang nyan thos kyi mchog lnga
459b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya dang /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom
460a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to//
460a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams der rang gi khri ji ltar bshams pa la 'dug go/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /nyan thos chen po
460a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /
460a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /bdud kyi ris rnams dang /gzugs na spyod pa tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis gcig nas
460a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu sgra thos pa/'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'bol ba'i chos kyi gtam chen po smra bar 'gyur gyis bdag cag kyang chos nyan pa'i
460a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir nges par der 'dod par bya'o//skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong ba ni legs par mthong ba'o//de dag las chos thos pa ni legs par thos pa'o zhes sgra thos nas skad cig
460a7(dkon brtsegs): thong cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu tshad med grangs med pa dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te dga' ldan gyi gnas su
460b1(dkon brtsegs): phyin to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs byas des lha'i 'khor de tsam du tshad med pa dag rin po che bkod pa'i khyams kyi 'khyor/
460b2(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du go skabs yangs par gnas par gyur to//de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal lha'i 'khor chen po 'di
460b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus lags na chos kyi bka' mching las brtsams te spobs par mdzad du gsol//de skad ces smras pa dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu dpal bzang dang thams cad
460b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po dag chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba dag go//bzhi
460b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshul khrims la gnas pa'i thos pa dang /bsam gtan la gnas pa'i shes rab dang /mngon par shes pa la gnas pa'i ye shes dang /thabs la gnas
460b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bgra yod pa ste/grogs po dag chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o//grogs po dag de la yongs su dag pa rnam pa
460b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug ste/yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis ji ltar 'dug ce na/'di lta ste lus dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /ngag dag pa'i rnams pas 'jug pa dang //
461a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dag pa'i rnam byas 'jug pa dang /bsam pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /'tsho ba dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad nga /
461a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /tshul 'chos pa dang kha bsag dang gzhogs slongs dang thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad rnam par spong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /byang chub kyi sems
461a3(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ste/grogs po dag de ltar yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug go//grogs po dag de la yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yongs su
461a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ste/rnam pa brgyad gang she na/'di lta ste bla ma la gus pas yongasu dag pa dang /nga rgyal bcom pas yongs su dag pa dang /brtson 'grus dang 'dzin pas yongs su dag pa dang /
461a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa mi g.yeng bas yongs su dag pa dang /bstan pa dang rab tu bshad pas yongs su dag pa dang /bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi spyod pas yongs su dag pa dang /tshul bzhin du so
461a6(dkon brtsegs): sor rtogs pas yongs su dag pa dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos bsgrub pas yongs su dag pa ste/grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yongs su dag go//grogs po dag de'i
461a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag ste/rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste dgon pa la gnas shing dben pa la dga' bas yongs su dag pa dang /'du 'ji spong bas yod
461b1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang /yul dang mi 'dre bas yongs su dag pa dang /lus dang sems las su rung bas yongs su dag pa dang /kha zas bsnyungs te lus 'tsho bas yongs su dag pa dang /dmigs pa la
461b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pas yongs su dag pa dang /sgra dang mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jigs pas yongs su dag pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang zang zing med par so sor yang dag par 'ged pas yongasasu
461b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ste/grogs po dag da ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag go/grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag ste/rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste phung
461b4(dkon brtsegs): po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /khams la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /rten cing 'brel par
461b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /bden pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /rnam par thar
461b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgo gsum la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /bag la nyal dang kun nas bkris pa dang blta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag
461b7(dkon brtsegs): pab ste/grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag go//grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
462a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa mang par gzugs thams cad mthong bas lha'i mig yongs su dag pa dang /sgrib pa med par sgra thams cad thos pas lha'i zla ba yongs su dag pa dang /sems
462a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bas pha rol gyi sems shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /sgrib pa med cing chags pa med par sngon gyi mtha' rjes su dran pas sngon gyi
462a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes po yongs su dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro bas rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba yongs su dag pa dang /zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pas bsal
462a4(dkon brtsegs): cing dus ma yin pa'i yongs su spangs pas zag pa zad pa yongs su dag pa dang /g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa
462a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /ji ltar sngon dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas bshes pa brtan pa yongs su dge pa ste/grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongasu dag go//
462a6(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag ste/rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phung po lnga yongs su shes pas sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /
462a7(dkon brtsegs): sred pa shin tu spongs pas kun 'byung ba shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /rton nas skyes pa la skye ba med par so sor rtog pas 'gog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /'dus byas dang
462b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bas rgyu shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang
462b2(dkon brtsegs): srog med pa dang gso ba med pas rkyen shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /'khor gsum yongasu gcod pas dus gsum shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yaM
462b3(dkon brtsegs): shes thams cad la 'jug pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag go//grogs po dag de la rnam pa
462b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag ste/rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste nang nye bar zhi bas yongs su dag pa dang /phyir du mi rgyu bas yongs su dag pa dang /khams gsum
462b5(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mthun pas yongs su dag pa dang /skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas yongs su dag pa dang /mngon par
462b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa med pas so sor rtogs pas yongs su dag pa dang /chos thams cad bdag med par so sor rtog pas yongasu dag pa dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi 'khru/
462b7(dkon brtsegs): bso yongasu dag pa ste/grogs po dag 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o//grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su dpe ste/
463a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang /thos pa yongs su byang bas yongs su dag pa dang /

463a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi rlom sems med pas yongs su dag pa dang /nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang /dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas yongs su dag pa ste/grogs/
463a4(dkon brtsegs): po dag rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongs su dag go/grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed bag yod par gyis shig/bag yod pa la brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

463a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o//ngan song gsum las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang

463b1(dkon brtsegs): bo de dag go/'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa dang /'khor ba la

463b6(dkon brtsegs): sgom par byed/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa mdo pa'o//rigs gsum rgyun mi gcod de/sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang chos kyi rigs dang /dge 'dun gyi rigs so//

464a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims dang /tshul khrims las bzlog pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang /gnod sems dang /bzod pa las bzlogs

465b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam lnga yang rmongs pa med la dran pa yang med cing yid la byed pa yang med pa dang /thams cad kyi rjes su yang song la rtag tu mnyam par yang gzhan
465b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang thob par gyur la/spros pa dang lta ba yang yang dag par chad
466a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni de'i dbang po'i bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o//de stobs lnga bsgoms pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas phas kyi rgol/

466a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'phrogs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa dang /shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med
466a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/de ltar stobs lnga yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/

466a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos la dga' ba dang tu bya bar bya ba'i phyir dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /lus dang sems mi g.yo ba dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa
466b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa
466b2(dkon brtsegs): dang /mthon dman med pa'i btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste/'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa zhes bya'o//grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub
466b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/gang 'di rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag
466b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang /'dod pa dang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang /bdag dang gzhan la gtong ba med pa'i
466b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang /tshul 'chos pa dang /kha bsag dang gzhogs slongs dang thob kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i tshor ba bsgom pa dang /lus dang sems
466b6(dkon brtsegs): nyams chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang /bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la smod pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang /gti mug dang
466b7(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang /rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/'di ni 'phags par
